By observing fasts or vows in any other way, littlewitted man gain nothing.

source: मित्रध्रुग् दुष्टभावश्च नास्तिकोऽथानृजुः शठः। न सत्सु लभते पूजां यज्ञे मूर्ख इवागतः॥
target: One who injures the interests of friends, who is of a wicked habit, an atheist, crooked and a deceitful man, does not get worship among the honest as an ignorant man coming to a sacrificial ceremony.

source: न जातु कामान्न भयान्न लोभाद् धर्म त्यजेज्जीवितस्यापि हेतोः। नित्यो धर्मः सुखदुःखे त्वनित्ये जीवो नित्यो हेतुरस्य त्वनित्यः॥
target: For the sake neither of pleasure, not of fear, nor of cupidity should any one renounce Virtue. Indeed, for the sake of even life, one should not renounce Virtue. Virtue is eternal. Pleasure and Pain are not eternal. Jiva is eternal. The cause, however of Jiva's being covered with a body is not so.

source: ततः स पुनरुद्यम्य वृक्षान् बहुविधान् बली। प्राहिणोद् भीमसेनाय तस्मै भीमश्च पाण्डवः॥
target: Then that mighty Rakshasas tearing up various trees, hurled them at Bhima and that Pandava also (hurled) many on the Rakshasas.

source: दिवि देवा महीपाल क्रीडार्थमवनिं गताः। कृत्वा कार्यमिदं चैव ततश्च दिवमागताः॥
target: The deities, O king come to this world for sport. Having achieved their task, they ascended one more to the celestial region.

source: पञ्चाो भोजनं भुज्यात् प्राङ्मुखो मौनमास्थितः। न निन्द्यादन्नभक्ष्यांश्च स्वाद्वस्वादु च भक्षयेत्॥
target: One should, washing the five limbs, eal silently with face turned towards the East, One should never speak of the food which he is to eal. One should eat food which is good to the taste.

source: अथोद्यम्य गदे घोरे सशृङ्गाविव पर्वतौ। तावाजघ्नतुरन्योन्यं मण्डलानि विचेरतुः॥ क्रियाविशेषकृतिनौ रणभूमितलेऽचलौ।
target: Uplifting their terrible weapons, they again strucks each other like mountains striking each other with their summits at the time of an earthquake.

source: अनीशस्याप्रमत्तस्य भूतानि पचत: सदा॥ अनिवृत्तस्य कालस्य क्षयं प्राप्तो न मुच्यते।
target: Time has no master. Time is ever vigilant. Time is always coO king every thing within itself. No one who has once entered the kingdom of Time which is perpetually going on, can escape therefrom.

source: स तं कैलासशृङ्गार्भ प्रासादं रघुनन्दनः॥ आरुरोह नृपं द्रष्टुं सहसा तेन राघव।
target: Accompanied with Sumantra, Raghava, the descendant of the Raghus, for the purpose of beholding the monarch, began with rapid steps, to ascend the palace resembling a peak of the Kailasa hill.

source: भूयोऽपि दुःखं मम भीमसेन दूये विषस्येव रसं हि पीत्वा। यद् याज्ञसेनी परिक्लिश्यमानां संदृश्य तत् क्षान्तमिति स्म भीम॥
target: O Bhimasena, this was my great grief that I could not do anything when I saw Yajnaseni (Draupadi) persecuted in that way. O Bhima, my heart burns on account of this, as if I have drunk some poisonous liquid.

source: इमां ते तरुणी भार्यां तवाधिभिरभिप्लुताम्। कथं संधारयिष्यामि विवत्सामिव धेनुकाम्॥
target: How shall I comfort your young wife overwhelmed by the grief caused by your death and resembling a cow bereft of its calf.

source: भीमसेन उवाच स्वागतं ते वरारोहे यन्मां वेदयसे प्रियम्। न ह्यन्यं कञ्चिदिच्छामि सहायं वरवर्णिनी॥
target: Bhimasena said O fair and timid lady, I shall do what you say, welcome, O fair damsel, you, who have communicated this pleasant news to me.

source: प्रणम्य शिरसा नित्यं श्रोतव्यं क्षत्रियैर्द्विजात्॥ ऐश्वर्यं पुत्रलाभश्च भविष्यति न संशयः। रामायणमिदं कृत्स्नं शृण्वतः पठतः सदा॥
target: The Kșatriyas, bending low their heads, should hear this daily from the Brāhmaṇas. Hearing or reading the whole of Rāmāyaṇa, forsooth shall people get sons and riches.

source: द्वारकावासिनं कृष्णं द्वारवत्यां समासदत्। धर्मनाकाक्षिणं पार्थं दर्शनाकाक्षयाच्युतः॥
target: He arrived at Dvaravati in which Dvaravati city Krishna was living. Having heard that the son of Pritha (Yudhishthira) was eager to see him, Achyuta (Krishna) also became eager to see him.

source: एवं प्राप्ततमं कालं यो मोहान्नावबुद्ध्यते। स विनश्यति वै क्षिप्रं दीर्घसूत्रो यथा झषः॥
target: Like the idle fish, who from want of intelligence could not forsee the danger, every one meets with destruction.

source: कम्पनां तु समासाद्य नदी सिद्धनिषेविताम्। पुण्डरीकमवाप्नोति स्वर्गलोकं च गच्छति॥
target: Then going to the river named Kampana frequented by the Siddhas one obtains the fruits of Pundarika sacrifice and goes to the celestials region.

source: तस्य नारायणे भक्तिं वहतोऽमित्रकर्षिणः। एकशय्यासनं देवो दत्तवान् देवराट् स्वयम्॥
target: Seeing the devotion to Narayana of that destroyer of foes, the divine king of the gods himself shared with him his own seat and bed.

source: पदाति सानुजं दृष्ट्वा ससीतं च जनास्तदा। ऊचुर्बहुजना वाचः शोकोपहतचेतसः॥
target: And deprived of their senses by grief, the multitudes,* beholding Rāma proceeding on foot in company with Sītā and his younger brother, said. *Another reading i.e., Beholding Rāma without his umbrella and walking a foot.

source: पुत्रांस्ते निहतान् दृष्ट्वा सूतपुत्रः सुदुर्मनाः॥ हंसवर्णान् हयान् भूयः प्रेषयद् यत्र पाण्डवः।
target: Seeing those sons of yours thus slain Karna once more urged on his swan-like horses to where that son of Pandu was.

source: स मन्त्रकाले सम्मन्त्र्य सर्वां नैःश्रेयसी क्रियाम्। सुयोधनमिदं वाक्यमब्रवीद् राजसंसदि॥
target: Then in that time suitable for consultations, he consulted with them about the best remedial measure (against Arjuna's vow). And then repairing to the assembly of kings he said these words to Suyodhana.

source: ततस्तु कम्पनं दृष्ट्वा शोणिताक्षो हतं रणे। रथेनाभ्यपतित्क्षिप्रं तत्राङ्गदमभीतवत्॥
target: Seeing Kampana slain in the conflict, ſoņitākṣa mounted on a car, intrepidity rushed against Angada.

source: अस्त्येव त्वयि शोकोऽपि हर्षश्चापि तथा त्वयि। सुखदुःखे तथा चोभे तत्र का परिवेदना॥
target: You have grief for your associate. But joy, at the same time, lives in you. Both happiness and misery live in you. Why should you then yield to grief?

source: गते तु तस्मिन् नरदेववर्यः शक्रात्मजः शक्ररिपुप्रमाथी। शक्रेण दत्तानि ददौ महात्मा महाधनान्युत्तमरूपवन्ति॥ दिवाकराभाणि विभूषणानि प्रियः प्रियायै सुतसोममात्रे। ततः स तेषां कुरुपुङ्गवानां तेषां च सूर्याग्निसमप्रभाणाम्॥ विप्रर्षभाणामुपविश्य मध्ये सर्वं यथावत् कथयांबभूवा एवं मयास्त्राण्युपशिक्षितानि शक्राच्च वाताच्च शिवाच्च साक्षात्॥
target: He (Matali) having departed; that foremost of the royal race-the slayer of all the foes-the noble-minded son of Sakra, made over to his sweet-heart-the mother of Sutashoma-those beautiful and precious gems and ornaments of sun-like splendour presented by Sakra. Then sitting amidst those best of the Kurus and those Brahmanas having the lustre of the sun or fire, he (Arjuna), narrated (to them) faithfully all that happened (to him in heaven). "In this way, I have learnt the (science of) arms from Sakra, Vayu and Shiva himself;

source: सर्वा मातृस्तथाऽऽपृच्छ्य कृत्वा चैव प्रदक्षिणम्। सर्वाः प्रकृतयश्चैव प्रययुर्वारणावतम्॥
target: Taking leave of all the mothers (elderly ladies), walking round them respectfully and bidding farewell to the citizens, they (the Pandavas) started for Varanavata.

source: पुरूरवो भरतश्चक्रवर्ती यस्यान्ववाये भरताः सर्व एव। तथा वीरो दाशरथिश्च रामो ये चाप्यन्ये विश्रुताः कीर्तिमन्तः॥ तथा राजा पृथुकर्मा दिलीपो दिवं प्राप्तो गोप्रदानैर्विधिज्ञः। र्मान्धाताभूद् गोप्रदानैश्च युक्तः॥ तस्मात् पार्थ त्वमपीमां मयोक्तां बार्हस्पती भारती धारयस्व। द्विजाग्र्येभ्यः सम्प्रयच्छस्व प्रीतो गाः पुण्या वै प्राप्य राज्यं कुरूणाम्॥
target: Therefore, O son of Pritha, do you also keep in mind, those instructions of Brihaspati which I have recited to you Having obtained the kingdom of the Kurus, do you, with a cheerful heart, make gifts of good kine to foremost of Brahmanas.

source: नैषा तव ममैषेति ततस्तौ मन्युराविशत्। तस्या रूपेण सम्पत्तौ विगतस्नेहसौहृदौ॥
target: They each exclaimed, "She is mine, not yours.” Maddened by her beauty, they lost all love and friendship (that they bore for each other).

source: अविधिश्च विधिश्चैव समुत्पन्नौ तथैकतः। विद्याविद्येति विख्याते श्रुतिशास्त्रार्थचिन्तकैः॥
target: Allotment of attributes and the destruction thereof, called respectively by the names of Ignorance and Knowledge by persons learned in the Shrutis, then arose, referring to this, that, or the other of the three.

source: दिव्यमस्ति न मे ज्ञानं नाभिजानामि मैथिलीम्॥ यस्तां वक्ष्यति तं वक्ष्ये दग्धः स्वं रूपमास्थितः। योऽभिजानाति तद्रक्षस्तद् वक्ष्ये राम तत्परम्॥
target: I am not gifted with divine fore-sight and therefore do not know where Maithilī is. I shall let you know of him who shall be able to tell you all about her, after I resume my original shape, being burnt (by you). I shall furthermore tell you, O Rāma, who knows that Räksasa.

source: एकान्ततो ह्यमर्यादात् सर्वोऽप्युद्विजते जनः। दस्यवोऽप्यभिशङ्कन्ते निरनुक्रोशकारिणः॥
target: If the king disregards all healthy restraints, all people are filled with terror. They very robbers who know not what mercy is, fear such a king.

source: तथाप्यप्रियमस्माकं पुत्रस्ते समुपाचरत्। द्रौपद्या यत् सभामध्ये सव्यमूरुमदर्शयत्॥
target: Your son wronged us in many ways. In the court he had shown his left thigh to Draupadi.

source: अवप्लुत्य रथात् तूर्णं तव सैन्यान्यभीषयत्। तमुद्वीक्ष्य गदाहस्तं ततस्ते गजसादिनः॥
target: Speedily jumped down from his car and struck terror into the hearts of your troops. Then those elephant-warriors, beholding him stand with mace in hand,

source: मम त्वनन्तरं कृत्यं यद् वै तत् त्वं निबोध मे। हयान् विमुच्य हि सुखं विशल्यान् कुरु माधव॥
target: Hear what seems to me to be our duty next. Unyoking the steeds, leave them to their ease and O Madhava, draw out the arrows from their body."

source: ततो गच्छेतधर्मज्ञ दीर्घसत्रं यथाक्रमम्। तत्र ब्रह्मादयो देवाः सिद्धाश्च परमर्षयः॥
target: O king, one should then go in due order to Dirghasatra. There did Brahma and the celestials, the Siddhas and the great Rishis.

source: अदृष्टपूर्वव्यसना राजपुत्री यशस्विनी। तेन दुःखेन रुदती नैव मां किंचिदब्रवीत्॥
target: And not having experienced any calamity before, the famed princes weeping because of this misfortune, told me nothing.

source: वैश्यं हत्वा तु वर्षे द्वे ऋषभैकशतं च गाः। शूद्रं हत्वाब्दमेवैकमृषभं च शतं च गाः॥ श्ववराहखरान् हत्वा शौद्रमेव व्रतं चरेत्।
target: Having killed a Vaishya one Vaishya one should perform such a sacrifice for two years and present a hundred kine with one bull. Having killed a Shudra, one should perform such a sacrifice for one year and present a hundred kine with one bull. Having killed a dog or a bear or a camel, one should perform the same penance that is laid down for killing a Shudra.

source: व्याध उवाच मूर्धानमाश्रितो वह्निः शरीरं परिपालयन्। प्राणो मूर्धनि चाग्नौ च वर्तमानो विचेष्टते॥
target: The Fowler said: The vital spirit manifesting itself it seat the consciousness causes the action of the corporeal frame. The soul being present in both of these acts.

source: भग्नाक्षोपस्करान् कांश्चिद् भग्नचक्रांश्च भारत। अपश्याम महाराज शतशोऽथ सहस्रशः॥
target: We beheld, O monarch, chariots by hundreds and thousands then, some with their Akihas shattered and bottoms broken, some with their wheels broken.

source: कलिङ्गानां तु तं शूरं क्रुद्धं क्रुद्धो वृकोदरः। रथाद् रथमभिद्रुत्य मुष्टिनाभिजघान ह॥
target: Vrikodara, then fired with rage, leaped from (his own) car to that of the heroic prince of a : Kalinga, who also was (very) angry and killed him with blows from his fists.

source: व्यूढोरस्को महाबाहुरनिवर्ती स्थप्रणुत्। गतस्तव वरारोहे पुत्रः स्वर्ग ज्वरं जहि॥
target: Of expansive chest and mighty arms, unretreating and slayer of car-warriors, your son, 0 you of dainty waist, has gone to heaven. Renounce yours fever of grief.

source: स तद् गृह्य धनुःश्रेष्ठं तस्थौ स्थानं समाहितः। विचकर्षाथ विधिवत् सशरं धनुरुत्तमम्॥
target: Then that Brahmacharin taking up that most excellent bow stood in the proper posture. And placing the arrow on the string he began to stretch the latter duly.

source: आविवेश महान्हर्षों देवानां चारणैः सह। रावणे निहते रौद्रे सर्वलोकभयंकरे॥
target: And Ravana, the dread of all people, being slain, the celestials with the Cäraņas were greatly delighted.

source: चत्वारि कर्माण्यभयंकराणि भयं प्रयच्छन्त्ययथाकृतानि। मानाग्निहोत्रमुत मानमौनं मानेनाधीतमुत पानयज्ञः॥
target: Study, taciturnity, worship before fire and sacrifices, these are the four means through which fear is removed. But when these four are mixed with vanity, they cause fear instead of removing it.

source: त्वरितो वीर गच्छ त्वं गान्धार्युदरमाविश॥ पृथिव्यां धावमानस्य नान्यत् पश्यामि जीवनम्। यदि तावत् कृता बुद्धिः पलायणपरायणा॥
target: O brave warrior! Go immediately and reenter in the ovary of Gandhari, your mother. Because, there is o other place on this earth capable to defend you if you depart from the battle-field.

source: अश्वक्रन्देन वीरेण रेणुकेन च पक्षिराट्। क्रथनेन च शूरेण तपनेन च खेचरः॥ उलूकश्वसनाभ्यां च निमेषेण च पक्षिराट्। प्ररुजेन च संग्रामं चकार पुलिनेन च॥
target: Garuda fought with the greatly courageous Ashvakranda and Renuka, the bold Krathana and Tapana, Uluka and Shvasana, Nimesha, Praruja and Pulina.

source: अथ संगृह्य वेगेन गरुत्मानिव पन्नगम्। स तु शीघ्रं बिलद्वारं संप्रविश्य त दुर्मति॥ प्रविवेश च तद्द्वारं रावणो निर्भयस्तदा। स प्रविश्य च पश्यद्वै नीलाञ्जनचयोपमान्॥ केयूरधारिण शूरारक्तमाल्यानुलेपनान्। वरहाटकरत्नाद्यैर्विविधैश्च विभूषितान्॥ दृश्यन्ते तत्र नृत्यन्त्यस्तिस्रः कोट्यो महात्मनाम्। नृत्योत्सवा वीतभया विमलाः पावकप्रभाः॥ नृत्यन्त्यः पश्यते तांस्तु रावणो भीमविक्रमः। द्वारस्थौ रावणस्तत्र तासु कोटिषु निर्भयः॥ यथा दृष्टः स तु नरस्तुल्यांस्तानपि सर्वशः। एकवर्णानेकवेषानेकरूपान्महौजसः॥ चतुर्भुजान्महोत्साहांस्तत्रापश्यत्स राक्षसः।
target: As Garuda goes speedily taking a serpent so that vicious-minded Rāvana arrived quickly at the entrance of the den. And Ravana, having no fear, entered therein. And having entered there he saw males resembling the red collyrium, wearing Keyüras,* heroic, be-decked with red garlands, pasted with red sandal and adorned with diverse golden ornaments and jewels. He saw there three millions, of such high-minded persons. devoid of fear, pure, radiant like fire, dancing being mad after festivities. Beholding them the Ten-necked demon, of dreadful prowess, was not the least terrified and rather saw their dance, standing at the gate. They were all like the male being he had seen before. They were all of the same colour, same dress, same figure and equally gifted with great energy. They were all gifted with four arms and great energy. *A kind of ornament used on arms.

source: तस्य चाक्ष्णो महत् तेजो येनायं मथितो गिरिः। त्वत्प्रियार्थं च मे देवि प्रकृतिस्थः पुनः कृतः॥
target: The great energy of that eye crushed and consumed this mountain. For pleasing you, however, O goddess, I once more restored Himavat to his pristine condition for making good the injury.

source: शत्रुः पतिप्रवादेन मात्रेव हितकाम्यया। आशीविष इवाङ्गेन बाले परिधृतस्त्वया॥ यथा हि कुर्याच्छत्रुर्वा सर्पो वा प्रत्युपेक्षितः। राज्ञा दशरथेनाद्य सपुत्रा त्वं तथा कृता ॥
target: You O girl, in consideration of your welfare, have like to a mother taken to your lap a venomous snake in the form of your husband, Even what is done by an enemy or a serpent left alone, is being done by Dasaratha of wicked ways and false soothing speech, to you and your own son.

source: भीष्म उवाच श्रद्धापूतो नरस्तात दुर्दान्तोऽपि न संशयः। पूतो भवति सर्वत्र किमुत त्वं महाद्युते॥
target: Bhishma said He who has no selfcontrol becomes, forsooth, cleansed by devotion. Such a man, becomes purified in respect of every act.

source: धाता विधाता लोकेशो दिशश्च सदिगीश्वराः। स्वस्ति तेऽद्य प्रयच्छन्तु कार्तिकेयश्च षण्मुखः॥
target: May Dhatri and Vidhatri, the quarters of heaven and their regents and the six-headed Kartikeya do all that is beneficial you!

source: नदीं चाश्रमसंश्लिष्टां पुण्यतोयां ददर्श सः। सर्वप्राणभृतां तत्र जननीमिव धिष्ठिताम्॥
target: He saw that the hermitage was situated on the banks of the river, a most sacred one and she flowed as the mother of all the creatures living there.

source: भवानस्मन्नियोगेन यातु तावन्महीतलम्। काम्यके द्रक्ष्यसे वीरं निवसन्तं युधिष्ठिरम्॥
target: At my request go back to the earth. You will find the heroic Yudhishthira living in the Kamyaka (forest).

source: उर्वशी कृत्तिकायोगे गत्वा चैव समाहितः। लौहित्ये विधिवत् स्नात्वा पुण्डरीकफलं लभेत्॥
target: Bathing with concentrated soul in the tirtha of Urvashi which is situated in the river Lohitya, on the day of full moon of the month of Kartika, one acquires the merits of Pundarika sacrifice.

source: एतच्छ्रुत्वा तु सा कन्या गालवं वाक्यमब्रवीत्। मम दत्तो वरः कश्चित् केनचिद् ब्रह्मवादिना॥
target: Hearing these words, the damsel said to Galava: “A boon has granted to me by a certain being conversant with Brahma,

source: कपिल उवाच प्रत्यक्षमिह पश्यन्ति भवन्तः सत्पथे स्थिताः। प्रत्यक्षं तु किमत्रास्ति यद् भवन्त उपासते॥
target: Kapila said Adopting the path of the good (viz., Yoga), do you in even this life realise its fruits by the direct evidence of your senses! What, however, are the palpable results of those other objects which pursue?

source: एवमुक्त्वा जहासोच्चैः केसवः परवीरहा। अस्य संस्मयतः शौरेविद्युदूपा महात्मनः॥
target: Saying this Keshava, the slayer of the heroes of his enemies, laughed aloud and at his laughter the body of the great-souled one became like lightning.

source: साहमेवंगता श्रेष्ठा श्रुतधर्मपरावरा। आर्ये किमवमन्येयं स्त्रिया भर्ता हि दैवतम्॥
target: O exalted one, having learnt from my superiors the principal as well the minor duties, shall I disregard (my lord)? A husband is a deity to the wife.

source: योगनित्यो महाराज सिद्धि प्राप्तो महातपाः। तं तत्र वसमानं तु जैगीषव्यं महामुनिम्॥
target: That great ascetic ever practising Yoga, O monarch, while residing in Devala's hermitage became crowned with ascctic success.

source: ऋषयस्तत्र देवेशं स्तुवन्तो बहुभिः स्तवैः। तेजश्चास्मै वर्धयन्तो राजन्नासन् पुनः पुनः॥
target: There the great Rishi began to praise that Lord of the celestials with numerous kinds of hymns; as also they were repeatedly increasing His energy and stood up there, O monarch.

source: विस्तीर्यैतन्महज्ज्ञानमृषिः संक्षिप्य चाब्रवीत्। इष्टं हि विदुषां लोके समासव्यासधारणम्॥ मन्वादि भारतं केचिदास्तीकादि तथापरे। तथोपरिचराद्यन्ये विप्राः सम्यगधीयते॥
target: All this, having been seen by Rishi Vyasa, is mentioned here in due order as a specimen of the book. Rishi Vyasa declared this mass of knowledge in both abridged and detailed forms. The learned of the world wish to possess both the detailed and the abridged accounts. Some read the Bharata from the first Mantra, some from the story of Astika, some again from Uparichara, while some Brahmanas read the whole.

source: धृष्टद्युम्नेन सहितो महत्या सेनयावृतः। केकया भ्रातरः पञ्च वामपार्श्व समाश्रिताः॥ धृष्टकेतुर्नरव्याघ्रश्चेकितानश्च वीर्यवान्। दक्षिणं पक्षमाश्रित्य स्थितौ व्यूहस्य रक्षणे॥
target: The five Kaikeya brothers, united with Dhrishtadyumna and supported by a mighty division, stationed themselves on its left wing. Dhrishtaketu the foremost of men and Chekitana endued with prowess, stationing themselves on the right wing, prepared themselves for the defence of array.

source: तच्छूलं राघवो दृष्ट्वा ज्वलन्तं घोरदर्शनम्। ससर्ज विशिखारामश्चापमायम्य वीर्यवान् ॥
target: Seeing the dart, flaming and of terrific aspect, Raghu's son-Rāma-endowed with prowess, drawing his bow, discharged arrows.

source: हतो दुर्योधन: पापो राज्यस्य परिपन्थिकः। दुःशासनस्य रुधिरं पीतं विस्फुरतो मया॥
target: The wretched Duryodhana, that thorn in the way of our sovereignty, has been killed. I have quaffed the blood of the living Dusshasana.

source: तव संधारयन् पुत्रमब्रवीच्छान्तनोः सुतः। दुर्योधन विजानीहि स्थिरो भूत्वा विशाम्पते॥
target: Spoke these words to your son, consoling him therewith "O Duryodhana, O ruler of men, hear patiently what I now speak to you.

source: हा राम रामानुज हा हा वैदेहि तपस्विनि। न मां जानीत दुःखेन म्रियमाणमनाथवत्॥
target: Ah Rāma! Ah you younger brother of Rāma! Ah you unfortunate Vaidehī! You do not know that I am through grief lamenting like one deserted.

source: मातर ऊचुः इच्छाम तासां मातृणां प्रजा भोक्तुं प्रयच्छ नः। त्वया सह पृथग्भूता ये च तासामथेश्वराः॥
target: The mothers said : We desire that while living with you we may be able to eat up the progeny of those mothers and their grandsons by assuming different shapes. Grant us this favour.

source: अश्वानां प्रतिपानं च खादनं चैव सोऽन्वशात्। गुहस्तत्रैव पुरुषांस्त्वरितं दीयतामिति॥
target: Thereupon Guha on the spot commanded the men, saying, Let the horses have without delay meats and drinks.

source: यथाश्रममुपासीत आगमस्तत्र सिध्यति। सिद्धिः प्रत्यक्षरूपा च दृश्यत्यागमनिश्चयात्॥
target: Without avoiding the duties sanctioned for the particular inode of life which one may follow, one should follow the practices laid down in Agama. Such observance of the practices laid down in Agama gives one success. On account of the certainty of the conclusions of Agama, the success which the latter brings on may be said to be almost realisable by direct evidence.

source: परिग्रहान् परित्यज्य भवेद् बुद्ध्या जितेन्द्रियः। अशोकं स्थानमातिष्ठेदिह चामुत्र चाभयम्॥
target: One should, without taking any gifts, by the help of his own intelligence completely control his passions. One should live in his sclf where there is no grief. One would then have no fear in this world and attain to fearless region in the next world.

source: ततोऽस्य यज्ञविषयो रक्षोभिः पर्यबध्यत। अथागस्त्यमृषिश्रेष्ठं वाहनायाजुहाव ह॥
target: His sacrificial rites and presents were obstructed by Rakshasas. It was at this time that Nahusha yoked that foremost of Rishis, viz., Agastya, to his car.

source: कृतस्य करणाद् राजा स्वर्गमत्यन्तमश्नुते। त्रेतायाः करणाद् राजा स्वर्गं नात्यन्तमश्नुते॥
target: If he creates the Krita age, he acquires eternal heaven. If he creates the Treta age, he acquires heaven for a limited period.

source: रावणस्तवसंयुक्तान् गर्जतो राक्षसानपि। राजमार्ग समावृत्य स्थितं रक्षोगणं महत्॥
target: And (Hanumān) saw goblins and Rākşasas storming and eulogizing Rāvana; and mighty swarms of Rākṣas stationed, covering the highway.

source: धृतराष्ट्र उवाच उन्मत्त इव मे पुत्रो विलपत्येष संजय। न हि शक्तो रणे जेतुं धर्मराज युधिष्ठिरम्॥
target: Dhritarashtra said My son raves like a maniac, O Sanjaya; he is not capable of defeating in battle Yudhishthira the king of Dharma.

source: जानामि त्वां युधां श्रेष्ठमत्यन्तं पूर्ववैरिणम्। अनयस्याद्य सम्प्राप्तं फलं पश्य सुदारुणम्॥
target: “I know you to be one of the foremost in battle; your enmity for us in days gone by, was also implacable. Today, reap the mortal fruit of that wicked behaviour of yours.

source: तया जगदिदं कृत्स्नमटन्त्या मिथिलेश्वरः। तत्र तत्र श्रुतो मोक्षे कथ्यमानस्त्रिदण्डिभिः॥
target: In course of her wanderings over the Earth, Sulabha heard from many ascetics of different places that the king of Mithila was given to the religion of Liberation.

source: प्रत्यक्षं भूमिपाला भवतां चापि संनिधौ। न्यस्तशस्त्रो मम पिता धृष्टद्युम्नेन पातितः॥
target: Before all the kings, before your eyes also, my father after he had laid down his weapons, was killed by Dhrishtadyumna.

source: पुनः पुनश्च वार्ष्णेयं पर्यष्वजत फाल्गुनः। आ चक्षुर्विषयाच्चैनं स ददर्श पुनः पुनः॥
target: Phalguna repeatedly embraced the Vrishni hero and as long as he was within he range of eye-sight he repeatedly turned his eyes towards him.

source: सर्वे संहृष्टरोमाणः संत्रस्ताः प्रेक्ष्य कीचकम्। तथा सम्भिन्नसर्वाङ्गं कूर्म स्थल इवोद्भुतम्॥
target: Then beholding Kichaka with all his limbs mangled like a tortoise brought to the land, the hairs of their bodies siood erect and they were filled with fear.

source: तं शशापाथ संक्रुद्धो धनदः कुरुनन्दन। एवमेव भवत्वद्य स्त्रीत्वं पापस्य गुह्यकाः॥
target: Then the giver of wealth crushed him in his anger, O descendant of Kuru's race, “even never thus let the womanhood of this sinful one remain, O Guhyakas!"

source: अरुणा रक्षिता चैव रम्भा तद्वन्मनोरमा। केशिनी च सुबाहुश्च सुरता सुरजा तथा॥ सुप्रिया चातिबाहुश्च विख्यातौ च हाहा हूहूः। तुम्बुस्चेति चत्वारः स्मृता गन्धर्वसत्तमाः॥
target: Aruna, Rakshita, Rambha, Manorama, Keshini, Subahu, Surata, Suraja and Supriya, these were the daughters (of Pradha). And Atibahu, celebrated Haha-Huhu and Tumburu, these four best of Gandharvas (were also the sons of Pradha.)

source: संजय उवाच तथा प्रवृत्ते संग्रामे निवृत्ते च सुशर्मणि। भग्नेषु चापि वीरेषु पाण्डवेन महात्मना॥
target: Sanjaya said When the battle thus raged, when Susharma had turned away from the battle when the highsouled son of Pandu (Arjuna) had broken your ranks,

source: लोकं सुवृष्टया परितोषयित्वा नदीस्तटाकानि च पूरयित्वा। निष्पन्नसस्यां वसुधां च कृत्वा त्यक्त्वा नभस्तोयधराः प्रनष्टाः ॥
target: Having satisfied the people with a profuse discharge of water, filled the rivers and pools and covered the earth with crops the clouds have disappeared renouncing the sky.

source: महाबलस्तथा पाण्डयः सर्वशस्त्रभृतां वरः। निहतः पाण्डवैः संख्ये किमन्यद् भागधेयतः॥ बृहद्वलो हतो यत्र मागधश्च महाबलः। उग्रायुधश्च विक्रान्तः प्रतिमानं धनुष्मताम्॥ आवन्त्यो निहतो यत्र त्रैगर्तश्च जनाधिपः। संशप्तकाश्च निहताः किमन्यद् भागधेयतः॥
target: When Brihadvala has been slain and the powerful king of the Magadhas and the brave Ugrayudha, that model of all bowmen when the two princes of Avanti viz., Vinda and Avinda have been slain, and the king also of thc Trigartas, as also the numerous Samshaptakas, what can it be but Destiny?

source: तं क्रुद्धं प्रतिविव्याध प्रतिविन्ध्यः शितैः शरैः। सिंहलाङ्गललक्ष्माणं पितुरर्थे व्यवस्थितम्॥
target: Wrought up with rage, Prativindhya with whetted shafts pierced him who bore the device of the lion's tail in his banner and who was anxious to serve his father's interests.

source: इषवोऽत्र परिस्तोमा मुक्ता गाण्डीवधन्वना। महारथप्रयुक्ताश्च द्रोणद्रौणिप्रचोदिताः॥
target: The arrows, let loose by the wielder of the Gandiva bow and shot also by car-warriors urged by Drona and his son will act for ladles in their sacrifice.

source: धनंजयसमं युद्धे त्वां वयं तात संयुगे प्रणिधायानुयास्यामो रक्षन्तः सर्वतोमुखाः॥
target: Secing you penetrate the hostile ranks, we will follow you, O sire, who are equal to Dhananjaya himself in battle, protecting you from all sides.

source: अक्षय्यं मधुहन्तारं जानामि त्वां सुरेश्वरम्। धनुषोऽस्य परामर्शात् स्वस्ति तेऽस्तु परंतप ॥
target: Even from your handing of this bow I know you to be the chief of the celestials even that eternal one, the slayer of Madhu. Hail to you,

source: वस्तानि सर्वभूतानि त्रैलोक्यं भूः प्रकम्पते। निमित्तानि च घोराणि तत्र संदधत: शरम्॥
target: All the creatures were filled with terror; and the three worlds began to tremble. And while he was aiming that shaft, numerous dreadful omens appeared there.

source: धर्मराज उवाच यद्येवमीप्सितं राजन् भुड्क्ष्वास्य सहितः फलम्। तुल्यकालं सहानेन पश्चात् प्राप्स्यसि सद्गतिम्॥
target: Dharmaraja said : O king, if this be your wish, then taste with him the fruits of that act, as long as he is to do. After that you will obtain the blessed state.

source: तं समुत्थाय काकुत्स्थश्चिरस्याक्षिपथं गतम्। अङ्के भरतमारोप्य मुदितः परिषस्वजे॥
target: Raising Bharata up who had been seen after a long time and placing him on his lap Kākutstha, delighted, embraced him.

source: यथा हि दिवि दीप्तांशुः प्रभासयति तेजसा। तथा भुवि महीपालो दीप्त्या संवरणोऽभवत्॥
target: As Surya in the heavens fills the firmament with his splendour, so did king Samvarana fill region on the earth with the splendour of his good achievements.

source: ततः पञ्चनदं चैव कृत्स्नं च कुरुजाङ्गलम्॥ तथा रोहितकारण्य मरुभूमिश्च केवला। अहिच्छत्रं कालकूटं गङ्गाकूलं च भारत॥ वारणं वाटधानं च यामुनश्चैव पर्वतः। एष देश: सुविस्तीर्णः प्रभूतधनधान्यवान्॥
target: O son of Bharata, for this reason the country of the five rivers, Krishna, Kurujangala and the forest of Rohitaka and the desert of Kevala and Ahichhatra and Kalakuta and the bank of the Ganges and Varana and Vatadhana and the mountains of Yamuna, all these extensive tracts containing large quantities of corn and wealth became exceedingly crowded with the army of the Kauravas.

source: अपरेधुस्तस्याः क्रियतेऽत्युच्छ्रयो नृपः। अलंकृतायाः पिटकैर्गन्धमाल्यैश्च भूषणैः॥
target: After planting the stick, they cover it with golden cloths, perfume it with scents and decorate it with garlands and various ornaments.

source: हितं तु परमं कर्ण ब्रवीमि कुलवर्धनम्। अथ त्वं मन्यसे दुष्टं ब्रूहि यत् परमं हितम्॥
target: O Karna, know that what I have said is good for all. This is for the prosperity of the Kuru race. If you consider it as productive of evil, tell yourself what is the great good.

source: आपो नित्यं प्रदेयास्ते पुण्यं ह्येतदनुत्तमम्। प्रपाश्च कार्या दानार्थं नित्यं ते द्विजसत्तम। भुक्तेऽप्यन्नं प्रदेयं तु पानीयं वै विशेषतः॥
target: Do you always make gifts of water. This act is full great merit, О best of twice born persons, for making such gifts you should put up resting places along the roads for the distribution of water. After one has eaten, the gift to one should especially be made of water for drink.

source: धृतराष्ट्र उवाच स्वयं शिष्यो महेशस्य भृगूत्तमधनुर्धरः। शिष्यत्वं प्राप्तवान् कर्णस्तस्य तुल्योऽस्रविद्यया॥
target: Dhritarashtra said Beholding, O Sanjaya, him on whom the hope of victory of my sons rested, compelled to turn his face away from the field of battle, what did king Duryodhana say?

source: कार्यः धर्मसंस्थापनार्थं हि प्रतिज्ञैषा ममाव्यया। ब्रह्म सत्यं दमः शौचं धर्मो ह्रीः श्रीकृतिः क्षमा॥ यत्र तत्र रमे नित्यमहं सत्येन ते शपे। न विषादस्त्वया कर्ण वैकर्तनं प्रति॥

source: अव्यक्तं प्रकृतिं त्वासां कलानां कश्चिदिच्छति। व्यक्तं चासां तथा चान्यः स्थूलदर्शी प्रपश्यति॥ अव्यक्तं यदि वा व्यक्तं द्वयीमथ चतुष्टयीम्। प्रकृतिं सर्वभूतानां पश्यन्त्यध्यात्मचिन्तकाः॥
target: Whether the Unmanifest or the Manifest be their cause, or whether the two be considered as their cause, or, fourthly, whether the four together be the cause, they that are conversant with spiritual science behold Nature as the cause of all creatures.

source: ततः सविशिखं चापं सहदेवस्य धन्विनः। छित्त्वा भल्लेन समरे विव्याधैनं त्रिसप्तभिः॥
target: Then cutting off with a broad-headed arrow the bow, with shaft fixed on the string, of Sahadeva, he struck Sahadeva himself in that battle, with seventy-arrows.

source: प्रांशु कनकवर्णाभः सिंहसंहननो युवा। मत्तवारणविक्रान्तो मत्तवारणवेगवान्॥
target: That youth, of the splendour like the color of the gold, having a body as strong as that of the lion, treading like a mad elephant and possessing the prowess of a mad elephant.

source: ततः स सचिवैः सार्धं षड्भिर्नीत्यबलोद्धतः। महोदरप्रहस्ताभ्यां मारीचशुकसारणैः॥ धूम्राक्षेण च वीरेण नित्यं समरगर्धिना। वृतः संप्रययौ श्रीमान्क्रोधाल्लोकान्दहन्निव॥
target: Accompanied by his six counsellor Mohodara and Prahasta, Marica, Suka and Sarana, and the heroic Dhümrākṣa eager for encounter the graceful Rāvana, elated with his strength sallied out, as if consuming all creatures with his wrath.

source: गत्वाब्रुवन् नहुषं तत्र शक्र त्वं नो राजा भव भुवनस्य गोप्ता। तानब्रवीनहुषो नास्मि शक्त आप्यायध्वं तपसा तेजसा माम्॥
target: And going, O Shakra, to Nahusha they said-Be you king, the protector of the worldNahusha said to them-I am not capable of being your king); infuse in me, strength with the virtue of devotion.

source: निष्प्रचारं मनः कृत्वा प्रतिष्ठाप्य च सर्वशः। यामयं लभते तुष्टिं सा न शक्याऽऽत्मनोऽन्यथा॥
target: The pleasure which a man enjoys by governing his mind from roving in all directions and fixing it entirely on the Soul is such that its like cannot be acquired by one through any other means.

source: अधोमुखं स्थितं रामं ततः कृत्वा प्रदक्षिणम्। उपावर्तत वैदेही दीप्यमानं हुताशनम्॥
target: Thereupon circumambulating Rāma, standing with his head down, Vaidehi approached the burning fire.

source: स्त्युवाच वरं च वृणु राजेन्द्र यं त्वमिच्छसि सुव्रत। पुरुषत्वमथ स्त्रीत्वं मत्तो यदभिकांक्षते॥ स्त्रीत्वमेव वृणे शक्र पुंस्त्वं नेच्छामि वासव। एवमुक्तस्तु देवेन्द्रस्तां स्त्रियं प्रत्युवाच ह॥ पुरुषत्वं कथं त्यक्त्वा स्त्रीत्वं चोदयसे विभो। एवमुक्तः प्रत्युवाच स्त्रीभूतो राजसत्तमः॥ स्त्रियाः पुरुषसंयोगे प्रीतिरभ्यधिका सदा। एतस्मात् कारणाच्छक स्त्रीत्वमेव वृणोम्यहम्॥
target: The lady said I wish to remain a woman, O Shakra. In fact, I do not wish to become a man, O Vasava.Hearing this answer, Indra once more asked her, saying Why is it, O powerful one, that leaving aside the dignity of manhood you seek for that of womanhood? Thus accosted that foremost of kings transformed into a woman, answered In sexual intercourse, the pleasure that women enjoy is always much greater than what is enjoyed by men. Therefore, O Shakra, I wish to continue a woman.

source: तस्य चैत्यैर्महाराज क्रतूनां दक्षिणावताम्। चतुरन्ता मही व्याप्ता नासीत् किंचिदनावृतम्॥
target: O great king, the sacrificial grounds prepared by him were to be found all over the earth. There is not a single spot which is not marked with it.

source: दुखुरुवाच न गजं न रथं नाश्वं जीर्णो भुङ्क्तेन च स्त्रियम्। वाक्सङ्गश्चास्य भवति तां जरां नाभिकामये॥
target: Druhyu said: O king, one, if he is decrepit, cannot enjoy elephants, cars, horses or women. His voice also becomes indistinct. Therefore, I do no desire (to take upon myself) your old age.

source: यदा नान्यं प्रवृणुते वरं वै द्विजसत्तमः। तदैनमब्रवीद् भूयो राधेयः प्रहसन्निव॥
target: When that most exalted of the twice-born ones did not ask for any other boon, the son of Radha then addressed him again with a smile,

source: चण्डवातविभिन्नानां समुद्राणामिव खनः। रणेऽभवद् बलौघानामन्योन्यमभिधावताम्॥
target: Then Bhimasena, Dhrishtadyumna, Nakula, Sahadeva, the virtuous king Yudhishthira, O sire, exclaimed sayingपार्थिवानां समेतानां बहून्यासन् नरोत्तम।

source: यदि मामप्रतीकारमशस्त्रं शस्त्रपाणयः। धार्तराष्ट्रा रणे हन्युस्तन्मे क्षेमतरं भवेत्॥
target: Better would it be if unretaliating and unarmed myself, the armed sons of Dhritarashtra kill in battle".

source: श्रुत्वा चैनमुवाचाथ पर्वतो मुनिसत्तमः। एष शूरो रणे योद्धा संग्रामेष्वनिवर्तकः॥ युध्यमानस्तथैवेष प्रहारैर्जर्जरीकृतः। कृती शूरो रणे जेता स्वाम्यर्थे त्यक्तजीवितः॥ संग्रामे निहतोऽमित्रैर्हत्वा च सरमे बहून्। इन्द्रस्यातिथिरेवैष अथ वा यत्र गच्छति॥ नृत्यगीतपरैर्लोकः सेव्यते नरसत्तमः। पप्रच्छ रावणो भूयः कोऽयं यात्यर्कसंनिभः॥ रावणस्य वचः श्रुत्वा पर्वतो वाक्यमब्रवीत्। य एष दृश्यते राजन्विमाने सर्वकाञ्चने॥ पर्वतस्य वचः श्रुत्वा अप्सरोगणसंयुक्ते पूर्णचन्द्रनिभाननः। सुवर्णदो महाराज विचित्राभरणाम्बरः॥ एष गच्छति शीघ्रण यानेन तु महाद्युति। रावणो वाक्यमब्रवीत्॥
target: Hearing his words Parvata, the foremost of saints, again said, "He is heroic and a great warrior, he never return unsuccessful from a battlefield. Having performed many heroic feats in battle, and slain many enemies, he has been assailed with many wounds in fighting and has renounced his life for his master. Having destroyed many in battle, he has at last been slain by his enemies and is perhaps now going either to the region of Indra or to some such place. This best of men is now being entertained by these well-versed in the are of singing and dancing.” Rāvana again said, "Who go there effulgent like to the sun?” Hearing the words of Ravana, Parvata said, "The person, resembling the full moon and wearing diverse ornaments and clothes, whom you behold, O great diverse ornaments and clothes, whom you behold, O great king, in the golden car abounding in Apasaräs, distributed gold. He, gifted with great effulgence, is now going in a swift-coursing car." Hearing the words of Parvata, Ravana said.

source: कोऽयं गिरा घोषयति प्राणैः प्रियतरस्य मे। जटायुषो वधं भ्रातुः कम्पयन्निव मे मनः॥
target: Who is it that, making my mind tremble, speak of the death of my brother, Jațāyu, dearer to me than life.

source: दुमशाखावभग्नोऽहं मुहूर्तं परिनिष्टनन्। सान्त्वयित्वा त्वनेनोक्तो न पुनः कर्तुमर्हसि ॥
target: Being struck by him with branches of trees, while I fled away and wept, he, consoling me, said only Do not do this again.

source: घटोत्कचोऽत्र शामित्रं करिष्यति महाबलः। अतिरात्रे महाबाहो वितते यक्षकर्मणि॥
target: Ghatotkacha, of great strength, will be the slayer of the sacrificial animals at the commencement of this sacrificial rite at an advanced hour of the night, O you of long arms.

source: विशन्ति चावशाः पार्थ योगाद् योगबलान्विताः। प्रजापतीनृषीन् देवान् महाभूतानि चेश्वराः॥
target: Independent of all things, Yogins, gifted with Yoga-power and other lordly powers enter into the very lords of creation, the Rishis, the gods, and the great Beings in the universe.

source: यक्षी वा राक्षसी वा त्वमुताहोऽसि वराङ्गना। सर्वथा कुरु नः स्वस्ति रक्ष वास्माननिन्दिते॥ यथायं सर्वथा सार्थः क्षेमी शीघ्रमितो व्रजेत्। तथा विधत्स्व कल्याणि यथा श्रेयो हि नो भवेत्।।
target: Be you a female Yaksha or a female Rakshasa or a heavenly damsel, do good unto us and O blaimeless one! protect us completely. O blessed one! do you so ordain that, ere long, this caravan may start from this place attended with prosperity in every direction, as also that poor personal property may be secured.

source: देवतानां हितार्थाय महात्मा वै पितामहः। उवाच देवतास्तुष्ट इदं सर्वा महद्वचः॥
target: Being propitiated with them, the high-souled Patriarch, for their welfare, addressed the celestials, with the following pregnant speech.

source: ततोऽहं पुनरेवायथ तानष्टौ ब्रह्मवादिनः। अद्राक्षं दीप्यमानान् वै ग्रहानष्टाविवोदितान्॥
target: And then I again saw those eight revealers of Brahmana, blazing like eight constellations risen (in the sky).

source: ददर्श च नगात् तस्मान्नदी निपतितां कपिः। अङ्कादिव समुत्पत्य प्रियस्य पतितां प्रियाम् ॥ जलेन पतिताप्रैश्च पादपैरूपशोभिताम्। वार्यमाणामिव क्रुद्धां प्रमदां प्रियबन्धुभिः॥
target: That monkey beheld there a river falling down from the mountain like to a damsel falling down from the lap of her beloved. And the branches of the trees touching the water (of the stream) resembled a fair damsel prevented by her dear companions from forsaking the company of her beloved).

source: धृतराष्ट्र उवाच भयं मे सुमहज्जातं विस्मयश्चैव संजय। श्रुत्वा पाण्डुकुमाराणां कर्म देवैः सुदुष्करम्॥
target: Dhritarashtra said Hearing of those feats achieved by the sons of Pandu-feats which are difficult of being achieved even by the celestial themselves, O Sanjaya, I have been filled with apprehension and amazement.

source: ऊषु तिचिरं कालं रममाणाः कुरूद्वहाः। प्रतीक्षमाणा बीभत्सुं गन्धमादनसानुषु॥
target: With the permission of Kubera, those foremost of the Kurus pleasantly lived for sometime, at that spot on the slopes of the Gandhamadana (mountain) awaiting for Vivatsa (Arjuna). were

source: श्रोतुमिच्छामि भगवन् स्त्रीणां माहात्म्यमुत्तमम्। कथ्यमानं त्वया विप्र सूक्ष्मं धर्म्यं च तत्त्वतः॥
target: O you that are possessed of great energy, I desire to listen to the best account of a woman's greatness, O Brahmanas, you relate to me in detail the principles of pure morality.

source: तां दृष्ट्वा मुनयः सर्वे जनकस्य पुरीं शुभाम्। साधु साध्विति शंसन्तो मिथिला समपूजयन्॥
target: Beholding Janaka's beauteous city, the ascetics exclaiming, 'Excellent' fell to admiring Mithila.

source: सम्परिष्वज्य वैदेही वामेनाङ्केन रावणः। तलेनाभिजघाना” जटायुं क्रोधमूछितः॥
target: Beside himself with anger, Ravana, holding Jānaki fast by her left flank, struck Jațāyu with his palms.

source: नातिप्रीतमनाश्चासीद्विवादांश्चान्वमोदत। द्यूतादीननयान्घोरान्विविधांश्चाप्युपैक्षत॥
target: And being displeased, he did nothing to stop the dispute, but overlooked the fatal game and other horrible unjust deeds that were the result of it.

source: लक्ष्मणेनैवमुक्तस्तु रामः सौमित्रिमब्रवीत्॥ मा स्म त्रासं वृथा वीर नहि त्वादृग् विषीदति।
target: Being thus addressed by Lakşmaņa, Rāma spoke to Saumitrī—Fear not in vain, O hero; persons of your prowess are never afflicted (with fear).

source: पतिभिः पञ्चभिः शूरैरग्निकल्पैः प्रहारिभिः। उपपन्ना महेष्वासैद्रौपदी दुःखभागिनी॥
target: Draupadi has a bad lot, though she has five husbands, all heroes like the fire, all smiters of foes and all great bowmen.

source: अक्षतः शस्त्रसम्पन्नो जितारिः सह राजभिः। रथमास्थाय तं दिव्यं निर्जगाम गिरिव्रजात्॥
target: Unwounded, (now) with (many) weapons, vanquishing the foe, he (Krishna), riding on the celestials car (of Jarasandha) came out with the kings from the city of Girivraja.

source: तेन शब्देन महता पूर्णश्रुतिरथाब्रवीत्। धृतराष्ट्रो नरश्रेष्ठो विदुरं हृष्टमानसः॥
target: Having his ears filled with the uproar, the best of men, Dhritarashtra, asked Vidura with delight,

source: कर्णेन चेदिकैकेयपाञ्चालेषु च भारत॥ विश्राव्य नाम निहता बहवः शूरसम्मताः।
target: Many proud and well-approved heroes of the Chedis and Panchalas were killed by Karna.

source: यत् तद्यूते परिविष्टा कृष्णा चानायिता सभाम्। तत् स्मरन्तोऽनुशोचन्तो भृशमुद्विग्नचेतसः॥
target: Recollecting these, viz. that they (the Pandavas) were greatly oppressed during the game at dice and also that Krishna (Draupadi) was (forcibly) brought to the assembly (of kings), they greatly regretted, with hearts filled with anxiety.

source: ततः कमलपण्डानि शल्लकीगहनानि च। व्यचरत् स मुदायुक्तः पद्मरेणुविभूषितः॥
target: The Rishi's elephant then, covered with the filaments of lotus, dived gladly into lakes abounding with lotuses and walked by their banks filled with rabbit holes.

source: अधृष्यं वरुणस्येव निधिपूर्णमिवोदधिम्। एकाहं वेद्मि कोशं वै पतीनां धर्मचारिणाम्॥
target: While my husbands were engaged in virtuous pursuits, I supervised their treasury as inexhaustible as the ever full abode of Varuna (ocean).

source: ऋषिमध्ये महातेजा बाढमित्येव देवताः। ततो देवा महात्मानो ऋषयश्च तपोधनाः। जग्मुर्यथागतं सर्वे यज्ञस्यान्ते नरोत्तम॥
target: Then, after the sacrifice had concluded, the high-souled celestials and the saints of ascetic wealth went to their respective regions, o foremost of men.

source: वसनात् सर्वभूतानां वसुत्वाद् देवयोनितः। वासुदेवस्ततो वेद्यो बृहत्त्वाद् विष्णुरुच्यते॥
target: From his covering all creatures with illusion, from his being the support of the world and from his being of divine origin, he is know as Vasudeva. He is called Vishnu, owing to the fact of his pervading everything.

source: तं गृहीत्वा महास्कन्धं सोऽश्वकर्णं महाद्युतिः। प्रगृह्य परया प्रीत्या भ्रामयामास भूतले॥
target: And taking that broad-shouldered Asvakarma, that one furnished with high splendour, with great glee whirled it above the ground.

source: एवमुक्तस्ततः शर्वः सुरैर्ब्रह्मादिभिस्तथा। आह मां भगवानीशः प्रहसन्निव शंकरः॥
target: Thus addressed by all the gods with the Grandfather Brahman among them, Sharva, otherwise called Isha and Shankara, said these words, as if smiling, to ine.

source: ये च राज्ञो ददौ दिव्ये महात्मा वरुणः स्वयम्। जनकस्य महायज्ञे धनुषी रौद्रदर्शने॥ अभेद्ये कवचे दिव्ये तूणी चाक्षय्यसायको। आदित्यविमलाभौ द्वौ खङ्गौ हेमपरिष्कृतौ॥ सत्कृत्य निहितं सर्वमेतदाचार्यसद्मनि। सर्वमायुधमादाय क्षिप्रमाव्रज लक्ष्मण ॥ स सुहृज्जनमामन्त्र्य वनवासाय निश्चितः। इक्ष्वाकुगुरुमागम्य जग्राहायुधमुत्तमम्॥
target: The high-souled Varuņa himself offered two terrible-looking bows of ethereal temper, two sets of weapons at the great sacrifice of the royal Janaka, namely, impenetrable mail, two quivers, two inexhaustible arrows, two swords burnished with gold and bright as the sun. These things were offered to me as bridal presents, and I have kept them at the house of my preceptor. Do you, O Lakşmaņa, paying homage to my preceptor, taking all those weapons, swiftly bring them hither. Determined upon going to the forest, Lakşmaņa, taking leave of his friends, went to the abode of the spiritual preceptor of the Ikşvākus and took from him those excellent weapons.

source: तस्य भार्यासहायस्य रममाणस्य शाश्वतम्। दैवयोगविमूढस्य नान्या वृत्तिररोचत॥
target: He was in the habit of sporting with his wife in the forest for many long years in the pursuit of this profession, and stupefied by destiny, he liked no other profession.

source: गयस्य यज्ञः शशबिन्दोश्च राज्ञो यज्ञस। वैश्रवणस्य राज्ञः। तथा यज्ञोऽयं, भारतार्य पारिक्षिः स्वस्ति नोऽस्तु प्रियेभ्यः॥
target: O son of Parikshit, O best of the Bharata race, your this sacrifice is like the sacrifices of Gaya, king Sashabindu and king Vaishravana. Blessings be upon those who are dear to us

source: तत् तेषां वानरेन्द्राणां पपात पवनोद्धतम्। मध्ये सुपीतं पञ्चानां विद्युन्मेघान्तरे यथा॥
target: And like lightning (playing) among the (dark) clouds that beautiful and yellow (cloth) fluttering through the air fell down among those five (dark-coloured monkeys).

source: नैव खं न दिशो राजन् न सूर्यं शत्रुतापन। विदिशो वाऽपि पश्यामः शरैर्मुक्तैः समन्ततः॥
target: Neither, O monarch, O afflicter of your enemies, were we able to see the firmament, the sun or the cardinal and subsidiary quarters, in consequence of their being shrouded on all sides by a thick discharge of arrows.

source: कस्यान्यस्य सुरैः सर्वैर्लिङ्गं मुक्त्वा महेश्वरम्। अर्च्यतेऽर्चितपूर्व वा ब्रूहि यद्यस्ति ते श्रुतिः॥
target: If Mahesvara be not accepted, tell me, if you have ever heard of it, who else is there whose einblem has been adored or is being adored by all the celestials?

source: कुण्डलाभ्यां विमुक्तोऽहं वर्मणा सहजेन च। गमनीयो भविष्यामि शत्रूणां द्विजसत्तम॥
target: Divested of my ear-rings and the armour with which I was born, Obest of the Brahmanas, I shall be liable to be killed by my enemies.

source: इत्येष वृत्रमाश्रित्य ज्वरस्य महतो मया। विस्तरः कथितः पुत्र किमन्यत् प्रब्रवीमि ते॥
target: Thus, O son, while describing the story of Vritra have I recited to you fully the narrative of Fever! What else shall I describe to you?

source: कथं सा मम सुश्रोणी भीरुभीरुः सती तदा। भयावहानां घोराणां मध्ये तिष्ठति रक्षसाम्॥
target: How live that timid damsel, having a beautiful waist, being terrified, amidst the terrible and grim Raksasis?

source: ततस्तस्मिन् महाघोरे संध्याकाल उपस्थिते। राजानः समसज्जन्त समासाद्येतरेतरम्॥
target: When the terrible period of the junction of Treta and the Dvapara, set in the Kshatriyas, approaching one another, began to fight.

source: शतानीकमथायान्तं नाकुलिं रभसं रणे। चित्रसेनो रुरोधाशु शरैर्दोणपरीप्सया॥

source: चिन्तयित्वा ततो दृष्टिं वानरेषु न्यपातयत्। उवाच धीमांस्तेजस्वी हनूमन्तं प्लवंगमम्॥
target: Thinking thus the intelligent and effulgent (Rāma) cast his looks towards the monkeys and spoke to Hanumān, saying.

source: यश्चैवं वचनं श्रुत्वा ब्रूयात् प्रतिवचो नरः। तदादाय वचस्तस्य ममावेद्यं द्विजोत्तमाः॥
target: O excellent of the regenerate ones! do you convey to me the words of that man who, hearing these words of yours, will answer you.

source: वानप्रस्थानां च द्रव्योपस्कार इति प्रायशाः खल्वेते साधवः साधुपथ्यौदनाः स्वाध्यायप्रसङ्गिनस्तीर्थाभिगमनदेशदशनार्थं पृथिवीं पर्यटन्ति, तेषां प्रत्युस्थानाभिगमनाभिवादनानसूय वाक्प्रदानसुखशक्त्यासनसुखशयनाभ्यवहरिसक्रिया चेति॥
target: The third mode of life is called the Vanaprastha or life in forest. Those that lead it, need not kcep in store wealth and articles. Living upon good food, and engaged in the study of the Vedas, generally those pious and god men walk over the Earth for visiting the sacred shrines and various other kingdoms. Standing up, advancing forward, sweet and sincere speeches, gifts according to the means of the giver, offer of seats and beds of the best sort, and presents of excellent viands, are some of the means for showing them regard.

source: मन्त्रयुक्तान् समददत् ते च प्रीतास्तदाभवन्।
target: Then Trita, O monarch, duly allotted to them their shares with proper mantras. The gods took them and were greatly delighted. Having duly received their respective shares, the denizens of heaven, pleased with him, granted him the boons he wanted.

source: ततस्तेषां विधातव्यं सर्वमेवाप्रमादतः। भक्तान् पूजयता नित्यं द्विषतश्च निगृह्णता॥
target: He should then, carefully, concert his own measures, honouring those that are loyal to him and chastising those that are hostile.

source: समन्तपञ्चकद्वारात् ततो निष्क्रम्य माधवः। पप्रच्छर्षिगणान् रामः कुरुक्षेत्रस्य यत् फलम्॥

source: काश्यो यद् धनमाहार्षीद् द्रव्यं यच्चान्यदुत्तमम्। तथान्ये पृथिवीपाला यानि रत्नान्युपाहरन्॥ वाहनानि धनं चैव कवचान्यायुधानि च। राज्यमात्मा वयं चैव कैतवेन हृतं परैः॥
target: Whatever wealth and other excellent articles which the king of Kashi gave, and the gems and jewels, animals, wealth, armours, and weapons which the other kings, presented, nay even our kingdom, yourself and ourselves, have all been won by our enemies at play.

target: Those dreadful shafts of terrible effects and touch, penetrating penetrating through car-warriors, elephants and horses, struck on the earth's surface.

source: अद्यप्रभृति षड्रात्रं रक्षतां राघवौ युवाम्। दीक्षां गतो ह्येष मुनिौनित्वं च गमिष्यति॥
target: For six nights from to-day, you should protects us. This ascetic has been initiated into the sacrifice, and must, therefore, observe taciturnity.

source: देशे देशे कलत्राणि देशे देशे च बान्धवाः। तं तु देशं न पश्यामि यत्र भ्राता सहोदरः॥
target: In land after land one meets with wives, in land after land one meets with friends, but country find I none where a uterine brother may be met with.

source: सर्वमूर्धाभिषिक्तानामेष मूनि ज्वलिष्यति। प्रभाहरोऽयं सर्वेषां ज्योतिषामिव भास्करः॥
target: He will blaze forth above the heads of all that wear crowns on their heads. Like the sun he will rob all other kings of their splendour.

source: आविद्ध्यतो गदां तस्य कौन्तेयस्य महात्मनः। बभौ रूपं महाघोरं कालस्येव युगक्षये॥

source: संजय उवाच उपातिष्ठन्नथो वैद्याः शल्योद्धरणकोविदाः॥ सर्वोपरकरणैर्युक्ताः कुशलैः साधु शिक्षिताः।
target: Sanjaya said Thereafter there came several practitioners of the healing are, all well-trained and skillful in drawing out shafts, carrying with them all the necessary balms and appliances.

target: Should you come within the range of the vision of those sons of the king, you could not, although you should happen to be accompanied with your army, live for a moment.

source: तथेति च प्रतिज्ञाय तं परिष्वज्य सादरम्॥ शत्रुघ्नं च परिष्वज्य वचनं चेदमब्रवीत्। मातरं रक्ष कैकेयीं मा रोषं कुरु तां प्रति ॥ मया च सीतया चैव शप्तोऽसि रघुनन्दन। इत्युक्त्वाश्रुपरीताक्षो भ्रातरं विससर्ज ह॥
target: Promising, “So be it,” and affectionately embracing Bharata, and also embracing Śatrughna, Rāma said, Do you protect your mother Kaikeyi. Do not be angry with her. source: तच्छ्रुत्वा लक्ष्मणो वाक्यं प्राप्तकालं हितं तदा। उवाचार्तिसमापनो विक्रमे कृतनिश्चयः॥

source: शाश्वतं परमं चैवधातारं परमं पदम्। यं विदित्वा न शोचन्ति विद्वांसः शास्त्रदृष्टयः॥ तत्र देवर्षयः सिद्धाः सर्वे चैव तपोधनाः।
target: He is the great creator, he is the highest state. By knowing him, learned men versed in the Shastras never meet with grief. The celestials Rishis, the Siddhas, may all the ascetics live ther.

target: Whither are you bound, O you of a gigantic body? Desired by me, who am hungry, do you becoming my food, gratify this body deprived of diet for a long time.

target: This weapon, in its work among the kings, has been pronounced to be the great by Shakra and the son of the lord of the waters hold this weapon of great energy.

target: He will never have any cause to be angry with me whether the worshipful one comes in the morning or in the evening or during the night or at midnight.

target: Beholding the Wind-god's own begotten son, Hanumān, resembling a huge mountain, Sītā, the daughter of Janaka, having eyes resembling lotus-petals, said.

target: Hence have I given you these my jewelled ear-rings which were coveted by you. Do you now keep the agreement which you have made with me today.

target: You are Vayu, you are the clouds, you are Agni, you are the lightning in the sky, you are the propellers of the clouds and therefore you are called the great clouds.
