target: Mark the differences between those two subtile things, viz., Intelligence and the Soul. One of these viz., Intelligence (displays of qualities. The other viz., the Soul) does nothing of the kind.

source: एतानौत्पातिकान्दृष्ट्वा वज्रदंष्ट्रो महाबलः। धैर्यमालम्ब्य तेजस्वी निर्जगाम रणोत्सुकः॥
target: Witnessing these evil omens, the exceedingly powerful and energetic Vajradanșțra, assuming patience, set out, eager for encounter.

source: दैवमेव परं मन्ये यत् कर्णो हस्तसंस्थया। न जघान रणे पार्थं कृष्णं वा देवकीसुतम्॥
target: Indeed it is destiny that is supreme to all other forces, inasmuch as Karna did not slay cither Partha or Krishna with the dart that he had in his grasp.

source: कृच्छ्राद् द्वादशरात्रे तु तस्य राज्ञः समाहिते। आजगाम विशुद्धात्मा वसिष्ठोः भगवानृषिः॥
target: The illustrious Rishi of pure soul Vasishtha came to that king when his vow of the twelfth night was over.

source: अनया सह लोकांश्च गन्ताऽसि तपसार्जितान्। यत्र नावृत्तिमभ्येति शाश्वतांस्तान् सनातनान्॥
target: And you will acquire with her all the worlds that are acquired by penances.

source: ततस्तु सा राक्षससङ्घसंवृतं खरं जनस्थानगतं विरूपिता। उपेत्या तं भ्रातरमुग्रतेजसं पपात भूमौ गगनाद् यथाशनिः॥
target: Then having been deformed, (the Rākşasī) approaching, her brother of fierce energy, Khara, come to Janasthāna, (seated surrounded by numbers of Raksasas), fell down to the earth, even as the thunderbolt bursts from the sky.

source: धृष्टद्युम्नमहत्वाहं न विमोक्ष्यामि दंशनम्। अनृतायां प्रतिज्ञायां नाहं स्वर्गमवाप्नुयाम्॥
target: Without slaying Dhristadyumna, I will not lay aside my arms. If this my promise proves futile, I will not go to heaven.

source: अद्यापीदं वनं दुर्गं विचिन्वन्तु वनौकसः। खेदं त्यक्त्वा पुनः सर्वं वनमेव विचन्वताम्॥
target: You dwellers of the wood, do you to day rummage this impenetrable wood; renouncing grief, do you again search through this forest.

source: कन्दर्पबाणाभिनिपीडिताङ्गाः कृष्णागतैस्ते हृदयैर्नरेन्द्राः। धनेश्वरं च॥ रङ्गावतीर्णा दुपदात्मजार्थं द्वेषं प्रचक्रुः सुहृदोऽपि तत्र॥
target: Their bodies afflicted with the arrows of the god of love and their hearts completely lost in Krishna (Draupadi), the kings descended into the arena; and they felt jealousy against even their own friends for the sake of the daughter of Drupada.

source: यावद्गच्छामि सौमित्रे मृगमानयितुं द्रुतम्। पश्य लक्ष्मण वैदेह्या मृगत्वचि गतां स्पृहाम्॥
target: Look, O Laksmana, Vaidehi is extremely anxious to get the skin of this deer I shall therefore proceed at once, O son of Sumitrā, to catch this deer.

source: आहुः केचित् परं मोक्षं स च नास्ति कथंचन। अर्थप्राप्तौ तु नरकः कृत्स्न एवोपपद्यते॥
target: Some say salvation is our highest object of attainment, but it can never be attained. The acquisition of wealth is hell; it is attended with misery.

source: स ददर्श महावीर्यं देवदेवमुमापतिम्। शैलपुत्र्या समासीनं भूतसंघशतैर्वृतम्॥
target: One day, the highly energetic child, saw that god of gods, viz., the lord of Uma, seated with the daughter of Himavat, amid a number of goblins.

source: स तेषां प्रतिशुश्राव राक्षसानां तदा वने॥ प्रतिज्ञातश्च रामेण वधः संयति राक्षसाम्। ऋषीणामग्निकल्पानां दण्डकारण्यवासिनाम्॥
target: Thereupon in the presence of those ascetics like the flaming fire, inhabiting the Daņdaka forest, he promised to slay those Räkşasas in battle.

source: एवं धृतिमतः साधोः सर्वास्त्रविदुषः सतः। सभ्रातृबन्धोः कस्मात् त्वं वधमस्य चिकीर्षसि॥
target: Arjuna is endued with such patience, and honesty. He is, besides, a master of every weapon. Why do you try to bring about the destruction of such a man with all his brothers.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच ततः प्रयान्तं कौन्तेयं ब्राह्मणा वनवासिनः। अभिगम्य तदा राजन्निदं वचनमबृदन्॥
target: Vaishampayana said: O king, thereupon those dwellers of the forest, those Brahmanas, seeing that the son of Kunti was about to, came to him and spoke these words.

source: संजय उवाच शृणु राजन् न ते विद्या मम विद्या न हीयते। विद्याहीनस्तमोध्वस्तो नाभिजानाति केशवम्॥
target: Sanjaya said Listen, O king; you have no knowledge and my knowledge has diminished (since my last birth). You being without knowiedge and steeped in ignorance, do not know Keshava.

source: शुचीन्यभ्यवहाराणि मूलानि च फलानि च। काञ्चनानि विमानानि राजतानि गृहाणि च ॥ तपनीयगवाक्षाणि मणिजालावृतानि च। पुष्पिताः फलवन्तश्च पुण्याः सुरभिगन्धयः॥ इमे जाम्बूनदमयाः पादपाः कस्य तेजसा।
target: And the pure fruits and roots, and the houses and vehicles of gold and silver,-veiled in networks of jewels, and furnished with golden windows? And by whose energy are these golden trees (here), bearing flowers, crowned with fruits, grateful to the sight, and breathing rich odour?

source: क्षमा तेजस्विनां तेजः क्षमा ब्रह्म तपस्विनाम्। क्षमा सत्यं सत्यवतां क्षमा यज्ञः क्षमा शमः॥
target: Forgiveness is the energy of the energetic; forgiveness is the sacrifice and forgiveness is the control of mind; forgiveness is the truth of the truthful; forgiveness is the control of mind.

source: प्रथमं वै महाराज कृत्यमेतदचिन्तितम्। केवलं वीर्यदर्पण नानुबन्धो विचारितः॥
target: At first, O mighty king, you did not ponder over this course of conduct; nor, from pride of prowess, did you at all take note of the evil thereof.

source: पुरं राजगृहं गत्वा शीघ्रं शीघ्रजवैर्हयैः। त्यक्तशोकैरिदं वाच्यः शासनाद् भरतो मम ॥
target: First going speedily to the royal residence by means of swift horses, do you, renouncing grief, by my order speak these words of mine to Bharata.

source: उपपन्नं हि यत् प्राज्ञो निस्तरेन्नेतरो जनः। दूरतो गुणदोषौ हि प्राज्ञः सर्वत्र पश्यति॥
target: It is reasonable that only he that is wise should succeed in crossing this river and not the man of little understanding. The former sees from a distance the merits and faults of everything.

source: धात्र्यास्तु निनदं श्रुत्वा रुदत्याः परमार्तवत्। अभ्यधावत तं देशं स्वयमेव महीपतिः॥
target: Hearing the cries of the nurse, the king in great anxiety ran there.

source: तामब्रवीद् राजा कस्यासि भद्रे का वा त्वमिति। सा तां प्रत्युवाच कन्या स्मीति राजोवाचार्थी त्वयाहमिति॥
target: To her said he, “O blessed lady, who are you and to whom do you belong?" "She replied, I am a maiden." The king said, “I ask you to be mine."

source: अथ कालस्य पर्याये वृद्धो नृपतिसत्तमः। सम्भारानभिषेकार्थं कारयामास शास्त्रतः॥
target: In course of time, that old king, the best among rulers of men, had all arrangements made for the installation according to the holy books ((of his son).

source: ततो महान्बालदिवाकरप्रभं प्रतप्तजाम्बूनदजालसंततम्। रथं समास्थाय ययौ स वीर्यवान् महाहरिं तं प्रति नैर्ऋतर्षभः॥
target: That best of Naiſtas (Rākṣasas) possessed of prowess, ascending a car resembling the infant sun in effulgence, and surrounded all round with networks of burnished gold, sallied forth in quest of that mighty monkey.

source: तेषां स्वस्त्ययनं चैव महर्षिः स चकार ह। प्रस्थितान् प्रेक्ष्य तांश्चैव पिता पुत्रानिवौरसान् ॥
target: Seeing them about to set forth, that Maharși performed a propitiatory ceremony for them, even as a father does on behalf of the sons begot from his own loins.

source: तं दृष्ट्वा परमप्रीतौ राघवौ पुण्यमाश्रमम्। ऊचतुस्तं महात्मानं विश्वामित्रमिदं वचः॥
target: Beholding that sacred asylum those descendants of Raghu, exceedingly delighted, spoke to the high-souled Viśvāmitra, these words.

source: पापं कर्म च यत् किंचिद् ब्रह्महत्यासमं भवेत्। शोधयेत् कपिला ह्येका प्रदत्तं गोशतं यथा॥
target: The gift of a single Kapila cow is capable cleansing whatever sins the giver may be guilty of even if those sins be as grave as Brahmanicide, for the gift of a single Kapila cow is considered as equal in merit to that of a hundred kine.

source: लगुडायोगुडाश्मानः शतघ्नयश्च सशक्तयः। गदापरिघनिस्त्रिंशशूलमुद्गरपट्टिशाः॥ सकम्पनर्टिनखरा मुसलानि परश्वधाः। क्षुराः क्षुरप्रनालीका वत्सदन्तास्थिसन्धयः॥ चक्राणि विशिखाः प्रासा विविधान्यायुधानि च। प्रपेतुः शतशो दिग्भ्यः प्रदिग्भ्यश्चार्जुनं प्रति॥
target: Then clubs, iron-balls, Shataghnis, rocks, darts, maces, bludgeons, swords, tridents, mallets, battle-axes, kampanas scimitars, nails, Mushalas, axes, razors, horse-shoe-headed arrows, Nalikas, Vatsadantas and shafts of bony-heads, discuses, Vishikhas, lances and many other kinds of weapons began to fall upon Arjuna from all the cardinal and subsidiary points of the compass.

source: शिरोऽभूद् द्रुपदो राजन् महत्या सेनया वृतः॥ कुन्तिभोजश्च चैद्यश्च चक्षुर्ध्या तौ जनेश्वरौ।
target: The king Drupada, surrounded by a large number of troops, stood at the head of that Vyuha, becoming as if its head. The two kings Kuntibhoja and Shaivya became its two eyes.

source: दिदृक्षुरस्मि सम्प्राप्तो वन्दिनं राजसंसदि। निवेदयस्व मां द्वा:स्थ राज्ञे पुष्करमालिने।॥
target: O gate-keeper, I have come with the desire of secing Bandi. Go, inform the king (Janaka) adorned with the garlands of lotuses.

source: अक्षौहिण्यस्तु सप्तैव पाण्डवानामभूद् बलम्। अहौहिण्यो दशैका च कौरवाणामभूद् बलम्॥
target: The army of the Pandavas consisted of seven Akshauhini, while that of the Kauravas consisted of ten and one Akshauhini.

source: सिंहाः केसरिणो व्याघ्रा महिषा वारणास्तथा। समागताश्च शतशो निहताश्च मया युधि॥
target: I have in battle slain countless lions, lions having manes, tigers, buffaloes and elephants all assembled together,

source: तेन यज्ञेन शुभ्रेण हूयमानेन शक्तिजः। तद्विदीपितमाकाशं सूर्येणेव धनात्यये॥
target: Like the sun emerged from the clouds, the firmament was illuminated by that stainless sacrifice in which large were the libation of ghee poured.

source: आचारसम्भवोधर्मोधर्मे वेदाः प्रतिष्ठिताः। वेदैर्यज्ञाः समुत्पन्ना यज्ञैर्देवाः प्रतिष्ठिताः॥
target: Four religious observances proceed from virtue, the Vedas are established in virtue and from the Vedas sacrifices came into existence. By sacrifices the celestials are established.

source: अनिश्चयज्ञो हि नरः कार्याकार्यविनिश्चये। अवशो मुह्यते पार्थ यथा त्वं मूढ एव तु॥
target: Persons ignorant of them become benumbed and befooled in discriminating between what ought to be done and what ought not, even as you, O Partha, have been nonplussed.

source: तमहमब्रुवं कार्यचेष्टाकुलत्वान्न वयं वासायनिका ग्रामैकरात्रवासिनो प्रत्यभिजानीमोऽप्यात्मनोऽर्थानामनुष्ठानं न शरीरोपतापेनात्मनः समारभामो ऽर्थानामनुष्ठानम्॥
target: To him said I, “From our eager desire to acquire virtue we do not stay at one place. We live for one night only in one village or in one town. A man like us therefore can not possibly know who you are. The fasts and vows that we are to observe make us weak in body, therefore we are unable to follow worldly pursuits to earn wealth."

source: यद्येतदेवमुक्त्वाहं न कुर्यां पृथिवीश्वराः। पितामहानां पूर्वेषां नाहं गतिमवाप्नुयाम्॥ अस्य पापस्य दुर्बुद्धेर्भारतापसदस्य च। न पिबेयं बलाद् वक्षो भित्त्वा चेद् रुधिरं युधि॥
target: O lords of earth, if having spoken these words, I do not accomplish them hereafter, and if I do not forcibly tearing open the breast of this sinful wretch, this wicked minded scoundrel of the Bharata race, drink his life blood in the field of battle, let me not obtain the path of my ancestors.

source: ततः संधाय विशिखान् पञ्च भारत दुःसहान्। पञ्चालानवधीत् पञ्च कर्णो वैकर्तनो वृषः॥
target: O Bharata, then setting five dreadful arrows Karna, the son of Vikartana, killed five Panchalas.

source: तां देवसमिति तस्य दासवश्च विशाम्पते। अभ्यागच्छन्नृपवरं ज्ञातुमग्निश्च भारत॥
target: O king, O descendant of Bharata, being desirous of testing the merit of that great king, Vasava (Indra) and Agni came to his celestialslike Sava.

source: प्रादुर्भूतं ततः क्षीरं कृत्तिकानामनुत्तमम्। षण्णां षडाननो भूत्वा जग्राह स्तनजं पयः॥
target: And then the teats of the Křttikās were filled with milk; and thereupon assuming six mouths, he began to suck milk from the teats of those six.

source: यथा किरीटी सर्वाभ्यः सेनाब्यो व्यतिरिच्यते। एवमेव महाबाहुर्वासुदेवो महाद्युतिः॥
target: An Kiritin suppress the entire army, so does Vasudeva of long arms and of great luster.

source: वनवासे क्षयं प्राप्ते ममैष हि मनोरथः। यदनेन रथेनैव त्वां वहेयं पुरी पुनः॥
target: This is my desire that the term of exile over, I may carry you back to the palace on this very car.

source: व्यास उवाच अर्चितोऽहं त्वया राजन् वाग्भिरद्य यदृच्छया। अद्य ते कीटतां प्राप्य स्मृतिर्जाता जुगुप्सिता॥
target: Vyasa said I have today been adored by you, O king, with various words expressive of respect. Changed into a worm your memory had become clouded. That memory has again appeared.

source: व्यभिचारे तु कस्मिश्चिद् व्यतिक्रम्यापरान् सुतान्। पित्रोक्तः कुपितेनाथ जहीमां जननीमिति॥
target: On a certain occasion, seeing an act of great fault in his wife, the father Gautama, passing over his other children commanded in anger this Chirakarin, saying,-kill this women!

source: उपप्लवो महानस्मानुपावर्तत केशव। उक्तं प्रतिकुरुष्व त्वं कालो हि दुरतिक्रमः॥
target: O Keshava, a great danger has overtaken us. Therefore do what you say. None can prevail over Time.

source: मित्रामात्यैः सुसम्पन्नः सम्पन्नो युद्धयोजकैः। भ्रातृभिः श्वशुरैर्वीरैरुपपन्नो महारथैः॥ धृत्या च पुरुषव्याघ्रो नैभृत्येन च पाण्डवः। अनृशंसो वदान्यश्च ह्रीमान् सत्यपराक्रमः॥ बहुश्रुतः कृतात्मा च वृद्धसेवी जितेन्द्रियः। तं सर्वगुणसम्पन्नं समिद्धमिव पावकम्॥
target: With friends and counselors and surrounded by men prepared for battle and also by brothers, fathers-in-law who are all excellent heroes and eminent car-warriors, the son of Pandu, that tiger among men, is also graced with patience, secrecy, humanity, benevolence, modesty, truth and prowess, versed in the knowledge of holy books, having self-control, attending to the old, is that one who has subdued his senses and is possessed of every virtue and he is like a blazing fire.

source: य एवं वृत्तसम्पन्नः स मुनिः श्रेष्ठ उच्यते। इन्द्रियाणीन्द्रियार्थांश्च महाभूतानि पञ्च च॥ मनो बुद्धिरहंकारमव्यक्तं पुरुषं तथा। एतत् सर्वं प्रसंख्याय यथावत् तत्त्वनिश्चयात्॥ ततः स्वर्गमवाप्नोति विमुक्तः सर्वबन्धनैः। एतावदन्तवेलायां परिसंख्याय तत्त्ववित्॥ ध्यायेदेकान्तमास्थाय मुच्यतेऽथ निराश्रयः। निर्मुक्तः सर्वसङ्गेभ्यो वायुराकाशगो यथा॥ क्षीणकेशो निरातङ्गस्तथेदं प्राप्नुयात् परम्॥
target: That man who is gifted with such a conduct is said to be the foremost of ascetics. The senses, the objects of the senses, the (five) great elements, mind, understanding, egoism, the unmanifest. Purusha also, after comprehending these duly with the help of correct inferences, one attains to the celestial region, released from all fetters. One conversant with the truth, understanding these at the time of the termination of his life, should mediate, exclusively resting on one point. Then, depending on none, none, one acquires Liberation. Freed from all attachments, like the wind in space, with his hoarded up means exhausted, without distress of any sort, he attains to the highest goal.

source: धर्मो यस्याभिशक्यः स्यादाष वा दुर्बलात्मनः। वेदाच्छूद्र इवापेयात् स लोकादजरामरात्॥
target: A weak-minded man who doubts religion, virtue and the words of the Rishis, is precluded form the regions of immortality and bliss as the Shudras are from the Vedas.

source: तथा यद्यद् भवेद् युक्तं संनिपाते क्वचित् क्वचित्। तत्तन्मर्म विजानीहि शास्त्रदृष्टं हि तत् तथा॥
target: The elements gathered together become in certain parts firmly united. Know that those parts are called the vitals of the body. It is said so in the Shastras.

source: कुमार्यः समलंकृत्य पर्यागच्छन्तु मे पुरात्॥ वादित्राणि च सर्वाणि गणिकाश्च स्वलंकृताः।
target: Let damsels and courtezans, adorned with ornaments, come out of the city with various musical instruments.

source: पश्यन्ति हि भवन्तोऽद्य मय्यतीव व्यतिक्रमम्। कृतानि तु परोक्षं मे यानि तानि निबोधत॥
target: Look, Sirs, at the hostility that he bears towards me. Known also all that he has done against me at my back.

source: तस्माद् योगं समास्थाय त्यक्त्वा गृहकलेवरम्। वायुभूतः प्रवेक्ष्यामि तेजोराशिं दिवाकरम्॥
target: I shall, therefore, have recourse to Yoga, and renouncing this body which is my present residence, I shall change myself into a wind and enter that mass of effulgence which is represented by the sin.

source: पवित्राणां पवित्र यो मङ्गलानां च मङ्गलम्। दैवतं देवतानां च भूतानां योऽव्ययः पिता॥
target: He is the most Holy of all holies, the most sacred of all sacred objects. He is the God of all the gods, and He is the immutabie Father of all creatures.

source: कृत्स्नं पञ्चनदं चैव तथैवामरपर्वतम्। उत्तरज्योतिषं चैव तथा दिव्यकटं पुरम्॥ द्वारपालं च तरसा वशे चक्रे महाद्युतिः। रामठान् हारहूणांश्च प्रतीच्याश्चैव ये नृपाः॥
target: The whole country, called after the five rivers, the mountains called Amara, the country called Uttarajyotisha, the city of Divyakata and the tribe called Dvarapala, the Ramathas, the Harahunas, and the various other kings of the west were all subjugated by the greatly effulgent hero.

source: प्रविष्टोऽस्मि हि ते वक्त्रं दाक्षायणि नमोऽस्तु ते। गमिष्ये यत्र वैदेही सत्यश्चासीद् वरस्तव॥
target: O descendant of Dakşa, I have entered into your mouth. I bow down to you. I will repair to where Vaidehi is Your boon has proved trve.

source: अव्यवस्था च वेदानां शास्त्राणां चाभिलङ्घनम्। अव्यवस्था च सर्वत्र एतान्नाशनमात्मनः॥
target: He who denies the authority of the Vedas, or tries to show that the scriptures should be disregarded, or approves of all breaches of control in society, simply brings about his own ruin.

source: तस्यां स फलके खङ्गं निजघान ततोऽङ्गदः। यज्ञोपवीतवच्चैनं चिच्छेद कपिकुञ्जरः॥
target: Then hitting at (Akampana's) shoulder-blade, that powerful monkey-Angada hewed him in twain, his blow going obliquely down like the sacred thread.

source: सा बभूव निशा घोरा हरिराक्षसहारिणी। कालरात्रीव भूतानां सर्वेषां दुरतिक्रमा॥
target: That Night, destructive to monkeys and Rākş asas, was dreadful, and difficult of being outsped by all, like to the Fatal Night of beings.

source: दिष्ट्या सर्वे पावकाद् विप्रमुक्ता यूयं घोरात् पाण्डवाः शत्रुसाहाः। दिष्ट्या पापो धृतराष्ट्रस्य पुत्रः सहामात्यो न सकामोऽभविष्यत्॥
target: O Pandavas, O with standers of foes, you have by sheer good fortune escaped from that fearful fire (of the lac house) and also by sheer good fortune the sinful son of Dhritarashtra (Duryodhana) with his ministers have not succeed in their (evil) wishes.

source: ते हया मथिता भग्ना व्यसवो धरणीं गताः। ते निहत्य हयांस्तस्य प्रमथ्य च महारथम्॥ पुनरुत्पत्य वेगेन तस्थुर्लक्ष्मणपार्श्वतः॥
target: Then the steeds were smashed and sent to the ground. And having slain the steeds, and smitten the mighty car-warrior,* again by a vehement bound, came to the side of Laksmana. *Maharatham (ac.) may also mean mighty car. By the way the samasa or junction called Tatpurusha is a frequent source of obscurity in Sanskrit specially where the gender of the word without samása is the same with that of the thing signified by the samāsa, as in this case.

source: उचितं हि सदा गन्तुं घोषयात्रां विशाम्पते। एवं च त्वां पिता राजन् समनुज्ञातुमर्हति॥
target: O king, O ruler of earth, it is always proper to go and see the cattle; if you say this to your father, you will get his permission."

source: पाल्यमानास्त्वया ते हि निवसन्ति गतज्वराः। नार्हस्येवंगते मन्युं कर्तुं प्राकृतवद् यथा॥
target: Under your protection, the Pandavas are residing in your dominion in great happiness. You should not indulge in sorrow like ordinary people.

source: द्रवते च महासैन्यं पाण्डवस्य महात्मनः। एते च कौरवास्तूर्णं प्रभग्नान् वीक्ष्य सोमकान्॥ प्राद्रवन्ति रणे दृष्ट्वा हर्षयन्तः पितामहम्। सोऽहं भीष्मं निहन्म्यद्य पाण्डवार्थाय दंशितः॥
target: The vast army of the illustrious Pandava (Yudhishthira) again began to fly away. Having seen the Somakas routed the Kurus gladdening the heart of the grandsire rushed to battle with great cheerfulness. (Seeing) all this, Krishna reflected;-"Clad in armour I will kill Bhishma today for the sake of the Pandavas.

source: अवमानेन कुरुते न प्रीयति न हृष्यति। ईदृशो जापको याति निरयं नात्र संशयः॥
target: That Reciter who work without faith, who is not contented with his work, and who takes no pleasure in it, forsooth, goes to hell.

source: ततो भीमो महाबाहुः संरम्भी दृढविक्रमः। अस्त्रैरस्त्राणि संवार्य शरैर्विव्याधय सूतजम्॥
target: Thereafter, the mighty-armed and wrathful Bhima of resolute prowess, repulsing the weapons of Karna by his own, began to pierce that son of Suta.

source: अण्डजे जन्मनि पुनर्ब्रह्मणे हरियोनये। एष धर्मः समुद्भूतो नारायणमुखात् पुनः॥
target: In the next birth of Brahman, viz., that which he derived from an egg which originated from Hari, this religion once more issued from the mouth of Narayana.

source: तस्य योनौ प्रयुक्तस्य गर्भो भवति वा न वा। आम्रपुष्पोपमा यस्य निवृत्तिरुपलभ्यते॥
target: When given to the womb, it sometimes produces an embryo and sometimes fails. When sexual intercourse fails, it resembles a mango tree that puts forth a great many flowers without, however, producing a single fruit.

source: दर्शयन्ति हि बीभत्सैः क्रूरैर्भीषणकैरपि। नानारूपैर्विरूपैश्च रूपैरसुखदर्शनैः॥ अप्रशस्तैरशुचिभिः : सम्प्रयुज्य च तापसान्। प्रतिघ्नन्त्यपरान् क्षिप्रमनार्याः पुरतः स्थितान्॥
target: And they show themselves sometimes in disgusting shapes, sometimes in horrible and dreadful ones, in various frightful forms capable of frightening folks. And they throw execrable and unclean things among the anchorets, and torment those that happen to come before them.

source: स्वर्ग येन द्विजाः प्राप्तः सभार्यः ससुतस्नुषः। यथा चाघ शरीरस्य ममेदं काञ्चनीकृतम्॥
target: On account of that incident he attained to Heaven, O twice-born ones, along with his wife and son and daughter-in-law. And in consequence of what then took place half my body became changed into gold.

source: निश्चयो वापि कस्तेषां तदा ह्यासीन्महात्मनाम्। विमुखेषु महाप्राज्ञ मम पुत्रेषु संजय॥
target: What, O highly wise one, the resolution of these high-souled warriors, when, O Sanjaya, my sons turned away their faces from the field? was

source: अतिविद्धेन मनसा मन्मथेन प्रदीपिता। दिव्यास्तरणसंस्तीर्णे विस्तीर्णे शयनोत्तमे॥ चित्तसंकल्पभावेन सुचित्तानन्यमानसा। मनोरथेन सम्प्राप्तं रमन्त्येनं हि फाल्गुनम्॥
target: Being greatly pierced by (the arrows of the) god of love and being excited by him, she withdrew her mind from any other object; and with her imagination highly inflamed, she mentally sported with him (Arjuna) on a wide and excellent bed laid over with celestials sheets.

source: यथा दग्ध्वा जगत् कृत्स्नं समये सचराचरम्। गच्छेद् वह्निर्विभोरास्यं तथास्रं भीममावृणोत्॥
target: Just as at the hour of the universal annihilation the All-destroying. Fire having burnt down the mobile and immobile creation proceeds to enter the mouth of the Creator, so also that weapon Proceeded to enter the body of Bhima.

source: यथा मधुकरस्तर्षात्काशपुष्पं पिबन्नपि। रसमत्रन न विन्देत तथानार्येषु सैहृदम्॥
target: As a bee, after feeding uport the Kāśa flowers, does not get honey so is (fruitless) the friendship with unworthy persons.

source: गृहीत्वा च महाकायं राक्षसेन्द्रमलम्बुषम्॥ उद्यम्य न्यवधीद् भूमौ मयं विष्णुरिवाहवे।
target: Then seizing that foremost of the Rakshasas, namely, the huge-bodied Alambusha, he raised him high and then dashed him against the earth, like Vishnu dashing Maya against the ground.

source: अष्टावक्र उवाच अन्धस्य पन्था बधिरस्य पन्थाः स्त्रियः पन्था भारवाहस्य पन्थाः। राज्ञः पन्था ब्राह्मणेनासमेत्य समेत्य तु ब्राह्मणस्यैव पन्थाः॥
target: Ashtavakra said: When no Brahmana passes along a path, it then belongs first to the blind, then to the deaf, then to women, then to the carriers of burden and then (last of all) to the king But when a Brahmana is met on the way, it solely belongs to him.

source: पशुपतिवचनाद् भवामि सद्यः कृमिरथवा तरुरप्यनेकशाखः। अपशुपतिवरप्रसादजा मे त्रिभुवनराज्यविभूतिरप्यनिष्टा॥
target: Commanded by that Lord of all creatures, I am ready to become a worm or a tree with many branches. If not acquired through the favour of Mahadeva's boons I would not accept the very sovereignty of the three worlds.

source: जम्बूखण्डस्तु तत्रैव सुमहान् नन्दनोयमः। आयुर्दश सहस्राणि वर्षाणां तत्र भारत॥
target: Here is also Jambukhanda, O king, which is greatly populated. O descendant of Bharata, the length of human life there is ten thousand years.

source: साङ्गाश्च चतुरो वेदानधीते यो द्विजर्षभः। षड्भ्यः प्रवृत्तः कर्मभ्यस्तं पात्रमृषयो विदुः॥
target: The Rishis have declared that Brahmana to be a deserving object of gifts who studies the four Vedas with all their auxiliaries and is devoted to the six well known duties. One acquires great merit by making gifts to Brahmanas endued with such qualifications.

source: प्रियां बहुमतां भार्यां त्यक्त्वा राजा महाबलः। सर्वासां च महाभागां त्वामुपैष्यति रावणः॥ समृद्धं स्त्रीसहस्रेण नानारत्नोपशोभितम्। अन्तःपुरं तदुत्सृज्य त्वामुपैष्यति रावणः॥
target: And turning away in scorn from his beloved wife, highly esteemed, the mighty king Ravana, desire for you. And leaving his inner apartment enriched with thousand of females and adorned with various jewels, Rāvana shall adore you.

source: ततो वादित्रनिर्घोषैर्माङ्गल्यैश्च स्तवैः शुभैः। प्रायान्तमर्जुनं वीरं मागधाश्चैव तुष्टुवुः॥
target: The minstrels and musicians then greeted the heroic Arjuna as he proceeded, with the sounds of musical instruments and eulogies, auspicious and well-worded.

source: परीतबुद्धिर्हि विसंज्ञकल्पो दुर्योधनो न च तच्छ्रद्दधाति। स शेष्यते वै निहतश्चिराय शास्त्रातिगो भीमवलाभिभूतः॥
target: Raft of his reason, and like one senseless, Duryodhana then disregarded our words. Past all counsel, he shall have soon to lie on the field crushed by the might of Bhishma.”

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच एतावदुक्त्वा राजा तु सर्वांस्तान् पृथिवीपतीन्। अनुभाष्य महाराज पुनः पप्रच्छ संजयम्॥
target: Vaishampayana said Having said this to all those rulers of the earth, the king, O great king, addressing Sanjaya asked him.

source: यानि शिल्पानि लोकेऽस्मिन् यच्चैवान्यत् सुदुष्करम् सर्वं यतिष्ये तत् कर्तुमृतुपर्ण भरस्व माम्॥
target: O Rituparna, I will take care to bring under operation all the arts, that rest in the world and also other matters difficult of accomplishment. Therefore, do you maintain me.”

source: मम प्रव्राजनादद्य कृतकृत्या नृपात्मजा। सुतं भरतमव्यग्रमभिषेचयतां ततः॥
target: On my wandering away to the forest to-day, the daughter of Kekaya shall have her ends attained and shall install Bharata on the throne without any disturbance whatsoever,

source: इयं कनकवर्णाङ्गी रामस्य महिषी प्रिया। प्रणष्टापि सती यस्य मनसो न प्रणश्यति॥
target: This one having a golden countenance must be the beloved queen of Rāma who, albeit separated from him, has not disappeared from his mind.

source: परश्वधायुधो देवो अनुकारी सुबान्धवः। तुम्बवीणो महाक्रोध ऊर्ध्वरेता जलेशयः॥
target: You are Kapila; you are brown; you are all the hues whose mixture produces white; you are the period of life; you are ancient; you are recent; you are a Gandharva; you are the mother of the celestials in the form of Aditi; you are Garuda, the king of birds, born of Vinata by Kashyapa otherwise called Tarkshya; you capable of being comprehended easily; you are of excellent and agreeable speech.

source: अतिदुःखमिदं मूढ न जातु ब्राह्मणः सहेत्। क्षत्रियस्येव ते धैर्यं कामया सत्यमुच्यताम्॥
target: O fool, no Brahmana could bear such a pain! Your patience is like that of a Kshatriya! Tell me the truth, without fear.

source: ततोऽस्य निशितैर्बाणैः सर्वान् हत्वा पदानुगान्॥ अभ्यगाद् भारती सेनां हतशेषां महारथः।
target: Killing next all the followers, of Susharman with his keen arrows, the great car-warrior Arjuna proceeded against the remnant of the Bharata army.

source: बिभ्रत् पितुश्च कौरव्य रूपवर्णमनुत्तमम्॥ बभौ तदा भावितात्मा विधूम इव पावकः।
target: Assuming the excellent form and hue of his father, Shuka, O son of Kuru, of purified Soul, shone like a smokeless fire.

source: कृच्छ्रेणैव तु तां पार्थो गोविन्दे विनिवेशिताम्। संजहार ततो दृष्टि कृष्णश्चाप्यपराजितः॥
target: With great difficulty, the son of Pritha withdrew his look that had fallen on Govinda. The undefeated Krishna also (did the same).

source: तस्य तद्भाषितं श्रुत्वा निःसृतोऽहं नृपालयात्॥ अनुयातश्च मां तूर्णमयं भ्राता सुदारुणः।
target: Hearing his speech I sallied out of the palace, and was followed by this horrible brother of mine.

source: विरूपाक्षेण सुग्रीवस्तारेण च निखर्वटः। तुण्डेन च नलस्तत्र पटुश: पनसेन च।॥
target: Sugriva with Virupaksha, Nikharvata with Tara, Nala with Tunda and Patusha with Panasa.

source: तरस्विना ते तरवस्तरसा बहु कम्पिताः। कुसुमानि विचित्राणि ससृजुः कपिना तदा॥
target: And shaken in diverse ways by the motion of the light fleeting monkey, the tree showered many-hued flowers.

source: नानापताकाकलिलं किङ्किणीजालमालिनम्॥ उह्यमानमिवाकाशे विमानं पाण्डुरैर्हयैः। ध्वज त पश्यं कर्णस्य नागकक्षं महात्मनः॥
target: It has four beautiful gray horses and it is also decked with various sorts of banners and net work of bells and how it is being borne as if in the skies by their pale horses. Look the high souled Karna's banner with the sign of elephant rope.

source: रौद्रं धनुर्वरं श्रेष्ठं लेभे यद् रोहिणीसुतः। तत् तुष्टः प्रददौ रामः सौभद्राय महात्मने॥
target: That foremost of bows of best make called Rudra which the son of Rohini had obtained, that bow was given, out of delight, to the highsouled son of Subhadra, by Rama.

source: वर्तमाने तथा घोरे सङ्ग्रामे लोमहर्षणे।। रुधिरौघा महाघोरा नद्यस्तत्र विसुनुवुः॥
target: And as the mighty envounter, capable of making people's hair stand on end, went on, there flowed a fearful river of gore.

source: चतुरङ्गस्य सैन्यस्य सम्पातश्च महानभूत्। ततोऽर्जुनो महाराज कौरवाणामनीकिनीम्॥ व्यधमत् त्वरया युक्तः क्षपयन् सर्वपार्थिवान्।
target: Terrific, (indeed) was the clash of the two armies, (each) consisting of four (kinds of) forces. Then, 0 great king, Arjuna, vanquishing all the kings (on your son's side), began quickly to destroy the army of the Kauravas.

source: गिरयः सागराश्चैव नद्यश्च सजलास्तथा॥ वृक्षाश्चौषधयश्चैव व्याश्रयन्त किरीटिनम्।
target: O foremost of men, all the mountains, rivers, seas, with trees, herbs and plants were for crowned Arjuna.

source: संक्लिष्टकर्माणतिप्रमादं नित्यानृतं चादृढभक्तिकं च। विसृष्टरागं पटुमानिनं चाप्येतान् न सेवेत नराधमान् षट्॥

target: The Kine said That man becomes purged off of all his sins who worships a cow with these Mantras. viz., O Bahula, O Samanga, O you who are fearless everywhere, O you who are forgiving and full of auspiciousness, O friend, O source of all plenty, in the region of Brahman, formerly you were present with your calf in the sacrifice of Indra the holder of the thunderbolt! source: ततः शैलोपमं वीरं प्राञ्जलिं प्रणतं स्थितम्। उवाचेदं वचो रामो हनूमन्तं प्लवङ्गमम्॥
target: Thereupon Rāma spoke to the heroic monkey Hanumān, resembling a mountain and standing before him humbly with folded hands saying.

source: अवप्लुत्याथ पाञ्चाल्यो रथात् तूर्णं महाबलः। आरुरोह रथं तूर्णं सात्यकेस्तु महात्मनः॥
target: Thereupon that mighty car-warrior the Panchala prince quickly jumping down his car, ascended with agility the chariot of the highly illustrious Satyaki.

source: रामलक्ष्मणयोर्वासमरण्ये सह सीतया। राघवस्य च बाणेन वालिनश्च तथा वधः।। रामकोपादशेषाणां रक्षसां च तथा वधम्। कैकेय्या वरदानेन इदं च विकृतं कृतम्॥
target: Rama's and Laksmana's abode in the forest with Sītā, Rāghava's slaying of Vāli with a shaft, the slaughter of innumerable Räksasas by the enraged Rama, and (finally) this mishap-all these owe their origin to the bestowal of the boon on Kaikeyi.

source: एवंरूपेति सा शक्या न निर्देष्टुं नराधिप। क्षणेन हि बिभर्त्यन्यदनिर्दैश्यं वपुस्तथा॥
target: O king, none is able to describe it by saying “It is such"; for it assumes an indescribable form with a moment.

source: महासत्त्वा महावीर्या महाबलपराक्रमाः। पाण्डुर्दृष्ट्वा सुतांस्तांस्तु देवरूपान् महौजसः॥ मुदं परमिकां लेभे ननन्द च नराधिपः ऋषीणामपि सर्वेषां शतशृङ्गनिवासिनाम्॥ प्रिया बभूवुस्तासां च तथैव मुनियोषिताम्। कुन्तीमथ पुनः पाण्डुर्माद्र्यर्थे समचोदयत्॥
target: Seeing his sons endued with celestial beauty and extraordinary strength, with super abundant energy, prowess and largeness of mind, Pandu. The king, became exceedingly glad obtaining such sons. To all the Rishis, inhabitants of the mountain with the hundred peaks. And to their wives, they became great favourites. Sometime after, Pandu again requested Kunti for Madri.

source: ते हयान् रथचक्रे च रथेषां चापि मारिष॥ निग्रहीतुमुपाक्रामन् क्रोधाविष्टाः समन्ततः।
target: O king, then assailing with with great vehemence his horses, the wheels of his car and Ishadanda.

source: हेमपुष्करसंछन्नं तत्र वैखानसं सरः॥ तरुणादित्यसंकाशैहँसैर्विचरितं शुभैः।
target: There is the Vaikhānasa tank filled with golden lotuses; and ranged by graceful cranes of the hue of the infant sun.

source: वरान् वरान् विनिघ्नन्तं पाण्डुपुत्रस्य सैनिकान्। युगान्तमिव कुर्वाणं भीष्मं यौधिष्ठिरे बले॥
target: And marking also that hero (Bhishma) was killing the foremost warriors of Yudhisthira's army and that he was making a great havoc amongst the troops as if the hour of dissolution had come.

source: अलाभे यो गवां दद्याद् घृतधेनुं यतव्रतः। तस्यैता घृतवाहिन्यः क्षरन्ते वत्सला इव॥
target: If in the absence of kine, one makes a gift of a cow made of clarified butter, observant of a vow the while, one gets for one's use these rivers of clarified butter all of which approach one like an affectionate mother approaching her loved child.

source: प्रवारणं तु बालानां पूर्वं कार्यमिति श्रुतिः। तस्मात् प्रवारणं पूर्वमर्हः पार्थो धनंजयः॥
target: But the holy books lay down that the younger persons should be aided first, therefore I should first assist Dhananjaya, the son of Pritha.

source: युधिष्ठिर उवाच ममाप्येतन्मतं पार्थ त्वया यत् समुदाहृतम्। गच्छामः पुण्यविख्यातं महद् द्वैतवनं सरः॥
target: Yudhishthira said : I do fully approve of what you have said. O Partha, let us repair to that sacred and celebrated lake Dvyaitavana.

source: निष्ठुरं वैरपुरुषं वृद्धानां शासनातिगम्। कथमात्मकृतं दोषं मय्याधातुमिहेच्छसि॥
target: Highly ruthless, he was the embodiment of hostilities, and disobedient to the commands of the old. Why do you then attribute your own faults to me?

source: सुयोधनबलं त्वद्य योधयिष्ये समन्ततः। विजेष्ये च रणे राजन् सत्यमेतद् ब्रवीमि ते॥
target: I will, this day, fight with the entire army of Suyodhana and vanquish it in battle, Oking. This I tell you for sooth.

source: तानि दृष्ट्वा महार्हाणि दर्शयित्वा मुहुर्मुहुः। राघवः सहसौमित्रिः सुग्रीवे संन्यवेशयत्।॥
target: Looking again and again with Saumitri, at those costly ornaments, Rāghava handed them over to Sugriva.

source: तस्यैवं वर्तमानस्य पुरुषस्य विजानतः। अमित्राः सम्प्रसीदन्ति तथा मित्रीभवन्त्यपि॥
target: A wiseman who conduct himself thus, succeeds in freeing his very enemies of their hostility and converting them into friends.

source: प्रीतो नाम ततो भूत्वा भृत्यानां त्वमरिंदम! भोगांश्च परिवारांश्च कामान्वसु च दापय॥ ततो माल्यानि वासासि वीराणामनुलेपनम्। देयं च बहु योधेभ्यः स्वयं च मुदितः पिब॥
target: O repressor of foes, (pretending to be) well pleased, do you dispense-viands, and servants, and objects of enjoyments, and wealth to your retainers; and to the many heroes and warriors distribute wreaths and attires and unguents. And do you (Simulating) delight drink.

source: इयं ममात्मजा राजन्हेमयाप्सरसा धृता ॥ कन्या मन्दोदरी नाम पल्यर्थं प्रतिगृह्यताम्।
target: This daughter of mine, O king, O king, borne by the Apsarā, Hemā, this my daughter named Mandodari do you accept as my wife.

source: पिनाकी सर्वभूतेशो भगनेत्रनिपातनः। ते गत्वा सहिता देवा ब्राह्मणा सह मन्दरम्॥
target: That wielder of the Pinaka, that lord of all creatures, that slayer of the Asura that Bhaganetra. Thereupon all those celestials accompanied by Brahma, proceeded to the Mandara mountain.

source: कथंचिन्मृगशावाक्षी विश्वासमुपपादिता। ततः सम्भाषिता चैव सर्वमर्थं प्रकाशिता॥
target: And somehow creating her confidence I addressed that damsel having the eyes of a fawn and related to her the whole story.

source: कुलीनत्वे च रमे दुष्कुलीनान् विकुत्सयन्। धनदर्पण दृप्तश्च दरिद्रान् परिकुत्सयन्॥
target: Proud of his high birth, one is seen to speak ill of those that are but high born. Elated with pride of wealth, one is seen to hate the poor.

source: दनुर्नाम दितेः पुत्रः शापाद् राक्षसतां गतः। आख्यातस्तेन सुग्रीवः समर्थो वानराधिपः॥ स ज्ञास्यति महावीर्यस्तव भार्यापहारिणम्। एवमुक्त्वा दनुः स्वर्ग भ्राजमानो दिवं गतः॥
target: A son of Diti named Danu, had, by virtue of an imprecation, undergone Raksasa-hood. He it is who had related to us all about the capable Sugrīva.—That exceedingly puissant one shall have a knowledge of the ravisher of your wife? Having said this, Danu beaming (with a halo) went to heaven.

source: गजस्कन्धगतानां च पुरुषाणां किरीटिना। छिद्यन्ते चोत्तमाङ्गानि भल्लैः संनतपर्वभिः॥
target: The diadem-decked Arjuna then cut-off with bhallas of close knots, the heads of hostile warriors that rode on the neck of these elephants.

source: धृतराष्ट्र उवाच न चेद् वेदा विना धर्मं त्रातुं शक्ता विचक्षण। अथ कस्मात् प्रलापोऽयं ब्राह्मणानां सनातनः॥
target: Dhritarashtra said If the Vedas, without the aid of virtue, are not competent to rescue (men from sins), 0 you, who have control over your senses, then whence is this false and old idea of the Brahmanas (that a knowledge of the Vedas rescues a man from sins)?

source: अत्युग्रं तेजसां तेजस्तपां परमं तपः। विश्वावसुहिरण्याक्षपुरुहूतनमस्कृत॥
target: You, O powerful one, are the liberal giver of blessings. You are the supreme Truth. I bow to you.

source: तं विद्याद् दुःखसंयोगवियोगं योगसंज्ञितम्। स निश्चयेन योक्तव्यो योगोऽनिर्विण्णचेतसा॥
target: That state should be understood to be called Yoga, in which there is a complete severance of all connection with pain. Such Yoga should be practised with steadiness, and with an undisponding heart.

source: प्राहुर्नारायणं देवं यं विश्वस्य परायणम्॥ अणीयसामणीयांसं स्थविष्ठं च स्थवीयसाम्।
target: You are the subtilest of the subtile, grossest of the gross, the heaviest of the heavy, and the highest of the high.

source: एतावतापि लाभेन तोष्टुमर्हसि काश्यप। किं पुनर्योऽसि सत्त्वानां सर्वेषां ब्राह्मणोत्तमः॥
target: With this gain, you should O Kashyapa, be contented. How happy, again, should you feel yourself, as you think that amongst living creatures you are a superior Brahmana.

source: शरार्चिषा गाण्डिवेनाहपेकः सर्वान् कुरून् बाह्निकांश्चाभिहत्य। स्तथा दहेयं सगणान् प्रसा॥
target: And like a spark of fire in a heap of dried grass at the end of winder, I, too, alone, am well capable of setting fire to all the Kurus and the Balhikas, as also their followers with my flashing arrows flung from Gandiva.

source: पार्थिवाः पृथिवीहेतोः समभित्यज्य जीवितम्। न वा शाम्यन्ति निघ्नन्तो वर्धयन्ति यमक्षयम्॥
target: They are not to be restrained. They striking one another and giving up their lives will increase the population of the abode of Yama.

source: एतां बुद्धिं समास्थाय जीवितव्यं सदा भवेत्। जीवन् पुण्यमवाप्नोति पुरुषो भद्रमश्नुते॥
target: With such a view one should always preserve his life. person, if alive, can acquire religious merit and enjoy happiness and prosperity.

source: स कस्मिंश्चित् क्षुधाविष्टः फलभारसमन्वितम्। बिल्वं ददर्श विप्रर्षिरारुरोह च तं ततः॥
target: After he had proceeded for some distance, he became stricken with hunger. He there saw a Bilva tree covered down with the weight of (ripe) fruits. He climbed that tree.

source: वैदूर्यमणिदण्डैश्च पतितैरङ्कुशैः शुभैः। घण्डाभिश्च गजेन्द्राणां पतिताभिः समन्ततः॥
target: With well-shaped hooks having their handles decked with lapses, with bells of huge elephants scattered here and there.

source: प्राणमात्रबला ये वै नैव ते बलिनो मताः। इत्येवमुक्तः पवनः श्व इत्येवाब्रवीद् वचः॥
target: Thus addressed, the Wind-god said,Tomorrow I shall test your strength,Thereafter night came.

source: इन्द्र उवाच पुनरेव महाभाग देवर्षिगणसेवित॥ समाख्याहि मम ब्रह्मन् किं सुखं चिरजीविनाम्।
target: Indra said: O greatly exalted one, tell me what are the joys of those that live forever, joys adored by the celestials and the Rishis?

source: पृथिवी देश इत्युक्तः कालः स च न दृश्यते। अभिप्रेतार्थसिद्ध्यर्थं ध्यायते यच्च तत्तथा॥
target: The divisions of the Earth are called place. Time is not seen. Regarding the success of any object or purpose, it is gained or not gained according to the manner in which the mind is engaged to think of it.

source: तव भ्राता मम सखा सम्बन्धी शिष्य एव च। मांसान्युत्कृत्य दास्यामि फाल्गुनार्थे महीपते॥
target: Your brother, Arjuna, is my friend, relative and pupil; O ruler of earth, I can cut off and give away my own flesh for Arjuna's sake.

source: वध्यमानं तु तत्सैन्यं पाण्डुपुत्रेण धन्विना॥ प्रायशो विमुखं सर्व नावतिष्ठत भारत।
target: O descendant of the Bharata race, that army, which was thus slain by the son of Pandu, that great bowman, almost wholly ran away (from the field of battle); and in fact, none remained (to fight with the foe).

source: वेत्ति ज्ञानविसर्ग च निग्रहानुग्रहं तथा। यथोक्तवृत्तेधीरस्य क्षेमाश्रमपदं भवेत्॥
target: That king, who is possessed of knowledge, who makes gifts to worthy persons on proper occasions, who knows how to favour and punish, who follows the injunctions of the scriptures in all his dealings, and who has tranquility of soul, attains to the object of the Garhasthya mode of life.

source: संजय उवाच अर्जुनस्तु महाराज हत्वा सैन्यं चतुर्विधम्। सूतपुत्रं च संक्रुद्ध दृष्ट्वा चैव महारणे॥ शोणितोदां महीं कृत्वा सांसमजास्थिपङ्कलाम्। मनुष्य शीर्षपाषाणां हस्त्यश्वकृतरोधसम्॥ शूरस्थिचयसंकीर्णा काकगृध्रानुनादिताम्। छत्रहंसप्लवोपेता वीरवृक्षापहरिणीम्॥ हारपद्माकरवतीमुष्णीषवरफेनिलाम्। धनुःशरध्वजोपेतांन नरक्षुद्रकपालिनीम्॥ चर्मवर्मभ्रमोपेतां रथोडुपसामाकुलाम्। जयैषिणां च सुतरां भीरूणां च सुदुतराम्॥
target: Sanjaya said Arjuna in that great battle, after destroying the four divisions (of the army belonging to the enemy) and taking a glance of the enraged son of Suta, make a river of blood to flow there, a river that was filled with flesh, bones and marrow; elephants and horses formed the bed of that river; and human heads, like rocks and stones strewn on all sides, seemed to resound with the cries of crows and ravens, umbrellas floated like swans; and bodies of brave soldiers like so many trees drifted away by the current; necklaces were like lotuses in the stream; and head-dresses its foam, broken pieces of skulls floated about and bows and arrows were like fishes in it; armours and shields formed its eddies; chariots, with which it teemed, were like its rafts; and braver-hearted men could alone cross that bloody stream, while the fainthearted sunk within to navigate it.

source: ये चापि सततं राजंस्तेभ्यश्च स्पृहयाम्यहम्। शक्यं ह्येवाहवे योद्धं न दातुमनसूयितम्॥
target: It is easy to fight in battle, but not so to make a gift without pride or vanity.

source: यावन्न ते चमूः चमूः सर्वाः शरैः संनतपर्वभिः। नाशयत्यर्जुनस्तावत् संधिस्ते तात युज्यताम्॥
target: O son! Your alliance with Arjuna is must to be made unless he destroys your whole army by hitting hard through the arrows having bent knots.

source: यावत् पार्थो न जानाति सात्यकि बहुभिर्वृतम्। ते त्वरध्वं तथा शूराः शराणां मोक्षणे भृशम्॥
target: Let now a detachment of mighty and foremost car-warriors intercept Pritha's son, so that he may not advance to the rescue of Satyaki now surrounded by many.

source: गुरुं शिष्यो वरयेद् गोप्रदाने स वै गन्ता नियतं स्वर्गमेव। विधिज्ञानं सुमहान् धर्म एष विधिं ह्याद्यं विधयः संविशन्ति॥
target: The disciple should, in the matter of making gifts of kine, select his preceptor. Such a disciple is sure to go to Heaven every time. The selection of a preceptor is considered as a high duty by persons knowing the ordinances. This is, indeed, the initial ordinance. All other ordinances depend upon it.

source: वरं ददामि ते हन्त वृणीष्व त्वं यदिच्छसि। यच्चाप्यवाप्यं हृदि ते सर्वं तद् ब्रूहि माचिरम्॥
target: I shall give you boons. Do you name the boons. Do not delay, but tell me what is in your mind. Even if it be unattainable, I Shall yet bestow it on you.

source: स निर्याय महाबाहुः पुण्डरीकेक्षणस्ततः। गिरिव्रजाद् बहिस्तस्थौ समदेशे महायशाः॥
target: The long armed, the lotus-eyed and the greatly famous (Krishna), coming out (of Girivraja), stopped on a level plain outside the city.

source: स नो राजाधृतराष्ट्रस्य पुत्रो न्यपातयद् व्यसने राज्यमिच्छन्। दास्यं च नोऽगमयद् भीमसेन यत्राभवच्छरणं द्रौपदी नः॥
target: O Bhimasena, when the king (Duryodhana) the son of Dhritarashtra, wishing to get possession of our kingdom, plunged us into misery and even slavery, it was Draupadi who rescued us.

source: म्लेच्छाश्चार्याश्च ये तत्र ददृशुः शुश्रुवुस्तथा। वृत्तं तत् पाण्डुपुत्राणां रुरुदुस्ते सगद्गदाः॥
target: Both the Aryas and the Mlecchas that saw or heard of this conduct of the Pandavas all wept with their voice choked with tears.

source: ते चोदिताः पार्थिवसत्तमेन ततः प्रहृष्टाः जगृहुः प्रदीपान्। देवर्षिगन्धर्वसुरर्षिसङ्घा विद्याधराश्चाप्सरसां गणाच॥
target: In obedience to the command of that foremost of kings they gladly took (burning) lamps, in their hands. large numbers of celestials, sages, Gandharvas and Rishis and hosts of Vidyadharas, Apsaras.

source: वासयन्त्यतिथीन् नित्यं नित्यं ये चानसूयकाः। नित्यं स्वाध्यायशीलाश्च दुर्गाण्यतितरन्ति ते॥
target: Those, who always treat guests hospitably, those, who do not cherish malice, those, who constantly read the Vedas, succeed in getting over all difficulties.

source: तस्मिन् निपतिते नागे वज्रदत्तस्य पाण्डवः। तं न भेतव्यमित्याह ततो भूमिगतं नृपम्॥
target: When the elephant of Vajradatta was prostrated on the ground the so of Pandu, addressing the king who had fallen down with his beast, said, 'Do not fear.'

source: स्वर्गो धनं वा धान्यं वा विद्या पुत्राः सुखानि च । गरुवृत्त्यनुरोधेन न किंचिदपि दुर्लभम् ॥
target: Heaven, wealth, grains, learning, son, and happiness, nothing remains inaccessible to us.

target: Thought burnt by the energy of your weapon's fire, I shall revive him. O lowest of men, witness the power of my austerities and my truth.'

target: The words I shall utter will have senses, be free from ambiguity, logical, free from tautology, smooth, certain, free from bombast, agreeable, or sweet truthful, not inconsistent with the three-1 old objects of life, refined not elliptical or imperfect, shorn of harshness or difficulty of comprehension, characterised by due order, not far-fetched in sense, corrected with one another as cause and effect, and each having a specific object.

target: You were fully capable, O twiceborn one, of protecting my wife whose disposition, by nature is sinful. In doing what you did, you did not commit any sin I was for this, pleased with you.

target: Ever one had and will have in this world mothers and fathers and sons and wives, by hundreds and thousands. Who, however, were they and whose are we?

target: The conquest of these, viz., the five objects, is tantamount to the conquest of self. The king who has governed his senses is capable to resist his enemies.

target: Do you place yourself now under the control of Sugrīva, ascertaining time and place, putting up with misery for your welfare and injury.

source: तत्प्रसादान्मया प्राप्तं ब्राह्मण्यं दुर्लभं महत्। असितो देवलश्चैव प्राह पाण्डुसुतं नृपम्॥ शापाच्छक्रस्य कौन्तेय विभो धर्मोऽनशत् तदा। तन्मे धर्मे यशश्चाग्र्यमायुश्चैवाददत् प्रभुः॥
target: Then addressing the royal son of Pandu, the Rishi Asita Devala said Formerly O son of Kunti, through the curse of Shakra, all the merit of my pious deeds was destroyed. The power, Mahadeva kindly gave me back that merit together with great fame and a long life.

source: कच्चिद् भगवतां रम्यं तपोवनमिदं नृपः। भवेत् प्राप्तो नलो नाम निषधानां जनाधिपः॥ यत्कृतेऽहमिदं ब्रह्मन् प्रपन्ना भृशदारुणम्। वनं प्रतिभयं घोरं शार्दूलमृगसेवितम्॥
target: Has the royal Nala, the ruler of the Nishadha people, for whom, O Brahmanas! afflicted, I am roaming in this dreadful and deep wilderness, full of terrible things and infested by tigers and other beasts of prey-visited this charming hermitage of your almighty selves!

source: इत्युक्तः स तु पुत्रेण तदा वानरकेतनः। स्मयन् प्रोवाच कौन्तेयस्तदा चित्राङ्गदासुतम्॥ विदितं ते महाबाहो यथा दीक्षां चराम्यहम्। न स तावत् प्रवेक्ष्यामि पुरं ते पृथुलोचन॥
target: The ape-bannered son of Kunti, thus addressed by his son, answered the child Chitrangada, saying, You know, mighty-armed one, what vow I am observing? O you of large eyes, till the termination of this my vow, I cannot enter your city.

source: भवेत्तु मानुषेष्वेवं प्रायश्चित्तमनुत्तमम्। दानं वा दानशक्तेषु सर्वमेतत् प्रकल्पयेत्॥
target: Amongst men such expiation ranks foremost. The practice of charity has been sanctioned in all such cases for those that are able to practise charity.

source: एवमुक्ता मया सा तु सुरसा कामरूपिणी॥ अब्रवीन्नातिवर्तेत कश्चिदेष वरो मम।
target: Thus accosted by me, Surasā, wearing forms at her will, said, 'None is able to escape me. Even this is the boon that I have received.'

source: सव्योरुः कामिनीभोग्यस्त्वया स च विवर्जितः। तस्मादहं नाचरिष्ये त्वयि कामं वराङ्गने॥
target: The left thigh is the seat for the wife, but you have rejected it. Therefore, O best lady, I cannot accept you.

source: द्रौपदी च परिविष्टा सभामध्ये रजस्वला॥ द्यूते न वञ्चितो राजा यत् त्वया सौबलेन च।
target: Remember the ill-treatment of Draupadi, while in her season, in the midst of the assembly! Remember how yourself and Subala's son deprived the king at dice.

source: ततः प्रक्षाल्य पादौ सा विश्रान्तं मुनिमब्रवीत्। विनिधाय ततो भारं संनिधाय फलानि च॥
target: Shakuntala, then came to her fatigued father and washed his feet. She took down the heavy load that was on his shoulder and placed the fruits in proper order. Then she said-

source: माल्यवान् नाम वैदेहि गिरिणामुत्तमो गिरिः । ७९ ।। ततो गच्छति गोकर्ण पर्वतं केसरी हरिः। स च देवर्षिभिर्दिष्टः पिता मम महाकपिः।। तीर्थे नदीपतेः पुण्ये शम्बसादनमुद्धरन्॥ यस्याहं हरिणः क्षेत्रे जातो वातेन मैथिलि। हनूमानिति विख्यातो लोके स्वेनैव कर्मणा ॥
target: There is a hill, O Vaidehi, named Malyavana, the foremost of all the mountains. There lives my father, the great monkey Kesari. Being commanded by the celestial ascetics, he once repaired thence to the mount Gokarna and at the holy watering place of the lord of the rivers he brought about the destruction of (the Asura) Sammasādana. O Vaidehi, I was bom, on the field, of that monkey. And I am known all over the world as Hanumān by my own actions.

source: यो मे न दद्यादृच्छिष्टं न च पादौ प्रधावयेत्। प्रीणेरंस्तेन वासेन गन्धर्वाः पतयो मम॥
target: My Gandharva husbands wish me to serve only such person as will not give me to eat food already partaken of by another or ask me to wash their feet.

source: आरम्भाच्चैव युद्धानां यदेष कृतवान् प्रभो। मदर्थे दुष्करं कर्म कृतं तेन महाहवे॥
target: O master, the feats he had achieved in battle, fully prove that he was learned in all

source: कामक्रोधोद्भवान्दोषान्निरस्य च नराधिपाः। धर्मेण दण्डं दण्ड्येषु प्रणयन्तोऽन्वपालयन्॥
target: All the kings (of the world), becoming free from vices born of lust and anger and punishing those that deserved punishment, protected the earth.

source: धृतराष्ट्र उवाच गवां सहस्रं भवते ददानि दासीशतं निष्कशतानि पञ्च! अन्यच्च वित्तं विविधं महर्षे किं ब्राह्मणस्येह गजेन कृत्यम्॥
target: Dhritarashtra said I shall give you a thousand kine, a hundred maidservants, and five hundred pieces of gold. I shall also, O great Rishi, give you various other kinds of wealth. What use can Brahmanas have with elephant?

source: इति स्वदोषान् परिकीर्तितांस्तया समीक्ष्य बुद्ध्या क्षणदाचरेश्वरः। धनेन दर्पण बलेन चान्वितो विचिन्तयामास चिरं स रावणः॥
target: On his vices having been thus celebrated by her (Surpanakhā), that lord of the rangers of night, Råvaņa, musing awhile, was long plunged in thought.

source: शतमश्वसहस्राणि दशनागायुतानि च। युधिष्ठिरस्यानुयात्रमिन्द्रप्रस्थनिवासिनः॥
target: When Yudhishthira lived in Indraprastha, one lakh horses and one lakh elephants used to follow him.

source: लोकपालोऽसि लोकानां न लोकस्य विलोपकः।।१८ सोमेन दत्ता भार्या मे त्वया चापहृताद्य वै।
target: You may tell him further, You are a protector of the worlds, O Varuna, and not a destroyer. Why then have you abducted my wife bestowed upon me by Sona?

source: द्रौपद्युवाच नास्मि देवी न गन्धर्वी नासुरी न च राक्षसी। सैरन्ध्री तु भुजिष्यास्मि सत्यमेतद् ब्रवीमि ते॥
target: or Draupadi said I am neither a goddess nor a Gandharvi nor an Asuri nor a Rakshasi; I am a maid-servant of the Sairandhiri class; I tell you this truth.

source: भेरीमृदङ्गाभिरुतं शङ्खघोषविनादितम्। नित्यार्चितं पर्वसुतं पूजितं राक्षसैः सदा॥
target: Resonant with trumpets and drums; and ringing with the blares of conchs; where the ever adored offspring of the Parvas was always worshipped by the Rākşasas;

source: स रथादवतीर्याथ राजा परमकोपनः। पदातिः पितरं क्रुद्धो योधयामास पाण्डवम्॥
target: Descending from his car, the king, worked up with rage, fought his father on foot.

source: ततः सर्वस्य सैन्यस्य तावकस्य विशाम्पते। महानादो ह्यभूत् तत्र दृष्ट्वा राजानमाहवे॥
target: Then beholding the king proceed to the battle, all your troops, O ruler of men, raised a loud uproar.

source: धर्मं च मत्तो गृह्णीष्व सात्वतं नाम नामतः। तेन सृष्टं कृतयुगं स्थापयस्व यथाविधि॥
target: Do you receive also from me this excellent religion known by the name of Satvata. Helped by that religion do you create the golden age and ordain it duly.

source: स्वर्ग गच्छेत्यनुज्ञातस्त्र्यम्बकेण तदार्जुनः। प्रणम्य शिरसा राजन् प्राञ्जालर्देवमैक्षत॥
target: Then Arjuna was commanded by the threeeyed deity to "Go to heaven." O king, bowing down his head, he gazed at him with joined hands.

source: मणिमन्थेऽथ शैले वै पुरा सम्पूजितो मया। वर्षायुतसहस्राणां सहस्रं शतमेव च॥
target: In a former incarnation I worshipped Mahadeva on the Manimantha mountain for millions of years.

source: स दष्टपात्रो नागेन भस्मीभूतोऽभवन्नगः। काश्यपश्च ततो राजन्नजीवयत तं नगम्॥
target: The tree reduced to ashes as soon as bitten by the snake; but, О king, Kashyapa, however revived it.

source: अथाभवद् युद्धमतीव दारुणं पुनः कुरूणां सं पाण्डुसृञ्जयैः। नराश्वनागासुहरं भृशाकुलम्॥
target: The battle which followed between the Kurus on one side and the Pandus and the Srinjayas on the other with shafts cutlasses, darts, swords and maces and battle axes became awful and hard and many steeds, men and elephants were killed.

source: ऋद्धिमस्यानु तप्यन्ते पुरा विप्रकृता नराः। शालावृका इवाजस्त्रं जिघांसुमेव विन्दति॥
target: The former enemies of the king become stricken with grief on seeing his newly acquired riches. Like dogs they once more serve him, and though they only seek an opportunity to kill him, he treats them as if nothing has taken place.

source: आपूर्यमाणा निशितैः शरैः पाण्डवचोदितैः। हतप्रवीरा विध्वस्ता वार्यमाणा समन्ततः॥ कौरव्यवध्यत चमूः पाण्डुपुत्रैर्महारथैः।
target: Covered with keen arrows shot by the Pandavas, the Kaurava ariny, deprived of its foremost warriors, were routed on all sides. Indeed, O Kauravya, your army were killed by the mighty car-warriors of the Pandavas.

source: ततोऽपरान् सुतीक्ष्णाग्रान् नाराचान् मर्मभेदिनः। गत्या दशम्या संयुक्तनश्वत्थामाप्यवासृजत्॥
target: Thereafter Ashvatthaman, too, shot (at his enemy) several other broad-headed arrows, that are furnished with sharp points and that are capable of penetrating the very vitals and also that are possessed of ten different motions.

source: वानरांश्च महाकायान् प्रेषयिष्यति राघव॥ दिशो विचेतुं तां सीतां त्वद्वियोगेन शोचतीम्। अन्वेष्यति वरारोहां मैथिली रावणालये॥
target: He shall search that exquisitely fine damsel Maithili in Ravana's abode, bewailing on your separation, and to find her out he shall despatch, O Rāghava, many a monkey of huge proportions to various quarters.

source: भीष्म उवाच तस्मात् त्वमपि कौन्तेय पितृदेवद्विजातिथीन्। सम्यक् पूजयसे नित्यं गतिमिष्टामवाप्स्यसि॥
target: Bhishma continued For these reasons, do you also, O son of Kunti, always adore with reverence the deities the departed manes the Brahmanas and guests arrived at your palace, and as the outcome of such conduct you are to acquire a desirable end! sure the departed manes the Brahmanas and guests arrived at your palace, and as the outcome of such conduct you are to acquire a desirable end! sure

source: भक्ष्यानपाननिचयाः पर्वताः क्रोशमुच्छ्रिताः। तस्याश्वमेधे निर्वृत्ते राज्ञः शिष्टास्त्रयोदश॥
target: There were piles of edibles, foods and confectionery of the height of two full miles. And when the Horse-sacrifices of the king was over thirteen such piles remained (un-used).

source: मया जिता सा ध्वजिनी कुरूणां मया च गावो विजिता द्विषद्भ्यः। पितुः सकाशं नगरं प्रविश्य त्वमात्मनः कर्म कृतं ब्रवीहि॥
target: Rather entering the city, do you announce this as your own work before your father, saying “The army of the Kurus has been defeated by me, and the kine have been rescued by me from the enemies."

source: तस्य ते वीर कार्यस्य न किंचित् परिहास्यते। एष संचोदयाम्येनं यः कार्य साधयिष्यति ॥
target: That . business, O hero, say most moult a feather. I shall despatch even him who's bring about success.

source: मृतचैलपरिस्तीर्णं निर्माल्यकृतभूषणम्। सर्पनिर्मोकमालाभिः कृतचिह्नकुटीमठम्॥
target: Clothes of the dead lay here and there, and the huts were adorned with garlands of used up flowers. Many of the denizens again were dressed with sloughs cast off by snakes.

source: त्वयि सर्वमिदं विश्वं यदिदं स्थाणु जङ्गमम्। त्वं हि सर्वं विकुरुषे भूतग्रामं चतुर्विधम्॥
target: This entire universe, consisting of mobile and iinmobile objects, is established on you. You create, by modification, the four orders of Being.

source: ततो युधिष्ठिरो राजा क्रोधेन महता युतः। जिगीषमाणः संग्रामे धार्तराष्ट्रान् सराजकान्॥ त्रिभिः शारद्वतं विद्ध्वा रुक्मपुङ्खः शिलाशितैः। चतुर्भिनिजघानाश्वान् नाराचैः कृतवर्मणः॥
target: Filled with great anger and desirous of defeating the Dhartarashtras and their king in that battle, king Yudhishthira struck the son of Sharadvata with three gold winged arrows whetted on stone and next killed with four others the four horses of Kritavarman.

source: आर्य लक्ष्मण संप्राह वीरो दधिमुखः कपिः। अङ्गदप्रमुखैवीरैक्षितं मधु वानरैः॥
target: O worshipful Lakşmaņa, the heroic monkey Dadhimukha speaks that the war-like monkeys headed by Angada have drunk honey.

source: आर्थ्यशृङ्गिं कथं चैव सौभद्रः परवीरहा। तन्ममाचक्ष्व तत्त्वेन यथावृत्तं स्म संयुगे॥
target: How did also the son of Subhadra that slayer of hostile heroes, fight with the son of Rishyashringa? Describe all this in detail to me as it actually happened in the battle.

source: परीप्सन्ते जलं चेमे पेयं न त्ववगाहनम्॥
target: O Arjuna, there is no water here on the field of battle for the forces to drink from. They want water for drinking and not for a bath.

source: महाभूतानि नित्यानि भूताधिपतिसंश्रयात्। तेषां च नित्यसंवासो न विनाशो वियुज्यताम्॥
target: The great primal elements are eternal on account of the union with them of the Lord of all beings. They exist with what is eternal. Accordingly, they have no destruction when the non-eternal are destroyed.

source: दब्राह्मणे ब्रह्म न हि ध्रुवं स्यात्। मस्मिन् संग्रामे तुमुलेऽतीव भीमे॥
target: When the hour of your death will arrive. Brahmastra can never live in one who is not a Brahmana. I have forgotten that great weapon in this fierce and dreadful encounter.

source: ततः कदाचिन्निर्वेदान्निराकाराश्रितेन य। लोकतन्त्रं परित्यक्तं दुःखार्तेन भृशं मया॥
target: After all this one day, laden with sorrow, despair came upon me. I took refuge in the Formless. Suffering from great distress, I gave up the world with all its joys and sorrows.

source: ननद युधि सुग्रीवः स्वरेण महता महान्। पोथयन्विविधांश्चान्यान्ममन्थोत्तमराक्षसान्।।।। ममर्द च महाकायो राक्षसान्वानरेश्वरः। युगान्तसमये वायुः प्रवृद्धानगमानिव ॥
target: The heroic Sugrīva emitted terrible roars in the conflict and assailed the heroic Rakşasas and many others. The huge-bodied monkey-chief crushed the Rakşasas like to the wind uprooting the trees at the time of dissolution.

source: क्रौञ्चं तु गिरिमासाद्य बिलं तस्य सुदुर्गमम् । अप्रमत्तैः प्रवेष्टव्यं दुष्प्रवेशं हि तत् स्मृतम्॥
target: And coming to the Kruncha mountain, you should, having your wits about you, enter its inaccessible cavern; for that is well known as difficult of entrance.

source: विचित्य तु दिशं पूर्वां यथोक्तां सचिवैः सह। अदृष्ट्वा विनतः सीतामाजगाम महाबलः॥
target: And having explored the Eastern regions, as directed, the exceedingly strong Vinata not having been able to see Sītā, came back, in company with his counsellors.

source: इदमम्भो गृहीत्वा तु राजराजस्य शासनात्। गुह्यकोऽभ्यागतः श्वेतात् त्वत्सकाशमरिन्दम॥
target: "O tormentor of foes, at the command of the king of kings, a Guhyaka has come (to you) from the Shveta mountains, with this water.

source: ऋत्विजश्च समाहूता यथोक्ता वेदपारगाः। क्रियां कुर्वन्तु ते राजन् यथाशास्त्रमरिंदम॥
target: O king, O chastiser of foes, let Ritvijas, learned in the Vedas, celebrate your rites according to the ordinance.

source: चिताधूमाकुलपथा गृध्रमण्डलमण्डिता। अचिरेणैव कालेन श्मशानसदृशी भवेत्॥
target: And in no time, shall Lankā, assume the appearance of a cremation ground, having all her high ways enveloped with smoke issuing out of the funeral pyres, and filled with vultures.

source: अर्जुनाच्छ्रुतकीर्तिस्तु शतानीकस्तु नाकुलिः। तथैव सहदेवाच्च श्रुतसेनः प्रतापवान्॥
target: From Arjuna was born Shrutakirti, from Nakula was born Shatanika and from Sahadeva was born the greatly powerful Shrutasena.

source: ज्ञायतां सौम्य वैदेही यदि जीवति वा न वा। स च देशो महाप्राज्ञ यस्मिन् वसति रावणः॥
target: O placid one, do you learn whether Videha's daughter is alive or not; as well as ascertain the country, where, O you endowed with eminent wisdom,.liveth Ravana.

source: निवृत्तं चास्थितो धर्मं क्षमी भागवतः प्रभुः। निवृत्तिधर्मान् विदधे स एव भगवान् प्रभुः॥
target: Endued with forgiveness, he has adopted, again, the Religion of Renunciation. Indeed, it is that holy and powerful one who has himself laid down the duties of Renunciation.

source: जितारयो महाप्रज्ञाः सत्यधर्मपरायणाः। मुदं परमिकां प्राप्तास्तत्रोषुः पाण्डुनन्दनाः॥
target: Having defeated all their foes, the greatly wise and ever devoted to truth and virtue, the sons of Pandu lived there in great happiness.

source: तस्मिन् क्षणे तस्या यन्ता तूर्णश्वानचोदयत्। भीमसेनस्य कौरव्य तदद्भुतमिवाभवत्॥ ततः स्वरथमास्थाय भीमसेनो महाबलः। अभ्यद्रवत वेगेन तव पुत्रस्य वाहिनीम्॥
target: He then proceeded resisting the hostile troops like mountains checking the surging sea;

source: अपरे वानरश्रेष्ठाः संगम्य च यथोचितम्। सुग्रीवेण समागम्य स्थिताः प्राञ्जलयस्तदा।॥
target: And other foremost of monkeys, gathering together duly, came before Sugrīva with joined hands.

source: अहमात्मा गुडाकेश सर्वभूताशयस्थितः। अहमादिश्च मध्यं च भूतानामन्त एव च॥
target: O Gudakesha, I am the Self in the heart of every being. I am the beginning the middle and the end of every thing.

source: युधिष्ठिर उवाच पूर्वरूपाणि मे राजन् पुरुषस्य भविष्यतः। पराभविष्यतश्चैव तन्मे ब्रूहि पितामह॥
target: Yudhisthira said Tell me, O grandfather, the marks of future greatness and future degeneration of a person.

source: किं नु नो विद्यते कृत्यं धनेन धनलिप्सया॥ यत्र युध्यामहे सर्वे धनलोभात् समागताः। नेयं सभा राजपुत्र
target: Urged though we are by a desire for wealth, what use have we of wealth that meeting each other, we now engage in battle, urged by avarice.

source: तस्माज्जहि रणे पार्थ धार्तराष्ट्र कुलाधमम्। यथेन्द्रेण हतः पूर्वे जम्भो देवासुरे मृधे॥
target: For these reasons, O Partha, slay you this disgrace to the race of Dhritarashtra, even as Indra slew the Asura Jambha in days gone by, in the battle between the celestials and the Asuras.

source: एवं ब्रुवाणः सौमित्रिर्वनवासाय निश्चितः। रामेण बहुभिः सान्त्वैर्निषिद्धः पुनरब्रवीत्॥
target: The son of Sumitrā, who spoke thus and was determined upon going to the forest, being repeatedly requested by Rāma with consoling words to desist from his purpose, spoke to him the following words.

source: उद्यन्तौ च यथा सूर्यो बालसूर्यसमप्रभौ। कर्णशल्यौ रणे दृष्ट्वा विद्रवन्तु महारथाः॥
target: Let the greatest car-warriors, belonging to the hostile force, run away from the field, after seeing in the battle both Karna and Shalya, who are like two risen suns and who also are possessed of the splendour of the rising sun.

source: उवाच वदतां श्रेष्ठः कोऽस्मानभिभविष्यति। सज्जीभवत भद्रं वः पाण्डवा युद्धदुर्मदाः॥ यथारूपाणि पश्यामि स्वभ्यग्रो नः पराक्रमः। एवमुक्त्वा ततो राजा वीक्षांश्चक्रे समन्ततः॥
target: That foremost of speakers, thus spoke, “Who will overcome us? OPandavas, who are always invincible in battle, be blessed. Arm yourself. From what I see I am of opinion that time has come near, when we are to display our prowess." Having said this, the king looked around.

source: ततः क्रुद्धो गदां तस्य चिक्षेप रजनीचरः। ज्वलन्ती भास्कराभासां सुग्रीवाय महोदरः॥
target: Thereupon the night-ranger Mahodara, inflamed with ire, hurled at Sugrīva, the club flaming like the Sun.

source: तत्र मेधाविनः केचिदर्थमन्यैरुदीरितम्। टिचिक्षिपुर्यथा धेना नमोगतमिवामिषम्॥
target: Some greatly intelligent disputants fell upon the position urged by others as hawks dart at meat thrown into the air.

source: तानुवाच महाबाहुर्भीष्मः कुरुपितामहः। स्वागतं तव वार्ष्णेय स्वागतं ते धनंजय॥
target: Then the mighty-armed Bhishma the grandsire of the Kurus thus addressed them saying “All hail, O you of Vrishni's race, all hail, O Dhananjaya.

source: ततः पञ्चवटीं गत्वा नानाव्यालमृगायुताम्। उवाच लक्ष्मणं रामो भ्रातरं दीप्ततेजसम्॥
target: Then repairing to Pañcavațī filled with various animals and beasts of prey, Rāma remarked to his brother Laksmana of flaming energy,

source: ध्रुवं नो हिंसते राजा सर्वान् प्रतिगतानितः॥ वधेनाप्रतिरूपेण श्रेयान् मृत्युरिहैव नः।
target: Death at this place is preferable to the unequal punishment (we must meet with at the hands of Sugriva).

source: आसुरेण समाविष्टः सोऽस्त्रेण रघुपुङ्गवः। ससर्जास्त्रं महोत्साहं पावकं पावकोपमः।४६।। अग्निदीप्तमुखान्बाणांस्तत्र सूर्यमुखानपि। चन्द्रार्धचन्द्रवक्रांश्च धूमकेतुमुखानपि।। ग्रहनक्षत्रवर्णाश्च महोल्कामुखसंस्थितान्॥ विद्युज्जिह्वोपमांश्चापि ससर्ज विविधाञ्छरान्।
target: Covered with that Asura weapon that foremost of the Raghus, himself resembling fire, discharged an exceedingly vigorous weapon informed with fire; and shot various shafts having faces filled with live flames, and faces like to suns, and hued like to planets and stars, and furnished with faces resembling mighty meteors or resembling tongues of lightning.

source: द्विविधो जायते व्याधिः शारीरो मानसस्तथा। परस्परं तयोर्जन्म निर्द्वन्द्वं नोपलभ्यते॥
target: There are two sorts of diseases, viz., physical and mental. Each originates from the other. None of them exists independently.

source: ततोऽग्नि विधिवद् दत्वा सोऽपसव्यं चकार ह। पितरं दीर्घमध्वानं प्रस्थितं व्याकुलेन्द्रियः॥
target: And putting fire duly, he circumambulated his Sire, bound for a journey for good.

source: संजय उवाच तथा निपतिते कर्णे परसैन्ये च विद्रुते। आश्लिष्य पार्थ दाशार्हो हर्षाद् वचनमब्रवीत्॥
target: Sanjaya said After the destruction of Karna and the flight of the Kuru soldiers Krishna, embracing Partha in delight, said-

source: एतद्वोऽस्तु तपोयुक्तं ददामीत्वृषिचोदितम्। तस्मात् तत्तद् व्यवस्थानं तपस्वि तप उच्यते॥
target: There is a verse in the Maniras which says,-(Ye sacrificer, perform the sacrifice with gifts of costly things. I will give you the happiness represented by sons, animals, and heaven.) To live, therefore, in accordance with the ordinance is said to be the highest form of asceticism. Therefore, you should perform sacrifice and penances in the shape of gifts.

source: तस्यैतौ राक्षसेन्द्रस्य मन्त्रिणौ शुकसारणौ। लङ्कायाः समनुप्राप्तौ चारौ परपुरंजय॥
target: These are the counsellors of the lord of Raksasas-Suka and Sarana. O captor of hostile capitals, they have come as spies from Lankā.

source: चिरं धारयते रोष चिरं कर्म नियच्छति। पश्चात्तापकरं कर्म न किंचिदुपपद्यते॥ चिरं वृद्धानुपासीत चिरमन्वास्य पूजयेत्। चिरं धर्मं निषेवेत कुर्याच्चान्वेषणं चिरम्॥
target: That man who nurses his anger for a long time, who thinks long before doing any work, never does any act which produces repentance. One should wait for a long time upon the aged, and sitting near them show them respect. One should satisfy his duties for a long time and be engaged for a long time in determining them.

source: छिन्नानि पट्टिशैश्चैव शिरांसि युधि दारुणैः। तप्तकाञ्चनमालीनि निपेतुरनिशं तदा॥
target: The heads, adorned with bright goldchains, cut off by the discus, fell continually in the fearful battle.

source: इत्युक्त्वा च दितिस्तत्र प्राप्ते मध्यं दिनेश्वरे। निद्रयापहृता देवी पादौ कृत्वाथ शीर्षतः॥
target: And it came to pass that having said this, the sun being in his meridian, the worshipful Diti with her feet placed at that part of the bed which should contain her head, was overpowered by sleep.

source: एतावुपचितौ वृत्तौ संहतौ सम्प्रगल्भितौ॥ पीनोन्नतमुखौ कान्तौ स्निग्धतालफलोपमौ। मणिप्रवेकाभरणौ रुचिरौ ते पयोधरौ॥
target: Your nipples are bulky, pointed, highly captivating like cold palm fruits, beautiful and ornamented with diverse jewels.

source: धृतराष्ट्र उवाच अतिभारमहं मन्ये सैन्धवे संजयाहितम्। यदेकः पाण्डवान् क्रुद्धान् पुत्रप्रेप्सूनवारयत्॥
target: Dhritarashtra said I consider, O Sanjaya that a heavy burthen was then placed upon the king of the Sindhus, in as much as he had to withstanding the enraged Pandavas desirous of rescuing their son.

source: सा तमादाय सुश्रोणि ससार भृगुनन्दनम्। च्यवनं भार्गवं पुत्रं पुलोमा दुःखमूर्छिता॥
target: O descendant of Bhrigu, the beautiful Puloma, heing afflicted with grief, took up her child Chyavana and walked away.

source: बलेवैरोचनस्येह त्रैलोक्यमनुशासतः। समीपमाजगामाशु शुक्रो भृगुकुलोद्वहः॥
target: Once on a time, Shukra of Bhrigu's race approached Bali the son of Virochana while he was ruling the three worlds.

source: एतत् तत्त्वमहं वेद जन्म तात शिखण्डिनः। ततो नैनं हनिष्यामि समरेष्वाततायिनम्॥
target: I know this truth about the birth of Shikhandin, O son, and therefore I will not slay him in any battle, through with weapon in his hand.

source: अजानात् स यदा तु त्वां राजधर्मादधश्च्युतम्। तदाप्रभृति कृष्णस्त्वां न तथा बहु मन्यते॥
target: But when he came to know you fallen from the duties of royalty, that time forward, he did not respect you as before.

source: प्रभावं नात्र पश्यामि पाण्डवानां कथंचन॥ यस्तान् बलवतो नित्यं मन्यसे त्वं द्विजाधम
target: I do not see in it any prowess on the part of the Pandavas. Those whom you, you that are the basest of men, always deem powerful.

source: अर्धयोजनविस्तारा पञ्चयोजनमायता। एतावती वेदिका तु पुण्या देवर्षिसेविता॥
target: It is said that the sacred Dabhika (Tirtha), frequented by the celestials and Rishis, is five yojanas in length and half a yojana in breadth.

source: श्रूयते च कपोतेन शत्रुः शरणमागतः। पूजितश्च यथान्यायं स्वैश्च मांसैर्निमन्त्रितः॥
target: We have heard that a pigeon received reverentially a suppliant enemy according to due rites and even fed him with his own flesh.'

source: पञ्चाशतं सहस्राणि वर्षाणां दिवि मोदते। पक्षे पक्षे गते राजन् योऽश्नीयाद् वर्षमेव तु॥ षण्मासानशनं तस्य भगवानङ्गिराऽब्रवीत्। षष्टिवर्षसहस्राणि दिवमावसते च सः॥
target: Such a person enjoys all kinds of happiness in Heaven for fifty thousand years. He who passes a whole year, o king, taking food only at intervals of a fortnight, gains the merit of a continuous fast for six months. This has been said by the illustrious Angirasa himself. Such a man Lives in Heaven for sixty thousand years.

source: तत्र भेरीसहस्राणि शङ्खानामयुतानि च। न्यवादयन्त संहृष्टाः सहस्रायुतशो नराः॥
target: And those men by thousands and tens of thousand, filled with joy, beat their drums by thousands, and blew their conches by tens of thousands.

source: पतितं समभिज्ञाय राक्षसी सा महाचमूः। वध्यमाना दिशो भेजे हरिभिर्जितकाशिभिः॥
target: And knowing (Indrajit) fallen (in fight), the mighty army of Rākşasas, attacked by monkeys burning for victory, fled in the ten cardinal directions.

source: काञ्चनानि प्रमर्दन्तस्तोरणानि प्लवंगमाः। कैलासशिखराग्राणि गोपुराणि प्रमथ्य च॥ आप्लवन्तः प्लवन्तश्च गर्जन्तश्च प्लवंगमाः। लङ्कां तामभिधावन्ति महावारणसंनिभाः॥
target: The monkeys crushed golden gateways; and, breaking down gates resembling the tops of the summits of Kailasa, bounded roaring, some towards the wall and some all around. And resembling gigantic elephants, they rushed towards Lankā.

source: लोहिताक्षो महाक्षश्च विजयाक्षो विशारदः। संग्रहो निग्रहः कर्ता सर्पचीरनिवासनः॥
target: You have bloody eyes; you have eyes whose vision extends over over the infinite universe; you have a car whose wheels are ever victorious, you are greatly learned; you are he who accepts you devotees for your servants; you are he who restrains and subjugates your senses; you are he who acts; you put on clothes whose warp and woof are inade of snakes.

source: भरतो लक्ष्मणश्चैव शत्रुघ्नश्च महाबलः। आदाय तानि रत्नानि स्वां पुरी पुनरागताः॥ आगम्य च पुरीं रम्यामयोध्यां पुरुषर्षभाः। तानि रत्नानि चित्राणि रामाय समुपानयन्॥
target: And taking all those jewels, the highly powerful Bharata, Lakşmaņa and ſatrughna returned to their own city. Having arrived at the picturesque city Ayodhyà those foremost of men, made presents of various jewels to Räma.

source: न हि धर्मविभागज्ञः कुर्यादेवं धनंजय। यथा त्वं पाण्डवाद्येह धर्मभीरुरपण्डितः॥
target: O Dhananjaya, those who are versed in the niceties of religion would never act in the way as you are doing today, O pious son of Pandu, on not being acquainted with them.

source: बिभ्यत्येषां साहसिका गुणास्तेषामतीव हि। कूपा इव तृणच्छन्ना विशुद्धा द्यौरिवापरे॥
target: The most courageous men are struck with fear at their name. Their virtues and powers are extraordinary and immeasurable. Some amongst them are like wells and pits with mouths covered by grass and creepers, while others resemble the sky shorn of clouds and darkness.

source: प्रतिगृह्णीष्व पुत्रं स्वं मया दत्तमनिन्दितम्। इत्युक्तः प्रतिजग्राह प्रीति चावाप पुष्कलाम्॥
target: Given by me, accept this faultless child of your own!' Thus addressed by her, the Rishi accepted the child and was highly pleased.

source: दृष्ट्वा नातिप्रभं सोमं तथा सूर्यं च पार्थिव। प्रकाशमकरोदत्रिस्तपसा स्वेन संयुगे॥
target: Seeing that the real Moon and the real Sun had become darkened by the arrows of the enemy, Atri, assuming the forms of those luminaries, began to shine forth over the field of battle, helped by the power of his penances.

source: इति ब्रुवन्तीं तां साध्वी भार्यां स द्विजसत्तमः। क्षुधापरिगतां ज्ञात्वा तान् सक्तून् नाभ्यनन्दत॥
target: Knowing that his chaste wife who said so, was herself stricken with hunger, that best of Brahmanas could not approve of her share of the powdered barley being given to the guest.

source: सवैजयन्तास्तु गजा गजारोहैः प्रचोदिताः। तरन्तः स्म प्रकाशन्ते सपक्षा इव पर्वताः॥
target: And elephants graced with flags ing spurred on by their riders, began to cross the stream, appearing like (so many) winged hills.

source: सत्यं ते ब्रुवतः सर्वे सम्पत्स्यन्ते मनोरथाः। मिथ्या च ब्रुवतो मूर्धा शतधा ते स्फुटिष्यति॥
target: And if you speak truly, you will gain all the objects of your hcart, and should you tell a lie, your head shall be cut into a hundred pieces.

source: तामवप्लुत्य जग्राह द्रौणिय॑स्य रथे धनुः। चिक्षेप चैनां तस्यैव स्यन्दनात् सोऽवपुप्लवे॥
target: Placing his bow on the car and jumping down, the son of Drona seized it and hurled it back at him (i.e. the Rakshasa, (Seeing that Asani proceed towards him) he leaped down from his car.

source: तस्मिँल्लोकपरित्यक्ते किं कार्यमवशिष्यते।। हते दुर्योधने राजन् यदन्यत् क्रियतामिति॥
target: When he is forsaken by men, what shall there be left to be done and Duryodhana is killed; do whatever remains to be accomplished.

source: पततां हरिवीराणां रूपाणि प्रचकाशिरे। वभिन्नाग्रकूटानां शैलानां पततामिव। ७७।।
target: The appearances of those monkey-heroes falling were like mountains toppling, having their summits riven with the thunder-bolt.

source: एकः पुत्रो विराटस्य शून्ये संनिहितः पुरे। स एष किल निर्यातो बालभावान्न पौरुषात्॥
target: Excepting Dhananjaya who, in this world, alone can come to fight with us? Only one son of Virata has been left in the empty city.

source: संजय उवाच ततो हयान् सर्वदाशार्हमुख्यः प्रचोदयन् भीममुवाच चेदम्। नैतचित्रं तव कर्माद्य भीम यास्माम्यहं पार्थारिसंघान्॥
target: While he was about to drive the horses, the foremost of Dasharhas said to Bhima-"If it nothing wonder for you, O Bhima. Kill the enemies of Partha.

source: त्वया दत्तां न चेच्छेयं पृथिवीमखिलामहम्। त्वां तु युद्धे विनिर्जित्य भोक्तास्मि वसुधामिमाम्।। ५८
target: I do not, therefore, wish to have the Earth as a gift from you. I shall, on the other hand, enjoy the Earth after defeating you in battle.

source: यावदेतदतीतं मे वयः पुत्रफलाश्रितम्। तावदिच्छामि पाथेयमादातुं पारलौकिकम्॥
target: And since the best portion of my life has passed away as house-holder, I wish to devote the remaining part of my life in acquiring the means of defraying the expenses of my journey in respect of the time to come.

source: लाघवेनाथ चरतः सर्वे ते सुबलात्मजाः। अन्तरं नाभ्यगच्छन्त चरन्तः शीघ्रगैर्हयैः॥
target: Those sons of Subala, riding on fleet chargers could find no opportunity for striking Iravat moving as he was with great agility.

source: स कैकेय्या गृहं श्रेष्ठं प्रविवेश महायशाः॥ पाण्डुराभ्रमिवाकाशं राहुयुक्तं निशाकरः। शुकबर्हिसमायुक्तं क्रौञ्चहंसरुतायुतम्॥ वादितरवसंघुष्टं कुब्जावामनिकायुतम्। लतागृहैश्चित्रगृहैश्चम्पकाशोकशोभितैः॥ दान्तराजतसौवर्णवेदिकाभिः समायुतम्। नित्यपुष्पफलैर्वृक्षैर्वापीभिरुपशोभितम्॥ दान्तराजतसौवर्णैः संवृतं परमासनैः। विविधैरन्नपानैश्च भक्ष्यैश्च विविधैरपि॥ उपपन्नं महाहश्च भूषणैत्रिदिवोपमम्।
target: Like to the moon entering the sky covered with white clouds and with Rähu present in it, that one of high fame entered the excellent apartment of Kaikeyi, having parrots and peacocks and Krauñcas and swans, resounding with the sounds of musical instruments, containing hump-backed and dwarfish women, graced with houses containing creepers, and pictures, and adorned adorned with aśokas and campakas, furnished with daises composed of ivory and silver and gold, and adorned with trees bearing flowers and fruits always, and tanks, having superb seats made of ivory, silver and gold; rich with various viands and drinks and edibles, with costly ornaments, and resembling heaven itself.

source: यं लब्ध्वा मागधो राजा सान्त्वमानोऽथ सौहदैः॥२६ अरौत्सीत् पार्थिवं क्षत्रमृते यादवकौरवान्।

source: स्थूलोदरा: कृशाङ्गाश्च स्थूलाङ्गाश्च कृशोदराः॥ ह्रस्वग्रीवा महाकर्णा नानाव्यालविभूषणाः। नकुलोलूकवकनाश्च काकवक्त्रास्तथा परे। आखुबभ्रुकवकनाश्च मयूरवदनास्तथा॥ गजेन्द्रचर्मवसनास्तथा कृष्णाजिनाम्बराः॥ स्कन्धेमुखा महाराज तथाप्युदरतोमुखाः। पृष्ठेमुखा हनुमुखास्तथा जङ्घामुखा अपि॥ पार्थाननाश्च बहवो नानादेशमुखास्तथा। तथा कीटपतङ्गानां सदृशास्या गणेश्वराः॥ नानाव्यालमुखाश्चान्ये बहुबाहुशिरोधराः।
target: Some had large and protruding stomachs but other limbs very lean; some had large limbs but lean stomachs. The necks of some were very short and the ears of some were very Jarge. Some had various kinds of snakes for their ornaments. Some were clad in skins of large elephants. And some in black deer-skins. The mouths of some were on their shoulders. Some had mouths on their stomachs, some on their backs, some on their cheeks, some on their calves and some on their flanks and the mouths of many were placed on other parts of their bodies. The faces of some amongst those combatants were like those of insects and worms. The mouths of some amongst them were like those of various beasts of prey. Some had many arms and some many heads.
