target: When the Pandava troops were thus routed and crushed all over the field, the sun set, the night came, and nothing could be seen.

source: कोन्वेतद् बुध्यते साधु कोन्वेतत् साधु पश्यति। अतत्त्वे तत्त्वदर्शी यस्तमसस्तत्त्वलक्षणम्॥
target: Who is there what truly gets over it? Who is there who truly sees it? That indeed, is the characteristic of Ignorance, viz., the seeing of reality in what is not real.

source: ते तु वीराः समाश्वस्य वाहनान्यवमुच्य च। अतिष्ठन्त मुहुः सर्वे पाण्डवाः सात्यकिस्तथा।॥
target: Having unyoked their animals, the Pandavas and Satyaki took rest there awhile.

source: सूतपुत्रो जरासंघश्चेदिराजो निषादजः। सुयोधनं समाश्रित्य जयेयुः पृथिवीमिमाम्॥
target: The son of Suta, Jarasandha, the ruler of the Chedis and the prince of the Nishadas, these, united with Suyodhana, mighty have conquered the whole earth.

source: जनमेजय उवाच दिशामभिजय ब्रह्मन् विस्तरेणानुकीर्तय। न हि तृप्यामि पूर्वेषां शृण्वानश्चरितं महत्॥
target: Janamejaya said O Brahmana, narrate to me in full the history of the conquests of the various directions (by the Pandavas). I am not satiated with listening to the great history of my ancestors.

source: अथ राजा वृतः स्त्रीभिर्दीनाभिर्दीनचेतनः। निर्जगाम प्रियं पुत्रं द्रक्ष्यामीति ब्रुवन् गृहात्॥
target: Then the king, his sense overcome by grief, surrounded by his distressed wives, went out of his house, saying, “I will behold my dear son.”

source: अन्यैर्गुणैरुपेतं तु शुल्कं याचन्ति बान्धवाः। अलंकृत्वा वहस्वेति यो दद्यादनुकूलतः॥ यच्च तां च ददत्येवं न शुल्कं विक्रयो न सः। प्रतिगृह्य भवेद् देयमेष धर्मः सनातनः॥
target: When the person desirous of marrying happens to be gifted with such qualities as do not go down with the girl's kinsmen, it is then that kinsmen demand dower from him. The person, however, who won over by another's accomplishments, says,—Do you marry my girl, adorning her with proper ornaments of gold and gems,—and that person who satisfies this request, cannot be said to demand dower or give it, for such a transaction is not a sale. The bestowal of a daughter upon acceptance of what may properly be considered as gifts is the eternal practice.

source: विन्दानुविन्दावावन्त्यौ क्षेमधूर्तिश्च वीर्यवान्। त्रयाणां तव पुत्राणां त्रय एवानुयायिनः॥
target: The two princes from Avanti, viz., Vinda and Anuvinda and the highly puissant Kshemadhurti were the followers of your three sons,

source: अब्रवीच्च मुदा युक्तः पुनरागमनं प्रति। कथं नु त्यक्तदेहानां पुनस्तद्रूपदर्शनम्॥
target: Filled with joy, he once more asked Vaishampayana the subject of the reappearance of dead men, saying of the reappearance of dead men, saying-How is it possible for persons whose bodies have been destroyed to reappear in those very forms?

source: सुपर्ण उवाच न मे सर्वाणि भूतानि बिभियुर्देहदर्शनात्। भीमरूपात्समुद्विग्नास्तस्मात्तेजस्तु संहरे॥
target: Garuda said: No one need be afraid of seeing my body. As you are also very much frightened at its sight, I shall diminish it.

source: दुःशासनेन च तथा सौबलेन च धीमता। संवृतो भ्रातृभिश्चान्यैः स्त्रीभिश्चापि सहस्रशः॥
target: He has accompanied by Dushasana the intclligent son of Subala (Shakuni) and by many others of his brothers and also thousands of women.

source: व्याघ्रचर्मोत्तरे शुक्ले सर्वतोभद्र आसने। दृढपादप्रतिष्ठाने हुताशनसमत्विषि॥ उपवेश्य महात्मानं कृष्णां च दुपदात्मजाम्। जुहाव पावकं धीमान् विधिमन्त्रपुरस्कृतम्॥
target: Making the great Yudhishthira then, with Krishna the daughter of Drupada, seated upon a handsome seat, called Sarvatobhadra, with firm feet and covered with tiger-skin and effulgent, began to pour libations of clarified butter upon the sacrificial fire with proper Mantras.

source: एतावदुक्त्वा वचनं कैकेयी विरराम ह। विलपन्तं च राजानं न प्रतिव्याजहार सा॥
target: Having said this, Kaikeyi paused; and maintained silence disregarding the bewailing monarch.

source: एष देवो महादेवो जगत् सृष्ट्वा चराचरम्। कल्पान्ते चैव सर्वेषां स्मृतिमाक्षिप्य तिष्ठति॥
target: You are that Mahadeva who is the original Creator of the universe with all its mobile and immobile creatures. You are he who, at the end of the aeon stands, withdrawing all things into yourself.

source: वैचित्रवीर्यस्य यशो धनं च वाञ्छाम्यहं सहपुत्रस्य शश्वत्। यथा तथा तेऽस्तु नमश्च तेऽस्तु ममापि च स्वस्ति दिशन्तु विप्राः॥
target: I always wish prosperity and affluence to the son of Vichitravirya (Dhritarashtra) and his sons. Happen what may to you, here I bow to you. Let the Brahmanas wish me sell.

source: लध्वी वसुमती चापि कर्तव्या विष्णुना सह। गृहाणास्त्रं महाबाहो दण्डमप्रतिवारणम्। अनेनास्त्रेण सुमहत् त्वं हि कर्म करिष्यसि॥
target: The earth shall be lightened of her burden by you along with Vishnu; O large-armed hero, accept this weapon of mine-this mace, incapable of being baffled and with it you will accomplish great deeds.

source: इदं विमानं वैदेहि पुष्पकं नाम नामतः। दिव्यं त्वां धारयेनेदं यद्येतौ गतजीवितौ ॥
target: O Vaidehi, if those had lost their lives, this celestial chariot, named Puspaka, would not have held you.

source: मलंकृतं तं सुतमाव्रजन्तम्। नन्दामि पश्यन्निव दर्शनेन भवामि दृष्ट्वैव पुनर्युवेव॥
target: When I hear him coming, adorned like to a son of the celestials, I rejoice on casting my eyes on him, and I feel as if I had regained my youth.

source: सुरा हि कथयन्ति त्वामागतं शूद्रघातिनम्। ब्राह्मणस्य तु धर्मेण त्वया जीवापितः सुतः॥
target: The celestials informed me that you went coming having slain the Sūdra ascetic. You have observed piety and have given back life to dead child of the Brahmana.

source: सपुत्रपौत्रं सामात्यं सभृत्यं च निराशिषम्॥ अद्य राज्ये करिष्यामि धृतराष्ट्र जनेश्वरम्।
target: I will make king Dhritarashtra, with all his descendants, counsellors and followers, shelterless today.

source: शुनःसख उवाच न्यस्तमद्यं न पश्यद्भिर्यदुक्तं कृतकर्मभिः। सत्यमेतन्न मिथ्यैतद् बिसस्तैन्यं कृतं मया॥
target: Shunasakha said Not seeing the lotusstalks deposited by you, what you say is indeed true, for it is I who have actually stolen them.

source: तमपश्याम संनद्धं मेघं विद्युद्युतं यथा। समन्तात् समभिध्याय हृष्यमाणोऽभ्यभाषत॥
target: I beheld him, with his coat of mail on, like clouds with lightning. After thinking for a short time he addressed me thus with a light heart.

source: उद्यानानि महार्हाणि शयनान्यासनानि च। प्रतिभोगसुखेनैव कोशमस्य विरेचय॥
target: Making them attached to pleasure gardens and rich beds and seats, do you, by offering such objects of enjoyment, exhaust your eneiny's treasury.

source: ज्येष्ठानुज्येष्ठपत्नीनां भ्रातृणां पुत्रनप्तृणाम्। निग्रहानुग्रहौ पार्थ गार्हस्थ्यमिति तत् तपः॥
target: Granting favours and inflicting punishments upon the wives of brothers elder and younger and upon their sons and grandsons, constitute the domestic duties of a king and these are also his best penances.

source: हयांश्च रजतप्रख्यान कङ्कपत्रैः शिलाशितैः। अवाकिरदमेयात्मा पार्थं संकोपयन्निव॥
target: As if to work up Partha with anger, that one of incomparable energy covered his horses of silvery hue with sharpened and Kankafeathered arrows.

source: विधिना सम्प्रणुदितः शापायास्य मनो दधे। ततः स वार्युपस्पृश्य कोपसंरक्तलोचनः। मैत्रेयोधार्तराष्ट्रं तमशपद् दुष्टचेतसम्॥ यस्मात् त्वं मामनादृत्य नेमां वाचं चिकीर्षसि। तस्मादस्याभिमानस्य सद्यः फलमवाप्नुहि॥
target: And, as if commissioned by fate set his mind to curse him. Thereupon touching water and with eyes red in anger. Maitreya cursed the evil-minded son of Dhritarashtra, saying, "Since slighting my words you decline to follow my advice, you shall soon reap the fruit of your this insolence.

source: दुर्विनीतेषु लुब्धेषु का प्रीतिः कौरवेषु नः। इति पौराः सुदुःखार्ताः क्रोशन्ति स्म पुनः पुनः॥२६
target: What love can we bear for the wicked and covetous Kurus”? The citizens repeatedly bewailed thus in great grief.

source: तं प्रजासु विधर्माणं रागद्वेषवशानुगम्। मन्त्रपूतैः कुशैर्जघ्नुर्ऋषयो ब्रह्मवादिनः॥
target: Vena, a slave of anger and malice, become impious and tyrannical towards all creatures. The Brahmavadin Rishis killed him with Kusha blades inspired with Mantras.

source: ततो देवाः सगन्धर्वाः सिद्धाश्च परमर्षयः। भागप्रतिग्रहार्थं वै समवेता यथाविधि ॥
target: And the deities, with the Gandharvas, and the Siddhas, and the principal saints, assembled there duly with the object of each obtaining his share of the offerings.

source: प्रविश्य महतीं लङ्कां भवद्भ्यां धनदानुजः। वक्तव्यो रक्षसां राजा यथोक्तं वचनं मम ॥
target: Entering the extensive Lankā, you should say to the king-younger brother to the Dispenser of riches-the words which I utter.

source: राज्याच्च हीनो भ्रात्रा च पक्षाभ्यां विक्रमेण च। सर्वथा मर्तुमेवेच्छन् पतिष्ये शिखराद् गिरेः॥
target: Deprived of my kingdom, and my brother, and my wings, and my prowess, I wishing to put a period to my existence, will hurl myself headlong from this summit of the mountain.

source: यथा यथा हि पुरुषो नित्यं शास्त्रमवेक्षते। तथा तथा विजानाति विज्ञानमथ रोचते।॥
target: The scriptures or science which one always studies imparts him the knowledge becomes agreeable to him.

source: होतारो वृषलानां च वृषलाध्यापकास्तथा। तथा वृषलशिष्याश्च राजन् नार्हन्ति केतनम्॥
target: Those Brahmanas who pour libations on the sacred fire for Shudras or who are preceptors of Shudras, or who are servant of Shudra masters, should not be invited.

source: तमेतमतितेजोऽशं भूतात्मानं हृदि स्थितम्। तमोरजोभ्यामाविष्टा नानुपश्यन्ति मूर्तिषु॥
target: Men possessed by the qualities of Darkness and Ignorance never succeed in sceing within the gross body the sentiency which is a portion of the Supreme Soul to transcendent effulgence and which lies within the heart of every creature.

source: तानहं सुमहाभाग मृगसंघान् समागतान्॥ हन्यां निशितधारेण शरेणानतपर्वणा। भवांस्तत्राभिषज्येत किं स्यात् कृच्छ्रतरं ततः॥
target: O exalted one, if by means of sharpened shafts blazing like lightning, I slay those herds of deer when they come, it shall impart pain to you, and what can be more unfortunate than this?

source: बालेनापि सता तेन कृतं साह्यं जनार्दन। असहेतोर्गतं ज्ञात्वा पाण्डवं श्वेतवाहनम्॥
target: Although then a small boy only, did us many good turns, O Jannarddana. Being informed that Pandu's son Arjuna had gone to acquire weapons.

source: शतं कन्या राजपुत्रमेकैकं पृथगन्वयुः। कन्यां कन्यां शतं नागा नागं नागं शतं रथाः॥
target: Each of those princes married a hundred princesses, and each princess brought a hundred elephants. With each each of those elephants were a hundred cars.

source: स्त्रियो बालाश्च वृद्धाश्च प्रायः क्रीडागता जनाः॥ या गाथाः सम्प्रगायन्ति कुर्वतोऽध्ययनं यथा। ता गाथाः शृणु मे शल्य मद्रकेषु दुरात्मसु॥ ब्राह्मणैः कथिताः पूर्वं यथावद् राजसंनिधौ। श्रुत्वा चैकमना मूढ क्षम वा ब्रूहि चोत्तरम्॥
target: Hear from me, O Shalya, the sayings that have already passed into proverbs, that men young and old and women, persons while sporting utter as if they are their studies about the wicked Madrakas. the Brahmanas also recounted them formerly in the courts of kings. Hearing them, O fool, you may forgive or give a reply.

source: अभक्तमटवीप्रायं दावदग्धमहीरुहम्। पन्थानं तस्कराकीण क्षेमेणाभिपतेद् युवा॥
target: Indeed, the path of Yoga is like a road along which no food is available, which runs through a desert having all its trees burnt down in a fire, and which is unsafe for being infested with bands of robbers. Very few young men can pass safely through it.

source: शरीरं योक्तुमिच्छामि तपसोग्रेण भारत। उपदिष्टमिहेच्छामि तत्त्वतोऽहं विशाम्पते॥
target: I wish, O Bharata, to afflict my body with, severe, penances. With that end in view, O king. I wish to receive instructions from you.

source: ततः कर्णरथं यान्तमरिघ्नं तं धनंजयम्। बाणवरभिनन्तः संशप्ततरथा ययुः॥
target: As the destroyer of his enemies, Dhananjaya was advancing towards Karna's car, he was followed by the ninety Samsaptaka car warriors who werc pouring down arrows him.

source: ते वयं प्राप्तकालस्य चिकीर्षा मन्त्रयामहे। यथा नो न गसेयुस्ते सपुत्रवलबान्धवान्॥
target: The time has come when we should consult together, so that they (the Pandavas) may not swallow us all with our sons, forces, friends and relatives.

source: गुह्यकानां गतिं चापि केचित् प्राप्ता नराधिपाः। त्यक्त्वा देहं जित: स्वर्गः पुण्यवाग्बुद्धिकर्मभिः।।२३।
target: Some have attained to the dignity of Guhyakas, O king. Having renounced their bodies, they have conquered the celestial region by the merit they had acquired through word, thought, and deed.

source: तन्मया साधु वाऽपीदं यदि वासाधु वै कृतम्॥ तद् वो हृदि न कर्तव्यं मया बद्धोऽयमञ्जलिः।
target: Whether I have, in that matter, acted rightly or wrongly, I pray you with joined hands to remove all recollections of it from your hearts.

source: बृहस्पतिरुवाच कृत्वा पापं पूर्वमबुद्धिपूर्व पुण्यानि चेत्कुरुते बुद्धिपूर्वम्। स तत्पापं नुदते कर्मशीलो वासो यथा मलिनं क्षारयुक्तम्॥
target: Brihaspati answered If, having committed sin through foolishness, one performs meritorious acts understanding their nature, he succeeds, by such righteousness, in cleansing himself from sin even as a piece of dirty cloth is washed clean by some saline substance.

source: नित्यतुष्टाश्च ते राजन् प्राणिनः सुरवेश्मनि। नित्यपुष्पफलास्तत्र पादपा हरितच्छदाः॥
target: O king, in the abodes of the celestials all beings are always cheerful. There the trees are always covered with green leaves and fruits and flowers,

source: सत्त्वं वहति शुद्धात्मन् परं नारायण प्रभुम्। प्रभुर्वहति शुद्धात्मा परमात्मानमात्मना॥
target: Darkness then carries them to the highest end of Goodness. Goodness then bears them,O you of pure soul, to the Supreme and powerful Narayana.

source: क्षेममद्य करिष्यामि धर्मराजस्य माधव। हत्वैतद् दुर्बलं सैन्यं धार्तरष्ट्रस्य पश्यतः॥
target: Slaying this weak army in the very presence of Dhritarashtra's son, I shall today do what is for Yudhishthira's good."

source: पृष्ठे कलिङ्गः साम्बष्ठा मागधाः पौण्ड्रमद्रकाः॥ गान्धाराः शकुनाः प्राच्याः पर्वतीया वसातयः।
target: The Kalingas, the Ambasthas, the Magadhas, the Paundras, the Madrakas, the Gandharas, the Sakunas, the Easterners, the highlanders and the Vasatis were stationed in the back of that Suparna.

source: दर्शयन्तावुभौ शिक्षा लाघवं सौष्ठवं तथा। रणे रणकृतां श्रेष्ठावन्योन्यं पर्यकर्षताम्॥
target: And both displayed their training agility and skill. Those foremost of warriors in that battle, made many skillful thirst at each other.

source: सुव्याहृतानि सूक्तानि सुकृतानि ततस्ततः। संचिन्वन् धीर आसीत शिलाहारी शिलं यथा।॥
target: A wise man should live, picking out good manners, good sayings and good deeds, even as one given up to the Shila mode of life picks grains of corn from the field.

source: कोपिताः पाण्डवा नित्यं समाश्रित्य सुयोधनम्। अवश्यभावी ह्यर्थोऽयं योन शक्यो निवर्तितुम्॥
target: For the interests of Duryodhana, I have hitherto always incited the Pandavas against me; the result is inevitable and none possibly can prevent it.

source: जीमूताविव धर्मान्ते गर्जमानौ नरर्षभौ। तयोरासीत् सम्प्रहारः क्रुद्धयोर्नरसिंहयोः॥
target: Began to roar at each other like two rain clouds at the end of the summer season. The combat between those two foremost of men who were excited to the highest pitch of fury.

source: विद्युद्विभाजितं चासीत् तुमुलाभ्राकुलं नभः॥ ततो वज्रनिपाताश्च साशनिस्तनयित्नवः।
target: Then sky the appeared to be over-spread with darts, masses of clouds with flashes of lightning. A thunder storm then made its appearance accompanied by rumble of clouds and claps of thunder.

source: शतं सहस्राणि गवां शतं पुन: पुनः शतान्यष्टशतायुतानिा त्वया पुरा दत्तमितीह शुश्रुम नृप द्विजेभ्यः क्व तु तद् गतं तव॥
target: We have heared that you did repeatedly make gifts to the Brahmanas numerable kine. Why, therefore, have you come by this end.

source: तं दृष्ट्वा नित्यमुद्युक्तमिष्वस्त्रं प्रति फाल्गुनम्। आहूय वचनं द्रोणो रहः सूदमभाषत॥ अन्धकारेऽर्जुनायान्नं न देयं ते कदाचन। न चाख्येयमिदं चापि मद्वाक्यं विजये त्वया॥
target: Drona, seeing Falguni's (Arjuna) great devotion of arms, summoned the cook and told him in private, “Never give rice (food) to Arjuna in the dark and never told him also that I have asked you to do it."

source: कौरवास्तु ततो राजन् प्रययुः शिबिरं स्वकम्। वीडमाना निशाकाले पाण्डवेयैः पराजिताः॥
target: Thereafter, the Kauravas, at night fall haveily repaired to their own encampments, being ashamed and being vanquished by the Pandavas.

source: ऋभवो नाम तत्रान्ये देवानामपि देवताः। तेषां लोकात् परतरे यान् यजन्तीह देवताः॥
target: There live certain beings called Ribhus, they are the gods of the gods. Their region is highly blessed and they are adored even by the celestials.

source: ततोऽभिपूज्य मनसा कृष्णं शर्वं च पाण्डवः। इच्छाम्यहं दिव्यमस्त्रमित्यभाषत शङ्करम्॥
target: Thereafter that son of Pandu having worshipped in his mind both Sharva and Krishna, said unto the gold Sankara-'I desire to have the celestial weapon (Pasupata)!'

source: भक्ष्योत्तमप्रतिच्छन्नं मत्स्यो बडिशमायसम्। लोभाभिपाति ग्रसते नानुबन्धमवेक्षते॥
target: A fish out of greediness dose not think about the result of an action and swallows up the iron hook concealed in a dainty morsel.

source: संवेष्टितमिवात्यर्थं गहनं मातरिश्वना। वनस्य तस्य शब्दोऽभूद् वनमापूरयन्निव॥
target: The forest was enveloped on all sides with a mighty wind and everywhere was audible a roar filling the wood-land.

source: अमात्यरक्षा प्रणिधी राजपुत्रस्य लक्षणम्। चारश्च विविधोपायः प्रणिधेयः पृथग्विधः॥ साम भेदः प्रदानं च ततो दण्डच पार्थिव। उपेक्षा पञ्चमी चात्र कात्स्न्येन समुदाहृता॥
target: The subjects also of behaviour towards ministers, of spies, the indications of princes, of secret agents, of envoys and agents of other kinds, conciliation, sowing seeds of discord, gifts, and punishment, O king, with toleration as the fifth, were fully described there.

source: सोऽस्त्रमाहारयामास ब्राह्मशस्त्रविशारदः। धनुश्चात्मरथं चैव सर्वं तत्राभ्यमन्त्रयत्॥
target: Then that (Rākşasa) skilled in weapons acquired a Brāhma weapon (from that deity), and inspired his bow and car with mantras.

source: तस्माद्धर्मार्थयोर्नित्यं न प्रमाद्यन्ति पण्डिताः। प्रकृतिः सा हि कामस्य पावकस्यारणिर्यथा॥
target: It is for this, those that are wise always pursue both virtue and profit, for the union of virtue and profit is the essential requisite of pleasure, as wood is of fire.

source: ते सर्वे ब्राह्मणा राजस्तपोभिर्नियमैस्तथा। उपवासैश्च विविधैर्यमैः कष्टव्रतैस्तथा॥ आराध्य पशुभर्तारं महादेवं जगत्पतिम्। तां देवीं मोक्षयामासुः सरिच्छ्रेष्ठां सरस्वतीम्॥ तेषां तु सा प्रभावेण प्रकृतिस्था सरस्वती। प्रसन्नसलिला जज्ञे यथापूर्वं तथैव हि॥ निर्मुक्ता च सरिच्छ्रेष्ठा विबभौ सा यथा पुरा।
target: O king, adoring Mahadeva, that Lord of the universe and protector of all creatures, with penances, vows, fasts, abstinences and painful observances, all those Brahmanas emancipated that foremost of rivers, viz., the divine Sarasvati.

source: स तं दृष्ट्वा विशुद्धात्मा त्रासादङ्कमुपागतम्। आश्वास्याश्वसिहीत्याह न तेऽस्ति भयमण्डज॥
target: The pure-souled, king beholding the pigeon take refuge in his lap from fear, comforted him, saying, Be comforted, O bird! You have no fear!

source: सुग्रीवः प्रकृतीः सर्वाः सम्भाष्योत्थाप्य वीर्यवान्॥ भ्रातुरन्तःपुरं सौम्यं प्रविवेश महाबलः।
target: Welcoming the subjects and raising them up; the highly powerful Sugrīva entered the pleasant inner apartment of his brother.

source: क्रव्यादैः कृष्यमाणानामपरेषां महात्मनाम्। शातकौम्भ्यः सजश्चित्रा विप्रकीर्णाः समन्ततः॥
target: The beautiful golden garlands on the necks of other illustrious heroes, as the latter and being dragged by carnivorous creatures, are scattered about on all sides.

source: खादाम पाटयामैनां तिलश: प्रविभज्य ताम्। येयं भर्तारमस्माकमवमन्येह जीवति॥
target: "Let us devour her; mangle her and tear her to pieces, who is living here despising our lord."

source: नैयमस्ति मही कृत्स्ना यत्र दुर्योधनो नृपः। साधु गच्छामहे सर्वे यत्र गच्छन्ति पाण्डवाः॥
target: Where Duryodhana is the king, there the whole earth is doomed. Let us proceed there where the virtuous Pandavas are going.

source: पश्यन्ति ग्रस्यमानं मां सहन्ते वै दिवौकसः। तस्माल्लोकविनाशार्थं ह्यवतिष्ठे न संशयः॥
target: The inhabitants of the celestial regions (unconcernedly) see me devoured and they quietly brook it. Therefore, I must make an attempt to destroy the worlds. There is no doubt about it.

source: गुणवचनसमुच्चयैकदेशो नृवर मयैष गवां प्रकीर्तितस्ते। न च परमिह दानमस्ति गोभ्यो भवति न चापि परायणं तथान्यत्॥
target: O best of men, I have thus recited to you only a portion of the great merits of kine. There is no gift in this world that is superior to that of kine. There is also no refuge in this world that is higher than kine.

source: गुणानामपि यद्येतत् कर्मणा चाप्युपस्थितम्। तत् तच्छंसन्ति भूतानि मनो यद्भावितं यथा।॥
target: Whichever among the three qualities of Goodness, Darkness, and Ignorance is caused by the influence of pristine acts and by whichever amongst them the mind is affected for the time being in whatever way, the elements in their subtile forms) or indicate accordingly (in the way of images).

source: इन्द्र उवाच कुतो दुःखं मानसं देहजं वा पाण्डुर्विवर्णश्च कुतस्त्वमद्या आचक्ष्व मे ब्राह्मण यावदेतान् निहन्मि सर्वांस्तव दुःखकर्तृन्॥
target: Indra said Whence then is this pain, mental or physical, and why are you pale and changed in appearance at present, tell me, O Brahmana, who those people are, who have caused you pain, so that I may slay them all.

source: महाभ्रजालमतुलं मातरिश्वेव संततम्। ते वध्यमाना बलिना भीमसेनेन दन्तिनः॥
target: Like the tempest scattering away a mighty network of clouds. The those tuskers, slaughtered by the highly powerful Bhimasena in battle,

source: विद्ध्वा तं च रणे द्रोणं पञ्चभिर्नतपर्वभिः॥ क्षुरप्रेण सुतीक्ष्णेन विच्छेदास्य महद् धनुः।
target: Then also piercing Drona with five depressed-knotted razor-headed shafts of great sharpness, he cut-off his mighty bow.

source: प्राणादाने निवृत्तोऽसि हिंसायां वर्तते भवान्। नास्ति चेष्टा विना हिंसां किं वा त्वं मन्यसे द्विज।।२१
target: You do not then abstain from taking life. Really, you are engaged in slaughter. There can be no movement without destruction. Or, what do you think. O twice-born one.

source: यदि स्वर्ग परं स्थानं स्वधर्मं परिमार्गसि। यत् किञ्चिज्जयसे भूमिं ब्राह्मणाय निवेदया॥ श्रुतवृत्तोपपन्नाय धर्मज्ञाय तपस्विने। स्वधर्मपरितृप्ताय यो न वित्तपरो भवेत्॥
target: If you try to satisfy the duties of your order and wish to acquire the highest place in heaven, then give to the Brahmana all the land you may conquer, to him who is learned and of virtuous conduct, who is conversant with duties and observant of penances, who is contented with the duties of his order and not covetous of wealth.

source: आयान्तं स रथं दृष्ट्वा तूर्णमिन्द्रध्वजं कपिः। ननाद च महानादं व्यवर्धत च वेगवान्॥
target: Beholding that car having a flag like that of Indra, approach very quickly, the monkey began to emit terrible roars and increase himself.

source: असुराश्च सुराश्चैव पुण्यहेतोर्मखक्रियाम्। प्रयतन्ते महात्मानस्तस्माद् यज्ञाः परायणम्॥
target: The great celestials and Asuras celebrate sacrifices for acquiring religious mcrit; and therefore sacrifices are of great importance.

source: प्रहस्तोऽथ दशग्रीवं गत्वा वचनमब्रवीत्। प्रहृष्टात्मा महात्मानं महामात्यं सहाजुनम् ॥
target: And Prahasta, going (back), joyfully spoke to the high-souled Ten-necked one, (seated) with his counsellors and his younger brothers.

source: सम्प्रगृह्य विशुद्धात्मा शक्तिं प्रज्वलितां तदा॥ कम्पयामास सव्येन पाणिना पुरुषोत्तमः।
target: The pure Vishnu caught hold of the burning dart with his left hand, and began to shake it.

source: मा ते व्यथास्तु निहतान् बन्धून् वीक्ष्य पुनः पुनः। न शक्यास्ते पुनर्द्रष्टुं ये हताऽस्मिन् रणाजिरे॥
target: Let not, therefore, grief overpower you again, on seeing your friends lying killed on the battle-field. You cannot see the men killed in this battle alive again.

source: अनयेनाभिसम्पन्नमर्थहीनमनुव्रते। नाशायाम्यहमद्य त्वां सूर्यः संध्यामिवौजसा ॥
target: O you following asceticism, this your vow is without any meaning and beyond the pale of morality. Even shall I destroy you today like to the Sun dispelling darkness with his rays.

source: ततस्तस्य रथौघस्य मध्यं प्राप्य हयोत्तमाः। कृच्छ्रेण रथमूहुस्तं क्षुत्पिपासासमन्विताः॥
target: Having penetrated into the rear of the cardivision, these excellent steeds drew the car of Arjuna with great difficulty, suffering as they did from hunger, thirst and fatigue.

source: एकस्तु धार्तराष्ट्रेभ्यः पाण्डवान् यः समाश्रितः। तं बृहन्तो महाकाया युयुत्सुमवहन् रणे॥ पलालकाण्डवर्णास्तु वार्धक्षेमि तरस्विनम्। ऊहुः सुतुमुले युद्धे हयाः कृष्णाः स्वलंकृताः॥
target: Huge-bodied steeds bore to battle Yuyutsu, who alone, among the sons of Dhritarashtra, had sided with the Pandavas, (deserting his own brothers). Steeds, plump, decked with golden caparisons and of the hue of the stalk of paddy, bore to that dreadful battle, Vardhakshemi of great activity.

source: प्रतिषिद्धो मया तात रैभ्यावसथदर्शनात्। गतवानेव तं द्रष्टुं कालान्तकयमोपमम्॥
target: O child, I prohibited you from visiting the residence of Raivya, but you went there to visit it which was like the all-destroying death.

source: वैश्यापुत्रेण हर्तव्याश्चत्वारोंऽशाः पितुर्धनात्। पञ्चमस्तु स्मृतो भागः शूद्रापुत्राय भारत॥
target: The son born of the Vaishya wife shall take four of such shares of his paternal property. The fifth share, O Bharata, has been said to belong to the son born of the Shudra wife.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच तथा तु संजयं कर्णे कीर्तयन्तं पुनः पुनः। आशीविषवदुच्छ्वस्य धृतराष्ट्रोऽब्रवीदिदम्॥
target: Vaishampayana said Thereupon breathing (heavily) out like a snake, Dhritarashtra spoke these words to Sanjaya who had been thus repeatedly extolling Karna.

source: ब्रह्ममृत्युरशुद्धात्मा पापमेवानुचिन्तयन्। प्रबुद्ध्यसे प्रस्वपिषि वर्तसे परमे सुखे॥
target: Dead within, you are of impure soul for you always wish to commit sin. Though you sleep, and wake, your life, however, is spent in great misery.

source: न स्तम्भी न च मानी स्यान्नाप्रसन्नो न विस्मितः। मित्रामित्रसमो मैत्रो यः स धर्मविदुत्तमः॥
target: One should not be arrogant; nor proud; nor cheerless and discontented; nor wonder at anything. Indeed, one should treat his friends and enemies alike. Indeed, one who is the foremost of all persons conversant with duties should treat all creatures like friends.

source: यदि नोत्तिष्ठति जयः पिता मे नरसत्तमः। अस्मिन्नेव रणोद्देशे शोषयिष्ये कलेवरम्॥
target: If this best of men, Jaya, my father does not rise up, I shall emaciate my own body, sitting on the field of battle.

source: उद्यम्य त्वरितो बाहुं ब्रुवाणश्च पुनः पुनः। जीवन्तमानयाचार्य मा वधीरिति धर्मवित्॥
target: "Bring the preceptor alive; conversant with the rules of fair fight, you should not slay aim." Although thus prevented by the Kauravas and Arjuna.

source: त्वं भूतानामधिपतिस्त्वयि लोकाः प्रतिष्ठिताः। नमुचेर्विश्वरूपस्य निहन्ता त्वं बलस्य च॥
target: You are the Lord of creatures, and in you are the worlds established. And you have killed Namuchi Vishvarupa and Vala.

source: अर्जुनं च युधां श्रेष्ठं प्राद्रवन्तं महारथम्। अलम्बुषो महाराज राक्षसेन्द्रो न्यवारयत्॥
target: O great king, Alambusha, the lord of the Rakshasas, resisted the rapid career of the mighty car-warrior Arjuna, the foremost of warriors.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच ततस्तीर्थवरं रामो ययौ बदरपाचनम्। तपस्विसिद्धचरितं यत्र कन्या धृतव्रता॥ भरद्वाजस्य दुहिता रूपेणाप्रतिमा भुवि। श्रुतावती नाम विभो कुमारी ब्रह्मचारिणी॥
target: Vaishampayana said Rama then proceeded to the Tirtha called Vadarapachana where dwell many ascetics and Siddhas, there the daughter of Bharadvaja on was of a peerless Earth for beauty, named Shruvavati, practised severe austerities. She maiden who led the life Brahmacharini.

source: तस्माच्छश्वत् त्यजेत् क्रोधं पुरुषः सम्यगाचरन्। श्रेयान् स्वधर्मानपगो न क्रुद्ध इति निश्चितम्॥
target: The person, who wishes to behave with decorum, should renounce anger; even one who has forsaken the virtues of his own order, docs not indulge in anger.

source: न ह्यदैवकृतं किंचिन्नराणामिह विद्यते। न च मे बालभावेऽपरि किंचित् पापकृतं कृतम्॥ कर्मणा मनसा वाचा यदिदं दुःखमागतम्।
target: Indeed, there exists nothing of men that does not fall within the category of destiny. I had committed no crime even in my childhood, either in action, thought or speech, for which reason this great calamity might befall me.

source: संततिश्च यथा दृष्टा कृत्यं यच्चापि साम्प्रतम्। राज्ञस्तत् क्रियतां सर्वमेष कालस्य निश्चयः॥
target: Let Angada perform all those ceremonies, which should be gone through by sons according to the Šāstras and which are for the well-being of the king; this is the time for the performance of those funeral rites.

source: देवदेवं ब्रुवाणं तं रक्ताम्बुरुहलोचनम्। शक्त्या बिभेद संक्रुद्धो राक्षसेन्द्रो भुजान्तरे॥
target: As that god of gods having eyes resembling the red lotuses was speaking thus, the lord of Rākşasas in high wrath pierced his breast with a dart.

source: एतद् द्वन्द्वसमायुक्तं कालचक्रमचेतनम्। विसृजेत् संक्षिपेच्चापि बोधयेत् सामरं जगत्॥
target: This wheel of life which is connected with pairs of opposites and devoid of consciousness, the universe with the very immortals should cast away, abridge, and chcek.

source: नलस्येव महानासीन च पश्यामि नैषधम्। वार्ष्णेयेन भवेन्नूनं विद्या सैवोपशिक्षिता॥ तेनाद्य रथनिर्घोषो नलस्येव महानभूत्। आहोस्विदूतुपर्णोऽपि यथा राजा नलस्तथा। यथायं स्थनिर्घोषो नैषधस्येव लक्ष्यते॥
target: This loud sound is like that of Nala's.car. But I do not find that prince of the Nishadhas. It is surely then that this are (of driving) was learnt by Varshneya. It is for this reason that the clattering sound of the car has been as loud as that of Nala. Or it may be, that king Rituparna is equal to Nala (in driving). Hence this rattle appears to be like that of the king of the Nishadhas."

source: तोमरान् सादिभिर्मुक्तान् प्रतीपानास्थितान् बहून्। हस्तैर्विचेरुस्ते नागा बभञ्जुश्चापरे तथा॥
target: Many of them seized the lances hurled by horsemen whilst others broke and twisted them.

source: नदीः सरांसि वापीश्च विविधांश्च मृगद्विजान्। सा बहून् भीमरूपांश्च पिशाचोरगराक्षसान्॥ पल्वलानि तडागानि गिरिकूटानि सर्वशः। सरितो निर्झराश्चैव ददर्शाद्भुतदर्शनान्॥
target: Many rivers, lakes, expanses of water and various kinds of birds and beasts; large number of serpents, Rakshasas and goblins of frightful figures; and pools, tanks, mountain-peaks on all sides; and streams and cataracts of picturesque appearance.

source: धृतराष्ट्र उवाच ततो भग्नेषु सैन्येषु भीमसेनेन संयुगे। दुर्योधनऽब्रवीत् किं नु सौबलो वापि संजय॥
target: Dhritarashtra said O Sanjaya, what did Duryodhana and Subala's son say on finding our troops shattered in battle by Bhimasena?

source: प्रविष्टस्तु वनं घोरं बहुपुष्पफलद्रुमम्। ददर्शाश्रममेकान्ते चीरमालापरिष्कृतम्॥
target: And having entered the dense forest abounding in blossoms and fruits and trees, Rāma saw in a recess an asylum glittering with bark and garlands.

source: ततो राममभिक्रम्य सौमित्रिरभिवाद्य च। तस्थौ भ्रातृसमीपस्थः शक्रस्येन्द्रानुजो यथा।४॥
target: Then going round Rāma and saluted him, Sumitra's son stood before his brother, like Indra's brother staying before Sakra.

source: असंग्राहाः सुसम्पन्ना हेमभाण्डपरिच्छदाः। अनेकशतसाहस्राः सर्वे सादिवशे स्थिताः॥
target: All the horses numbering many hundreds and thousands were kept under proper control and were free from the habit of scratching the ground with the fore feet.

source: ततो भीताः समुदैक्षन्त कर्णं राजन् सर्वे सैन्धवा बालिकाश्चा असम्मोहं पूजयन्तोऽस्य संख्ये सम्पश्यन्तो विजयं राक्षसस्य॥
target: was O king, then all the Saindhavas and Valhikas looked in fear at Karna whose senses were not confounded in that fight. And they all applauded him whether they looked at the triumphs of the Rakshasa.

source: शुक्ललोहितकृष्णानि रूपाण्येतानि त्रीणि तु। सर्वाण्येतानि रूपाणि यानीह प्राकृतानि वै॥
target: There are three colours in all viz., White, Red, and Dark. All those colours belong to Nature.

source: उत्थितेषु कबन्धेषु सर्वतः शोणितोदके। समरे पर्यधावन्त नृपा रिपुवधोद्यताः॥

source: करजैरतुदंश्चान्ये विहाय भयमुत्तमम्। बहुधा युध्यमानास्ते युद्धमार्गः प्लवङ्गमाः॥ नानाप्रहरणैर्भीमै राक्षसेन्द्रमताडयन्।

source: शप्त्वा च तान् महाभागस्तपस्येव मनो दधे। एवं स शप्तवान् राजन् वसूनष्टौ तपोधनः॥ महाप्रभावो ब्रह्मर्षिर्दैवान् क्रोधसमन्वितः। अथाश्रमपदं प्राप्तास्ते वै भूयो महात्मनः॥ शप्ताः स्म इति जानन्त ऋषिं तमुपचक्रमुः। प्रसादयन्तस्तमृषि वसवः पार्थिवर्षभ।॥ लेभिरे न च तस्मात् ते प्रसादमृषिसत्तमात्। आपवात् पुरुषव्याघ्र सर्वधर्मविशारदात्॥
target: Having thus cursed them, the illustrious man again engaged himself in asceticism. O king, when the celestial Vasus were thus cursed in anger by that Brahmarshi and ascetic of great power. They soon came to the hermitage of the illustrious man; as soon as they came to know of it. O best of men, Apava, learned in the ruled of every virtue. O best of kings, the Vasus tried to pacify that Rishi, but they failed to obtain grace from that best of Rishis.

target: He took up those exquisitely beautiful celestial flowers. Possessed of celestial fragrance, O Bharata, Vipula got them there as the result of his severe penances.

source: बुद्धौ कलुषभूतायां विनाशे समुपस्थिते। अनयो नयसंकाशो हृदयानापसर्पति॥ अनर्थाश्चार्थरूपेण अर्थाश्चानर्थरूपिणः। उत्तिष्ठन्ति विनाशाय नूनं तच्चास्य रोचते॥
target: When destruction is at hand, evil, appearing as good to the mind polluted by sin, remains stuck to it. That which is improper appears as proper, and that which is proper appears as improper to a man overwhelmed by destruction. And this he (always) likes.

target: The bulls, having their beauty enhanced by the autumn, and their body covered with dust, delighted, infuriated and hence desirous of entering into skirmish, have been setting up terrible roars in the midst of kine.

target: You will accomplish this, as soon as you go there, O Janardana; and, O hero, if any other treatment of that evil-souled one is derived by you; it will be as you wish, whether it is to be peace with them or not or whatever is desired by you.

source: आजघ्नुः कुरवस्तत्र वादित्राणि समन्ततः। कर्णं प्रहर्षयिष्यन्तः शङ्खान् दध्मुश्च सर्वशः॥

source: काष्ठा निमेषा दश पञ्च चैव त्रिंशत्तु काष्ठा गणयेत् कलां ताम्। त्रिंशत्कलश्चापि भवेन्मुहूर्ता भागः कलाया दशमश्च यः स्यात्॥ त्रिंशन्मुहूर्तं तु भवेदहश्च रात्रिश्च संख्या मुनिभिः प्रणीता। मासः स्मृतो रात्र्यहनी च त्रिंशत् संवत्सरो द्वादशमास उक्तः॥ संवत्सरं द्वे त्वयने वदन्ति संख्याविदो दक्षिणमुत्तरं च॥
target: The Rishis, measuring time, have given particular names to particular portions. Five and ten winks of the eye make what is called a Kashtha: Thirty Kashthas make what is called a Kala. Thirty Kalas, with the tenth part of a Kala, make a Muhurta. Thirty Muhurtas make up one day and night. Thirty days and nights form a month, and twelve months form a year. Persons well-read in mathematical science say that a year is made up of two solar motions. viz., the northern and the southern.

source: कृतवर्मा सहानीकस्त्रिगर्तश्च महारथः। दुर्योधनश्च नृपतिर्भ्रातृभिः परिवारितः॥

source: ऋषिरुवाच किं न पश्यसि मे ब्रह्मन् कराच्छाकरसं स्रुतम्॥ यं दृष्ट्वा सम्प्रनृत्तो वै हर्षेण महता विभो।
target: The Rishi said Do you not see that a vegetable juice is flowing from this my wound? Seeing this, O lord, I am dancing in great glee.

source: स श्रुतर्वाणमादाय नश्वमगमत् ततः। स च तौ विषयस्यान्ते प्रत्यगृहणाद् यथाविधि॥ तयोरय॑ च पाद्यं च ब्रनश्वः प्रत्यवेदयत्। अनुज्ञाप्य च पप्रच्छ प्रयोजनमुपक्रमे॥
target: Taking therefore Shrutarvana with him, he went to Bradhnashva. Having learnt of their arrival at the frontier of his kingdom he received them duly by offering them Arghya and water to wash their feet. He then with their permission inquired the reason of their coming.

source: सा विद्वज्जनसम्पूर्णा सभा सुरुचिरा तथा। अदृश्यत घनापाये पूर्णचन्द्रेव शर्वरी॥
target: And that splendid assembly filled with learned people looked like he night of the full moon after the clouds have dispersed.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच एतच्छ्रुत्वा व्यवसितो निकृति समुपाश्रितः। जितमित्येव शकुनियुधिष्ठिरमभाषत॥
target: Vaishampayana said Having heard this and adopting unfair means, Shakuni, ever ready with the dice, said to Yudhisthira, “Lo, I have won!"

source: विश्वामित्रः क्षत्रभावानिर्विण्णो वाक्यमब्रवीत्। धिग् बलं क्षत्रियबलं ब्रह्मतेजोबलं बलम्॥
target: Vishvamitra become disgusted with the Kshatriya might and spoke thus, "Fie on the Kshatriya prowess? The Brahma might is the true might.

source: स चेदिविषयं रम्यं वसुः पौरवनन्दनः। इन्द्रोपदेशाज्जग्राह रमणीयं महीपतिः॥
target: That son of Paurava, (Uparichara) called also Vasu, directed by Indra, conquered the beautiful and excellent kingdom of Chedi.

source: वीरौ तावभिसंरब्धौ संनिकृष्टौ महाभुजौ। छादयेतां शरव्रातैरन्योन्यमपराजितौ॥
target: Worked up with anger those two longarmed heroes, confronting each other, and each capable of vanquishing the other, covered each other with arrows.

source: अप्रियं सुमहत् कृत्वा सिन्धुराजः किरीटिनः। चक्षुर्विषयमा यमापन्नः कथं जीवितमाप्नुयात्॥
target: Having inflicted a terrible injury to the diadem-checked Arjuna, how could the ruler of the Sindhu's escape with his life, when he would become the object of Arjuna's sight?

source: एषा विराट दुहिता स्नुषा गाण्डीवधन्वनः। आर्ता बालं पति वीरं दृष्ट्या शोचत्यनिन्दिता॥
target: There, the daughter of Virata, the daughterin-law of Arjuna, that girl of faultless beauty, stricken with grief on seeing her heroic husband, is bewailing.

source: पाञ्चाल्यं त्वरयाविध्यन् सर्व एव महारथाः। स विद्धः सप्तभिवीरैर्दोणस्यार्थे महाहवे॥
target: Duryodhana pierced him with twenty and Shakuni with five arrows. Thus all the mighty car-warriors (of your army) quickly pierced the Panchala prince.

source: रावणस्य वचः श्रुत्वा मन्त्रिणोऽथार्जुनस्य ते॥ उत्तस्थुः सायुधास्तं च रावणं वाक्यमब्रुवन् ।
target: Hearing the words of Rāvana, the ministers of Arjuna stood up with arms and said.

source: तत्रापश्याम वै सर्वे मधु पीतकमाक्षिकम्। मरुप्रपाते विषमे निविष्टं कुम्भसम्मितम्॥
target: There we all saw some honey of a yellow colour inside a pot placed at a very high point of the mountain.

source: यथा चारोपितो वृक्षो जातश्चान्तनिवेशने। महानपि दुरारोहो महास्कन्धः प्रशाखवान्॥ शीर्येत पुष्पितो भूत्वा न फलानि प्रदर्शयन्। तस्य नानुभवेदर्थं यस्य हेतोः स रोपितः॥ एषोपमा महाबाहो त्वमर्थं वेत्तुमर्हसि। यद्यस्मान्मनुजेन्द्र त्वं भर्ता भृत्यान्न शाधि हि॥
target: If a tree, planted in the inner apartment of a house, growing huge with a big trunk and many branches, is dried up as soon it blossoms without bearing fruits, his object for whom it is planted, becomes fruitless? And this simili, O you of long arms, shall prove good in you, if did you not, our master, govern us, O lord of men, who are your servants.

source: ततस्तौ तत्र संरब्धौ राजमानौ मुहुर्मुहुः। शरैराशीविषाकारैस्ततक्षाते परस्परम्॥
target: Thereupon both of thein became angry. Engaging in a fearful fight, they hurled again and again at each other showers of poisonous snake-like arrows.

source: नाथवन्तश्च भवता पाण्डवा मधुसूदन। भवन्तं प्लमासाद्य तीर्णाः स्म कुरुसागरम्॥
target: O destroyer of Madhu, on you the Pandavas have got a powerful protector having obtained you for our raft we have crossed the Kuru ocean.

source: इदं च यदि वा मोहाल्लोभाद्वा व्याहृतं मया। तत्रापि च महाराज न दोषं कर्तुमर्हसि ॥
target: If I have said this through ignorance or covetousness, you ought not, O mighty monarch, criminate me.

source: बालश्चाकृतबुद्धिश्च एकपुत्रश्च मे प्रियः। तारेयो राम भवता रक्षणीयो महाबलः॥
target: He is my only son, dear and born of Tārā. A mere child and of unripe understanding as he is, that one of mighty strength should always be protected by you, O Rāma.

source: महारथैर्वृष्णिभोजैः सुगुप्तं सुराष्ट्रकैर्विहितैरात्तशस्त्रैः। बृहद् बलं कृतवर्माभिगुप्तं बलं त्वदीयं दक्षिणेनाभियाति॥
target: That large force which was well protected by the great car-warriors of the Vrishni and the Bhoja race and also by the warriors of Saurashtra, all well armed and well-skilled in the use of arms, the force which was under the command of Kritavarmana marched to the south of your army.

source: इदं गृहमिदं राज्यमिदं धर्मासनं च ते। राजा त्वमसि शाध्युर्वीमहं तु परवांस्त्वयि॥
target: This palace, this kingdom, this seat of justice, are at your disposal. You are the master of all these! Do you rule the Earth! As regards myself, I depend entirely upon you.

source: भयंकरः प्रलय इवाग्निरुत्थितः विनाशयन्युगपरिवर्तनान्तकृत्॥ खगेश्वरं शरणमुपागता वयं महौजसं ज्वलनसमानवर्चसम्।
target: You rise like the fire which, at the changes of the Yuga and at the dissolution of the creation, destroys everything. O king of birds, having come to you, we seek your protection, you move in the sky, your energy is great, you are as mighty as the fire.

source: युधिष्ठिर उवाच अस्ति चेदिह मर्यादा यामन्यो नाभिलवयेत्। पृच्छामि त्वां सतां श्रेष्ठ तन्मे ब्रूहि पितामह॥
target: Yudhishthira said Is there any such rule (regarding royal duties) which should, under no circumstances) be violated? I ask you this, O foremost of virtuous persons! Tell me, O grandfather.

source: ततो रथेन शुभ्रेण महता किङ्किणीकिना। हेमजालविचित्रेण लधुना मेघनादिना॥
target: With his white chariot and large, furnished with tinkling balls and ornamented with gold, with wheels clattering like the roaring of clouds,

source: तत्रैकां रजनी व्युष्य प्रभाते राम गम्यताम्। दक्षिणां दिशमास्थाय वनखण्डस्य पार्श्वतः॥ तत्रागस्त्याश्रमपदं गत्वा योजनमन्तरम्। रमणीये वनोद्देशे बहुपादपशोभिते॥
target: Passing a night there, do you, O Rāma, in the morning, taking a southerly course, go by the skirts of the forest tract. Passing a Yojana, you । shall come upon Agastya's asylum, located at a charming woodland graced with many a tree.

source: यदत्र तथ्यं तन्मे त्वं यथावद् वक्तुमर्हसि। त्वदृते पुरुषं नान्यं प्रष्टुमर्हामि कौरव॥
target: You should tell me properly what the truth is in this respect. O you of Kuru's race, I do not think it proper to ask any one else but you,

source: मद्रास्त्रिगर्ताः साम्बष्ठाः प्रतीच्योदीच्यमालवाः। शिवयः शूरसेनाश्च शूद्राश्च मलदैः सह॥ सौवीराः कितवाः प्राच्या दाक्षिणात्याश्च सर्वशः। तवात्मजं पुरस्कृत्य सूतपुत्रस्य पृष्ठतः॥ हर्षयन्तः स्वसैन्यानि ययुस्तव सुतैः सह। प्रवरः सर्वयोधानां बलेषु बलमादधत्॥ ययौ वैकर्तनः कर्णः प्रमुखे सर्वधन्विनाम्।
target: Then the Madras, the Trigartas, the Ambasthas, the warriors from the West and the North, the Malavas, the Shivis, the Surasenas, the Sudras with the Malavas, the Sauviras, the Kitavas, the warriors from the East and the South, all these with your son Duryodhana at son their head and the son of Suta at their rear, cheering the hearts of their own partisans, marched forth and increased the strength of the (advancing) troops. Karna, the of Vikartana, then marched at the head of all bowmen.

source: तस्मात् कामं ममायेमं राम सम्पादयानघ। जहि भीष्मं महाबाहो यथा वृत्रं पुरंदरः॥
target: Therefore do you fulfill this desire of mine, O sinless Rama; slay Bhishma, O you of long arms, as Purandara slew Vritra.

source: सौतिरुवाच ततस्तस्मिन्द्विजश्रेष्ठ समुदीर्णे तथाविधे। गरुडः पक्षिराट् तूर्णं संप्राप्तो विबुधान्प्रति॥
target: Sauti said : O best of the twice born, the celestials, having stood prepared for battle (in he way already narrated), the king of the birds Garuda soon came upon them.

source: रजन्यामप्रकाशस्तु संतापयति चन्द्रमाः। कृष्णरक्तांशुपर्यन्तो लोकक्षय इवोदितः॥
target: The Moon, although not appearing* in the night, burns, and with dark and red rays rises, as if it intended to exterminate people. *The moon, it seems appear, but does not look out clearly.

source: तौ पश्यमानौ विविधाशैलप्रस्थान बनानि च। नदीश्च विविधा रम्या जग्मतुः सह सीतया॥ सारसांश्चक्रवाकांश्च नदीपुलिनचारिणः। सरांसि च सपद्मानि युतानि जलजैः खगैः॥ यूथबन्धाश्च पृषतान् मदोन्मत्तान् विषाणिनः। महिषांश्च वराहांश्च गजांश्च द्रुमवैरिणः।४।।
target: And they went with Sītā, seeing many imountain-peaks, and forests, and delightful streams, and Cakravākas haunting river islets, and tanks with lotuses containing aquatic birds, and herds of deer, and horned buffalo's maddened with juices boars, and elephants, foes to trees.

source: तस्मात् प्रासादमद्यैवमिमं विध्वंसयाम्यहम्। इति संचिन्त्य हनुमान्मनसा दर्शयन् बलम्॥ चैत्यप्रासादमुत्प्लुत्य मेरुशृङ्गमिवोन्नतम्। आरुरोह हरिश्रेष्ठो हनूमान्मारुतात्मजः॥
target: Therefore, this very day will I demolish this structure. Hanumān, son to the Wind-god, foremost of monkeys, Hanumān, son to the Wind-god, displaying his strength, bounded to the Caitya (A building designed for deities) building, elevated like a summit of Meru.

source: सधूमाश्च शराः सर्वे मम युद्धाभिनन्दिताः। रुक्मपृष्ठानि चापानि विचेष्टन्ते विचक्षण ॥
target: And, O discerning one, rejoicing at the prospect of my fight, all these arrows emit smoke, and my bows plaited on the back with gold, are restless.

source: तासां नास्ति विशेषो हि दर्शने लक्षणेऽपि वा। ततोऽहमेकाग्रमनास्ताः प्रजाः समचिन्तयम्॥
target: There was no difference visible in their appearance or marks. Thereupon, with wholeminded-ness, I began to think of these created beings.

source: यो ह्यनाथ इवाक्रम्य पार्षतेन हतस्तथा॥ कर्मणा सुनृशंसेन तस्य नाथो व्यवस्थितः।
target: He, who has been slain like one helpless by the son of Prisata, by a cruel and deceitful means, yonder stands the protector of that one. name

source: एवं यो वेद कामस्य केवलस्य निवर्तनम्। बन्धं वै कामशास्त्रस्य स दुःखान्यतिवर्तते॥
target: One who understands that the end of all acts performed from the desire of fruit is rebirth or chains that bind, succeeds in getting over all sorrow.

source: त्वं शल्यभूतः शत्रूणामविषह्यः पराक्रमे॥ ततस्त्वमुच्यसे राजशल्य इत्यरिसूदन।
target: O monarch, you are made up of shafts; and you are invincible in respect to your antagonists in prowess. O slayer of enemies, you are, therefore, called Shalya (shaft).

source: चातुराश्रम्यबाह्याश्च क्षुतिबाह्याश्च ये नराः। विकर्मभिश्च जीवन्ति ते वै निरयगामिनः॥
target: They who are out of the limit of the four wellknown modes of life, they who follow to practices interdicted by the Shrutis and the Scriptures, and they who perform wicked or sinful deeds or who do not belong to their order of birth have to sink in hell.

source: द्रौणिपर्जन्यमुक्तां तां बाणवृष्टिं सुदुःसहाम्। वायव्यास्त्रेण संक्षिप्य मुदा पाण्डयानिलोऽनुदत्॥३३
target: Then Pandya, who was like the wind, after having checked, with his weapon, called the or Vayavya, that intolerable shower of shafts poured down by the son of Drona, who was like the mass of clouds, roared most loudly with great gratification.

source: लोककर्ता महाभाग भगवानच्युतो हरिः। नागभोगेन महता परिरभ्य महीमिमाम्॥
target: The creator of the universe, the greatly blessed one, the exalted and undeteriorating Hari, lay on the hood of the snake encircling the whole world.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच वसत्सु तेषु प्रच्छन्नं पाण्डवेषु महात्मसु। आजगामाथ तान् द्रष्टुं व्यास: सत्यवतीसुतः॥
target: Vaishampayana said : When the illustrious Pandavas were living in disguise, the son of Satyavati, Vyasa, once came to see them.

source: श्वशुर उवाच वातातपविशीर्णाङ्गी त्वां विवर्णो निरीक्ष्य वै। कर्षितां सुव्रताचारे क्षुधविह्वलचेतसम्॥ कथं सक्तून् ग्रहन्यामि भूत्वा धर्मोपघातकः। कल्याणवृत्ते कल्याणि नैवं त्वं वक्तुमर्हसि॥
target: The Father-in-law said-O you of excellent vows and conduct, seeing you wasted by wind and sun, deprived of your very complexion, emaciated, and almost destitute of consciousness through hunger, how can I be such a transgressor against the rules of virtue as to take your share of the barley? O auspicious damsel, you should not say so, for the sake of those auspicious results for which every family must try.

source: ततः परमसंक्रुद्धो विस्फार्य सुमहद् धनुः। राक्षसेन्द्रो महाबाहुविनदन् भैरवं रवम्॥
target: Thereafter excited to the highest pitch of fury, that foremost of Rakshasas possessed of mighty arms stretching his mighty bow, uttered a terrible yell.

source: मामकाः के महेष्वासा नाजहुः संजयाच्युतम्। दुर्योधनसमादिष्टाः के वीराः पर्यवारयन्॥
target: O Sanjaya, (tell me) what great bow men of my army, did not abandon that hero of unfading energy and what brave warriors at the command Duryodhana stood around that hero in order to protect him?

source: स मन्दराग्रस्त इवांशुमाली विवृद्धकोपो बलवीर्यसंवृतः। कुमारमक्षं सबलं सवाहनं ददाह नेत्राग्निमरीचिभिस्तदा॥
target: And with his ire heightened, that one endowed with energy and prowess, like to the ray-decorated (Sun) on the crest of Mandara,* The Sun is on Mandara in mid-day: therefore the meridian Sun is meant here, began to burn with the fiery rays of his eyes, Akşa, along with his forces and vehicles.

source: गोमायवश्च प्राक्रोशन् भयदान् दारुणान् रवान्। अकार्षुरपसव्यं च बहुशः पृतनां तव॥ चिखादिषन्तो मांसानि पिपासन्तश्च शोणितम्।
target: The jackals yelled forth and many dreadful and fierce rangers of the sky repeatedly placed your army to their right, being desirous of devouring flesh and thirsting for blood.

source: राघवस्य च ते कार्यं कर्तव्यमविशङ्कया। स्यादधर्मो ह्यकरणे त्वां च हिंस्यादमानितः॥
target: It behoveth you to perform Rāghava's service fearlessly or else you shall be visited with sin: on his being insulted you shall be injured.

source: शक्तिं कनकवैदूर्यां द्रोणश्चिच्छेद सायकैः। ततो द्रोणः सुपीताभ्यां भल्लाभ्यामरिमर्दनः॥
target: Drona cut-off the dart adorned with gold and lapises shot at him with his own arrows. Then that crusher of foes., viz., Drona with a couple of well-tempered bhalla.

source: अम्बष्ठान् मालवाञ्छूरांस्रिगर्तान् स शिबीनापि। प्राहिणोन्मृत्युलोकाय क्रुद्धो युद्धे युधिष्ठिरः॥
target: (And) in that battle Yudhishthira sent to the region of Death, the Ambhastas, the Malavas, the heroic Trigartas and the Sivis.

source: तामनुव्याहरच्छक्तिमापतन्ती स राघवः। स्वस्त्यस्तु लक्ष्मणायेति मोघा भव हतोद्यमा॥
target: Thereat as the dart descended, Raghava addressed it, saying-peace be to Laksmana! Be you frustrated; and let your energy go out of you. *i.e. as Rāmānuja remarks, addressed the deity presiding over it.

source: अर्थस्यावयवावेतौ धर्मकामाविति श्रुतिः। अर्थसिद्ध्या विनिर्वृत्तावुभावेतौ भविष्यतः॥
target: Virtue and Desire are the limbs of Wealth as the Shruti says. With the acquisition of Wealth, both Virtue and the objects of desire may be acquired.

source: मुहूर्तादथ मे दृष्टिः प्रादुर्भूता पुनर्नवा। यया निर्मुक्तमात्मानमपश्यं लब्धचेतसम्॥
target: As he said to me, within that very moment, I acquired as if new sight; in consequence of which I saw myself possessed of true knowledge and freed from the illusions of the world.

source: भीष्मादीनां महाबाहो तदनुज्ञातुमर्हसि। दिष्ट्या त्वद्य महाबाहो धृतराष्ट्रः प्रयाचते॥ याचितो यः पुरास्माभिः पश्य कालस्य पर्ययम्। योऽसौ पृथिव्याः कृत्स्नाया भर्ता भूत्वा नराधिपः॥१२ परैर्विनिहतामात्यो वनं गन्तुमभीप्सति। मा तेऽन्यत् पुरुषव्याघ्र दानाद् भवतु दर्शनम्॥
target: Indeed, O mighty-armed one, it is for Bhishma and others that the old king is desirous of making those gifts. You should grant your permission. By good luck it is, O you of mighty arms, that Dhritarashtra today begs wealth of us, he who was formerly begged by us. Mark the reverses brought about by time. That king who was before the lord and protector of the whole Earth, now wishes to go into the forest, his kinsmen and associates all killed by enemies. O king, let not your views deviate from granting the permission asked.

source: एवं द्वादश वर्षाणि तापयामास रोदसी। निवर्त्यमानापि च सा ज्ञातिभि:व शक्यते॥
target: And thus she continued for twelve years (her austerities) and made the heaven not. Nor could she be made to desist from the course by her relatives.

source: एवं नो विस्मयकरं संशयं मधुसूदन। त्वमेवार्हसि कल्याण वक्तुं वह्नर्विनिर्गमम्॥
target: Even this, O destroyer of Madhu, is a matter of wonder and doubt with us. O source of all auspiciousness, you should explain to us that doubt, viz., the issue of fire from your mouth.

source: अपसव्यं चकाराथ माद्रीपुत्रस्तवात्मजम्। किरज्छरशतैर्हष्टस्तत्र नादो महानभूत्॥
target: Then the son of Madri, delightful shooting hundreds of shafts, kept your son on his right side. At this, loud sounds and applause arose there.

source: अस्याश्चतस्रो धेन्वोऽन्या दिक्षु सर्वासु मातले। निवसन्ति दिशां पाल्यो धारयन्त्यो दिशः स्म ताः॥
target: She has got four calves, O Matali which are in the several cardinal points for they bear the load of these points.

source: माननस्यासौ मानकामस्य चे!ः संरम्भिणश्चार्थधर्मातिगस्य। दुर्भाषिणो मन्युवशानुगस्य कामात्मनो दौ«दैर्भावितस्य॥
target: He (the son) through himself desirous of honour, seeks to deprive others of honour, is jealous, wrathful, goes beyond the limits of virtue for his own interests, haughty in sensual desires and is induced with a bad heart.

source: तेषां प्रपक्षाः काम्बोजा: सुदक्षिणपुरःसराः। ययुरश्वैर्महावेगैः शकाश्च यवनैः सह॥
target: Then riding on horses of great fleetness, the Kamvojas headed by Sudakshina and the Shakas with the Yavanas, marched forth, forming the support of the last mentioned party.

source: माद्रीसुताभ्यामुक्ते तु स्वमते कुरुनन्दनः। वासविर्वासवसमः सव्यसाच्यब्रवीद् वचः॥
target: The two sons of Madri having spoken out their own opinions, that delighter of the Kuru race, Savyasachin, the son of Vasava, equal to Vasava himself, said these words.

source: एवं मयि च ते भक्तिर्भविष्यति सुदर्शिता। धर्मज्ञगुरुपूजायां धर्मश्चाप्यतुलो महान्॥
target: If you do act thus, it will be showing your best regard in me. O you, versed in the knowledge of religion, real virtue consists in the adoration of superiors.

source: ऋक्षाः शाखामृगाश्चैव दुमप्रवरयोधिनः। अभ्यधावन्त सहितास्तदनीकमवस्थितम्॥
target: And bears and monkeys, given to fighting excellently with trees, in a body rushed towards that army (of Rākşasa) drawn up there.

source: धृतराष्ट्र उवाच वर्षाणां चैव नामानि पर्वतानां च संजय। आचक्ष्व मे यथातत्त्वं ये च पर्वतवासिनः॥
target: Dhritarashtra said O Sanjaya, tell me in detail the names of all the Varshas and of all the mountains and also of all that live on these mountains.

source: त्वयि चानागते पूर्वमिति मे निश्चिता मतिः। जानतश्चापि ते वीर्य महेन्द्रवरुणोपम॥ हत्वाहं रावणं युद्धे सपुत्रबलवाहनम्। अभिषिच्य च लङ्कायां विभीषणमथाप च।७।। भरते राज्यमारोप्य त्यक्ष्ये देहं महाबल।
target: Ere you had come, I had arrived at this determination; albeit, O you that are equal to the mighty Indra or Varuna, I knew your prowess full well. Slaying Rāvana in battle along with his sons, forces and vehicles, and installing Vibhīşaņa in Lankā, and placing the kingdom in the hands of Bharata, I shall renounce my body, O exceedingly powerful one!

source: सौमित्रे शृणु वन्यानां वल्गु व्याहरतां स्वनम्। सम्प्रतिष्ठामहे कालः प्रस्थानस्य परंतप॥
target: O Sumiträ's son, do you hear the dulcet notes of the birds in the woods. Let us proceed. O repressor of foes, the time of our departure is present.

source: हा हा धिक् कुरुवीरस्य संनाहं काञ्चनं भुवि। आविद्धं हतस्येह मया पुत्रेण पश्यत॥
target: Alas, alas, the golden coat of mail of this foremost hero of Kuru's race, killed by me, his son, knowingly, is lying on the ground, cut off from his body.

source: न पश्येम कुरून् सर्वान् पाण्डवाश्चैव संयुगे। क्षीणानुभयतः शूरान् रथिनो रथिभिर्हतान्॥
target: You will not see all the Kurus, nor all the Pandavas, in the event of a battle, the heroes on both sides being weakened in number and in strength and car-warriors slain by car-warriors.

source: वसिष्ठ उवाच वृत्तमेतद् यथाकालं गच्छ राज्यं प्रशाधि वै। ब्राह्मणं तु मनुष्येन्द्र भावमंस्थाः कदाचन।॥
target: Vasishtha said: o king of men, my desire has been fulfilled at the proper time. Return to your kingdom and rliic your subjects. Never (again) disregard the Brahmanas.

source: समेतौ तौ महात्मानौ दृष्ट्वा कर्णधनंजयौ॥ अर्जुनो जयतां कर्णमिति शक्रोऽब्रवीत्तदा।
target: As those two noble warriors engaged in fight Shakra (Indra) himself wished that Arjuna might conquer Karna.

source: अहो रूपमहो धैर्यमहो सत्त्वमहो द्युतिः। अहो राक्षसराजस्य सर्वलक्षणयुक्तता ॥ यद्यधर्मो न बलवान् स्यादयं राक्षसेश्वरः। स्यादयं सुरलोकस्य सशक्रस्यापि रक्षिता॥
target: Ah! the form! Ah! the patience! Ah! the strength! Ah! the splendour! Ah! the entire auspiciousness of the king of Rākşasas! If the lord of Rākṣasas were not impious to the height, this one could well be the protector themselves of the celestial regions with Śakra.

source: एतदिच्छाम्यहं श्रोतुं चरितं तस्यधीमतः। यथा मान्धातृशब्दश्च तस्य शक्रसमद्युतेः। जन्म चाप्रतिवीर्यस्य कुशलो ह्यसि भाषितुम्॥
target: I am desirous to hear all about the life and achievements of that intelligent king. I should also like to hear when and how his name became Mandhata, belonging as it did to the greatly effulgent Indra and how that matchlessly powerful hero was born, you are greatly-skilled in the art of narrating all events, (narrate all this to me).

source: त्वमेव राजानासि श्रेयःकारणमेव च। यत्रेच्छसि महाराज निवासं तत्र कुर्महे॥
target: You know also, O king, what conduces to our well-being; and wherever you wish, O great king, we shall fix our habitation.

source: न कदाजिद् विकालं हि गतपूर्वो मयाऽऽश्रमः। अनागतायां सन्ध्यायां माता मे प्ररुणद्धि माम्॥
target: Never before did I return to the hermitage after the lapse of the proper time. My mother is used to shut me up in the asylum even before the evening sets in.

source: तत्राद्भुतं परं चक्रे कौन्तेयः कृष्णसारथिः॥ यदेको बहुभिः सार्धं समागच्छदभीतवत्।
target: Then that son of Kunti having Krishna for his charioteer, inspired his foes with wonder. Inasmuch as he, though single handed, dauntlessly encountered the numerous odds against him;

source: जानकीरक्षणार्थं वा श्रमाद् वा नोपलक्ष्यते। अथवा कः श्रमस्तस्य सैव तेनाभिरक्षिता॥
target: Whether for preserving Jānakī, or from fatigue—it dose not appear. But what is his fatigue? She it is that has been preserved by him.

source: द्रौपदेयाऽभिमन्युश्च शिखण्डी चापराजितः। न प्राजहन् भीमसेनं भये जाते महाबलम्॥
target: And the sons of Draupadi, and Abhimanyu and the ever-victorious Shikhandin, these mighty warriors did not forsake Bhimasena, as they all apprehended danger.

source: शरैर्निभिन्नहृदयान् कुञ्जरांस्तुरगांस्तथा॥ श्वापदाः परिकर्षन्तु नरांश्च निहतान् मया।
target: The ferocious beasts shall drag away elephants and steeds and men slaughtered by me with arrows penetrating into their hearts.

source: अथ द्रोणाभ्यनुज्ञाताः कदाचित् कुरुपाण्डवाः। ग्थैर्विनिर्ययुः सर्वे मृगयामरिमर्दन॥
target: O chastiser of foes, one day the Kuru and the Pandu princes with the permission of Drona all set out on their cars to a hunting excursion.

source: न गाथागाथिनं शास्ति बहु चेदपि गायति। प्रकृति यान्ति भूतानि भूलिङ्गशकुनिर्यथा॥
target: The verses that a chaunter chaunts, though he chants them often, would produce no impression on him. every creature acts according to his own disposition like the bird Bhulinga.

source: कच्चिदात्मसमाः शूराः श्रुतवन्तो जितेन्द्रियाः। कुलीनाश्चेङ्गितज्ञाश्च कृतास्ते तात मन्त्रिणः॥
target: And, my child, have you employed as your controlled, well-born, and understanding signs, who are like your own self?

source: शल्यस्तु नकुलं वीर: स्वस्त्रीयं प्रियमात्मनः। विव्याध प्रहसन् बाणैालयन् कोपयन्निव॥
target: The heroic Shalya, pierced, smilingly, his own dear nephew Nakula, as if in dalliance, with arrows, in order to excite the latter's Wrath.

source: अथ विजयमवाप्य वानरेन्द्रः समरमुखे सुरसिद्धयक्षसङ्घः। हर्षसमाकुलितैर्निरीक्षमाणः॥
target: And winning victory in the action that lord of monkeys was espied by the celestials Siddhas and Yaksas along with all creatures on earth, having their eyes flushed with joy.

source: यस्यार्थाः स च विक्रान्तो यस्यार्थाः स च बुद्धिमान्। यस्यार्थाः स महाबाहुर्यस्यार्थाः स गुणाधिकः॥
target: He that has wealth is powerful; he that has wealth is intelligent; he that has wealth is mighty-armed; and he that has wealth is full of all graces.

source: यः शक्तः समरे भीष्मं प्रतियोद्भुमिहाहवे। ऋते त्वां पुरुषव्याघ्र सत्यमेतद् ब्रवीमि ते॥
target: Who is able to fight with Bhishma in battle, except yourself, O best of men? This I say to you forsooth."

source: तस्य तत् सर्वमाचख्यौ भगिनी रामविक्रमम्। खरदूषणसंयुक्तं राक्षसानां पराभवम्॥
target: Then his sister informed him of the prowess of Rama causing the defeat of the Rakshasas led by Khara and Dushana.

source: सिंहस्कन्धोरुबाहुस्त्वां वृत्तायतमहाभुजः। परिष्वजतु बाहुभ्यां भीमः प्रहरतां वरः॥
target: Let also that one, possessed of the shoulders of a lion and round thighs and arms and of long arms, namely Bhima, the foremost among smiters, with his arms embrace you.

source: स पितुर्विक्रियां दृष्ट्वा राज्यान्निरसनं च तत्। नियतो वर्तयामास प्रजाहितचिकीर्षया।॥ ब्रह्मण्यः सत्यवादी च शुचिः शमदमान्वितः। प्रजास्तं चान्वरज्यन्त धर्मनित्यं मनस्विनम्॥
target: Seeing the reverses of his father and his expulsion from the empire he was ever busy with encompassing the well-being of the people, being devoted to Brahman, speaking the truth, practising purity and controlling his senses and thoughts. And the subjects were well-pleased with that grcat one constant in virtue.

source: जातीमरणरौगैश्च समाविष्टः प्रधानवित्। चेतनावत्सु चैतन्यं समं भूतेषु पश्यति॥
target: Though attacked by decrepitude and death and disease, he who understand Pradhana sees with an equal eye that Consciousness which lives in all beings gifted with Consciousness.

source: युद्धप्रमत्तो व्याक्षिप्तो जयाकाङ्क्षी क्षिपशरान्।।३३ नाहमज्ञासिषं युध्यन्स्वान्परान्वापि संयुगे। जामातरं न जाने स्म प्रहरन्युद्धदुर्मदः॥
target: Being mad after war-fare and desirous of acquiring victory, I was continually making a downpour of shafts, so I could not distinguish in the conflict between my own men and enemies, and thus unwittingly I did hurt your husband.

source: तत् प्रत्ययकरं लस्वा सुग्रीवं प्लवगाधिपम्। पृथिव्यां वानरैश्वर्ये स्वयं रामोऽभ्यषेचयत्॥
target: Having obtained this token, Rama installed Sugriva the monkey-king, in sovereignty over all the monkeys on earth. a

source: भीष्म उवाच सर्वमेतत् तपोमूलं कवयः परिचक्षते। न ह्यतप्ततपा मूढः क्रियाफलमवाप्नुते॥
target: Bhishma said They who arc endued with knowledge say that everything springs from penance. That foolish person who has not practised penances does not get the rewards of even his own acts.

source: दिशस्तस्यास्ततो भूयः प्रस्थितो दक्षिणां दिशम्। विन्ध्यपादपसंकीर्णा चन्दनदुमशोभिताम्॥
target: And changing that direction, I again made for the South crowded with trees belonging to Vindhya, and embellished with sandal woods.

source: ततः प्रावर्तत पुनः संग्रामः कटुकोदयः। रामरावणसैन्यानामन्योन्यमभिधावताम्॥
target: Then there again raged a terrible encounter between the forces of Rama and Ravana, smiting one another.

source: सहदेववचः श्रुत्वा नकुलोऽपि विशाम्पते। दर्शनीयतमो नृणामिदं वचनमब्रवीत्॥
target: Vaishampayana said O king, hearing the words of Sahadeva, Nakula, the handsomest of men, spoke thus.

source: जरत्कारुः सुमहता कालेन स्वर्गमेयिवान्। एतदाख्यानमास्तीकं यथावत्कथितं मया। प्रब्रूहि भृगुशार्दूल किमन्यत्कथयामि ते॥
target: The greatly noble Jaratkaru, after a long course of years, went to heaven. This is the story of Astika. I have narrated it (to you) as it is. Now, tell me, O best of the Bhrigu race, what else shall I narrate.

source: यद्यप्यकृतकृत्यानामीदृशः स्यादुपक्रमः। भवेत् तु दीनवदनो भ्रान्तविप्लुतमानसः॥
target: If the monkeys had engaged in such an unfair proceeding without being successful in their mission, Angada would have looked poorly and his mind would have been overwhelmed with grief and forgetfulness.

source: यदाश्रौषं वाहनेष्वक्षमेषु रथोपस्थे तिष्ठता पाण्डवेन। सर्वान् योधान् वारितानर्जुनेन तदा नाशंसे विजयाय संजय॥
target: I had no hope of success, O Sanjaya, when I heard that Arjuna had kept back all is assailants when his horses were taken away for drink.

source: इन्द्र उवाच जानन् यो गामपहरेद् विक्रीयाच्चार्थकारणात्। एतद् विज्ञातुमिच्छामि क्व नु तस्य गतिर्भवेत्॥
target: Indra said I desire to know. O Grandfather, what the end is of his who consciously steals a cow or who sells one from motives of cupidity.

source: इमामपि विशालाक्षीं रक्षितां स्वेन तेजसा। रावणो नातिवर्तेत वेलामिव महोदधिः॥
target: As the ocean cannot go beyond its banks so Răvaņa could not approach her having expansive eyes protected by virtue of her own chastity.

source: भक्तानुकम्पी कान्तश्च प्रियश्च स्थिरसंगरः। प्रार्थनीयैर्गुणगणैर्महेन्द्रवरुणोपमः॥
target: Who is kind to those devoted to him, who is pleasing and dear to all, who is firm in promise, who is like Mahendra and Varuna in every desirable attribute.

source: कर्ण उवाच योजितावर्थमानाभ्यां सर्वकार्येष्वनन्तरौ। न मन्त्रयेतां त्वच्छ्रेयः किमद्भुततरं ततः॥
target: Karna said : These two (Bhishma and Drona) are supported by your wealth and favours. They are supposed to be your best friends. What can be more surprising than they should give you advice that is not for your good!

source: एतज्ज्ञावा जोषमास्स्व प्रतीपं मा स्म वै कृथाः। मा त्वां पूर्वमहं हत्वा हनिष्ये केशवार्जुनौ॥
target: Knowing this, be silent. do not try to contradict me. Do not make me kill Keshava and Arjuna after having killed you first.

source: अजय्याश्च रणे पार्था देवैरपि सवासवैः॥ सदैत्ययक्षगनधर्वैः पिशाचोरगराक्षसैः।
target: The sons of Pritha are unconquerable in battle by the celestials together with Vasava (at their head), by the Yakshas, the Daityas and the Gandharvas (all) united together and by the Pishachas, the Urages and the Rakshasas.

source: लोहिताक्षो महाबाहुरूर्ध्वकेशो महाननः। मेघसंघातवर्मा च तीक्ष्णदंष्ट्रो भयानकः॥
target: (He was) of red eyed and strong arms, of standing hair and large mouth, of colour like clouds, of sharp teeth and fearful appearance.

source: वासुदेव उवाच एवमुक्ते तु गान्धार्या धृतराष्ट्रो जनेश्वरः। दुर्योधनमुवाचेदं राजमध्ये जनाधिप॥
target: Vasudeva said Words like these having been spoken by Gandhari that lord of men, Dhritarashtra in the midst of the kings, O lord of men.

source: संकल्पप्रभवान् कामांस्त्यक्त्वा सर्वानशेषतः। मनसैवेन्द्रियग्रामं विनियम्य समन्ततः॥
target: Abandoning without exception all desires, that produced from resolves, and restraining by mind only the entire group of the senses.

source: अस्मदीया च लङ्केयं नगरी राक्षसोषिता। निवेशिता तव भ्रात्रा धनाध्यक्षेण धीमता॥
target: This Lankā was our city, inhabited by Rākşasas. (Now) it is inhabited by the brotherthe intelligent lord of riches.

source: नाराचनिहतास्त्वन्ये तथा विद्धाश्च तोमरैः। विनदन्तोऽभ्यधावन्त विशृंगा इव पर्वताः॥
target: Others, slain with lances and pierced with Tomaras, with their riders killed, looked like mountains deprived of their crests.

source: निशम्य तल्लक्ष्मणमातृवाक्यं रामस्य मातुर्नरदेवपत्न्याः। सद्यः शरीरे विननाश शोक: शरद्गतो मेघ इवाल्पतोयः॥
target: Hearing those words of Laksmana's mother, the wife of the best of men, Rāma's mother, had her sorrow destroyed in her person, even like and autumnal cloud surcharged with slight rain.

source: स राजा रतिसक्तत्वादुत्तमस्त्रीगुणैर्हतः। संवत्सरानृतून् मासान् बुबुधे न बहून् गतान्॥
target: The king was so much sunk in the beauty of his wife, that months, seasons and years rolled away without his being conscious of them.

source: स गदामुद्यतां दृष्ट्वा ज्वलन्तीमशनीमिव। अपाक्रामद् रथोपस्थाद् विक्रमांस्त्रीन् नरर्षभः॥
target: Then, O foremost of kings, Ashvatthaman, beholding that upraised mace resemble the blazing bolt of heaven, leapt off three steps from the terrace of his car.

source: तत्किमेवं परिक्लिश्य लोकं मोहनिराकृतम्। जित एव त्वया सौम्य मर्त्यलोको न संशयः॥
target: What then is the use of affecting a race that is brought down ever by its own infatuation. O placid one, this world is verily conquered by you, there is no doubt.

source: बाहुक उवाच एको ललाटे द्वौ मूर्ध्नि द्वौ द्वौ पार्थोपपार्श्वयोः। द्वौ द्वौ वक्षसि विज्ञेयौ प्रयाणे चैक एव तु॥ एते हया गमिष्यन्ति विदर्भान् नात्र संशयः॥ यानन्यान् मन्यसे राजन् ब्रूहि तान् योजयामि ते॥
target: Bahuka said: These horses, respectively bearing one curl on the forehead, two on the temples, four on the sides, four on the breast and one on the back, will, without doubt, reach the country of the Vidharbhas. But, O monarch, should you like others, tell me and I will yoke them for you.

source: यश्चेदं शृणुयान्नित्यं यश्चैनं परिकीर्तयेत्। नमो भगवते कृत्वा समाहितमतिर्नरः॥ भवत्यरोगो मतिमान् बलरूपसमन्वितः। आतुरो मुच्यते रोगाद् बद्धो मुच्येत बन्धनात्॥ कामान् कामी लभेत् कामं दीर्घ चायुरवाप्नुयात्।
target: He, who, having uttered the words-'I bow to the holy Lord',-frequently listens, with rapt attention, to this discourse or reads or recites it to others, becomes gifted with intelligence and health, and possessed of beauty and strength If ill, he becomes freed from that illness; if fettered, freed from his bonds. The man who has desires gets (by this) the fruition of all his desires, and easily acquires a long life also.

source: ततः प्रववृते युद्धं पृथिव्यामेकवीरयोः। रणमध्ये द्वयोरेवं सुमहल्लोमहर्षणम्॥
target: Then there took place a great hair-stirring encounter between those two heroes peerless on earth.

source: यस्मात् तु बहु रूक्षं च श्रावितस्ते वृकोदरः। परोक्षं यच सौभद्रो युष्माभिनिहतो मम॥
target: As you have indulged in many harsh words against Vrikodara and as you have jointly with others, killed the son of Subhadra, when I was not present.

source: सोऽहमेत्य कुरुश्रेष्ठ द्वारकां पाण्डुनन्दन। अश्रौषं त्वां व्यसनिनं युयुधानाद् यथातथम्॥
target: Having reached Dvarka, O foremost of Kurus. O son of Pandu, I heard all about your misfortune from Yuyudhana.

source: धृतराष्ट्र उवाच दुर्योधन ममाप्येतद्धदि सम्परिवर्तते। अभिप्रायस्य पापत्वान्नैवं तु विवृणोम्यहम्॥
target: Dhritarashtra said : O Duryodhana, this is the very thought that exists in my mind, but from its sinfulness, I could not give it out.

source: न तस्याः सदृशं कंचित् त्रिषु लोकेषु भारत। भर्तारं सविता मेने रूपशीलगुणश्रुतैः॥
target: O descendant of Bharata, seeing her, Vivasvata thought, there was none who had beauty, accomplishments,, good behaviour and learning to be fit for her husband.

source: तव पित्रा समाज्ञप्तं ममेदं शृणु राघव॥ भरताय प्रदातव्यमिदं राज्यमकण्टकम्। त्वया तु खलु वस्तव्यं नव वर्षाणि पञ्च च॥ वने प्रव्रज काकुत्स्थ पितरं मोचयानृतात्।
target: Do you hear, O Rāghava, how I have been ordered by your Sire. This kingdom, rid of thorns is to be conferred of Bharata, and you shall have to sojourn into woods for years nine and five. Do you therefore repair to forest, O Kākutstha and save your Sire from untruth.

source: संजय उवाच तस्मिन् प्रशान्ते विधिना तेन तेजसि दुःसहे। बभूवुर्विमलाः सर्वा दिशः प्रदिश एव च॥
target: Sanjaya said When the unbearable energy of that weapon was pacified by this means, all the quarters, subsidiary and cardinal, became clear.

source: असंख्येया गुणाः पार्थे तद्विशिष्टो जनार्दनः। त्वमेव भूयो जानासि कुन्तीपुत्र धनंजयम्॥
target: Innumerable are the virtues of the son of Pritha; Janardana excels him however. You know very well Dhananjaya the son of Kunti.

source: हा स्वप्नः सत्यमेवेदं त्वं रामेण कथं हतः॥ त्वं मृत्योरपि मृत्युः स्याः कथं मृत्युवशं गतः।
target: That you wouldst be slain by Rāma was like a dream, but it has proved true! You were like death to Death himself, why have you been possessed by him then?

source: परस्परं सुसूक्ष्मेषु शोकेष्वाश्वासयंस्तदा। ताः शोकविह्वला राजन्नवैक्षन्त परस्परम्॥
target: Formerly they used to console each other while stricken with even slightest grief, Stupefied by grief, they, O king, could not look upon each other.

source: पश्य कृष्ण महाबाहो संशप्तकगणान् बहून्। कुर्वाणान् दारुणं कर्म वध्यमानान् सहस्रशः॥
target: “Behold, O Krishna, O you of long arms, those numberless Samsaptakas, bent upon a dreadful feat, are killed by thousands.

source: विशोकस्तमुवाचेदं धृष्टद्युम्नं कृताञ्जलिः। संस्थाप्य मामिह बली पाण्डवेयः पराक्रमी॥
target: Thereupon, folding his palm, Vishoka thus replied to Dhrishtadyumna saving: Leaving me here, the mighty son of Pandu (Bhima), possessed of great strength.

source: सहदेवस्तु माद्रेयः शूरः संक्रन्दनो युधि। स्वमंशं कल्पयामास श्यालं ते सुबलात्मजम्॥
target: The son of Madri, the hero Sahadeva, who makes loud roars in battle, has accepted as his own share your brother the son of Subala.

source: भैक्ष्येणान्नं समाहृत्य विप्रो वेदपुरस्कृतः। स्वाध्यायनिरते विप्रे दत्त्वेह सुखमेधते॥
target: A Brahmana knowing the Vedas, by giving away food acquired by him as alms, to a Brahmana devoted to the study of the Vedas, succeeds in acquiring happiness here.

source: अद्य तं पापकर्माणं क्षुद्रं विश्वासघातिनम्। शिशुपालवधामर्षाद् गमयिष्ये यमक्षयम्॥ मम पापस्वभावेन भ्राता येन निपातितः। शिशुपालो महीपालस्तं वधिष्ये महीपते॥
target: “Being enraged at the destruction of Shishupala, I shall dispatch today to the abode of Yama that mean and treacherous wight of vicious deeds. Oh king of the earth, “I shall slay him, vicious character as he is by whom, my brother, the great king Shishupala, was killed.

source: धनुर्मण्डलनिर्मुक्तैः शरैराशीविषोपमैः॥ सच्छत्रध्वजयन्तारं साश्वमाशु स्मयन्निव।
target: Then with arrows, shot from his bow drawn to a circle and resembling snakes of virulent poison in touch, Abhimanyu quickly cut-off Karna's umbrella, standard, horses and charioteer, smiling all the while.

source: ततस्तं बुबुधे देवः शक्रो बलनिषूदनः। ते च राजर्षयः सर्वे धिग्धिगित्येवमब्रुवन्॥
target: Then did the god Shakra, the slayer of Vala, perceived his folly and all those royal Rishis said-fie, fie.

source: ॥ विप्रविद्धकुथा नागाश्छिन्नभाण्डाः परासवः। सारोहास्तु रणे पेतुर्मथिता मार्गणैर्भृशम्॥
target: Greatly afflicted with the shafts of Partha, steeds with riders on their backs, fell down dead on the ground, with their caparisons and reins severed and their Bandha rent.

source: अधर्मसंश्रितो धर्मो विनाशयति राघव। सर्वमेतद्यथाकर्म काकुत्स्थ कुरुते नरः॥
target: O Rāghava, virtue aided by prowess, destroy enemies. Therefore, O Kakutstha, people, for compassing their ends, resort to both virtue and prowess.

source: परापरज्ञो भूतानां विधिज्ञः सर्वकर्मणाम्। सर्वभूतात्मभूतात्मा गच्छत्यात्मानमव्ययम्॥
target: One who knows which is superior and inferior among existent creatures, who is conversant with the ordinances about all deeds. and who forms himself the soul of all creatures, attains to the Unfading Soul.

source: नील किं बहुभिर्दग्धैःस्तव योधैः शरार्चिषा। मयैकेन हि युध्यस्व क्रुद्धः प्रहर चाशु माम्॥
target: What do you gain, O Nila, by consuming with your arrowy flame so many of my common soldiers? Fight with me single-handed as I am; and waxing worth, do you strike ma as you can.

source: अम्बा तमब्रवीद् राजन्ननङ्गशरपीडिता। नैवं वद महीपाल नैतदेवं कथंचन॥
target: Amba, being struck with the darts of love, said to that king:-“Do not speak thus, O ruler of the earth, it can not be so by any means.

source: लोकवीरौ महेष्वासौ त्यक्तात्मानौ च भारत। प्रत्ययं परिरक्षन्तौ महत् कर्म करिष्यतः॥
target: The two heroes among men, the mighty bowmen, disregarding their lives, O Bharata, will perform great deeds making good the trust.

source: एकसार्थप्रयातौ स्वस्त्वया सह नरर्षभ। समदुःखसुखौ चापि नावां शङ्कितुमर्हसि॥
target: We are determined to accompany you tomorrow, O foremost of men! We sympathies with you in weal and woe. You should not mistrust us.'

source: वेदाध्ययनसम्पन्नाः सर्वे युद्धाभिनन्दिनः। आशंसन्तो जयं युद्धे बलेनामिमुखा रणे॥
target: Learned in the Vedas, they all took great delight in battle. Being eager to secure success in the battle, they with their soldiers advanced to the fight.

source: सम्प्रक्षालनकालोऽयं लोकानां समुपस्थितः। तस्मात् त्वां बोधयाम्यद्य यत् ते हितमनुत्तमम्॥
target: The proper time for purging off this earth is almost come; therefore I tell you what will be good for you.

source: तत् तथा पीडितं तेन माधवेन यशस्विना। प्रदुद्राव भयाद् रक्षस्त्यक्त्वा सात्यकिमाहवे॥
target: Thus afflicted sore by that high souled scion of Madhu's race, the Rakshasa fled out of fear, leaving Satyaki (victorious) on the field.

source: उष्णीषवान् यथा वस्त्रैस्त्रिभिर्भवति संवृतः। संवृतोऽयं तथा देही सत्त्वराजसतामसैः॥
target: A person putting on a turban has his head circled with three folds of a piece of cloth. Similarly the embodied Soul is invested with the three qualities of Goodness, and Ignorance. But though thus invested, the Soul is not identical with those qualities.

source: इति लोके निर्वचनं पुरश्चरति भारत। अपि चैताः स्त्रियो बाला: स्वाध्यायमधिकुर्वते॥
target: Thus talk the people among one another. O descendant of Bharata, even women and children are repeating it, as if it were a lesson they wanted to commit to memory.

source: न चाहमुत्सहे कृष्णमृते लोकमुदीक्षितुम्। ततोऽहमनुवामि केशवस्य चिकीर्षितम्॥
target: I do not dare to look on this world separated from Krishna and therefore shall I remain inactive in what Krishna wishes.

source: तौ दृष्ट्वा मातुलस्तत्र विरथौ परवीरहा। अभ्यभाषत राधेयं मद्रराजोऽनुकम्पया॥
target: Seeing them deprived of their cars, their maternal uncle, the king of Madra and slayer of inimical heroes, out of compassion said to Karna.

source: असुरसुरमनुष्या: पक्षिणो वोरगा वा पितृजनिचरा वा ब्रह्मदेवर्षयो वा। चरमचरमपीदं यत्परं चापि तस्मात् तदपि ममरिपुं तं रक्षितुं नैव शक्ताः॥
target: Asuras and the celestials, mortals, winged creatures, reptiles or ancestral manes, rangers of the night, Brahmanical or celestials sages, the mobile and immobile things and beings and what other things there may be on the face of the earth, even all these will not be able to protect that foe of mine.

source: अनित्याः खलु मर्त्यानां गतयो भरतर्षभ। कुन्ती राजसुता यत्र वसत्यसुखिता वने॥
target: Forsooth, O chief of Bharata's race, the ends of men are exceedingly uncertain, since Kunti, who is a princess by birth, is now living in misery in the forest.'

source: कीट उवाच सर्वत्र निरतो जीव इतश्चापि सुखं मम। चिन्तयामि महाप्राज्ञ तस्मादिच्छामि जीवितुम्॥
target: The Worm said A living creature however circumstanced he may be becomes attached to it. In even this order of being I am happy, I think, O you of great wisdom! It is for this that I wish to live.

source: अथ सोमपदं गच्छेद् ब्रह्मचारी समाहितः। माहेश्वरपदे स्नात्वा वाजिमेधफलं लभेत्॥
target: Then one should go with concentrated mind and with Brahmacharya life to Somapada. Bathing in Maheshvara pada, one obtains the fruits of Ashvamedha sacrifice.

source: मुष्टियुद्धं महचासीद् योधानां तत्र भारत॥ तथा केशग्रहश्चोगो बाहुयुद्धं च भैरवम्।
target: Thus, O descendant of the Bharata race, the inost dreadful encounters between heroes took place there, some striking one another with their fists, and some also fiercely seizing one another with their hairs; and some, again, wrestling with another with their arms most fearfully.

source: शोणितं यावत: पांसून् संगृह्णीयाद् द्विजक्षतात्॥ तावती: स समा राजन् नरके प्रतिपद्यते।
target: If a man wounds a Brahmana with a weapon, he will have to live in hell for as many years as the grains of dust that are soaked by the blood flowing from the body of the wounded.

source: हताश्वे तु रथे तिष्ठन् पुत्रस्तव विशाम्पते। मुमोच निशितान् बाणाशैनेयस्य रथं प्रति॥
target: O ruler of men, remaining in that steedless car, your son began to discharge sharp arrows towards the car of Shini's grandson.

source: तव प्रसादादस्माभिः समित्रैः सह बान्धवैः॥ अवाप्ताः क्रतवो मुख्या बहवो भूरिदक्षिणाः।
target: Through your grace, ourselves with our friends and relatives have celebrated many leading sacrifices with profuse presents to Brahmanas.

source: यस्मिस्तु देवाः समये संतिष्ठेरंस्तथा भवेत्। अथवा लाभसमये स्थितिधर्मेऽपि शोभना॥
target: One should walk along that road by proceeding along which he may hope to meet with the gods; or, at such times when wealth is acquired, the duties of sacrifice and gift are highly spoken of.

source: कच्चिच्च निहतामित्रः प्रीणासि सुहृदो नृप। कच्चिच्छ्रियमिमां प्राप्य न त्वां शोकः प्रबाधते॥
target: Having killed all you foes, will you not please your friends, O King? Having secured this prosperity, I hope, you have nothing to be sorry of now.'."

source: इष्टयां तु वर्तमानायां कुशनाभं महीपतिम्। उवाच परमोदारैः कुशो ब्रह्मसुतस्तदा॥
target: And when the sacrifice had commenced, that son of Brahmā, the exceedingly noble Kusa, spoke to king Kusanābha, saying,

source: त्रिषु लोकेषु रत्नानि भुङ्क्ते आहृत्य रावणः। विक्रमे च बले चैव नास्त्यस्य सदृशो भुवि॥
target: Procuring gems from the three worlds, Răvana enjoy them. Neither in strength nor in prowess is there and one on earth who is his compeer.

source: भीष्म उवाच यथान्यायं त्वया तात प्रश्नः पृष्टः सुसंकटः। बुधानामपि सम्मोहः प्रश्नेऽस्मिन् भरतर्षभ॥
target: Bhishma said “However difficult it may be to answer it, the question which you have asked, O son, is proper. Verily, the question is of such a nature that even the highly learned men become stupefied in answering it, O chief of Bharata's racc.
