target: I shall now describe the characteristic marks of those persons who value self-control highly. They are nobility, calmness of nature, contentment, faith, forgiveness, invariable simplicity, the absence of talk-activeness, humility, reverence for elders, benevolence, mercy for all creatures, frankness, abstention from talk upon kings and men in authority, from all false and useless topics, and from applause and censure of others. The selfcontrolled man becomes desirous of liberation and, quietly bearing present joys and griefs, is never overjoyed or depressed by prospective (Ones.

source: बालेन्दुमुकुटं पाण्डु शरच्चन्द्रमिवोदितम्। त्रिभिर्नेत्रैः कृतोद्योतं त्रिभिः सूर्यरिवोदितैः॥
target: A crescent moon, of pale colour, formed his crown, and put on his forehead it looked like the moon which rises in the autumnal sky. He seemed to dazzle with splendour on account of his three cyes which looked like three suns.

source: युधिष्ठिर उवाच महानयं धर्मपथो बहुशाखश्च भारत। किंस्विदेवेह धर्माणामनुष्ठेयतमं मतम्॥
target: Yudhishthira said The path of duty in long. It has also, O Bharata, many branches. What are those duties which you hold to be the best to practise.

source: याच्यमानेन सततं तव पुत्रेण भारत। घातिता पृथिवी सर्वा वैरस्यान्तं विधित्सता॥
target: Your son, O king, who had constantly been requested (for peace) but who always desired to terminate his hostility after killing the Pandavas has caused the Earth exterminated.

source: ततो द्रुतं चैकशरेण पार्थ शितेन विद्ध्वा युधि कर्णपुत्रः॥
target: The great warrior Vrishasena, son of Karna injured the son of Kunti in battle-field with sharp blow from an arrow and began challenging with loud voice.

source: धन्विनौ तौ सुखं गत्वा लम्बमाने दिवाकरे। गङ्गायमुनयोः संधौ प्रापतुर्निलयं मुनेः॥
target: Thus having proceeded at ease, you bowmen when the sun stood aslant, arrived in the vicinity of the ascetic's residence on the delta of the Yamunā and the Gangā.

source: चेदिपो वसुदानश्च दशार्णाधिपतिस्तथा। सुप्रतीकेन तांश्चापि भगदत्तोऽप्युपाद्रवत्॥
target: Vasudeva, the ruler of the Chedis, the ruler of the Dasharnas, all these warriors assaulted Bhagadatta. Bhagadatta also mounted on his elephant Supratika, charged these heroes.

source: ततोऽब्रवीद्धनाध्यक्षः शरण्यः शरणागतम्। मानहा भव शत्रूणां सुहृदां नन्दिवर्धनः॥
target: Thereupon seeing him crave his protection, the lord of wealth, capable of affording protection, said "be you the destroyer of the pride of (your) enemies and enhancer of the joy of (your) friends.

source: पूर्व भगवता प्रोक्तं कृष्णयोर्विजयो ध्रुवः॥ तत् तथास्तु नमस्तेऽस्तु प्रसीद भगवन् मम।
target: O sacred one, you have said before that the two Krishnas are sure to gain victory, he then pleased and let that be the case now.

source: क्षरो भवत्येष यदा तदा गुणवतीमथ। प्रकृति त्वभिजानाति निर्गुणत्वं तथाऽऽत्मनः॥
target: We he becomes destructible he then assurnes attributes. When, however, he gains his own real nature, he then succeeds in understanding his own condition of being really shorn of qualities.

source: बक उवाच अप्रियैः सह संवासः प्रियैश्चापि विनाभवः। असद्भिः सम्प्रयोगाश्च तद् दुःखं चिरजीविनाम्॥
target: Baka said : To live with persons who are disagreeable, to be separated with persons that are agreeable and beloved, to associate with the wicked, these are the evils which they that are immortal have to bear.

source: देवानामिव ते सर्वं वाचि बुद्धं न संशयः। स दीन इव दुर्धर्ष कस्माच्छोचसि पुत्रकः॥
target: All these certainly wait your command as do they in the case of the celestials. () invincible hero, O son, why do you grieve (then) like a destitute person?

source: उभौ मे दक्षिणौ पाणी गाण्डीवस्य विकर्षणे। तेन देवमनुष्येषु सव्यसाचीति मां विदुः॥
target: Both of my hands are capable of drawing Gandiva: hence they know me as Savyasachi amongst men and celestials.

source: युधिष्ठिर उवाच भीष्मे द्रोणे कृपे कर्णे द्रोणपुत्रे च भारत। धनुर्वेदश्चतुष्पाद एतेष्वद्य प्रतिष्ठितः॥
target: Yudhishthira said: O descendant of Bharata, the four divisions of the science of arms always dwell in Bhishma, Drona, Kripa, Karna and the son of Drona (Ashvathama).

source: विद्वतां वाहिनीं दृष्ट्वा स ददर्श नरान्तकम्। गृहीतप्रासमायान्तं हयपृष्ठप्रतिष्ठितम् ॥
target: After seeing the army in flight, he saw Narāntaka himself, advancing, wielding a prasa, and mounted on a steed.

source: अपुत्रया मया राजन् सपत्नीनां भयादिदम्। कन्या शिखण्डिनी जाता पुरुषो वै निवेदिता॥
target: Childless as I was, O great king, and from fear of my companion, wives, my daughter Shikhandin, when born, was represented to you as a son,

source: द्रौणिस्तु रभसः शूरस्गर्तादनु भारत। प्रययौ सिंहनादेन नादयानो धरातलम्॥
target: After Trigarta, O Bharata, the valiant son of Drona rushed to battle, resounding the earth with his war-cries.

source: सहस्रमश्वाश्चैकैकं गजाना पृष्ठतोऽन्वयुः। अश्वे अश्वे शतं गावो गवां पश्चादजाविकम्॥
target: A thousand horses followed each king and after each horse, came a hundred cows and after the cows came sheep and deer, countless in number.

source: संन्यस्याग्नीनुदासीनाः पश्यन्ति विगतज्वराः। नैःश्रेयसं कर्मपथं समारुह्य यथाक्रमम्॥ प्रश्रिता विनयोपेता दमनित्याः सुसंशिताः। प्रयान्ति स्थानमजरं सर्वकर्मविवर्जिताः॥
target: Those who, keeping aside their domestic fires, have freed themselves from all worldly attachments, become freed from all anxieties. Gradually getting up step by step, in the path of Yoga, they at last see the stage of highest happiness. Gifted with faith and humility, always practising self-control, possessed of keen intelligence, and abstaining from all acts, they acquire eternal happiness.

source: न चात्मा शक्यते द्रष्टुमिन्द्रियैश्च विभागशः। तत्र तत्र विसृष्टैश्च दुर्वायैश्चाकृतात्मभिः॥
target: He who knows this, is really wise. What other mark is there of a wise man? Acquiring this knowledge, intelligent men considered themselves to be crowned with success.

source: आत्मप्रदानं दुधर्ष तव कृत्वा सती त्वहम्। त्वयि धर्मो यशश्चैव कीर्तिरायुश्च देहिनाम्॥
target: As O irrepressible one, the virtue, the reputation, the renown and the life of all embodied beings are established in you, may I remain chaste after having yielded my person to you.

source: भवनं च महेन्द्रस्य कुबेरस्य च धीमतः। वरुणस्य तथा लोकान् विविशुः पुरुषर्षभाः॥
target: Those foremost of men have gone, some to the abode of Indra, some to that of highly intelligent Kubera of great intelligence, and some to that of Varuna.

source: धारयामास चात्मानं धरणासु यथाक्रमम्। तस्योर्ध्वमगमन् प्राणाः संनिरुद्धा महात्मनः॥
target: He then held forth his lifebreaths successively in those parts of his body which are indicated in Yoga. The vital airs of that great one, restrained duly, then rose up.

source: दैवोपभोग्यं दिव्यं त्वामाकाशे स्फाटिकं महत्। आकाशगं त्वां महत्तं विमानमुपपत्स्यते॥
target: I shall give you an excellent and great crystal car, which the celestials alone possess and which is capable of carrying you through the sky.

source: अखिल भारतं चेदं चकार भगवान् मुनिः॥ आकर्य भक्त्या सततं जयाख्यं भारतं महत्।
target: It should be read by Brahmanas, by kings, and by women big with children. He who desires Heaven attains to Heaven; and he who desires victory achieves it.

source: अथ चित्तं समाधातुं न शक्नोषि मयि स्थिरम्। अभ्यासयोगेन ततो मामिच्छाप्तुं धनंजय॥
target: If, however, O Dhananjaya, you are unable thus to fix your mind on Me, then, try to obtain Me by devotion arising from continued application.

source: आर्जवं धर्ममित्याहुरधर्मो जिह्म उच्यते। आर्जवेनेह संयुक्तो नरो धर्मेण युज्यते॥
target: Sincerity, it has been said, is Virtue; while insincerity or crookedness is sin. That man who acts sincerely becomes indeed with Virtue.

source: तमकूजमभिज्ञाय जनौघं सर्वशस्तदा। पूजयित्वा यथान्यायं पायेनार्येण च प्रभो॥ भीष्मो राज्यं च राष्ट्रं च महर्षिभ्यो न्यवेदयत्। तेषामथो वृद्धतमः प्रत्युत्थाय जटाजिनी। ऋषीणां मतमाज्ञाय महर्षिरिदमब्रवीत्॥
target: O lord, Bhishma, seeing that vast crowd perfectly still, duly worshipped those ascetics by offering them water to wash their feet and the customary Arghya. And with the concurrence of other great Rishis, he spoke thus-

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच निदाघान्तकरः कालः सर्वभूतसुखावहः। तत्रैव वसतां तेषां प्रावृट् समभिपद्यत॥

source: तद् भार्गवाय प्रायच्छच्छकः परमसम्मतम्। तद् दिव्य भार्गवो मह्यमददद् धनुरुत्तमम्॥

target: Then going to Vena one should offer oblations to the Pitris and the celestials. (By doing this) a man obtains a car drawn by peacocks and cranes.

source: ब्रह्म वक्त्रं भुजौ क्षत्रं कृत्स्नमूरूदरं विशः। पादौ यस्याश्रिताः शूद्रास्तस्मै वर्णात्मने नमः॥
target: Brahmanas are your mouth, Kshatriyas are your two arms., Vaishyas are your stomach and thighs, and Shudras are your feet. Salutations to you in your form of caste.

source: श्रुतवानस्मि ते वाक्यं यथा वदसि गालव। विधिस्तु बलवान् ब्रह्मन् प्रवणं हि मनो मम॥
target: “I have heard what you say and know what you intend to say, O Galava; but O Brahman, the lord has all the power in such matters for my heart inclines to do what you say.

source: अभिवाद्य तु गोविन्दः सात्यकिस्ते च पार्थिवाः। व्यासादीनृषिमुख्यांश्च गाङ्गेयमुपतस्थिरे॥
target: Saluting those foremost of Rishis headed by Vyasa, Govinda and Satyaki and the others came to the son of Ganga.

source: तदा विद्यान्मनोग्लानिमाशु शान्तिकरो भवेत्। अस्माकं सहजं मित्रं पाण्डवाः शुद्धपौरुषाः॥
target: When misfortunes befall one's own self or one's friends, it is a sign that one's fall is near, and, therefore, one should at such times seek for the remedy.

source: राजोवाच जलमेतन्निपतितं मम पाणौ द्विजोत्तम। सममस्तु सहैवास्तु प्रतिगृह्णातु वै भवान्॥
target: The king said-These drops of water, see, O foremost of Brahmanas, have fallen upon my hand. I also wish to give you. Accept my gift. Let us both stand equal.

source: भवेत् सत्यं न वक्तव्यं वक्तव्यमनृतं भवेत्। यत्रानृतं भवेत् सत्यं सत्यं वाप्यनृतं भवेत्॥
target: There, where falsehood prevails as truth, truth should not be said. There, again, where truth passes for falsehood, even falsehood should be said.

source: अनुजां वासुदेवस्य सुभद्रां भद्रभाषिणीम्। सा शचीव महेन्द्रेण श्रीः कृष्णेनेव संगता॥
target: And sweet-speeched younger sister of Krishna, named Subhadra. Like Sachi with the great Indra and like Lakshmi with Krishna,

source: कथं ह्यविजितां कृष्णां मन्यसे धृतराष्ट्रज। यदा सभायां सर्वस्वं न्यस्तवान् पाण्डवाग्रजः॥
target: o son of Dhritarashtra, how do you consider that Krishna (Draupadi) is not won, when the eldest of the Pandavas have staked all his possessions in this assembly?

source: कीर्यमाणे तदा द्रोणे शरैर्गाण्डीवधन्वना। हाहाकारो महानासीत् सैन्यानां भरतर्षभ॥
target: O foremost of Bharatas, beholding Drona entirely enveloped with shafts shot by the holder of the Gandiva bow, the army set a mighty lamentation.

source: जगाम हास्तिनपुरं कृपः शारद्वतस्तदा। स्वमेव राष्ट्रं हार्दिक्यो द्रौणिर्व्यासाश्रमं ययौ॥
target: Sharadvat's Kripa went to Hastinapura; Hridika's son went to his own kingdom; while the son of Drona started for the hermitage of Vyasa.

source: स चाप्रतिमगाम्भीर्यो देवदानवदर्पहा॥ ब्रह्मशापाभिभूतस्तु कुम्भकर्णो विबोध्यताम्।
target: Do you wake up that destroyer of the pride of the deities and then Danavas-Kumbhakarma, endowed with unparalleled gravity, overwhelmed with the curse of Brahmā.

source: तदा सूतो महाराज कृताञ्जलिरुपस्थितः। राममेवानुशोचन्तं दुःखशोकसमन्वितम्॥ वृद्धं परमसंतप्तं नवग्रहमिव द्विपम्। विनिःश्वसन्तं ध्यायन्तमस्वस्थमिव कुञ्जरम्॥ राजा तु रजसा सूतं ध्वस्ताङ्ग समुपस्थितम्। अश्रुपूर्णमुखं दीनमुवाच परमार्तवत्॥
target: Thereupon the charioteer with joined hands spoke to the mighty monarch, lamenting for Rāma, influenced by grief and sorrow, aged, burning in grief, like a newly-taken elephant, sighing heavily, plunged in thought, and resembling an elephant that is indisposed. Then the king like one exceedingly distressed, spoke to the charioteer, who had presented himself, covered over with dust, with tears starting from his eyes, and in pitiable guise.

source: पुत्रशोकाभिसंतप्तः सोमदत्तो जनार्दन। युयुधानं महेष्वासं गर्हयन्निव दृश्यते॥

source: सूतस्त्वधिरथः पुत्रं विवृद्धं समयेन तम्। दृष्ट्वा प्रस्थापयामास पुरं वारणसाह्वयम्॥
target: When the charioteer saw that his son in course of time had grown up, he sent him to the city of Hastina.

source: रथे यश्च गजेभ्यश्च हयेभ्यश्च नराधिपाः। पतिताः पात्यमानाश्च दृश्यन्तेऽर्जुनसायकैः॥
target: Kings were seen falling from their cars; elephants and horses were also seen to fall cut down by Arjuna's arrows.

source: बलस्य यदि चेद्धर्मो गुणभूतः पराक्रमैः। धर्ममुत्सृज्य वर्तस्व यथा धर्मे तथा बले॥
target: If virtue is a property of manliness, then carefully forsaking virtue, do you follow strength as you have hitherto followed virtue.

source: दिव्यं वर्षसहस्रं ते तपस्तप्त्वा सुदारुणम्। शुश्रुवुर्मधुरां वाणी वेदवेदाङ्गभूषिताम्॥
target: For a thousand divine years they were engaged in those severe penances. At the conclusion of that time they heard these sweet words in harmony with the Vedas and their branches.

source: योऽहमज्ञानसम्मोहादज्ञया सम्प्रवृत्तवान्। ससङ्गयाहं नि:सङ्गः स्थितः कालमिमं त्वहम्॥
target: Through Ignorance and stupefaction, I have becoine associated with Inanimate Nature. Though really shorn of attachments, I have passed this long time in a state of attachment with Nature.

source: ततोऽर्जुनं तदा मूर्ध्नि समाघ्राय पुनः पुनः। प्रीतिपूर्वं परिष्वज्य प्ररुरोद मुदा तदा॥
target: Drona then cheerfully clasped Arjuna to his bosom and repeatedly took the scent of his head and shed tears of joy.

source: भीमसेनः खलु कैकेयीमुपयेमे कुमारी नाम। तस्यामस्य जज्ञे प्रतिश्रवा नाम॥
target: Bhimasena married Kumari, the princess of Kekaya and she gave birth to a son, named Pratishrava.

source: विषाणगात्राफरयोधपातिना गजेन हन्तुं शकुनि कुलिन्दजः। जगाम् वेगेन भृशार्दयंश्च तं ततोऽस्य गान्धारपतिः शिरोऽहरत्॥
target: The second son of Kulinda attacked on Shakuni by the elephant capable to knock down the great warriors through his teeth, body and trunk and severally injured him. Shakuni, the king of Gandharva then beaded him.

source: ततो निषादाधिपतिं दृष्ट्वा दूरादुपस्थितम्। सह सौमित्रिणा रामः समागच्छद्गुहेन सः॥
target: Seeing the lord of the Nişādhas at a distance, Rāma came up to him in company with Sumitra's son.

source: सागरे सेतुबन्धं तं न श्रद्दध्यां कथंचन। अवश्यं चापि संख्येयं तन्मया वानरं बलम्॥
target: The construction of a bridge over the ocean cannot at all command credence. But (however it be), I must enumerate the monkey-hosts.

source: एषा ह्यस्य परा प्रीतिर्हदि सम्परिवर्तते। कदा नाम सुतं द्रक्ष्याम्यभिषिक्तमहं प्रियम्॥ वृद्धिकामो हि लोकस्य सर्वभूतानुकम्पकः। मत्तः प्रियतरो लोके पर्जन्य इव वृष्टिमान्॥
target: Surely he always wished for the prosperity of the people; and he showed kindness to all creatures. And like to the showering rain-cloud, he is dearer to the people than myself.

source: ततः सरथनागाश्वाः कुरवाः कुरुसत्तमम्। निर्भया भरतश्रेष्ठमभ्यवर्तन्त फाल्गुनम्॥
target: Then many Kauravas with their horses, elephants and cars boldly faced that foremnost man of Kuru and Bharata races viz. Phalguni.

source: सभां प्रपद्यते ह्यातः प्रज्वलन्निव हव्यवाट्। तं वै सत्येन धर्मेण सभ्याः प्रशमयन्त्युत॥
target: A person in distress comes to an assembly of good men like a man in a blazing fire. Those that are in the assembly extinguish that fire and cool him by means of truth and morality.

source: ततो युद्धमभूद् भूयो भारद्वाजस्य पाण्डवैः। द्रोणस्तव सुतै राजन् सर्वतः परिवारितः॥
target: Then again commenced a battle between the sons of Bharadvaja and the Pandavas. Drona, O king, completely surrounded by your sons.

source: ततः स्तुतिपुराणज्ञा रक्तकण्ठाः सुशिक्षिताः। अस्तुवन् विश्वकर्माणं वासुदेवं प्रजापतिम्॥
target: Then a number of well-trained and sweet voiced persons conversant with hymns and the Puranas, began to sing the praises of Vasudeva, the master of all creatures and the creator of the universe.

source: हंसादिभिः सुबहुभिर्विविधैः पक्षिभिर्वृताम्। गङ्गां गोकुलसम्बाधां दृष्ट्वा स्वर्गोऽपि विस्मृतः॥
target: Seeing her surface teeming with swans and various other aquatic fowl, and having banks adorned with pasture lands with kine grazing on them, the celestial region herself loses her pride.

source: स प्रविश्याश्रमपदमपविद्धबृसीमठम्। मार्कण्डेयादिभिर्विप्रैरनुकीर्णं ददर्श ह॥
target: Entering the hermitage he saw it covered with the seats for the ascetics, filled with their disciples and graced with the presence of Markandeya and other Brahmanas.

source: नारद उवाच आश्रमास्तात चत्वारो यथासंकल्पिताः पृथक्। तान् सर्वाननुपश्य त्वं समाश्रित्येति गालव॥
target: The modes of life four in number, O child! All of them serve the object for which they have been designed; and the duties they declare differ from one another. Learning them first from competent preceptor's, reflect upon them, OGalava.

source: ततः शरसहस्राणि कर्णमुक्तानि मारिष। व्ययोजयन्त पञ्चालन् प्राणैः प्राणभृतां वर॥ तत्र शब्दो महानासीत् पञ्चालानां महामते। वध्यतां सूतपुत्रेण मित्रार्थे मित्रगृद्धिना॥
target: Oye of noble mind and best of living beings, when Karna-the son of Suta and protector of his friends, thus desirous to serve his friends, sent thousands of shafts which killed many of the Panchalas, cries, loud from woe, rose among them.

source: सुग्रीवेणेव दीनेन दीनो भूत्वा महाबलः। समानशोकः काकुत्स्थः प्रेतकार्याण्यकारयत्॥
target: And the highly powerful Käkutstha, equally aggrieved like Sugriva, being as poorly, conducted duly the obsequious ceremonies of Vali.

source: कश्च लक्ष्मणमुक्तानां रामकोपानुवर्तिनाम्। शराणामग्रतः स्थातुं शक्तो देवासुरेष्वपि॥
target: Who is there even among celestials and Asuras that is competent to stay before the shafts shot by Lakşmaņa and Rāma in wrath?

source: ततस्ते सहिताः सर्वे तरखून् महिषान् मृगान्। गवयर्डवराहांश्च समन्तात् पर्यकालयन्॥ स ताञ्छरैर्विनिर्भिद्य गजांश्च सुबहून् वने। रमणीयेषु देशेषु ग्राहयामास वै मृगान्॥
target: Attended by all his followers, the king killed many bison's, buffaloes, deer gavayas, bear and boars. Pierced by his arrows animals by thousands died in that deep forest. He caused the deer to be caught in the most delightful parts of the forest.

source: यतो हि निम्नं भवति नयन्ति हि ततो जलम्। यतश्छिद्रं ततश्चापि नयन्ते धीवरा जलम्॥
target: The wise always conduct the water to place that are low. The fisherman take the water through the place where there are holes.

source: माता पिता गुरुर्गोप्ता वह्निर्वैश्रवणो यमः। सप्त राज्ञो गुणानेतान् मनुराह प्रजापतिः॥
target: The lord of all creatures, viz., Manu, has declared that the king has seven attributes : he is mother, father, preceptor, protector, fire, Vaishravana, and Yama.

source: अदोमूला सुराणां श्रीयंत्र शक्रोऽभ्यषिच्यत। सुरराज्येन विप्रर्षे देवैश्चात्र तपश्चितम्॥
target: Here is the source of the prosperity of the gods, where Shakra was appointed in the kingship of the immortals, where even the gods, O regenerate Rishi, practiced asceticism.

source: अनुरोधविरोधाभ्यां समः स्यादचलो ध्रुवः। सुकृतं दुष्कृतं चोभे नानुरुध्येत कर्मणा॥
target: By association with Yoga and dissociation from company, he should be perfectly calm, steadily fixed, and uniform. He should not acquire either merit or demerit by means of acts.

source: प्रादुरासन् महाकायास्तस्योद्यानस्य रक्षिणः। ते दृष्ट्वाधर्मराजानं महर्षि चापि लोमशम्॥ विनयेन नताः सर्वे प्रणिपत्य च भारत॥ सान्त्विताधर्मराजेन प्रसेदुः क्षणदाचराः। विदिताश्च कुबेरस्य तत्र ते कुरुपुङ्गवाः॥
target: Seeing Dharmaraja (Yudhishthira) and the great Rishi Lomasha and Nakula and Sahadeva and also the other foremost of Brahmanas, They all, O descendent of Bharata, bowed down their heads to them in humility. Being pacified by Dharmaraja (Yudhishthira) the Rakshasas were gratified.

source: अथ काले व्यतिक्रान्ते कस्मिंश्चित् कुरुनन्दन। रुच्या भगिन्या आदान प्रभूतधनधान्यवत्॥
target: After sometime, O delighter of the Kurus, the time came for a ceremony of gifts to take place with respect to the sister of Ruchi. Profuse wealth and corn were to be given away in it.

source: न विश्वासाज्जातु परस्य गेहे गच्छेन्नरशेतयानो विकाले। न चत्वरे निशि तिष्ठेन्निगूढो न राजकाम्यां योषितं प्रार्थयीत॥
target: A man should not, out of confidence, go to the house of an untrustworthy person in the evening. He should not hide himself in the yard of another's house at night, nor desire a woman sued by a king.

source: कथं नु राजा वृद्धः स वने वसति निर्जने। गान्धारी च महाभागा सा च कुन्ती पृथा कथम्॥
target: How, indeed, will the king, who has become old, live in the solitary forest? How will the highly blessed Gandhari, and Pritha, the daughter of Kuntibhoja, live there?

source: अथवा मद्विनाशोऽयं न हि शक्ष्यामि कंचन। परित्यक्तुमहं बन्धं स्वयं जीवन् नृशंसवत्॥
target: Oh, how can I bear it? The time has come for my own death. I shall not be able to live like a cruel wretch by abandoning my own relatives and friends.

source: दिव्याम्बरधरः श्रीमान् सुमृष्टमणिकुण्डलः। विचित्रमाल्यमुकुटो वसन्त इव मूर्तिमान्॥
target: Attired in a celestials garment, wearing a handsome appearance, adorned with jewelled ear-rings, decked with a beautiful garland and a crown and looking as (handsome as) the very embodiment of Spring.

source: नागतिर्न गतिस्तस्य ज्ञेया भूतेषु केनचित्। सांख्येन विधिना चैव योगेन च यथाक्रमम्॥ चिन्तयामि गतिं चास्य न गतिं वेधि चोत्तराम्। यथाज्ञानं तु वक्ष्यामि पुरुषं तु सनातनम्॥ तस्यैकत्वं महत्त्वं च स चैकः पुरुषः स्मृतः। महापुरुषशब्दं स बिभत्र्येकः सनातनः॥
target: No one succeeds in perceiving how he enters into embodied creatures and how he goes out of them. According to the Sankhya mode, as also with the help of Yoga and the due observance of the ordinances prescribed by it, I am engaged in thinking of the cause of that Soul, but, alas, I am unable to comprehend that cause, excellent as it is. I shall, however, according to the extent of my knowledge describe to you that eternal Soul and his Oneness and supreme greatness. The learned speak of him as the one Soul. That one eternal Being deserves the appellation of the great Supreme Purusha.

source: नैव ते निष्ठितं कर्म नैव ते शत्रवो जिताः। कथं शत्रु शरीरस्थमात्मनो नावबुध्यसे॥
target: Your deed has not yet been destroyed nor have your enemies been subjugated, for you do not yet know the enemies that live within your own body.

source: ततः सात्यकिमादाय पाणौ हार्दिक्यमेव च। ऋषिभिस्तैरनुज्ञातो निर्ययौ मधुसूदनः॥
target: Then taking Satyaki by his hand and also the son of Hridika the slayer of Madhu went out, with the permission of those Rishis.

source: वैशंपायन उवाच हन्त ते कथयिष्यामि नमस्कृत्य स्वयंभुवे। सुरादीनामहं सम्यग्लोकानां प्रभवाप्ययम्॥
target: Vaishampayana said : Bowing down my head to the Self-created (Brahma), I shall narrate to you in detail the origin of the celestials and of all creatures.

source: तं कालं तं मुहूर्तं च प्रतीक्षन्ती नृपात्मजा। यथोक्तं नारदवचश्चिन्तयन्ती सुदुःखिता॥
target: And with a heavy heart, the princess, pondering on the words of Narada (anxiously) awaited the hour and the moment of her husband's death).

source: दह्यमानस्तु शोकाभ्यां कौसल्यामाह दुःखितः। वेपमानोऽञ्जलिं कृत्वा प्रसादार्थमवाङ्मुखः। ॥
target: Burning in grief and distressed, he trembling and with joined hands, with his head hanging down, addressed Kausalyā, with the view of pacifying her.

source: निमे संकल्पिस्तेऽयं पितृयज्ञस्तपोधन। मा ते भूद् भीः पूर्वदृष्टो धर्मार्थं ब्रह्मणां स्वयम्॥
target: He said to him, O Nimi, this rite that you have conceived, is a sacrifice in honour of the departed Manes. Do not fear, O you, having asceticism for wealth. Formerly the Grandfather Brahman himself laid it down.

source: अपिहरार्या मेघानां मागधा मनुना कृताः। कौशिको मणिमांश्चैव चक्राते चाप्यनुग्रहम्॥
target: Manu himself had made the country of the Magadhas to be free from draught Kaushika and Maniman also have favoured and blessed this country.

source: मर्माण्यस्थीनि हृदयं तथासून् रूक्षा वाचो निर्दहन्तीह पुंसाम्। तस्माद् वाचमुषती रूक्षरूपां धर्मारामो नित्यशो वर्जयीत॥
target: Harsh words burn the very vitals, bones, heart and the life of men. Therefore he that has virtue for his refuse should always avoid harsh and angry words.

source: यथा सूर्यांशुभिः स्पृष्टं सर्वं शुचि विभाव्यते। तथा त्वदर्चिनिर्दग्धं सर्वं शुचि भविष्यति॥ त्वमग्ने परमं तेजः स्वप्रभावाद्विनिर्गतम्। स्वतेजसैव तं शापं कुरु सत्यमृषेविभो। देवानां चात्मनो भागं गृहाण त्वं मुखे हुतम्॥
target: As all thing become pure, touched by the sunbeams, so will everything be pure that will be burnt in your flames. O Agni, you are the supreme energy, born of your own power. By that power, make the Rishi's curse true. Continue to receive your portion and that of the celestials offered into your mouth."

source: इन्द्रो वै ब्रह्मणः पुत्रः क्षत्रियः कर्मणाभवत्। ज्ञातीनां पापवृत्तीनां जघान नवतीनव॥
target: Indra himself, though a Brahmana, become a Kshatriya in his deeds, and fought with his sinful kinsmen for eight hundred and ten times.

source: निवर्तनं च तत्रास्य त्रीणि पद्यानि वै विभुः। दिवसे यश्चतुर्थे तु प्राश्नीयादेकभोजनम्॥ सदा द्वादशमासान् वै जुह्वानो जातवेदसम्। वाजपेयस्य यज्ञस्य फलं प्राप्नोत्यनुत्तमम्॥
target: Fasting for three days successively, he who takes only one meal every fourth day, and pours libations every day on his sacred fire, acquires the great merit of the Vajapeya sacrifice. The car he acquires is graced by highly beautiful celestial ladies who have Indra for their father.

source: यच्छक्नोषि समुद्यन्तुं प्रयोक्तुमपि वा रणे। तद् गृहाण विनास्त्रेण यन्मे दातुमभीप्सति॥
target: Without giving me the weapon you wish to give, take from among these weapons of mine that which you will be able to wield and use in battle.

source: सुहृदयश्चैव ये सर्वे पृथक् च सह चाब्रुवन्। यज्ञकालस्तव विभो क्रियतामत्र साम्प्रतम्॥
target: His friends and relatives all separately and jointly said, "O lord, the time for the sacrifice has come. Let it be now performed without delay.”

source: ताश्चैवं पायसं प्राप्य नरेन्द्रस्योत्तमस्त्रियः। सम्मानं मेनिरे सर्वाः प्रहर्षोदितचेतसः॥
target: Thus the king dispensed the Pāyasa to each and all of his wives. And those foremost wives of the king, having received that Pāyasa, became exceedingly delighted, and considered themselves as highly honoured.

source: एते हाहाकृताः सर्वे प्रगृहीतशरासनाः। वीरं द्रौणायनिं वीराः सर्वतः पर्यवारयन्॥
target: Then all these brave warriors crying Oh and Alas and grasping their bows and arrows surrounded Drona's brave son on all sides.

source: तथैव पाण्डवा राजंस्तव पुत्रस्य वाहिनीम्। कर्णस्य प्रमुखे क्रुद्धा निजध्नुस्ते महारथाः॥
target: O king, the mighty car-warriors, namely the Pandavas, had most wrathfully smitten the soldiers of your son in the same way in the very presence of Karna.

source: सृञ्जयं नारदोऽभ्येत्य तन्निबोध युधिष्ठिर। कामानामवितृप्तस्त्वं सृञ्जयेह मरिष्यसि॥
target: King Srinjaya. O Yudhishthira listen on 10 those words. Narada said : You shall have to die, O Srinjaya, with many of your desirc', unfulfiled.

source: यद् वयं सुहृदो हत्वा कृत्वा पापमनन्तकम्। नरके निपतिष्यामो ह्यधःशिरस एव ह॥
target: Having killed our kinsmen and friends and thereby committed a sin which cannot be expiated, we shall have tù fall into hell with heads downwards.

source: पार्थिवै राजपुत्रैर्वा शक्याः प्राप्तुं पितामह। नार्थन्यूनैरवगुणैरेकात्मभिसंहतैः॥
target: Indeed, O grandfather, the merit attaching to Sacrifices can be acquired by only kings and princes. That merit is incapable of being acquired by those who have no wealth and power and who live alone and are helpless.

source: तानागतान् द्विजश्रेष्ठान् विरूपाक्षो विशाम्पते। यथार्ह प्रतिजग्राह विधिदृष्टेन कर्मणा॥
target: The Rakshasa king Virupaksha, O monarch, received the guests, as they came, duly and according to the rites sanctioned in the scriptures.

source: सर्व एनं विमनीमः पुरैकैकं हिनस्ति नः। अथाब्रवीत् पुनर्दोणं कर्णो वैकर्तनो रणे।॥
target: 'Let all of us united together, crush this one; for, fighting singly, he will slay us all. O king, with the assistance of Drona and Kripa and others, do you think out the means of slaying this one. Thereafter Vikartana's son Karna, addressing Drona said these words-

source: तामपश्यन् कपिस्तत्र पश्यंश्चान्या वरस्त्रियः। अपक्रम्य तदा वीरः प्रस्थातुमुपचक्रमे॥
target: And not seeing her, that hero, having beheld other magnificent dames, coming out of that place, set about searching for Sītā (afresh).

source: वानरैर्वध्यमानास्ते शस्त्राण्युत्सृज्य राक्षसाः। लङ्कामभिमुखाः सस्रुभ्रष्टसंज्ञाः प्रधाविताः॥
target: And assailed by the monkeys, the Raksasas, pursued (by their foes), with their senses lost, rushed towards Lankā, leaving their arms behind.

source: महद् बलं धार्तराष्ट्रस्य राज्ञः को वै शक्तो हन्तुमक्षीयमाणः। सोऽहं जये चैव पराजये च निःश्रेयसं नाधिगच्छामि किञ्चित्॥
target: Who is capable of staying, without any loss to his own army, the large force of the royal son of Dhritarashtra? Therefore do I see not the slightest good in either victory or defeat.

source: इति संचिन्त्य हनुमान्गत्वा क्षिप्रं महाबलः। आसाद्य पर्वतश्रेष्ठं त्रिः प्रकम्प्य गिरेस्तटम्॥ फुल्लनानातरुगणं समुत्पाट्य महाबलः। गृहीत्वा हरिशार्दूलो हस्ताभ्यां समतोलयत्॥
target: Having reflected thus the exceedingly powerful Hanumăn, foremost of monkeysswiftly drawing up to that best of mountains and giving three shakes to the mountain filled with various flowering trees-raised it up with his hands.

source: उष्ट्रवामीभिरप्यन्ये सदश्चैश्च महाजवैः॥ तूर्णं परिययुः सेनां कृत्स्ना कर्णस्य शासनात्। आज्ञापयन्तो राज्ञश्च योग: प्रागुदयादिति॥
target: And others on camels, and others again on good horses went out and ordered the united army at Karna's behest to be ready for battle before sunrise.

source: तातेति परिपूर्णार्थं तस्य तन्मधुरं वचः। अदृश्यन्त्यश्रुपूर्णाक्षी शृण्वती तमुवाच ह॥
target: Hearing the well explained word "father" uttered sweetly by her son, Adrishyanti with tearful eyes thus spoke to him,

source: स दण्डस्तत्र राजाभूद्रम्ये पर्वतरोधसि। पुरं चाप्रतिमं राम न्यवेशयदनुत्तमम्॥ पुरस्य चाकरोन्नाम मधुमन्तमिति प्रभो। पुरोहितं तूशनसं वरयामास सुव्रतम्॥
target: Danda became king of that picturesque valley. And having reared a fine city there he named it as Madhumanta and appointed śukrācārya of firm views as his priest.

source: असौ धनंजयाग्निर्हि कोपमारुतचोदितः। सेनाकक्षं दहति मे वह्निः कक्षमिवोत्थितः॥
target: Like a raging fire consuming a heap of dry grass and fuel, this Dhananjaya-fire urged on by the wind of his anger, is consuming the grass and fuel formed by my troops.

source: एतत् तु वचनं श्रुत्वा लक्ष्मणस्य महात्मनः। उवाच रामं कौसल्या रुदती शोकलालसा॥
target: Hearing these words of the high-souled Laks maņa, Kausaly, weeping and being pressed with sorrow spoke these words to Rāma.

source: ये चैनं प्रतिपद्यन्ते भक्तियोगेन भाविताः। तेषामेवात्मनाऽऽत्मानं दर्शयत्येष हृच्छयः॥
target: O you living in all heart you appear before those persons who succeed in attaining to you after having purified themselves by devotion.

source: सर्वप्राणिहितं प्रश्न ब्रह्मक्षत्रे विशेषतः। द्रव्यहीनाः कथं मा दरिद्राः साधुवर्तिनः॥
target: By doing what acts may virtuous men who have no worldly belongings succeed in acquiring the merits of sacrifices?

source: इह प्रजापतिः पूर्वं देवाः सर्षिगणास्तथा। इष्टदेवतपसः पूता ब्रह्मलोकमुपाश्रिताः॥
target: Here, in days of yore, the very Creator and all the gods having performed proper penances, with the Rishis became cleansed and attained to Brahma.

source: तस्यैष मन्युप्रभवो धार्तराष्ट्रस्य दुर्मतेः। तपोदग्धशरीरस्य कोपो दहति भारतीम्॥
target: It is the wrath, engendered by grief, of that Yudhishthira whose person have been consumed by the austerities of asceticism, that is consuming the host of the wicked-souled son off Dhritarashtra.

source: मैव स्म सुकृताल्लोकान् गच्छेत् पार्थो वृकोदरः। यदि वक्षो हि ते भित्त्वा न पिबेच्छोणितं रणे॥
target: I tell you, if Vrikodara, the son of Pritha, does not drink your life-blood piercing open your breast in battle, let him not attain to regions of blessedness.

source: अभिषिक्ते ततस्तस्मिन् सिंहनादो महानभूत्। तव सैन्येऽभ्यवाद्यन्त वादित्राणि च भारत॥
target: After Shalya has been appointed the commander, leonine shouts arose among your soldiers and various musical instruments also, O Bharata, were struck.

source: आपद्गतेन धर्माणामन्यायेनोपजीवनम्। अपि ह्येतद् ब्राह्मणेषु दृष्टं वृत्तिपरिक्षये॥
target: In a time of distress, when ordinary practices cannot be followed, a Kshatriya may support himself by even unjust and improper means. The very Brahmanas, it is seen, do the same when their means of living run out.

source: शीतोष्णे चैव वायुश्च त्रयः शारीरजा गुणाः। तेषां गुणानां साम्यं यत्तदाहुः स्वस्थलक्षणम्॥
target: Cold, heat, and winds,-are the three essentials of the body. Their harmonious existence indicates good heath.

source: तमेकं बहुधापश्यन् मोहितास्तस्य तेजसा। रथैर्विमथितैश्चैव भग्नीडैश्च मारिष॥
target: Although Satyaki was alone yet, your troops thought him to be multiplied into many. They were then confounded by his energy. Then with shattered chariots and crushed carniches.

source: प्रत्याहु!च्यमाना ये न हिंसन्ति च हिंसिताः। प्रयच्छन्ति न याचन्ते दुर्गाण्यतितरन्ति ते॥
target: Those, who do not speak when addressed in evil words, those who do not injure others when injured themselves, those, who give but do not take, succeed in getting over all difficulties.

source: अनु त्वां तात जीवन्तु सुहृदः साधुभिः सह। पर्यन्यमिव भूतानि स्वादुद्रुममिव द्विजाः॥
target: Let your friends, together with all honest man, derive their support from you, like all creatures from the god of the clouds and like birds from a large tree with sweet fruits.

source: धर्मज्ञमानिनौ यौ त्वां वध्यमानमुपैक्षताम्। पाण्डवाश्चापि ते सर्वे किं वक्ष्यन्ति नराधिप॥ कथं दुर्योधनोऽस्माभिर्हत इत्यनपत्रपाः।
target: They consider themselves as moral, yet both of them were indifferent while you were killed! How will the other Pandavas, shameless as they are, O king, speak of the manner in which they have brought about your death?

source: वसिष्ठ उवाच ततस्तं क्रोधजं तात और्वोऽग्निं वरुणालये। उत्ससर्ज च चैवाप उपयुङ्क्ते महोदधौ॥
target: Vasishtha said: Thereupon Aurva threw the fire of his wrath into the abode of Varuna (sea) and that fire consumes the waters of the great ocean.

source: उद्वीक्षमाणा भर्तारं मुखेन परिशिष्यता। मुमोच सहसा बाष्पं प्रयान्तमुपवीक्ष्य सा॥
target: Looking up to her lord with a blank countenance, she suddenly let fall tears, perceiving the destruction of the subject.

source: वृषभस्तु महाराज बहुधा विपरिक्षतः। अमुच्यत महारौद्रात् तस्माद् वीरावकर्तनात्॥
target: Only Vrishabha, O mighty monarch, with his body mangled with wounds, escaped, with difficulty, alive from that most terrible combat destructive of heroes.

source: सिद्धो वा यदि वा देवो गन्धर्वो वाथ गुह्यकः। पृष्टः सन् काम्यया ब्रूहि कस्त्वं वानररूपधृक्॥
target: Are you a Siddha, a celestials, a Gandharva or a Guhaka, I ask you in curiosity. Who are you in the shape of a monkey?

source: अर्जुन उवाच गायामि नृत्याम्यथ वादयामि भद्रोऽस्मि नृत्ये कुशलोऽस्मि गीते। त्वमुत्तरायै प्रदिशस्व मां स्वयं भवामि देव्या नरदेव नर्तकः॥
target: Arjuna said I sing, dance and play on instruments. I am skilled in dancing and expert in singing. O god among men, assign me to Uttara. I shall be the dancing-master to the princess.

source: एतच्च कर्णो यत् प्राह सर्वमीहामहे तथा। यथोद्दिष्टं चराः सर्वे मृगयन्तु यतस्ततः॥
target: This and what Karna has said have my full approbation. As directed let all those spies search at all those places.

source: स्वयं युधिष्ठिरो राजा वज्रं व्यूहमथाकरोत्। तथा व्यूढेष्वनीकेषु यथास्थानमवस्थिताः॥
target: King Yudhishthira himself formed his troops in the array known as Vajra. Thus when the troops were thus formed into battle array, and were stationed in proper ranks.

source: ततस्ते वानराः सर्वे राक्षसाः सविभीषणाः। उत्पत्योत्पत्य संहृष्टास्तां पुरीं ददृशुस्तदा॥
target: Thereupon all the monkeys and Rākşasas along with Vibhīşaņa rose up delightedly and saw the city.

source: ततः कुब्जाम्रकं गच्छेत् तीर्थसेवी नराधिप। गोसहस्रमवाप्नोति स्वर्गलोकं च गच्छति॥
target: O ruler of men, one should then go to Kubjamraka; one then obtains the fruits of giving away one thousand kine and goes to the celestials region.

source: पापं कुर्वन् पापवृत्तः पापस्यान्तं न गच्छति। तस्मात् पुण्यं यतेत् कर्तुं वर्जयीत च पापकम्॥
target: The sinful man who is addicted to vices never comes to the end of his course of inequities. Therefore we must do what is virtuous and forbear from doing what is sinful.

source: तस्य तद्वचनं श्रुत्वा राक्षसास्ते भयार्दिताः। चोदयामासुरव्यग्रान्राक्षसांस्तानृपाज्ञया ॥
target: Hearing his speech-those Raksasa, possessed by fear, asked by the command of the king, the Rākşasa soldiers to be ready.

source: तां चासीनौ ददृशतुर्भीमसेनयुधिष्ठिरौ। अमृष्यमाणौ कृष्णायाः कीचकेन पराभवन्॥
target: Both Bhimasena and Yudhishthira, who were seated there, beheld with unforgiving attitude, that outrage on Krishna committed by Kichaka.

source: तत् पुनस्तुमुलं युद्धं प्राणांस्त्यक्त्वाभ्यवर्तत॥ तावकानां परेषां च परस्परवधैषिणाम्।
target: Again a dreadful encounter took place, in which the combatants did not care for their lives, between your soldiers and those of the foe, all of whom were desirous of killing one another.

source: सोऽसृजद् वातमग्निं च भास्करं चापि वीर्यवान्। आकाशमसृजच्चोर्ध्वमधो भूमिं च नैर्ऋतीम्॥ नभः सचन्द्रतारं च नक्षत्राणि ग्रहांस्तथा। संवत्सरानृतून् मासान् पक्षानथ लवान् क्षणान्॥
target: He then created wind, and fire, and the highly powerful sun. He also created the sky, the heavens, the nether regions, Earth, the quarters, the firmament with the moon and the stars, the constellations, the planets, the year, the seasons, the months, the two fortnights and the smaller divisions of time.

source: कर्ण उवाच अपि त्वां कृष्ण पश्याम जीवन्तोऽस्मान्महारणात्। समुत्तीर्णा महाबाहो वीरक्षत्रविनाशनात्॥
target: Karna said If I am alive, O Krishna, I shall see you after this great battle, destructive of Kshatriya heroes, which is come on us, O you of long arms.

source: ततो वरं ददौ तस्मै ह्यविध्याय परंतपः॥ त्रिजटां चार्थमानाभ्यां योजयामास राक्षसीम्। भूयः प्रहृष्टो भरतर्षभ।
target: That tormentor of foes then conferred a boon on Avindhya. He then honoured and gave riches to the Rakshasa woman Trijata.

source: तथा ब्रुवाणं भरतं दृष्ट्वा तं भ्रातृवत्सलम्। मुमुचुनिरा बाष्पं राक्षसश्च विभीषणः॥
target: Hearing Bharata speak in that wise and beholding him devoted to his brother all the monkeys and the Rākşasa Vibhîşana shed tears.

source: ततो गिरितटे जातामुत्पाट्य कुसुमायुताम्। लक्ष्मणो गजपुष्पी तां तस्य कण्ठे व्यसर्जयत्॥ स तया शुशुभे श्रीमाल्लतया कण्ठसक्तया। मालयेव बलाकानां ससंध्य इव तोयदः॥
target: Thereat that highly graceful one with the garland around his neck appeared like to a cloud.

source: सात्यकिस्तु ततः क्रुद्धो दर्मपुत्रे शरार्दिते॥ मद्राणामधिपं शूरं शरैविव्याध पञ्चभिः।
target: Then Satyaki, enraged upon beholding the son of Dharma thus assailed with arrows, obstructed the heroic king of the Madras with clouds of arrows.

source: एतत् सहरपर्यन्तमहो ब्राह्ममुदाहृतम्। विश्वं हि ब्रह्मभवने सर्वतः परिवर्तते॥ लोकानां मनुजव्याघ्र प्रलयं तं विदुर्बुधाः। अल्पावशिष्टे तु तदा युगान्ते भरतर्षभ॥ सहगन्ते नराः सर्वे प्रायशोऽनृतवादिनः। यज्ञप्रतिनिधिः पार्थ दानप्रतिनिधिस्तथा॥
target: One full thousand of such cycles would constitute a day of Brahma. O foremost of men, when this universe is withdrawn and taken back within its (original) home, (namely) Brahma himself, that disappearance of all things is called by the learned "the universal dissolution." O best of the Bharata race, at the end of the last mentioned one thousand years, men become addicted to falsehood. O son of Pritha, they then perform sacrifices and gifts by representatives.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच भरद्वाजस्य विप्रर्षेः स्कन्नं रेतो महात्मनः॥ दृष्ट्वाऽप्सरसभायान्तीं घृताचीं पृथुलोचनाम्।
target: Vaishampayana said "The vital seed of the great Rishi Bharadvaja fell upon beholding the large eyed Apsara Ghritachi as the latter was passing by at one time.

source: कामं च मम न न्याय्यं प्रष्टुं त्वां कार्यमीदृशम्। किं तु कार्यगरीयस्त्वात्ततस्त्वाहमचूचुदम्॥
target: It is not proper for me to ask you such a question, but I ask you from the gravity of the matter.

source: अदेया च यथा सीता वध्यौ दशरथात्मजौ। भवद्भिर्मन्त्र्यतां मन्त्रः सुनीतं चाभिधीयताम्॥ नहि शक्ति प्रपश्यामि जगत्यन्यस्य कस्यचित्। सागरं वानरैस्तीत्वा निश्चयेन जयो मम ॥
target: Do you so counsel that Sītã may be withholden by me and the sons of Dasaratha may be slain; but you must prefer certain counsel. No other* person in this world has the power to cross the sea along with the monkeys, victory, therefore, is undubitably mine." *I fail to understand anyasya, "no other person" nor does the commentator helps me anyway.

source: ततः कौरवसैन्यानां प्रादुरासीन्महास्वनः॥ प्रयातान् सहितान् दृष्ट्वा पाण्डुपुत्रान् महारथान् जितकाशिनश्च खचरास्त्वरिताश्च महारथाः॥ क्षणेनैव वने तस्मिन् समाजग्मुरभीतवत्। न्यवर्तन्त ततः सर्वे गन्धर्वा जितकाशिनः॥
target: Thereupon, the Kuru soldiers sent up a very loud shout. O seeing the great car-warriors the sons of Pandu going to fight with the Gandharvas). Those rangers of the sky (Gandharvas), the great car-warriors, were flushed with victory. Those warriors, the Pandavas, fearlessly encountered one other in the forest.

source: ततः क्रोधो ममापूर्वो धैर्यस्योपरि वर्धते। वैरं च सुमहज्जातं रामं प्रति सुदारुणम् ॥
target: Hence unprecedented is my wrath, towering above my patience; and great and fierce also is the hostility I have conceived against Rāma.

source: अवश्यकरणीये च मा त्वां कालोऽत्यगादयम्। किं त्वतः परमं दुःखं यद् वयं स्वर्गते त्वयि॥ याचमानाः परादन्नं परिधावेमहि श्ववत्। त्वयि त्वरोगे निर्मुक्ते क्लेशादस्मात् सबान्धवे। अमृते वसती लोके भविष्यामि सुखान्विता॥
target: There should not be may delay in doing that which is inevitable. What could be more painful to us than your ascending heaven. (Then) we shall have to beg our food from others like dogs. If you are saved with your friends (dear ones), I shall pass my time in heaven and bliss.

source: तस्य कक्ष्या व्यतिक्रम्य तिस्रो द्वा:स्थैरवारितः। ततोऽभ्रघनसंकाशां गिरिकूटमिवोच्छ्रितम्॥ श्रिया ज्वलन्तं प्रासादमारुरोह महायशाः। तत्र राजसहस्त्रैश्च कुरुभिश्चाभिसंवृतम्॥
target: Traversing tree divisions of that mansion, without a word of challenge from the gatekeepers, that one of great fame, came to a palace, effulgent with marks of prosperity and i having the appearance of a mass of clouds, high as the peak of a mountain. There surrounded by a thousand Kuru kings.

source: वायुीमो भीमनादो महौजा भेत्ता देहान् प्राणिनां सर्वगोऽसौ। नो वाऽऽवृत्तिं नैव वृत्तिं कदाचित् प्राप्नोत्युग्रोऽनन्ततेजोविशिष्टः॥
target: The wind that is tremendous. of dreadful roars and great strength, omni-present and endowed with energy infinite, even that wind will tear open the bodies of living creatures. It will, in this action, put forth no active energy. nor will it suspend its workings.

source: ये मदर्थं परीप्सन्ते वसुधां वसुधाधिपाः। ते हित्वा वसुधैश्वर्यं वसुधामधिशेरते॥
target: Those lords of the earth, who desired for me the sovereignty of the earth, having abandoned all earthly prosperity, are lying on the earth.

source: अन्ववर्तत भीमोऽपि निश्चितो धर्मजं नृपम्॥ धृतराष्ट्रं च सम्प्रेक्ष्य सदा भवति दुर्मनाः।
target: Dharma's son Yudhishthira, was truly obedient to his uncle. Bhima, however, on seeing Dhritarashtra, became very dispirited.

source: स रामः स्वर्गतं श्रुत्वा पितरं पृथिवीपतिम्। उवाच भरतं वाक्यं धर्मात्मा धर्मसंहितम्॥
target: And hearing that lord of earth, his sire, had gone to heaven, that righteous one said to Bharata words fraught with virtue and interest.

source: अतिनिर्मथनादेव कालकूटस्ततः परः। जगदावृत्य सहसा सधूमोऽग्निरिव ज्वलन्॥
target: Because of the great churning, then appeared deadly poison, which soon covered the whole earth and blazed up like a fire with fumes.

source: उदयास्तमने संध्ये वेदयन्ती महद्भयम्। शिवा च वाशते घोरं तत् पराभवलक्षणम्॥
target: At the conjunction of day and night namely when the sun rises and sets are seen terrific sights; the jackals tertific howls and these are the signs of a defeat.

source: अस्मिन् कर्मणि सम्पन्ने विज्ञाते निषधाधिपे। गवां सहस्रं दास्यामि यो वस्तावानयिष्यति॥ अग्रहारांश्च दास्यामि ग्राम नगरसम्मितम्। न चेच्छक्याविहानेतुं दमयन्ती नलोऽपि वा॥ ज्ञातमात्रेऽपि दास्यामि गवां दशशतं धनम्।
target: “To him, who will perform this deed, viz., learning the place where at the king of the Nishadhas does live now or bringing him hither with his wife, will I give a thousand kine, fields and a village like a city. Should he fail to bring hither Nala as well as Damayanti, his very knowledge of them would be rewarded by my giving him wealth in the shape of a ten thousand kine."

source: वयं सृष्टा हि भगवंस्त्वया च प्रभविष्णुना। येन यस्मिन्नधीकारे वर्तितव्यं पितामह॥
target: Addressing the Grandfather, they said,-We have been created, O holy one, by you, O you of great power. Tell us, O Grandfather, which of us should be vested with what jurisdiction.

source: तद् बलं पाण्डुपुत्रस्य द्रोणपुत्रप्रतापितम्॥ चुक्षुभे भरतश्रेष्ठ तिमिनेव नदीमुखम्।
target: O foremost of Bharata's race, the Pandava army, thus provoked by the son of Drona, became exceedingly agitated as the water of a river is troubled by a whale.

source: एष चैव स्वभावो मे पूजयेयं द्विजानिति। तव चैव प्रियं कार्यं श्रेयश्च परमं मम॥
target: To worship the Brahmanas is my habit. And as this is agreeable to you, it will lead to my highest good.

source: अप्रवृत्तो च सीतायाः पापमेव करिष्यति। तस्मात् क्षममिहाद्यैव्र गन्तुं प्रायोपवेशनम्॥ त्यक्त्वा पुत्रांश्च दारांश्च धनानि च गृहाणि च ।
target: Sītā not having been found out, Sugrīva, for certain, shall commit this sin.* Therefore it is fit that, forsaking our sons, and wives, and wealth, and homes, we this very day sit down to starve ourselves to death. *i.e. slay us.

source: बाढमित्येव गाधेयो वसिष्ठं प्रत्युवाच ह। यथाप्रियं भगवतस्तथास्तु मुनिपुङ्गव॥
target: Then Gadhi's son answered Vasistha, Very well. O potent ascetic, let that be which find favour in your sight.'

source: एतत् सुबहुवृत्तान्तं पञ्चमं पर्व भारते। उद्योगपर्व निर्दिष्टं संधिविग्रहमिश्रितम्॥
target: These are the matters that have been dwelt on, the fifth Parva of the Bharata in full of incidents regarding both peace and war.

source: अकीर्तिः कीर्त्यते लोके यस्य भूतस्य कस्यचित्। स पतत्यधमाँल्लोकान् यावच्छब्दः प्रकीर्त्यते॥
target: The man, the report of whose evil deeds is talked about, is said to fall down; and he lives in the lower region as long as that evil report lasts. me

source: मन्ये दशरथान्ताय मम प्रव्राजनाय च। कैकेयी सौम्य सम्प्राप्ता राज्याय भरतस्य च॥
target: O amiable one, I think that Kaikeyi has been born for making an end of Dasaratha, sending me into exile, and conferring the kingdom on Bharata.

source: अप्याशिष्म वयमर्जुन त्वयि यियासवो बहु कल्याणमिष्टम्। तन्नः सर्व विफलं राजपुत्र फलार्थिना विफल इवातिपुष्पः॥
target: O Arjuna, we showered many a blessing on you because we expected much good of you. But all our hopes, O prince, are frustrated, like that of a man expecting fruits from a tree and getting flowers instead.

source: विजयाय प्रयास्यामि दिशं धनदपालिताम्। तिथावथ मुहूर्ते च नक्षत्रे चाभिपूजिते॥
target: I shall start, in an auspicious moment of a holy day of the moon under a favourable constellation, to conquer the kingdoms situated in the quarter protected by the lord of wealth (Kubera).

source: दशग्रीवस्तु सर्वेषां श्रेष्ठो राक्षसपुङ्गवः। महोत्साहो महावीर्यो महासत्त्वपराक्रमः॥
target: That foremost of Rakshasas, the ten-headed (Ravana) became the greatest of them all; highly energetic, powerful and gifted with great strength and prowess.

source: मान्धातुस्तु सुतः श्रीमान् सुसंधिरुदपद्यत। सुसंधेरपि पुत्रौ द्वौ ध्रुवसंधिः प्रसेनजित्॥
target: And Māndhātā's son was the graceful Susandhi. And Susandhi's two sons were Dhruvasandhi and Prasenajit.

source: दक्षिणं वाथ वामं वा पार्श्वमासीत् पण्डितः। रक्षिणां ह्यात्तशस्त्राणां स्थानं पश्चाद् विधीयते॥ नित्यं हि प्रतिषिद्धं तु पुरस्तादासनं महत्। न च संदर्शने किञ्चित् प्रवृत्तमपि संजयेत्॥
target: Learned men should sit either on the right or the left side of the king, because the place behind him is reverend, for the guards furnished with arms and seats in his front are always forbidden.

source: एष योत्स्यति संग्रामे गजस्कन्धविशारदः। रथेन वा महाबाहुः क्षपयन् शत्रुवाहिनीम्॥
target: Conversant with the science of war. that one of long arms having the shoulders of an elephant will fight in battle scattering the hostile army, seated on a chariot.

source: सोऽपश्यन् नरशार्दूलं वानरर्षभलक्षणम्। गाण्डीवस्य च नि?षमशृण्वन् व्यथितेन्द्रियः॥
target: He could not then find that foremost of men having the money-chief for the device on his banner; and could not also hear the twang of the Gandiva bow. He therefore became greatly depressed.

source: ततः क्षुरप्राञ्जलिकार्धचन्द्रा नालीकनाराचवराहकर्णाः। गाण्डीवः प्रादुरासन् सुतीक्ष्णाः सहस्रशो वज्रसमानवेगाः॥
target: Then many sharp arrows namely the Anjalikas, i.e. razor-headed shafts and crescent like and Nalikas and cloth-yard arrows and those adorned with the boar's ears all very powerful and sharp, came out in numbers from the Gandiva with force.

source: किमन्यद् विहिता नूनं तस्य सा पुरुषेन्द्रता। यदि ते विहितं राज्यं भविष्यति विशाम्पते॥ मिषतः सर्वलोकस्य स्थास्यते त्वयि तद् ध्रुवम्। अतोऽन्यथा चेद् विहितं यतमानो न लप्स्यसे॥
target: O king, what else human exertion can be said to have been in him than that the kingdom was dependent on his Destiny. If this kingdom be fixed in you by destiny. It will certainly remain in you, notwithstanding the enmity of all the worlds. If otherwise, however you may try, it will never remain in you.

source: यत्तो याहि रणे सूत शृणु चेदं वचः परम्। एतदालोक्यते सैन्यमावन्त्यानां महाप्रभम्॥
target: Yonder is seen the highly resplendent division of the Avantis. Next to them is the mighty host composed of the warriors from the south.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच ततो राज्ञाभ्यनुज्ञातो धृतराष्ट्रः प्रतापवान्। ययौ स्वभवनं राजा गान्धार्यानुगतस्तदा।॥
target: Vaishampayana said son Having received the kings' permission, the highly energetic king Dhritarastra, then, went to his own palace, followed by Gandhari.

source: गच्छन्तु दूतास्त्वरितं नगरं तव पार्थिव।॥ सुहृदां प्रियमाख्यातुं घोषयन्तु च ते जयम्।
target: O king, let emissaries speedily go to your city, to communicate this pleasant tidings to your friends and announce your victory.

source: हते तु भीष्मे राधेय पुनरेष्यसि संयुगम्। धार्तराष्ट्रस्य साहाय्यं यदि पश्यसि चेत् समम्॥
target: O son of Radha, when Bhishma will be killed, you may come back and fight on Duryodhana's side, if you have no particular lcaning for any party.

source: भीमस्ततस्तत् कृतवान् नरेन्द्र तां चैव पूजां प्रतिगृह्य हर्षात्। सुखोपविष्टं तु पुरोहितं तदा युधिष्ठरो ब्राह्मणमित्युवाच॥
target: O king, Bhima then did as directed. Accepting the worship thus offered to him, he (the priest) became exceedingly glad; and then Yudhishthira thus addressed that priest sitting in comfort.

source: तमेवं वानरश्रेष्ठं गर्जन्तममितप्रभम्॥ प्रहृष्टा हरयस्तत्र समुदैक्षन्त विस्मिताः।
target: Filled with delight, the monkeys there amazed see that foremost of monkeys, endued with immeasurable might, storming.

source: एवमुक्तौ तु तौ वीरौ कवन्धेन नरेश्वरौ। गिरिप्रदरमासाद्य पावकं विससर्जतुः॥
target: After Kabandha had spoken thus, the two best of men, Rāma and Lakṣmaṇa took him to a mountain-cave and placed on fire.

source: स तु निहतरिपुः स्थिरप्रतिज्ञः स्वजनबलाभिवृतो रणे बभूव। स्त्रिदशगणैरभिसंवृतो महेन्द्रः॥
target: There appeared beautiful at the battle-field Rāma of firm promise, slaying his enemy and encircled by his army and friends like to the lord of the celestials surrounded by the gods.

source: तेषामृषिकृतो धर्मो धर्मिणामुपपद्यते। न कामकारात्कामोऽन्यः संसेव्यो धर्मदर्शिभिः॥
target: The religion which these virtuous men are to follow is the Religion that has been laid down and followed by the Rishis. With their eyes set upon the acquisition of virtue, they should never pursue any other object of desire from a sense of uncontrolled caprice.

source: पशुरभ्याहृतो राजन् प्रणयस्तव दुर्नयात्। अरक्षितारं राजानं घ्नन्ति दोषा नरेश्वर॥
target: O king, the beast has been stolen (away); and it has been lost through your dereliction. And, O lord of men, his own fault destroy the king that fail to protect (the beast).7

source: पौरवो धृष्टकेतुं तु शङ्खदेशे महासिना। ताडयामास संक्रुद्धस्तिष्ठ तिष्ठेति चाब्रवीत्॥
target: Then the wrathful descendant of Puru, with his huge sword, struck Dhrishtaketu on the frontal bone, saying at the same time 'Stop, stop.'

source: अमानित्वमदम्भित्वमहिमा शान्तिरार्जवम्। आचार्योपासनं शौचं स्थैर्यमात्मविनिग्रहः॥ इन्द्रियार्थेषु वैराग्यमनहंकार एव च। जन्ममृत्युजराव्याधिदुःखदोषानुदर्शनम्॥
target: Purity, constancy, self-restraint, forgiveness, uprightness, absence of vanity, ostentation and egoism, abstention from fear, indifference to objects of senses, perception of misery and evil of birth, death decrepitude and disease.

source: स संनिकर्षमागम्य पार्थस्याक्लिष्टकर्मणः। मूकं नाम दनोः पुत्रं ददर्शाद्भुतदर्शनम्॥ वाराहं रूपमास्थाय तर्कयन्तमिवार्जुनम्। हन्तुं परं दीप्यमानं तमुवाचाथ फाल्गुनः॥ गाण्डीवं धनुरादाय शरांचाशीविषोपमान्। सज्यंधनुर्वरं कृत्वा ज्याघोषेण निनादयन्॥
target: Coming near Partha of spotless deeds, he (Shiva) saw that a son of a Danava, named Muka of wonderful appearance. Assuming the form of a boar, intended to kill Arjuna. Seeing him in the attempt to kill him. (At once) taking up his Gandiva bow and virulently poisonous snake-like arrows and also stringing them to the bow and having filled all sides with its twang, Falguni said to him.

source: ततः संतप्तहृदयः स्मरन्निग्रहमात्मनः। विनिःश्वस्य विनिःश्वस्य कृतवैरो महात्मना॥ स दक्षिणां दिशं गत्वा महिष्या सह राघव। तताप परमं घोरं विश्वामित्रो महातपाः॥
target: Then with his heart burning, in consequence of the remembrance of his humiliation, and having made enemies with that high-souled one, Viśvāmitra of mighty asceticism sighing and sighing, went towards the south, in company with his queen, and became engaged in dreadful austerities.

source: विश्वामित्रस्तु मातङ्गमुवाच परिसान्त्वयन्। क्षुधितोऽहं गतप्राणो हरिष्यामि श्वजाघनीम्॥
target: Conciliating the Chandala, Vishvamitra said, I am greatly hungry and about to die of starvation. I wise to take away that haunch of dog's meat.

source: काशिभिश्चेदिपञ्चालैर्मत्स्यैश्च मधुसूदन। भवता चैव नाथेन पञ्च ग्रामा वृता मया।॥
target: Five villages were only asked by me, who have the Kashis, the Chedis, the Panchalas and the Matsyas for my supporters and your exalted self for my lord.

source: वासुदेव उवाच श्रुतवानस्मि वार्ष्णेय संग्रामं परमाद्भुतम्। नराणां वदतां तत्र कथं वा तेषु नित्यशः॥
target: Vasudeva said O you of Vrishni's race, I have repeatedly heard men speaking of the wonderful battle.

source: सर्वकामसमायुक्तां काश्यपी यः प्रयच्छति। सर्वभूतानि मन्यन्ते मां ददातीति वासव॥
target: That person, O Vasava, who makes a gift of earth capable of satisfying every wish with fruition is considered as making a gift of every object in the world,

source: सायाह्ने विचरन् राम विटपी माल्यधारिणः॥ शिवोदकं च पम्पायां दृष्ट्वा शोकं विहास्यसि।
target: And rambling in the evening, you shall assuage your grief beholding the pleasant water of Pampā and blossoming trees.

source: अब्रवीत् सुमहातेजा ब्रह्मा सुरुचिरं वचः। ऋषिस्त्वमसि भद्रं ते स्वार्चितैः कर्मभिः शुभैः॥
target: The exceedingly effulgent Brahmă addressed him in soothing words, saying, “You are henceforth a saint, good to you, and (this. eminence) you have attained through your own laudable exertions.'

source: द्युततो धार्तराष्ट्राणां निन्दां कृत्वा तथा पुनः। भेदयित्वा नृपान् सर्वान् वाग्भिर्मन्त्रेण चासकृत्॥
target: Then again finding fault with the match at dice of the sons of Dhritarashtra I tried to create disunion among those rulers of the earth by means of eloquence and by intrigues.

source: त्रासनी सर्वभूतानां स्वसैन्यपरिहर्षिणीम्। मनष्यलोके विख्यातां गिरिशृङ्गविदारणीम्॥
target: It inspired the enemies with terror and the friends with joy. It was celebrated in the world and capable or riving mountain summits.

source: चापमण्डलमेवास्य विस्फुरद् दिक्ष्वदृश्यत। सुदीप्तस्य शरत्काले सवितुर्मण्डलं यथा॥
target: Only his bow drawn to the fullest stretch could then be seen blazing like the burning disc of the sun in the autumnal sky.

source: यथाशक्ति मनुष्याणां शममालक्षयामहे। अन्येषामपि सत्त्वानामपि कीटपिपीलिकैः।

source: त्वमेव हि पुरा काल: कर्ता विकर्ता च सर्वमन्यदकारणम्। नाशं विनाशमैश्वर्यं सुखं दुःखं भवाभवौ॥
target: By virtue of Time's course, you are now an object of universal adoration in this charming world of living beings. Can you say what is that by having done which you have become Indra to-day and what also is that by having done which we have falls off from the position we had occupied.

source: अथवा नहि तस्यार्थो धर्मकामस्य धीमतः। मया रामस्य राजर्षेर्भार्यया परमात्मनः॥
target: Or that highly intelligent royal ascetic desirous of securing piety and freed from the troubles of life, has no need of a wife like me.

source: एककालं तु भुञ्जीत चरन् भैक्ष्यं स्वकर्मकृत्। कपालपाणिः खट्वाङ्गी ब्रह्मचारी सदोत्थितः॥ अनसूयुरधःशायी कर्म लोके प्रकाशयन्। पूर्णीदशाभिर्वषैर्ब्रह्महा विप्रमुच्यते॥
target: By living upon only one meal a day, procured by begging, by doing all his acts himself, by going about begging with a human skull in one hand and a staff with a skull on it in another, by becoming a Brahmacharin and always ready for work, by renouncing all malice, by sleeping on the naked earth, by declaring his offence publicly, by doing all this for full twelve years, a person can cleanse himself from the sin of a Brahmanicide.

source: वागध्यात्ममिति प्राहुर्यथा श्रुतिनिदर्शिनः। वक्तव्यमधिभूतं तु वह्निस्तत्राधिदैवतम्॥

source: ईदृशः स मुने लोकः स्वकर्मफलहेतुकः। सुकृतैस्तत्र पुरुषाः सम्भवन्त्यात्मकर्मभिः॥
target: O Rishi, the world obtained as the fruit of one's (good) acts is like this. Men go there by virtue of their meritorious acts.

source: तमब्रवीनरो राजशरण्यः शरणैषिणाम्॥ ब्रह्मण्यो भव धर्मात्मा मा च स्मैवं पुन: कृथाः।

source: ततः स कर्मणा तस्य विस्मितो भीमविक्रमः। हनूमान् क्रोधताम्राक्षो रक्षोऽधिपमवैक्षत॥ भ्राजमानं महार्हेण काञ्चनेन विराजता। मुक्ताजालवृतेनाथ मुकुटेन महाद्युतिम्॥ वज्रसंयोगसंयुक्तैर्महार्हमणिविग्रहैः। हैमैराभरणैश्चित्रैर्मनसेव प्रकल्पितैः॥ महार्हक्षौमसंवीतं रक्तचन्दनरुषितम्। स्वनुलिप्तं विचित्राभिर्विविधाभिश्च भक्तिभिः॥ विचित्रं दर्शनीयैश्च रक्ताक्षैर्भीमदर्शनैः। दीप्ततीक्ष्णमहादंष्ट्रं प्रलम्बं दशनच्छदैः॥ शिरोभिर्दशभिर्वीरो भ्राजमानं महौजसम्। नानाव्यालसमाकीणैः शिखरैरिव मन्दरम्॥ नीलाञ्जनचयप्रख्यं हारेणोरसि राजता। पूर्णचन्द्राभवक्त्रेण सबालार्कमिवाम्बुदम्॥ बाहुभिर्बद्धकेयूरैश्चन्दनोत्तमरुषितैः। भ्राजमानाङ्गदैर्भीमैः पञ्चशीषैरिवोरगैः॥ महति स्फाटिके चित्रे रत्नसंयोगचित्रिते। उत्तमास्तरणास्तीर्णे सूपविष्टं वरासने॥ अलंकृताभिरत्यर्थं प्रमदाभिः समन्ततः। बालव्यजनहस्ताभिरारात्समुपसेवितम्॥ दुधरण प्रहस्तेन महापाइँन रक्षसा। मन्त्रिभिर्मन्त्रतत्त्वज्ञैनिकुम्भेन च मन्त्रिणा॥ उपोपविष्टं रक्षोभिश्चतुर्भिर्बलदर्पितम्। कृत्स्नं परिवृतं लोकं चतुर्भिरिव सागरैः॥ मन्त्रिभिर्मन्त्रतत्त्वज्ञैरन्यैश्च शुभदर्शिभिः। आश्वास्यमानं सचिवैः सुरैरिव सुरेश्वरम्॥
target: And struck with his (Indrajit's) deed, that one of dreadful vigour, Hanumān, his eyes reddened in wrath, steadily looked at the lord of Rākşas; flaming in gorgeous and precious gold, with a splendid diadem studded with pearls; (adorned with) excellent ornaments, containing diamonds and costly gems, (seeming to have been forged by the mind; apparelled in costly linen; smeared with red sandal pastc, and beautifully painted with various and variegated devices; (e.g. the there horizontal marks painted on the forehead by Saivas and Sāktas) looking splendid with his sightly yet terrible eyes; having shinny, sharp and long teeth, with hanging lips; and that hero (saw) that one of great energy, radient with ten heads; like to Mandara with its summits containing serpents; resembling a mass of blue collyrium; with his breast graced by a chain; with his countenance possessed of the lustre of the moon; looking like a cloud beside the newrisen Sun; with his dreadful arms bound with keyūras, and graced with excellent sandal paste, brilliant with Angadas, and resembling fiveheaded serpents; seated on a superb seat, upon a spacious, variegated, and gay sheet embellished with crystals, and studded with gems; ministered on all sides by gorgeously adorned damsels, bearing hair-furnished fans, the strength-elated surrounded by four Rākşasa—his counsellors versed in the mystery of counsel, viz., Durdhara, Prahasta, the Raksasa Mahāpārśva, and the minister Nikumbha, like the entire world girt round by the four seas, and encouraged by other counsellors, fair of forms One and versed in counsel, even like the sovereign of celestials by the celestials.

source: श्वपच उवाच भिक्षामन्यामाहरेति न च कर्तुमिहार्हसि। न नूनं कार्यमेतद् वै हर कामं श्वजाघनीम्॥

target: He is gifted with forgiveness. He is free from prive or egotism. He is devoted to the Brahmanas and is their leader. He removes the fears of all persons stricken with fear. He increases the joys of all his friends.

source: समुत्सृज्याथ शैनेयो गौतमं रथिनां वरः। द्रौणि राहुः खे शशिनं यथा॥
target: Thereupon that foremost of car-warriors the grandson of Shini, forsaking Gautama's son in battle, rushed towards Drona's son, like Rahu in the firmament rushing towards the moon.

source: आहवे तु हतं शूरं न शोचेत कथंचन॥ अशोच्यो हि हतः शूरः स्वर्गलोके महीयते।
target: One should never lament for a hero killed in battle. A killed hero, if nobody grieves for him, goes to heaven and acquires the respect of its residents.

source: मनीप्सनीयं स्वनवेक्षणीयम्। प्राप्तोऽस्मि पाप्मानमिदं वयस्य भ्रातुर्वधात् त्वाष्ट्रवधादिवेन्द्रः॥
target: O friend, like to the lord of celestials perpetrating sin by destroying Biswarupa, I have been, by bringing about the destruction of my brother, visited. with this sin, beyond comprehensio”, avoidable, undesirable and invisible.

source: अध्वा जरा देहवतां पर्वतानां जलं जरा। असम्भोगो जरा स्त्रीणां वाक्शल्यं मनसो जरा॥
target: The roads are the sources of pain and weakness to those beings who have bodies; and water is the source of pain and weakness to the mountains, non-enjoyment is the source of pain to women; and harshness in speech is the source of pain to the mind.

source: शन्तनो राजसिंहस्य भरतस्य च धीमतः। प्रणष्टः कीर्तिजः शब्दः पाण्डुना पुनराहृतः॥
target: O the lion of kings, the fame of Shantanu and that of Bharata, was about to be extinct, but it was now revived by Pandu.

source: पूर्व हि निर्जितः कर्णो भीमसेनेन संयुगे। कथं भूयः स राधेयो भीममागान्महारथः॥
target: Once before, Karna was vanquished by Bhima in battle, how could he then again assail Bhimasena?

source: भरतार्धतृतीयेषु योजनेष्वजने वने। चित्रकूटगिरिस्तत्र रम्यनिर्झरकाननः॥
target: O Bharata, two and a half Yojanas hence, embossed in a tenantless wood is the mountain Citrakuta, charming with rocks and woods.

source: प्रवेशः केन दत्तोऽयमुभयोर्वैन्यसंसदि। उच्चैः समभिभाषन्तौ केन कार्येण धिष्ठितौ॥
target: Who did admit them to the court of Vainya? What is it that they are clamouring for?”

source: एवं कुते रथस्थोऽहं गुणैरभ्यधिकोऽर्जुनात्। भवे युधि जयेयं च फाल्गुनं कुरुसत्तम।॥
target: Thus my car, which is attended with all these surroundings, will indeed, be superior to that of the son of Pritha. Even the very celestials, accompanied by Vasava, will not be capable of proceeding against it (my car).

source: संयच्छ वाजिनां रश्मीन् सूत याहि शनैः शनैः। मुखं द्रक्ष्याम रामस्य दुर्दशं नो भविष्यति॥
target: O charioteer, rein in the horses, do you proceed softly. We will see the countenance of Rāma, which we shall never see again.

source: सर्वेषामेव भवतां संतापो मा भवेदिति। अतो विरात्रागमनं नान्यदस्तीह कारणम्॥
target: Considering that you all should not be troubled on my account, I came so late at night. There is no other reason (for my late arrival).

source: छेत्तारः संशयानां च क्लिश्यन्तीहाल्पबुद्धयः। द्वेषक्रोधप्रसक्ताश्च शिष्टाचारबहिष्कृताः॥ अन्तःक्रूरा वाङ्मधुराः कूपाश्छन्नास्तृणैरिवा
target: Covetous men are swayed by malice and spite. They are beyond the range of good conduct. Wily as they are in their hearts, their speeches are sweet. They are like dark pits whose mouths are covered with grass.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच कुन्त्यास्तु वचनं श्रुत्वा पाण्डवा राजसत्तम। वीडिताः संन्यवर्तन्त पाञ्चाल्या सहिताऽनघाः॥
target: Hearing these words of Kunti, the sinless Pandavas, O best of kings, became ashamed. They, therefore, desisted, along with the princess of Panchala, from following her.

source: गुहस्य तत् तु वचनं श्रुत्वा स्नेहादुदीरितम्। रामस्यानुवशो वाक्यं भरतोऽपीदमब्रवीत्॥ सुखा नः शर्वरी धीमन् पूजिताश्चापि ते वयम्। गङ्गां तु नौभिर्बह्वीभिर्दासाः संतारयन्तु नः॥
target: Hearing Guha's speech fraught with affection, Bharata ever obedient to Rāma, spoke on his pare, saying. "Happily have we spent the night; and we have also been well received by you. Now let your servants take us over by means of many boats."

source: भवतां प्रीतिरव्यग्रा तेजसा परिरक्षिता।२१।। धर्मश्च नियतो नित्यं सत्यं च भवतां सदा। युष्माकं चानुभावेन तेजसा च महात्मनाम्॥ हतो दुरात्मा दुर्बुद्धी रावणो राक्षसाधमः। हेतुमात्रमहं तत्र भवतां तेजसा हतः॥
target: Being well protected by your own prowess, you have all displayed your great love for me. By your piety, truthfulness, sagacity and strength, the vicious-souled Rāvana has been slain. Forsooth, I am merely the instrument in the destruction of Rāvana-he has been slain by your strength.

source: यद्यष्टरात्रेऽतिक्रान्ते नागमिष्यति पन्नगः। तदाहारं करिष्यामि तन्निमित्तमिदं व्रतम्॥
target: If, on the expire of the eighth night hence, the king of the Nagas do not come back, I shall then break this fast by eating. Indeed, this vow of abstaining from all food that I am observing is on account of my respect for the Naga king.

source: अरण्ये दुःखवसतीमत्कृते भरतर्षभाः। भवद्भिरनुभूता हि यथा कुपुरुषैस्तथा॥
target: Through my fault, O foremost of Bharata's race, you have suffered the miseries of banishment in the forests like ordinary men.

source: रामस्य भाषितं श्रुत्वा लक्ष्मणः परमार्थवित्। उवाच प्राञ्जलिर्वाक्यं राघवं दीप्ततेजसम्॥
target: Hearing the words of the highly effulgent Rama, Laksmana, conversant with discriminative knowledge, replied with folded hands, saying.

source: आदित्यानां भवान् विष्णुर्वसूनां चैव पावकः। पक्षिणां वैनतेयस्त्वमनन्तो भुजगेषु च॥
target: Among the Adityas, you are Vishnu (Upendra), among the Vasus, you are Pavaka, among birds you are Garuda, and among snakes you are Ananta.

source: अलम्बुषस्तु संक्रुद्धः कुन्तिभोजशरार्दितः। अशोभत भृशं लक्ष्म्या पुष्पाढ्य इव किंशुकः॥
target: Afflicting with the arrows of Kuntibhoja, Alambusha inflamed with wrath, appeared beautiful like a Kinshuka tree rich with the wealth of its flowers.

source: पितामहेन यजता आहूता पुष्करेषु वै। सुप्रभा नाम राजेन्द्र नाम्ना तत्र सरस्वती॥
target: Summoned at Pushkara by the grandfather engaged in the celebration of a sacrifice, Sarasvati, O king came there under the name of Suprava.

source: स चेन्ममार संजय चतुर्भद्रतरस्त्वया। पुत्रात् पुण्यतरश्चैव मा पुत्रमनुतप्यथाः॥
target: When he, O Srinjaya, who was superior to you in the four principal attributes and who was purer than your son, met with death, do not grieve for your son who is dead.

source: इत्येवमुक्तः सख्या स प्रीतिपूर्वं जनेश्वरः। भारद्वाजेन पाञ्चालो नामृष्यत वचोऽस्य तत्॥
target: Having been thus joyfull addressed by his friend, the son of Bharadvaja (Drona), the king of Panchala could not bear those words.

source: जानन्तस्तस्य कर्माणि कुरुः सव्यसाचिनः। कथं तत् किल्बिषं कृत्वा निर्भया ब्रूहि मामकाः॥
target: Aware, as they were, of the feats achieved by Savyasachin (Arjuna), tell me, how could the Kauravas and and my warriors, having perpetrated that sinful act. (Abhimanyu's slaughter) remain undaunted?

source: ततस्तस्मिन् महाबाहो कोपसंवर्तितेक्षणः। वायसे त्वं व्यधाः क्रूरां मतिं मतिमतां वरः॥
target: Thereupon, your eyes rolling with ire, you, O mighty armed hero, O foremost of the intelligent, did resolve to destroy that crow.

source: विदुर उवाच शकुनीनामिहार्थाय पाशं भूमावयोजयत्। कश्चिच्छाकुनिकस्तात पूर्वेषामिति शुश्रुम॥
target: Vidura said For the capture of birds did a certain fowler set his net in this world. O Sire, so we have heard from old men.

source: सर्वथा न हि मे पुत्राः सहामात्याः ससौबलाः। क्रुद्ध पार्थे च भीमे च वासुदेवे च सात्वते॥
target: When these Bhima, Partha (Arjuna) and Vasudeva (Krishna) of the Satvata race are angry, my sons with their friends and the son of Subala are surely not at all capable to fight with them.

source: कर्णिनालीकनाराचैस्तोमरप्रासशक्तिभिः। मुसलैर्भिन्दिपालैश्च रथस्थं पार्थमार्दयन्॥
target: Partha on his chariot was distressed, by Nalikas, lances, darts spears, Kampanas, barbed arrows and other sorts throwing at him by them.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच एवं सम्पूजितो राजा पाण्डवैरम्बिकासुतः। विजहार यथापूर्वमृषिभिः पर्युपासितः॥
target: Thus adored by the Pandavas, the royal son of Ambika passed his time happily as before, waited upon and honoured by the Rishis.

source: स तान्निषादानुपसंहरंस्तदा रजः समुद्भूय नभःस्पृशं महत्। समुद्रकुक्षौ च विशोषयन्पयः समीपजाम्भूधरजान्विचालयन्॥
target: Bent upon destroying the Nishadas he raised up a great storm of dust that covered the whole sky. He sucked up water from the ocean and shook the trees growing on adjacent mountains.

source: तद्धि तेजस्तु मित्रस्य उर्वश्याः पूर्वमाहितम्। तस्मिन्समभवत्कुम्भे तत्तेजो यत्र वारुणम्॥
target: Before the vital energy of Varuna was thrown into the pot Mitra discharged his own on Urvasi's account which was the source of Agastya's birth. (Into the pot in which Mitra's energy was discharged Varuņa also put his own and both the energies were mixed up).

source: युधिष्ठिर उवाच दह्यमानाय विप्राय यः प्रयच्छत्युपानहौ। यत्फलं तस्य भवति तन्मे ब्रूहि पितामह॥
target: Yudhishthira said I wish to hear, O grandfather what the merits are of that person who makes the gift of a pair of sandals to a Brahmana whose feet are burning or being scorched by hot sands while walking.

source: तानि सर्वाण्यतीतानि समपश्यत् ततोऽसितः। आरुह्य च गवां लोके प्रयातो ब्रह्मसत्रिणाम्॥ लोकानपश्यद् गच्छन्तं जैगीषव्यं ततोऽसितः।
target: Thereafter, Asita crossing all that saw him. Having soared next into the blessed region called Golaka, Jaigishavya was next scen to pass into those of the Brahmasatris.

source: क्रियावद्भिर्हि कौन्तेय देवलोकः समावृतः। . न चैतदिष्टं देवानां मर्त्यरूपनिवर्तनम्॥
target: The world of the celestials is filled, O son of Kunti, with those who follow the religion of actions. The cessation of the body is not liked by the celestials.

source: गायद्भिर्नृत्यमानैश्च वादयद्भिश्च सर्वशः। वृतं पार्श्वचरैर्दिव्यैरात्मतुल्यपराक्रमैः॥
target: He was cncircled by companions all endued with prowess equal to his own, who were singing or dancing or playing on various inusical instruments.

source: षट्पदोद्गीतनिनदैविघुष्टं सामगैरिव। पुंस्कोकिलरवोन्मिश्रं जीवं जीवकनादितम्॥
target: It resounded with the hum of bees as if they were reciting Samas. It echoed with the melodious notes of males Kokilas and Chakoras.

source: यच्चैवं मन्यसे मूढ न मे कश्चिद् व्यतिक्रमः। पाण्डवेष्विति तत् सर्वं निबोधत नराधिपाः॥
target: O fool, you think that there is nothing blamable in your conduct towards the Pandavas; all the kings here know this.

source: पश्यन्निव च तां सीतामपश्यन्मन्मन्थार्दितः। उवाच राघवो वाक्यं विलापाश्रयदुर्वचम्॥
target: Pierced with the shafts of Manmatha, Rāghava, as if beholding Sītā though he actually did not see her, uttered the following piteous accents

source: सुग्रीवमङ्गदं नीलं शरभं गन्धमादनम्। जाम्बवन्तं सुषेणं च वेगदर्शिनमेव च॥ मैन्दं नलं ज्योतिमुखं द्विविदं चापि वानरम्। विभीषणो हनूमांश्च ददृशाते हतारणे॥
target: Vibhīşaņa and Hanuman beheld there Sugriva, Angada Nila, Gandhamādana, Jambhavan, Susena, Vegadarshin, Mainda, Nala, Jyotimukha, and the monkey, Dvivida, almost slain.

source: तेषां परमहृष्टानां जयमात्मनि पश्यताम्। संरब्धानां महावेगः प्रादुरासीद् विशाम्पते॥
target: The violence of tie collision was indeed very great collision that then took place on the field of battle between those warriors all of whom were filled with joy and rage and inspired with hopes of victory.

source: जानामि वीर्यं तव राक्षसेन्द्र बलं प्रतापं च पराक्रमं च रागच्छ किं मोघविकत्थनेन।१६॥
target: O lord of Raksasas, I know your prowess and strength and energy and vigour. Here am I stationed, bow and shafts in hand. Come you. What is the use of vain-glorious self-laudation?

source: व्यासोक्तं श्रूयते येन कृत्वा ब्राह्मणमग्रतः॥ स नरः सर्वकामांश्च कीर्ति प्राप्येह शौनक।
target: That man, O Shaunaka, who hears this history, placing a Brahmana before him, acquires both fame and the fruition of all his desires.

source: किमियं वक्ष्यतीत्येवं विममर्श भृगूद्वहः। इति दध्यौ चिरं रामः कृपयाभिपरिप्लुतः॥
target: "What shall this one say?" So thought Bhrigu; thinking thus Rama was silent for a long time filled with pity.

source: काञ्चनोरश्छदान् दिव्यान् पिशाचवदनान् खरान्। तांश्चास्य जवसम्पन्नाञ्जघान समरे बली॥
target: Thereupon moving away with the wind of his wings Rāvana's blazing cuirass resembling flaming fire, Jațāyu in that conflict made away with his fleet-coursing asses having the faces of demons.

source: न मे वागनृतं प्राह स्वैरेष्वपि कुतोऽन्यथा। तं वै नृपवरं गत्वा दीक्षितं जनमेजयम्॥ वाग्भिर्मङ्गलयुक्ताभिस्तोषयिष्येऽद्य मातुल। यथा स यज्ञो नृपतेनिवर्तिष्यति सत्तम॥
target: None can say that my words even in jest have ever been false, not to speak of my words on serious occasions. O uncle, going to that best of kings, Janamejaya, now installed in the sacrifice, I shall please him with words mixed with blessings, so that, O excellent one, that king will refrain from the sacrifice.

source: श्रुत्वा चर्षिस्तद् वचनं शुकस्य प्रीतो महात्मा पुनराह चैनम्। भो भो पुत्र स्थीयतां तावदद्य यावच्चक्षुः प्रीणयामि त्वदर्थे॥
target: Hearing of Shuka's intention, the great Rishi became highly pleased. Addressing him the great Rishi said,-0 son, O dear son, do you stay here to-day so that I may see you for some time for gratifying my eyes.

source: अभ्ययुः पाण्डवं युद्धे विसृजन्तः शिलीमुखान्। चित्रोपचित्रश्चित्राक्षश्चारुचित्र: शरासनः॥
target: Rushed against Pandu's son in battle shooting numerous sharp arrows. They were Chitra, Upachitra, Chitraksha, Charuchitra, Chitrasana.

source: स चापरिमितप्रज्ञस्तच्छ्रुत्वा पार्थभाषितम्। किमुक्तवान् महेष्वासो भीष्मः प्रहरतां वरः॥
target: What also did, that great bowman Bhishma, that foremost among strikers, endued with unlimited wisdom, say after he had heard what the son of Pritha had said?

source: यो वै दर्पात् संहननोपपन्नः। सुदुर्बलः पर्वतमाविहन्ति। तस्यैव पाणिः सनखो विदीर्यते न चैव शैलस्य हि दृश्यते व्रणः॥
target: That weak man, who in the pride of his strength strikes a blow at a mountain, only hurts his hands and nails. He can not wound the mountains.

source: रुधिराक्तः स वेगेन शरीरान्तकरः शरः। रावणस्य हरन्प्राणान्विवेश धरणीतलम्॥
target: That body-ending arrow bathed in blood stealing away the life of Råvana entered the earth.

source: अवध्यं पाण्डवं मन्ये धर्मराज युधिष्ठिरम्॥ अस्मिंस्तु मम संकल्पे ब्रूहि किंचिदनुग्रहम्। इदं वा परमत्रैव शृणु हृत्स्थं विविक्षितम्॥
target: I admit that the righteous Yudhishthira, son of Pandu, is unslayable. In this connection kindly tell me something in my favour. Hear me tell you of something else that lies in my heart.

source: इदं तावद् यथाकाममीश्वरस्य कृते कृतम्। रामस्य तु परित्यागे न हेतुमुपलक्षये॥
target: Even if this has been done in harmony with the wish of the Lord, I do not perceive any reason for the banishment of Rāma.

source: शप्त्वाथ शपथान् घोरान् सर्वसैन्यस्य पश्यतः। गत्वा दौर्योधनं सैन्यं किं वै वक्ष्यथ मुख्यशः॥
target: Having taken dreadful oaths before the eyes of the entire troops, what shall you say to the leaders of Duryodhana's army if now you go back to them?

source: सुयोधनो नाहतीति क्षमामेवं न विन्दति। अर्हस्तत्राहमित्येवं तस्मान्मां विन्दते क्षमा॥
