target: O illustrious god of gods! O you lotus-sprung! by the imprecation of Nimi I have been now deprived of my body and been converted into air.

source: तत: शुभामापतती स शक्तिं विद्युत्प्रभा शान्तनवेन मुक्ताम्। गदां च मद्राधिपबाहुमुक्तां द्वाभ्यां शराभ्यां निचकर्त वीरः॥
target: That hero cut down with two arrows the blazing dart, as effulgent as lightning that came towards him hurled by Shantanu's son and the mace hurled by the Madra king.

source: सम्मानिता यास्यथ तैर्यथेष्टं विमुच्य वाहानवरोहयध्वम्। प्रियातिथिर्धर्मसुतो महात्मा प्रोतो भविष्यत्यभिवीक्ष्य युष्मान्॥
target: Do you get down and dismiss your carriage so that yet may go after receiving a befitting welcome from them. The high-souled son of Dharma is fond of guests and will, in sooth, be glad to see you.

source: दलोलुपः साधुभिरागतः स्यात्। यात्रार्थमाहारमिहाददीत तथास्य स्याज्जाठरी द्वारगुप्तिः॥
target: One should not abstain entirely from food. One should not eat too much. One should give up covetousness, and always seek company of the good. One should eat only so much as is necessary for keeping life. By acting thus one succeeds in properly governing the door represented by his stomach.

source: महासत्त्वबलोपेतः सर्वा विद्योतयन्दिशः। कामरूपः कामगमः कामवीर्यो विहंगमः॥
target: He enkindled all the points of the universe, he was the bird endowed with strength, capable of assuming any form at will, of going every where at will and calling any amount of energy to action at will.

source: व्यालास्त्रसर्गोत्तमयत्नमन्युभिः शरेण मूर्ध्न प्रजहार सूतजः। दिवाकरेन्दुज्वलनप्रभत्विषं सुवर्णमुक्तामणिवज्रभूषितम्॥
target: The powerful Brahma had made this headdress for the king of gods himself, with gold and pearls, endued with the effulgence by Indra himself to Parthas. It was given by Indra himself to Partha when the latter killed his enemies.

source: स गुरुं पार्थ कस्मात् त्वं हन्तुकामोऽभिधावसि। असम्प्रघार्य धर्माणां गति सूक्ष्मा दुरत्ययाम्॥
target: Why, O Partha, do you rush upon your superior, intending to slay him, without determining (before-hand) the exceedingly fine course of virtue which is, certainly, not easily intelligible.

source: सारस्वतं ततः पर्व तीर्थवंशानुकीर्तनम्। अत ऊर्ध्वं सुबीभत्सं पर्व सौप्तिकमुच्यते॥
target: Then Sarasvata and the description of Tirtha and Vansha and then Sauptika, describing the disgraceful conduct of the Kurus.

source: लोहिताक्षं महाबाहुं जातं सिंहमिवाद्रिषु। उपेन्द्रसदृशं ब्रत कथमायोधने हतः॥
target: Tell me, Oh, how that hero possessed of mighty arms and red eyes, who was born in our race, like a lion on the mountain breast and who resembled Upendra himself, has been slain in battle?

source: कङ्कबल्लवगोपाला जामग्रन्थिश्च वीर्यवान्। युद्ध्येयुरिति मे बुद्धिवर्तते नात्र संशयः॥
target: There is no doubt Kanka, Ballava, Tantipala and the greatly energetic Damagranthi will fight.

source: ततः सचेतनो जन्तु भिजानाति किंचन। तमसा संवृतज्ञानः संवृतेष्वेव मर्मसु। स जीवो निरधिष्ठानचाल्यते मातरिश्वना॥
target: The creature then, though still possessed of consciousness, fails to know anything. The vital part being all worked up, the knowledge of the living creature becomes overwhelmed by darkness.

source: शृण्वन्तु क्षत्रियाः सर्वे यावन्तोऽत्र समागताः॥ यदा शूरं च भीरुं च मारयत्यन्तकः सदा। को नु मूढो न युध्येत पुरुषः क्षत्रियो ध्रुवम्॥
target: Listen, all you Kshatriyas that are here. When Dcath always kills heroes and cowards alike what man is there so foolish that, calling himself a Kshatriya, will not fight.

source: मारीचश्चिन्तयामास विशिष्टान्मरणं वरम्॥ अवश्यं मरणे प्राप्ते करिष्याम्यस्य यन्मतम्।
target: Maricha then considered (within himself) "since death is certain then it is preferable at the hands of a superior being. I shall do what he (Ravana) desires."

source: विविधं संहिताज्ञानं दीपयन्ति मनीषिणः। व्याख्यातुं कुशलाः केचिद्ग्रन्थान्धारयितुं परे।५३। तपसा ब्रह्मचर्येण व्यस्य वेदं सनातनम्। इतिहासमिमं चक्रे पुण्यं सत्यवतीसुतः॥
target: Learned men display their various knowledge of Smritis in commenting on this composition. Some are skillful in explaining it while others in remembering it. The son of Satyavati (Vyasa,) by penances and mediation, having classified the ever-lasting Veda, composed this holy history.

source: ज्येष्ठाय राज्यमदाद् धृतराष्ट्राय धीमते। यवीयसे तथा क्षत्रे कुरूणां वंशवर्धनः॥
target: To his elder brother the wise Dhritarashtra, that perpetuator of the Kuru race gave the kingdom as also to his younger brother Vidura.

source: प्राक्कर्मभिस्तु भूतानि भवन्ति न भवन्ति च। एवं सांसिद्धिके लोके किमर्थमनुतप्यसे॥
target: Creatures are born or destroyed according to their pristine acts. When such is the course of the world, why do you grieve?

source: बुद्धिशूरास्तथा चान्ये क्षमाशूरास्तथापरे। आर्जवे च तथा शूराः शमे वर्तन्ति मानवाः।
target: Likewise, there are others who are called heroes of the intellect, and also heroes of forgiveness. There are other men who live in tranquillity and who are considered as heroes of virtue.

source: अहमासं पण्डितको हैतुको वेदनिन्दकः। आन्वीक्षिकी तर्कविद्यामनुरक्तो निरर्थिकाम्॥
target: In my previous birth 1 had much useless learning. I always tried to find out reasons and had very little faith. I used to censure the Vedas. I was unacquainted with the fourfold objects of life, and was devoted to the science of reaping which is based upon ocular or tangible proofs.

source: प्रतिगृह्य तु तत्सर्वं कृतास्त्रो द्विजसत्तमः। प्रियं सखायं सुप्रीतो जगाम दुपदं प्रति॥
target: That excellent Brahmana (Drona) after receiving all of them and considering himself amply rewarded, went to (the country of) his friend Drupada in a delight-full heart.

source: कार्तिकं तु नरो मासं यः कुर्यादेकभोजनम्। शूरश्च बहुभार्यश्च कीर्तिमांश्चैव जायते॥
target: He who passes the month of Kartika, taking himself one meal every day, becomes possessed of heroism, many wives and great fame.

source: तत्र चैव महाराज दीक्षिते प्रपितामहे। यजतस्तस्य सत्रेण सर्वकामसमृद्धिना॥ मनसा चिन्तिता ह्या धर्मार्थकुशलैस्तदा। उपतिष्ठन्ति राजेन्द्र द्विजातींस्तत्र तत्र ह॥
target: There, O king, while the grandfather was initiated in the sacrifice and was performing the grand ceremony capable of granting prosperity and wished-for objects many great Rishis, conversant with virtue and profit, were present. As soon as they thought of necessary articles, they, O king, immediately came before the Rishis.

source: स्त्रियो ज्वलन्तीस्त्रपयोपगूढा निशीथकाले रमणोपगूढाः। ददर्श काश्चित् प्रमदोपगूढा यथा विहंगा विहगोपगूढाः॥
target: At dead of night Hanuman saw some females blazing in beauty affected simultaneously with bashfulness and bliss, on being embraced by their paramours, like birds embracing their mates.

source: शतशश्चापरान् योधान् सद्विपांश्च रथान् रणे॥ शरैरवचकर्ताग्रैः क्रुद्धोऽन्तक इव प्रजाः।
target: He then cut-off many other warriors hundreds in number and elephants and cars in

source: न दृष्टपूर्वं प्रत्यक्षं परलोकं विदुर्बुधाः। आगमांस्त्वनतिक्रम्य श्रद्धातव्यं बुभूषता॥
target: The wise men behold, as if with corporeal eyes, the next world which is unseen. Without setting at naught the scriptures, one desirous of knowledge should cherish faith.

source: अधर्मेण न गृह्णीयां त्वया दत्तां महीमिमाम्। न हि धर्मः स्मृतो राजन् क्षत्रियस्य प्रतिग्रहः॥
target: I cannot sinfully accept this Earth as a gift from you. Acceptance of a gift, O king, is not the duty of a Kshatriya.

source: मानुषी मानुषं तं तु राममिच्छसि शोभने। राज्याद् भ्रष्टमसिद्धार्थं विक्लवन्तमनिन्दिते॥
target: You are a woman, O you of comely presence, and therefore dose your fancy cling to Rāma, O you of a blameless countenance, who is a man, deprived of his kingdom, overwhelmed with disasters and has his desires frustrated.

source: न ह्येतामाशिष पाणडुर्न चाहं न पितामहः। प्रयुक्तवन्तः पूर्वं ते यया चरसि मेधया।॥
target: Pandu, nor myself, nor your grandfather blessed you then formerly for that you should follow the course you are adopting.

source: काशिराज्यं तदद्यैव त्वदर्थं जीवितं तथा। त्यजेयं भव विश्रब्धः कपोत न भयं तव॥
target: I shall, for your sake give up today the very kingdom of the Kashis and, if necessary my life too! Be comforted, therefore, do no fear, O pigeon.

source: यतः प्रवर्तते तन्त्रं यत्र च प्रतितिष्ठति। प्राणोऽपान: समानश्च व्यानश्चोदार एव च॥ तत एव प्रवर्तन्ते तदेव प्रविशन्ति च। समानव्यानयोर्मध्ये प्राणापानौ विचेरतुः॥
target: It is that from which proceeds the wellordained universe, and it that upon which it depends. The vital airs called Prana, Apana, Samana, Vyana and Udana, flow from it, and it is that into which they again enter. The vital airs Prana and Apana move between Samana and Vyana.

source: यथाश्रु पतितं तेषां दीनानामथ सीदताम्। ब्राह्मणानां हृते क्षेत्रे हन्यात् त्रिपुरुषं कुलम्॥
target: The tears that would drop from the eyes of such cheerless and destitute Brahmaras on account of their lands being resumed, are capable of destroying the ancestors and descendants to the third generation of the resumer.

source: त्वगस्थिभूतः परिशुष्कमांसो जटाजिनी वल्कलसंवृताङ्गः। स पार्थिवस्तत्र तपश्चचार महर्षिवत्तीव्रमपेतमोहः॥
target: Shorn of all stupefaction of mind, king Dhritarashthra began to practice vows and penances like a great Rishi, reducing his body to skin and bones, for his flesh was all dried up, bearing inatted locks on heard, and his person clad in barks and skins.

source: पश्य सागरमक्षोभ्यं वैदेहि वरुणालयम्॥ अपारमिव गर्जन्तं शङ्खशुक्तिसमाकुलम्।
target: Do you O Vaidehī, behold the unagitated deep-the abode of Varuņa, appearing as if without the other end, roaring and abounding in conchs and pearl oysters.

source: तान् पाद्यमधुपर्कार्हान् गवार्हान् सत्कृतिं गतान्। प्रत्युत्थाय जरासंध उपतस्थे यथाविधि॥ उवाच चैतान् राजासौ स्वागतं वोऽस्त्विति प्रभुः। मौनमासीत् तदा पार्थभीमयोर्जनमेजय॥
target: Jarasandha rose up in haste saying “Welcome to you”. He received his visitors with proper ceremonies, with water to wash their feet, with honey, with Arghya, with gift of kine and with the other forms of respect. O Janamejaya, both Partha and Bhima remained silent.

source: सर्वे प्रत्यक्षधर्माणो जितक्रोधा जितेन्द्रियाः। दमे स्थिताश्च सर्वे ते हिंसादम्भविवर्जिताः॥
target: All of them were men who had obtained a sight of the deity of virtue in his embodied form. They had subjugated anger and acquired a complete mastery over all their senses. Living in the observance of self-control, they were freed from pride and the desire of injuring others.

source: येषां चैकान्तभावेन स्वभावात् कारणं मतम्। पूत्वा तृणमिषीकां वा ते लभन्ते न किंचन॥
target: They again, who firinly believe that all Cause is due to the Nature of things, cannot acquire any truth by even listening to learned 17en or the Rishis.

source: कामगाः कामचारिण्यः कामात् कामांश्च भुञ्जते॥ वाप्यः सरांसि सरितो विविधानि वनानि च। गृहाणि पर्वताश्चैव यावद्र्व्यं च किंचन॥ मनोज्ञं सर्वभूतेभ्यः सर्वतन्त्रं प्रदृश्यत। ईदृशाद् विपुलाल्लोकान्नास्ति लोकस्तथाविधः॥
target: Capable of going everywhere at will and actually going from place to place with ease, they enjoy the fruition of desire after desire as it arises in their minds. Lakes, tanks, rivers, forests of diverse kinds, mansions, hills and all kinds of delightful objects are to be seen there. There is no region of happiness that is superior to any of these of which I speak.

source: यज्ञवाटगताश्चापि मुनयः सर्व एव ते। राजानश्च नरव्याघ्रा विस्मयानोपरेमिरे॥
target: The Rşis, kings and other leading men present in the sacrificial arena repeatedly expressed their surprise.

source: शङ्खचक्रगदाहस्तं यदा द्रक्ष्यसि केशवम्। पर्याददानं चास्त्राणि भीमधन्वानमर्जुनम्॥
target: When you will see Keshava with the conch, the disc and the mace in his hand and Arjuna with that terrific-looking bow taking up weapons.

source: अभ्यधावन् सुसंक्रुद्धाः सौभद्रमपराजितम्। ते तु पौत्रेण ते राजन प्रायशो विमुखीक़ताः॥
target: All these warriors excited with rage rushed against the invincible son of Subhadra. Then those warriors also, O king, were almost beat back by your grandson (Abhimanyu).

source: शिशुनैकेन संग्रामे काल्यमानानि संघशः। द्रक्ष्यन्ति सर्वभूतानि द्विषत्सैन्यानि वै मया॥
target: All creatures will see the enemies' host crushed in large bodies by myself, an unaided child.

source: भरद्वाजाभिगमनं प्रयागे च सभाजनम्। आ गिरेर्गमनं तेषां तत्रस्थैरभिलक्षितम्॥ अनुज्ञातः सुमन्त्रोऽथ योजयित्वा हयोत्तमान्। अयोध्यामेव नगरी प्रययौ गाढदुर्मनाः॥
target: Learning from envoys at (Śrngaverapura) all about Rāma's visit to Bharadvāja at Prayāga and his reception (at Bharadvāja's place) as well as their destined journey (to Citrakuta), Sumantra, taking the permission (of Guha), yoked those excellent horses and with a heavy heart directed his course to the city of Ayodhyā.

source: क्षमा वै साधुमायाति न ह्यसाधूक्षमा सदा। क्षमायाश्चाक्षमायाश्च पार्थ विद्धि प्रयोजनम्॥
target: Forgiveness always comes to the good. It never comes to the bad. Listen now, O Partha, to the uses of forgiveness and of hardness.

source: उल्मुकं तु समुद्यम्य तेषामग्रे धनंजयः। प्रकाशार्थं ययौ तत्र रक्षार्थं च महारथः॥
target: There is the delightful waters of the Ganges was sporting in solitude the proud king of the Gandharvas (Chitraratha) with his wives.

source: स सम्पश्यन् गिरिनदीर्वैदूर्यमणिसंनिभैः। सलिलैर्हिमसंकाशैहँसकारण्डवायुतैः॥
target: He viewed also mountain streamlets containing waters (white and cold) like snow, (sparkling and transparent) like the gem Vaidurya (lapis lazuli) and swarmed with ducks and Karandavas.

source: अभिपेतुर्महाकायाः प्रतियत्ता महाबलाः। राक्षसा वानरानरोषादसिबामगदाधराः॥
target: And fired with fury, those huge-bodied Räkş asas endowed with dreadful prowess, equipped with swords and shafts and maces, being on their guard, fell upon the monkeys.

source: यदि नेच्छति मे दानं यथा दत्तमनेन वै। भवानत्र स्थिरो भूत्वा मार्गे स्थापयिताद्य नौ॥
target: If this my companion does not wish to take from me in return a gift equal to what he gave me, you shall have to judge patiently and put us both on the right road.

source: स तेषु रुधिराम्भ:सुह्रदेषु क्रोधमूर्छितः। पितॄन् संतर्पयामास रुधिरेणेति नः श्रुतम्॥
target: We have heard, that being senseless with anger, he offered oblations to the manes of his ancestors, standing in the bloody water of these lakes.

source: तस्मादयं पुनः शक्रो देवराज्येऽभिषिच्यताम् एवं सम्भाषमाणं तु देवाः पार्थ पितामहम्॥ एवमस्त्विति संदृष्टाः प्रत्यूचुस्तं नराधिप। सोऽभिषिक्तो भगवता देवराज्ये च वासवः॥ ब्रह्मणा राजशार्दूल यथापूर्वं व्यरोचत। एवमेतत् पुरावृत्तं नहुषस्य व्यतिक्रमात्॥
target: Do you, therefore, once more install Indra as the king of Heaven. The celestials filled with joy, O son of Pritha, replied to the Grandsire, who said so to them, saying, So be it. Brahman then, O best of kings, installed Indra in the sovereignty of Heaven. Made once more the king of the celestials, Vasava began to shine in beauty and resplendence. This is what took place forinerly through the transgressions of Nahusha.

source: एवमुक्तः सहस्राक्षो भगवान् पाकशासनः॥ प्रतिसंहृत्य संरम्भमित्युवाच शतक्रतुः।
target: Thus addressed by the kings of the Daityas, the god of a hundred sacrifices, viz., the powerful and thousand-eyed chastiser of Paka, checked his anger and said these words.'

source: तथाहतस्ततश्च त्वं दृष्टिं स्वां प्रतिमुञ्चसि। मत्पक्षप्रतिघाताय स्वपक्षोद्भावनाय च॥
target: By loO king thus towards all these meritorious Brahmanas, it is clear that you wish to humiliate them all the glorify yourself.

source: तथैव पाण्डवा हृष्टा धृष्टद्युम्नपुरोगमाः। परिवब्रुर्महात्मानं पार्थमप्रतिमं युधि॥
target: So Dhristadyumna, with all the Pandavas surrounded the noble Partha matchless in war.

source: मूत्रतश्चासृजत् कांश्चिच्छबरांश्चैव पार्श्वत:। पौण्ड्रान् किरातान् यवनान् सिंहलान् बर्बरान् खसान्॥ चिबुकांश्च पुलिन्दांश्च चीनान् हूणान् सकेरलान्। ससर्ज फेनतः सा गौम्लेंच्छान् बहुविधानायि॥
target: From her urine an army of Kanchis and from her sides an army of Saravanas; and from the froth of her mouth that cow created hosts of Kiratas, Yavanas, Singhalas, Barbaras, Chibuakas, Pulindas, Chinas, Hunas and Keralas and many other Mlecchas.

source: मृगनिर्मोकवसनाश्चीरवल्कलवाससः। निर्द्वन्द्वाः सत्पथं प्राप्ता बालखिल्यास्तपोधनाः॥ अङ्गुष्ठपर्वमात्रा ये भूत्वा स्वे स्वे व्यवस्थिताः। तपश्चरणमीहन्ते तेषां धर्मफलं महत्॥
target: Their dress consists of deerskins or barks of trees. Freed from pairs of opposites, the Valakhilyas, having penances for wealth, walk in this track of virtue. They are as big as a digit of the thumb. Divided into classes, each class lives in the practice of its duties. They wish only to practise penances. The merits they acquire by their righteous conduct are very great.

source: विसर्जित: स रामेण पितुर्वचनकारिणा। नन्दिग्रामेऽकरोद् राज्यं पुरस्कृत्यास्य पादुके॥
target: (But), being dismissed by Rama who was bent on obeying his fathers; words, he (Bharata) began to reign at Nandigram placing his brother's shoes before him.

source: तस्यायमाश्रमः पुण्यस्तस्येमे मुनयः पुरा। शिष्या धर्मपरा वीर तेषां पापं न विद्यते॥
target: This sacred hermitage belongs to Śiva; and these ascetics engaged in pious acts, O hero, have been from father to son his disciples. And no sin touch them.

source: अब्रवीच्च तदा रामं सप्रतोदो रथे स्थितः। प्राञ्जलिर्मातलिक्यिं सहस्राक्षस्य सारथिः॥
target: With his hand holding the reins, the charioteer car, of the thousand-eyed (Deity) with joined hands addressed Rāma: saying.

source: कृच्छ्रान् दुर्योधनो लोकान् पापः प्राप्स्यति दुर्मतिः। यस्य लोभाद् विनिहताः समरे क्षत्रियर्षभाः॥
target: ‘Like a hungry tiger slaying inferior animals, Drona is slaying these Kshatriyas. Surely the wicked Duryodhana will obtain very miserable regions after Death.

source: अभुक्तवत्सु नाश्नाति ब्राह्मणेषु तु यो नरः। अभोजनेन तेनास्य जितः स्वर्गो भवत्युत॥
target: He who abstains from eating till Brahmanas have eaten, is considered considered as conquering Heaven by such abstention.

source: ततस्त्वाश्रमवासाख्यं पर्व पञ्चदशं स्मृतम्। यत्र राज्यं समुत्सृज्य गान्धार्या सहितो नृपः॥ धृतराष्ट्रोश्रमपदं विदुश्च जगाम ह। यं दृष्ट्वा प्रस्थितं साध्वी पृथाप्यनुययौ तदा॥ पुत्रराज्यं परित्यज्य गुरुश्रुश्रूषणे रता। यत्र राजा हतान्पुत्रान्यौत्रानन्यांश्च पार्थिवान्॥
target: Then comes the fifteenth Parva, named Ashramvasika, in which, abdicating the kingdom and accompanied by Gandhari and Vidura, the King Dhritarashtra went to the forest. Seeing this, virtuous Pritha (Kunti) ever engaged in serving her superiors, left the kingdom of her sons and followed the old couple.

source: दिवसं दिवसाधु वा मुहूर्तं वा क्षणं लवम्। न ह्यलब्धप्रसादस्य भक्तिर्भवति शङ्करे॥
target: One, who has not acquired the favour of Mahadeva, can never succeed to devote himself to Mahadeva for a single day or for half a day or for a moment or for a Kshana or for a Lava.

source: असंशयं हितार्थाय ब्रूयास्त्वं मधुसूदन। सर्वं च पाण्डवाः कुर्युस्त्वद्वशित्वान्न संशयः॥
target: Doubtless, O you slayer of Madhu, you are speaking for my own good and the Pandavas too will obey all your instructions, there is no doubt about it.

source: वासुदेव उवाच धर्मराज किमर्थं त्वमधर्ममनुमन्यसे। हतबन्धोर्यदेतस्य पतितस्य विचेतसः॥ दुर्योधनस्य भीमेन मृद्यमानं शिरः पदा। उपप्रेक्षसि कस्मात् त्वं धर्मज्ञः सन्नराधिप।॥
target: Vasudeva said O Yudhishthira why do you allow such a wrong act, since you suffer the head of the insensible and fallen Duryodhana whose relatives and friends have all been killed to be thus struck by Bhima with his foot? conversant as thou art with the rules of Ethics, why do you, O king, look at this act with indifference?'

source: तदेतदेव गाण्डीवं तव पार्थ करोचितम्। मायामास्थाय यद् चस्तं मया पुरुषसत्तम॥
target: O Partha this Gandiva which is fit for (only) your hands is that very bow (with which you chastised the Danavas). O foremost of men. I snatched it from you by means of my power of illusion.

source: ततो रथं समारोप्य कैकेयस्य वृकोदरम्। अभ्यधावत् सुसंक्रुद्धौ द्रोणमिष्वस्त्रपारगम्॥
target: Then placing Vrikodara on the car of the Kaikeya king he, inflamed with rage, rushed against Drona who was accomplished in the use of arrows and all other kinds of weapons.

source: वर्धयन्तस्तथैवान्ये पूजयन्तस्तथाऽपरे। वाग्भिर्ऋग्भूषितार्थाभिः स्तुवन्तो मधुसूदनम्॥
target: Some of them began to glorify him and some began to adore him with respect. Indeed, all of them then sang the praises of the destroyer of Madhu with words whose meanings were adorned with the eternal Richs.

source: अत्रैव दास्याम्यपरं द्वितीयं दुर्योधन यज्ञपशु विशस्य। शिरो मृदिन्ता च पदा दुरात्मनः शान्ति लप्स्ये कौरवाणां समक्षम्॥
target: I will very soon redeem my other promise by crushing the head of that other the miscreant Duryodhana with my foot, as a sacrifice in this warfare, before all the Kauravas and then I will know peace."

source: भीमस्य निघ्नतः शत्रून् पाणिं जग्राह पाण्डवः। द्रोणोऽपि पाण्डुपञ्चालान् व्यधमद् रजनीमुखे॥
target: The son of Pandu, took up his station at the flank of Bhima who was destroying the foes. Drona also began, at that nigiit, to destroy his enemies, the Panchalas.

source: शिरश्च तत् पूर्णशशिप्रभाननं सरोषताम्रायतनेत्रमुन्नसम्। क्षितावपि भ्राजति तत् सकुण्डलं विशाख्योर्मध्यगतः शशी यथा॥
target: The head, again, that was furnished with a face resembling the full moon and with eyes, large and red like copper, on account of wrath and that had a prominent nose and also that was adorned with the ear-rings, blazed upon the earth, even as the moon shines between two constellations.

source: ततः श्रुतो मया शब्दो जले कुम्भस्य पूर्यतः। द्विपोऽयमिति मत्वाहं बाणेनाभिहतो मया॥ गत्वा तस्यास्ततस्तीरमपश्यमिषुणा हृदि। विनिर्भिन्नं गतप्राणं शयानं भुवि तापसम्॥
target: Then hearing sounds from the water of a filling pitcher, I thought, This must be an elephant. I wounded it with a shaft. Next coming to the edge of the river, I saw an ascetic lying down on the ground almost deprived of life, with his heart pierced with an arrow.

source: द्रुतं सरस्वतीकूलात् स्मयन्निव महाबलः। ततो भृगुर्महातेजा मैत्रावरुणिमब्रवीत्॥
target: Possessed of great strength Nahusha smiling all the while, set that great Rishi speedily to the task, commanding him to bear the vehicle from the banks of the Sarasvati. At this time, Bhrigu, possessed of great energy, addressed the son of Mitravaruna, saying:

source: पाञ्चालानां ततः सेनामुद्भूतार्णवनिःस्वनाम्। भीमसेनो महाबाहुर्दण्डपाणिरिवान्तकः॥ प्रविवेश महासेनां मकरः सागरं यथा। स्वयमभ्यद्रवद् भीमो नागानीकं गदाधरः॥
target: As a Makara enters the sea, so the mightyarmed Yama-like Bhima with his club in his hand entered the Panchala ranks and roared as fiercely as the ocean in a tempest. Ever skillful in battle, Bhima, the son of Pritha, upraising his club, attacked the soldiers riding on elephants with the powers of his arms like the great destroyer himself.

source: ततः कर्णो महाराज व्याक्षिपद् विजयं धनुः॥ अर्जुनं समरे क्रुद्धः प्रेक्षमाणो मुहुमुर्हः। द्वैरथं चापि पार्थेन कामयानो महारणे॥
target: Then, O king, Karna took up his bow, Vijaya and filled with anger he again and again cast his looks on Arjuna desiring for a duel with him.

source: यदाश्रौषं सैन्धवार्थे प्रतिज्ञा प्रतिज्ञातां तद्वधायार्जुनेन। सत्यां तीर्णां शत्रुमध्ये च तेन तदा नाशंसे विजयाय संजय॥
target: I had no hope of success, O Sanjaya, when I heard that Arjuna had taken the vow of killing Saindhava and he had fulfilled his vow in the presence of his enemies.

source: हस्तावापं सुबाहोस्तु भल्लेन युधि पाण्डवः। चिच्छेद तं चैव पुनः शरवर्षैरवाकिरत्॥
target: Then in that battle the son of Pandu, with a broad-headed arrow cut-off the finger-guard of Suvahu and also covered him over with arrowy showers.

source: अथाध्वनि परिश्रान्तमर्धरात्रे स्थितं बलम्। सुखसुप्तं समासाद्य चरितं प्रथमं चरैः॥
target: Then at midnight (my) spies coming to that host, thus stationed, fatigued from travel, and sleeping soundly (in consequence), first ranged it.

source: ततः सत्यवतः कायात् पाशबद्धं वशं गतम्। अङ्गुष्ठमात्रं पुरुषं निश्चकर्ष यमो बलात्॥
target: Then Yama powerfully drew out of the body of Satyavana a person of the measure of the thumb, bound him with the noose and brought him under control.

source: पूर्वं चाभिगतं सन्तो भजन्ते पूर्वसारिणः। त्वं च श्रेष्ठतमो लोके सतामद्य जनार्दन। सततं सम्मतश्चैव सद्वृत्तमनुपालय॥
target: From the time of our ancestors, good men have befriended him who has been the first to come; and you, O Janardana, are the best person in this world; therefore act after this good example which has always been followed."

source: दशरथनृपसूनुबाणवेगै रजनिचरं निहतं खरात्मजं तम्। प्रददृशुरथ देवताः : प्रहृष्टा गिरिमिव वज्रहतं यथा विकीर्णम् ॥
target: Seeing that night-ranger, the son of Khara, slain by Rāma's arrows, like to a mountain clept by a thunder-bolt, the celestials were greatly delighted.

source: उच्चैराकाशमार्गेण हता:स्मस्तैः सुदुःखिताः। अथ नः सैनिकाः केचिदमात्याश्च महारथाः॥
target: We were overwhelmed with sorrow and we were being taken by them ihrough high skies. Our Thereupon some of soldiers and counsellers and great car-warriors.

source: सुहृदां चापि धर्मज्ञाः प्रचक्रुः सलिलक्रियाः। उदके क्रियमाणे तु वीराणां वीरपत्निभिः॥ सूपतीर्था भवद्गङ्गा भूयो विप्रससार च।
target: While those wives of heroes were performing this rite in honour of their heroic husband, the access to the stream became easy, although the paths (carved out by feet) disappeared afterwards.

source: त्वत्समो नास्ति लोकेऽस्मिन् क्षत्रियः पृथिवीचरः। गम्यतां भीष्म युद्धेऽस्मिंस्तोषितोऽहं भृशं त्वया॥
target: "There is no Kshatriya among all men equal to you on the face of the earth. Go you, O Bhishma, for in this combat I have been highly pleased with you.

source: वयं काकाः कुतो नाम चरामः काकवाशिकाः। हंस प्राणैः प्रपद्ये त्वामुदकान्तं नयस्व माम्॥
target: “We are crows, we move about here and there crying caw, caw. O swan, I lay my life at your hands and seek refuge with you. Take me to the bank of the ocean.'

source: उभे सत्यानृते त्यक्त्वा शोकानन्दौ प्रियाप्रिये। भयाभयं च संत्यज्य स प्रशान्तो निरामयः॥
target: By shaking off both truth and falsehood, grief and joy, the agreeable and disagreeable, fearlessness and fear, one acquires tranquillity, and becomes free from anxiety.

source: शान्तनुः खलु गङ्गां भागीरथीमुपयेमे। तस्थामस्य जज्ञे देवव्रतो नाम यामाहुर्भीष्ममिति॥
target: Shantanu married Ganga and she gave birth to a son, named Devavrata, who was afterwards called Bhishma.

source: तावर्जुनं चतुःषष्ट्यासप्तत्या च जनार्दनम्। शराणां च शतैरश्वानविध्येतां मुदान्वितौ॥
target: Filled with delight they pierced Arjuna with sixty-four, Janardana with seventy and the horses with a hundred shafts.

source: महावराहसृष्टा च पिण्डोत्पत्तिः पुरातनी। प्रवृत्तौ च निवृत्तौ च यो यथा परिकल्पितः॥
target: I have also heard from you the origin of the Pinda (funeral cake), from the mighty Boar. I have heard from you about those gods and Rishis that were ordained for the religion of Action and of those that were ordained for the Religion of Renunciation.

source: उद्यन्तं च ततो गच्छेत् पर्वतं गीतनादितम्। सावित्र्यास्तु पदं तत्र दृश्यते भरतर्षभ॥
target: O best of the Bharata race, one should then go to Udyanta mountain resounding with melodious notes. The foot-prints of Savitri are still to be seen there.

source: अथ हृष्टो दशरथः सुमन्त्रं प्रत्यभाषत। यथर्घ्यशृङ्गस्त्वानीतो येनोपायेन सोच्यताम्॥
target: Thereupon king Dasaratha, well pleased, asked Sumantra, Do you now tell me by what means Rşyaśộnga was brought over (by the lord of the Angas).

source: भीमस्तु तव पुत्रेण युद्धशौण्डेन संगतः॥ पाञ्चाल्यः सात्यकिश्चैव माद्रीपुत्रौ च पाण्डवौ। शकुनिप्रमुखान् वीरान् प्रत्यगृह्णन् समन्ततः॥
target: Bhima fought with your son, the delighter in batlle. Dhristadyumna, Satyaki and the two sons of Madri by Pandu received Shakuni and the other Kuru heroes around.

source: पूर्वं हि विहितं कर्म देहिनं न विमुञ्चति। धात्रा विधिरयं दृष्टो बहुधा कर्मनिर्णये॥
target: The acts done before (in one's own former birth) never leave any creature. In determining the various effects of Karma, the Creator did see it.

source: ते हित्वा समरे कर्ण वध्यमानाश्च सायकैः। प्रदुद्रुवुर्दिशो भीताश्चक्रुशुश्चापि सूतजम्॥
target: Distressed to death by (Arjuna's) shafts they all, leaving Karna, began to disperse themselves on all directions abusing the son of Suta all the time.

source: परिच्छिद्यैव कामानां सर्वेषां चैव कर्मणाम्। मूलं बुद्धीन्द्रियग्रामं शकुन्तानिव पञ्जरे॥
target: One should shut up, like birds in a cage, the very springs, viz., the understanding and the senses, of his desires and acts.

source: भारतानां समेतानामुत्सृज्यैको मतानि यः। गतो युधिष्ठिरं भक्त्या त्यक्त्वा सर्वमभीप्सितम्॥ लोहिताक्षं महाबाहुं बृहन्तं तमरट्टजाः। महासत्त्वा महाकायाः सौवर्णस्यन्दने स्थितम्॥
target: Setting at naught the opinions of the assembled Bharatas, that prince who alone out of his reverence for Yudhishthira had sided with him abandoning all his cherished hopes. That mighty-armed Brihanta of red eyes was borne by huge-bodied, greatly powerful steeds, as he sat in his chariot.

source: य चेच्छक्नोत्ययं साधुर्योक्तुमात्मानमात्मनि। तत एकान्तशीलः स पश्यत्यात्मानमात्मनि॥
target: If the good man succeeds in concentrating the mind on the soul, he then, used to exclusive meditation, secs the Supreme Soul in his own soul.

source: ते गत्वा परमं राम कैलासं धातुमण्डितम्। अग्नि नियोजयामासुः पुत्रार्थं सर्वदेवताः॥
target: Then, O Rama, repairing to the Kailasa mountain teeming with metals, the deities commissioned Agni with the view of having a son (born to him.)10

source: श्रुत्वा गृहीतं वार्ष्णेयं पाण्डवा हतचेतसः। निरुत्साहा भविष्यन्ति भग्नदंष्ट्रा इवोरगाः॥
target: Hearing that the scion of the Vrishni race has been captured, the sons of Pandu will lose heart and will became deprived of their energy like serpents whose fangs have been broken.

source: न लिप्यते फलैश्चापि पद्मपत्रमिवाम्भसा। कर्मात्मा त्वपरो योऽसौ मोक्षबन्धैः स युज्यते॥
target: The acting Soul is different. That Soul is sometimes engaged in acts and when it succeeds in renouncing acts acquires Liberation or identity with the Supreme Soul.

source: मे युधिष्ठिर उवाच न ममैतन्मतं कृष्णं यत् त्वं यायाः कुरून् प्रति। सुयोधनः सूक्तमपि न करिष्यति ते वचः॥
target: Yudhishthira said It is not my wish, O Krishna, that you should go to the Kurus. For Suyodhana, though spoken in a most friendly manner and for his own good, will not listen to your words.

source: धृतराष्ट्र उवा ब्रवीहि विदुर त्वं मे पुराणं तं सनातनम्। कथमेतेन देहेन स्यादिहैव समागमः॥
target: Dhritarashtra said Tell me, O Vidura, how I can with this body of mine meet with that ancient and eternal being in this world.

source: वाजिनां बाह्निजातानामयुतान्यददं दशा कर्काणां हेममालानां न च तेनाहमागतः॥
target: I also gave away a hundred thousand horses of the Valhika breed, all of white complexion, and adorned with garlands of gold. It is not, however, through the merits of those deeds that I have acquired this region.

source: एषा गोदावरी रम्या प्रसन्नसलिला शुभा॥ अगस्त्यस्याश्रमश्चैव दृश्यते कदलीवृतः।
target: Do you behold there the beautiful and sacred river Godāvarī having clear water and the hermitage of Agastya, surrounded by plantain trees.

source: काममार्य सुपर्याप्तो वधायास्य दुरात्मनः। विधमिष्याम्यहं चैतमनुजानीहि मां विभो॥
target: O noble one, I alone am fit to compass the destruction of this wicked-minded one. I will slay him. Do you, O master, permit me.

source: नैष देवान् न गन्धर्वान् नासुरान् न च राक्षसान्। भयादिह न युध्येत कुन्तीपुत्रो धनंजयः॥
target: Dhananjaya, the son of Kunti, never from fear, withdraws himself from fighting even if it be with the Gandharvas, Asuras or Rakshasas.

source: गजो गवाक्षो वृषभश्चर्मवानार्जवः शुकः। षडेते बलसम्पन्ना निर्ययुर्महतो बलात्॥
target: Gaja, Gavaksha, Vrishabha, Charmavan, Arjava and Shuka, these six highly puissant heroes rode out of the mighty ranks the Kauravas,

source: दुर्योधनप्रभृतयो दृष्टा लोकान्तरं गताः। व्यासस्य तपसो वीर्याद् भवतश्च समागमात्॥
target: We have seen Duryodhana and others who have become dwellers of the other world, through the power of Vyasa's penances and through the merit of this my meeting with you.

source: प्रगृह्य च महाशक्तिं कालशक्तिमिवापराम्। समुत्क्षिप्य च राधेयः संधाय च महाबलः॥
target: Taking up that fierce lance that resembled a second dart of Death and tilting it and aiming it, the powerful son of Radha.

source: सर्वमव्यक्तमित्युक्तमसर्वः पञ्चविंशकः। य एनमभिजानन्ति न भयं तेषु विद्यते॥
target: All things, have been said to be the result of the Unmanifest. The Soul, which is the twentyfifth, is above all things. They who know the Soul have no fear of coming back to the world.

source: मुत्सृज्य शत्रून् विनिवर्तमानम्। विराटराष्ट्राभिमुखं प्रयान्तं नाशक्नुवंस्तं कुरवोऽभियातुम्॥
target: The Kauravas could not withstand Arjuna, when, after dispersing the enemies, he proceeded towards Virata's city, like an elephant with rent temples.

source: क्षत्रियस्य तु धर्मोऽयं यद् युद्धं भृगुनन्दन। स्वाध्यायो व्रतचर्याऽथ ब्राह्मणानां परं धनम्॥
target: This is the duty of a Kshatriya, viz., to fight; O descendant of Bhrigu, study and the observance of religious austerities are the best wealth of the Brahmanas.

source: भूत्वा हि नृपतिः पूर्वं समाज्ञाप्य च मेदिनीम्। कथमेकोऽद्य राजेन्द्र तिष्ठसे निर्जने वने।॥
target: You were a king who had issued your commands to all the world! Why then, O foremost of kings, do you lie alone on the bare ground?

source: एतदिच्छामि भगवन् बकशक्रसमागमम्। सुखदुःखसमायुक्तं तत्त्वेन कथयस्व मे॥
target: O exalted one, I desire to hear the account of the meetings of Indra and Baka which is both full of joy as well as grief. Tell me all this in detail.

source: स तथेति प्रतिज्ञाय तां कन्यां प्रतिगृह्य च। उवास नगरे तस्मिस्तिस्त्रः कुन्तीसुतः समाः॥
target: Promising to he accepted that maiden and the son of Kunti lived in that city for three years.

source: तं भीमसेनः सम्प्राप्तं वत्सदन्तैः स्तनान्तरे। विव्याध बलवान् क्रुद्धस्तोत्रैरिव महाद्विपम्॥
target: Excited to the highest pitch of rage, the mighty Bhimasena, with several Vatsadantas, pierced Karna on the centre of his chest, like a guide goring a mighty elephant with the hook.

source: यदि वैरिषु भृत्येषु स्वजनव्यवहारयोः। विषयेष्विन्द्रयाणां च आकाशे मा पराक्रम॥
target: Your power may extend over your enemies, your servants, your relatives, the disputes that take place between your subjects. Indeed it may extend over every part of your dominions and over also your own senses. Your power, however, does, not extend over the sky.

source: भार्यार्थं तां च जग्राह पार्थः कामवशानुगाम्। एवमेष समुत्पन्नः परपक्षेऽर्जुनात्मजः॥
target: As she came to him under the influence of desire, the son of Pritha accepted her as his wife. Thus it was that Arjuna's son was begotten upon another's wife.

source: एवमादि महाराज विलप्य दिवमास्थितः। कामगेन स सौभेन क्षिप्त्वा मां कुरुनन्दन॥
target: O great king, having thus bewailed and abused me, O descendant of Kuru, he rose up in the sky in (his car) Saubha, coursing at will.

source: प्रणीतं कर्मणा मार्ग नीयमानः पुनः पुनः। प्राप्नोत्ययं कर्मफलं प्रवृत्तं धर्ममाप्तवान्॥
target: Continually driven along the path that is created by acts, he reaps the fruit of his acts for his having followed the practice of acts.

source: तेन शब्देन चैवाथ भीमसेनरवेण च। वनान्तरगताश्चापि वित्रेसुगपक्षिणः॥
target: With the roarings of these (animals), as well as with the shouts of Bhima, the wild animals living in distant forests were also alarmed.

source: स त्वं पुरुषशार्दूल विक्रम्य जहि कौरवान्॥ अहं च तेऽनुयास्यामि भीमः कृष्णश्च मारिष।
target: O foremost of men, putting forth your prowess, kill of Kurus, O sire, I shall follow you Bhima and Krishna,

source: मणिमन्तं समासाद्यं ब्रह्मचारी समाहितः। एकरात्रोषितो राजन्नग्निष्टोमफलं लभेत्॥
target: O king, going to Manimanta and practising Brahmacharya and subduing one's mind and living there for (only) one night, one obtains the fruits of Agnishtoma (sacrifice).

source: एवमुक्तस्तु वैदेह्या हनूमान् मारुतात्मजः। ततो रामं यथातत्त्वमाख्यातुमुपचक्रमे॥
target: Being thus addressed by Vaidehi, Hanuman, the Wind-god's son, began to give an exact description of Rāma.

source: श्चकार तस्मिन् हरिवीरमुख्ये। अवध्यतां तस्य कपेः समीक्ष्य कथं निगच्छेदिति निग्रहार्थम्॥
target: Thereupon, that son of the lord of Rākşasas pinned his thoughts upon that foremost of monkeys, and finding him incapable of being slain, he began to devise plans how he could be bound.

source: स्तस्य दुःखेऽप्यंशभाजः सहायाः। सहायानामेष संग्रहणेऽध्युपायः सहायाप्तौ पृथिवीप्राप्तिमाहुः॥
target: O king, he who enjoys his wealth with his adherents finds them sharers of his adversity. This is the best means of securing adherents. It is said he that has adherents wins the sovereignity of the whole world.

source: पाण्डुर्जित्वा बहून् देशान् बुद्ध्या विक्रमणेन च। अरण्ये मृगयाशीलो न्यवसन्मुनिभिः सह॥
target: Pandu, after conquering many countries by his valour and wisdom, retired into a forest and took up his abode with the Rishis.

source: आचख्युः कवयः केचित् संप्रत्याचक्षते परे। आख्यास्यन्ति तथैवान्ये इतिहासमिमं भुवि॥
target: Some bards have already sung this history; and some again are teaching it to others; others will no doubt do the same hereafter on earth.

source: शक्तिं विनिहतां दृष्ट्वा पुत्रस्तव विशाम्पते। महता रथवंशेन वारयामास माधवम्॥
target: Beholding that lance to be baffled, your son, O ruler of men, checked him of Madhu's race, surrounding him with a large number of cars,

target: Of the radiance of a thousand Moons, he was born in the city of the Kurus, known as Udayendu. In as much as in an assembly of the Somas he won great renown, he came to be siylcd Sutasoma.

source: तौ शरौषैस्तथाकीर्णो निकृत्तकवचध्वजौ। सृजन्तौ रुधिरं चोष्णं जलं प्रस्रवणाविव॥
target: And covered with vollies of shafts, with their armour and banners rent, they drew each other's warm blood flowing like water from a fountain.

source: प्रत्यक्षमिह देवेन्द्र पश्य लिङ्गं भगाङ्कितम्। देवदेवेन रुद्रेण सृष्टिसंहारहेतुना॥
target: See, O Indra, in the image of Mahadeva the marks of both the sexes. That god of gods, viz., Rudra, that cause of both creation and destruction, shows in his form the marks of both the sexes as the one cause of the creation of the universe.

source: वायवः क्रतवश्चैव संकल्पः प्राण एव च। मूर्तिमन्तो महात्मानो महाव्रतपरायणाः॥ एते चान्ये च बहवो ब्रह्माणं समुपस्थिताः। अर्थो धर्मश्च कामश्च हर्षो द्वेषस्तपो दमः॥
target: Declaration of purpose in sacrifices, the Ritual principles, these illustrious and vow observing beings in their personified forms, and many others too numerous to mention, all wait upon Brahma. Artha Dharma, Kama, Joy, Aversion, Asceticism and Peace of Mind,

target: And being worked up with anxiety, they approached Dadhimukha and said "Commanded by Hanumān the monkeys have forcibly devastated the Madhuvana and we were thrown high up by them in the sky.”

target: In the days of yore there lived an old swan on the coast of the sea. He always spoke of morality and used to instruct all the birds, but his conduct was otherwise.

source: यदा च सुरकार्यं ते अविषां भविष्यति॥ प्रादुर्भावं गमिष्यामि तदाऽऽत्मज्ञानदैशिकः।
target: At such time, however, when it will be difficult for you to accomplish the work of the gods, I shall then appear in incarnate forms perceiving the gravity of the emergencies.

target: Thereafter he smote down the king's standard with the sixth arrows, his bow with the seventh and his sword with the eighth, upon the ground.

source: जन्म श्वपाकमध्येऽपि मेऽस्तु हरचरणवन्दनरतस्य। मा वानीश्वरभक्तो भवानि भवनेऽपि शक्रस्य॥
target: I may be born among the very Shvapakas but I will still be devoted to the feet of Hara! Without, again, being devoted to that Lord of all creatures, I would not like to be born in the palace of Indra himself.

source: दुर्योधनो मदेनैष क्षेमं राष्ट्रादपोहति। विषाणं गौरिव मदात् स्वयमारुजतेऽऽत्मनः॥
target: In consequence of this intoxication, Duryodhana forcibly drives away luck and prosperity from his kingdom like an infuriated bull who breaks his own hours.

source: तौ तस्य तुरगान् हत्वा त्वरमाणौ महारथौ। छादयामासतुरुभौ शरवाण पार्षतम्॥
target: Then those mighty car-warriors both endued with greu activity, slaying the steeds of Prishata's son, shrouded him with a shower of arrows.

source: अद्याक्षोभ्यमपि क्रुद्धः क्षोभयिष्यामि सागरम्। वेलासु कृतमर्यादं सहस्रोमिसमाकुलम्॥ निर्मर्यादं करिष्यामि सायकैर्वरुणालयम्। महार्णवं क्षोभयिष्ये महादानवसंकुलम्॥
target: Being angered, today, albeit incapable of being agitated, will I agitate the deep. And by means of my shafts will I make Varuna's abode, surging with a thousand billows and having his dignity maintained by his shores, overleep his continents. And I will agitate the deep harbouring numbers of mighty Dānavas.

source: सर्वतेजोमयस्तस्मिशयानः पुरुषोत्तमः। सोऽग्रजं सर्वभूतानां संकर्षणमकल्पयत्॥
target: While thus floating upon the waters, that foremost of all beings, that resort of every sort of energy and splendour, created consciousness, the first-born of all beings in the universe.

source: निवार्यमाणः सुहृदा मया भृशं प्रसह्य सीतां यति धर्षयिष्यसि। गमिष्यसि क्षीणबल: सबान्धवो यमक्षयं रामशरास्तजीवितः॥
target: I am your friend and do ask you again and again to desist (from your evil intention); if do you encroach upon Sītā surely shall you along with your kinsmen go to the abode of Yama being enfeebled by the arrows of Rāma.

target: Yayāti the son of Nahușa, was greatly distressed on hearing of the ire of the preceptor Sukra. Thereupon meeting with the infirmities of age by the imprecation of the saint he said to his son Yadu.

source: नमस्ते कृष्णवासाय कृष्णकुञ्चितमूर्धजे॥ कृष्णाजिनोत्तरीयाय कृष्णाष्टमिरताय च।
target: Salutations to you who are clad in black, to you who are of dark and curly hair, to you who have dark deerskin for your upper garment, to you who preside over the eighth lunation of the dark fortnight.

source: ततो रुक्मरथो राजन्नर्केणेव विराजता। वरूथिना विनिष्पत्य व्यचरत् पृतनामुखे॥
target: Then, O monarch, that one (Drona) riding on the golden car like the sun himself in radiance, crushing hosts of the Pandavas, careed at will through its various divisions.

source: एवं स मन्त्रिवृद्धैश्च मात्रा च बहु बोधितः। न त्वामुत्सहते मोक्तुमर्थमर्थपरो यथा॥
target: Thus long exhorted by his counsellors as well as his mother, Rāvaņa does not make up his mind to emancipate you, even as a covetous person is loath to pare with wealth (appropriated).

source: इत्युक्तः प्राह देवान् स न शक्तोऽस्मि महीगतान्। दग्धुं तपो हि क्षीयेन्मे न शक्यामीति पार्थिव॥
target: Thus requested by the gods, Agastya replied to them, saying, Yes, I can consume those Asuras who are living underneath the Earth; but if I achieve such a feat, my penances will suffer decay. Hence, I shall not exert my power.

source: पुष्पाणि दिव्यानि ववर्ष देवः पार्थस्य मूर्ध्नि द्विषतां निहन्तुः॥

source: कृतेऽवहारे सैन्यानां प्रवृत्ते च रणे पुनः॥ कथं वैकर्तनः कर्णस्तत्रायुध्यत संजय। कथं च पाण्डवाः सर्वे युयुधुस्तत्र सूतजम्॥
target: O Sanjaya, how did Karna, the son of Vikartana, fight there (in the field of battle), when my troops had first re-retreated and again engaged themselves in the battle. And how also did the sons of Pandu fight in the field with the son of Suta?

source: अतिष्ठ युगमध्ये स युगसनहनेषु च। जधानार्थेषु चाश्वानां तत् सैन्यान्यभ्यपूजयन्॥
target: And sometimes beside the horses. His troops then applauded him highly. When he, armed with the sword, was thus moving quickly on the backs of those crimson steeds.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच विशेषार्थी ततो भीष्मः पौत्राणां विनयेप्सया॥ इष्वस्त्रज्ञान् पर्यपृच्छदाचार्यान् वीर्यसम्मतान्। नाल्पधी महाभागस्तथानानास्त्रकोविदः॥ नादेवसत्त्वो विनयेत् कुरूनस्त्रे महाबलान्। इति संचिन्त्य गाङ्गेयस्तदा भरतसत्तमः॥ द्रोणाय वेदविदुषे भारद्वाजाय धीमते। पाण्डवान् कौरवांश्चैव ददौ शिष्यान् नरर्षभ।॥
target: Vaishampayana said : Being desirous of giving his grand sons a superior education, Bhishma was in search of a preceptor, who was endued with energy and who was well-skilled in the science of arms. O best of the Bharata race, deciding that none who was not possessed of great intelligence, who was not illustrious, who was not a perfect master of the science of arms, who was not as powerful as the celestial, shall be the preceptor of the Kurus, the son of Ganga (Bhishma), placed the Pandavas and the Kurus under the tuition of the son of Bharadvaja, the wise Drona, learned in all the Vedas. Having been honoured according to the proper form by the illustrious Bhishma.

source: सत्यात् प्रच्यवमानानां संकल्पश्च तथा भवेत्। ततो यज्ञः प्रतायेत सत्यस्यैवावधारणात्॥
target: The purposes of those that have deviated from truth are in accordance with their condition and, so replying on the truth of the Vedas, perform sacrificial ceremonies.

source: रावणस्तु समासाद्य आदित्यांश्च वसूंस्तदा। न शशाक स सङ्गामे योद्धं शत्रुभिरदितः॥
target: And being worn out in the encounter with the Ādityas and Vasus he was not capable of fighting any more.

source: तर्पयित्वा सहस्राक्षः सलिलेन वसुंधराम्। निर्वर्तयित्वा सस्यानि कृतकर्मा व्यवस्थितः॥
target: Having satisfied the earth with a profuse discharge of water, produced crops and thus finished his work, the thousand eyed Deity is sitting silent.

source: यथा स सज्जेत् त्रिशिराः कामभोगेषु वै भृशम्। क्षिप्रं कुरुत गच्छध्वं प्रलोभयत् मा चिरम्॥
target: He ordered fairies (to engage themselves) in decoying the son of Tvashtri, so that the three-headed one might, for certain, engage himself in the enjoyment of sensual pleasure saying them

source: कुशध्वजो नाम पिता ब्रह्मर्षिरमितप्रभः। बृहस्पतिसुतः श्रीमान्बुद्ध्या तुल्यो बृहस्पतेः।।।।।
target: My sire is named Kušadhvaja a Brahmarși of immeasurable energy, son to Bệhaspati, endowed with grace, and like to Bphaspati himself in intelligence.

source: युधिष्ठिर उवाच आगतानेकचक्रायाः सोदर्यानेकचारिणः। भवन्तो वै विजानन्तु सह मात्रा द्विजर्षभाः॥
target: Yudhishthira said : O best of the twice born, know, Sirs, that we are five brothers travelling with our mother. We are now coming from Ekachakra.

source: कानीनश्च सहोदश्च कन्यायां यश्च जायते। वोढारं पितरं तस्य प्राहुः शास्त्रविदो जनाः॥
target: The two classes of sons called Kanina and Sahoda, which are begotten on a girl (before her marriage) have for their father, the man married by their mother-so it is said by people conversant with holy books.

source: एतद्धि रुचिराकारैः प्रासादैरुपशोभितम्। शिवं च रमणीयं च सर्वर्तुसुमहाधनम्॥
target: This one (the abode of Dushasana) is graced with many palaces beautiful to look at; and it is comfortable, enchanting and rich during every season of the year.

source: श्रान्ताय क्षुधितायानं यः प्रयच्छति भूमिपः। स्वायम्भुवं महत् स्थानं स गच्छति नराधिप॥
target: That king, who makes a gift of food to one who is toil-worn and hungry, acquires the regions of supreme happiness belonging to the Self-create.

source: मघास्वङ्गारको वक्रः श्रवणे च बृहस्पतिः। भगं नक्षत्रमाक्रम्य सूर्यपुत्रेण पीड्यते॥
target: Mars advances towards Magha and Brihaspati towards Shravana. the sun's offspring (Shani) advances towards Phalguni and afflicts it.

source: कथं च वो रथस्थानां शरवर्षाणि मुञ्चताम्। नीतोऽभिमन्युनिधनं कदर्थीकृत्य वः परैः॥
target: You were all then on your chariots and were shooting your arrows; how could then Abhimanyu be slain by the enemy spreading havoc in your troops?

source: यक्षेणमिता राजन् स्थूणाकर्णेन पालितम्। तद्भयादेव च जनो विसर्जयति तद् वनम्॥
target: That forest, O king, was inhabited by a very rich and powerful Yaksha named Sthunakarna a and it was through his fear that men forsook that forest.

source: उवाच ज्वलनं विप्र तदा गर्भबलोद्धता। ते न शक्तास्मि भगवंस्तेजसोऽस्य विधारणे॥
target: Overwhelmed with the energy of the seed she held in her womb, O learned Brahmana, she then addressed the god of fire, saying, I cannot any longer, O illustrious one, bear your seed in my womb.

source: दुर्योधनस्तु संक्रुद्धो धृष्टद्युम्नं महारणे। विव्याध निशितैर्बाणैश्चतुर्भिः समरे द्रुतम्॥
target: Inflamed with wrath, Duryodhana in that fierce battle pierced Dhrishtadyumna with four whetted arrows; and in battle, the feat was wonderful.

source: अशोभत महाराज सविद्युदिव तोयदः। तमापतन्तं सहसा मागधस्य गजोत्तमम्॥
target: Appeared as beautiful, O mighty, monarch, as a mass of clouds surcharged with lightning. Then that elephant of the Magadha king, that king was advancing with fury.

source: तस्य कर्णो धनुश्छित्त्वास्वर्णपुङ्खः शिलाशितैः। त्रिंशता परमेष्वासः शरैः पाण्डवमर्दयत्॥
target: Then Karna, that most powerful bowman, after having severed his (enemy's) bow with numerous shafts, winged with gold and sharpened on stone, crushed the son of Pandu with thirty other arrows.

source: तत्रावहारं सम्प्राप्तं मन्येऽहं पुरुषर्षभ। श्रान्ता भीताश्च नो योधा न योत्स्यन्ति कंथचन॥
target: O foremost of men, I think, the time has come now to withdraw our army. The troops will never fight, they are tired and struck with panic".

source: स्यूमरश्मिरुवाच स्वर्गकामो यजेतेति सततं श्रूयते श्रुतिः। फलं प्रकल्प्य पूर्वं हि ततो यज्ञः प्रतायते॥
target: One should celebrate sacrifices from desire of heaven'-we always hear this Shruti. Thinking first of the fruit, one makes preparations for sacrifice.

source: कालचारित्रतत्त्वज्ञः सर्वशास्त्रविशारदः॥ विवेचने कृतात्मासि स्पृहणीयो विजानताम्।
target: O son of Virochana, you know full well Time's conduct! You are well versed in all branches of knowledge. You are of purified Soul and a perfect master of your passions. You are a favourite of all wise persons.

source: तद्भवांश्चतुरङ्गेण बलेन महता वृतम्। व्यूह्येदं वानरानीकं निर्मथिष्यसि रावणम्॥
target: Therefore you, environed by a mighty army, having arrayed the monkey-forces in order of battle, shall thrash Ravana (in battle)

source: प्रभग्नं समरे दृष्ट्वा वानराणां महाबलम्। अभिदुद्राव सुग्रीवो महोदरमनन्तरम्॥
target: And beholding his powerful monkeys force thus assailed in the conflict, Sugrīva dashed for ward and fronted Mahodara.

source: तुर्वसुरुवाच न कामये जरां तात कामभोगप्रणाशिनीम्। बलरूपान्तकरणां बुद्धिप्राणप्रणाशिनीम्॥
target: Turvasu said : O father, I do not like old age. It destroys all pleasures and enjoyments, strength and beauty, the intellect and the memory, nay even life.

source: केचिद् दुर्योधनं राजन्नद्यमानाः किरीटिना। नापश्याम ततस्त्वेनं सैन्ये वै रजसावृते॥
target: And others, O king, being afflicted sore by the diadem-decked Arjuna, flew towards Duryodhana's division. Then we could not see Arjuna, as the army was enveloped in a cloud of dust.

source: धनुर्घोरं रामदत्तं गाण्डीवात् तद् विशिष्यते। त्रिस्सप्तकृत्वः पृथिवी धनुषा येन निर्जिता॥
target: That fierce bow, given away by Rama, is in every way superior to the Gandiva bow; with that bow the entire earth was conquered twenty-one times (by Bhargava).

source: कामं यथावद्विहितं विधात्रा पृष्टेन वाच्यं तु मया यथावत्। तपो हि नान्यच्चानशनान्मतं मे नमोऽस्तु ते देववर प्रसीद।
target: Asked by the Supreme Creator of all things, I have duly explained the merits of the vow of fast. In my opinion, there is no penance higher than fast. I bow to you, o foremost of all the celestials. Be propitiated with me.

source: विदुरस्य प्रभावं च संधिविग्रहकारितम्। विवृद्धिं च परां मत्वा पाण्डवानां भविष्यति॥ स सभाद्वारमागम्य विदुरस्मारमोहितः। समक्षं पार्थिवेन्द्राणां पपाताविष्टचेतनः॥
target: Remembering the great intelligence of Vidura in war and in peace and thinking of the future prosperity of the the Pandavas, he (Dhritarashtra), having been pained at the recollection of Vidura and having come to the door of the Assembly-Hall, fell down senseless in the presence of the kings.

source: निरपेक्षः शुको भूत्वा नि:स्नेहो मुक्तसंशयः। मोक्षमेवानुसंचिन्त्य गमनाय मनो दधे॥
target: Shuka, however, paid no heed to that request. Freed from affection and all doubt, he began to think only of Liberation, and set his heart on the journey.

source: अवजानन्नह मोहाद् बालोऽयमिति राघवम्। विश्वामित्रस्य तां वेदिमभ्यधावं कृतत्वरः॥
target: Being under the influence of sheer foolishness I passed by him as a child and darted towards the sacrificial alter of Viśvāmitra.

source: उपस्थितस्य कामस्य प्रतिवादो न विद्यते। अपि निर्मुक्तदेहस्य कामरक्तस्य किं पुनः॥
target: Should a man's lineage be jaded about, O king and also by his food and dress. There is no struggling with a desire when it come on.

source: साहं तपश्चरिष्यामि गर्भ मे दातुमर्हसि। ईश्वरं शक्रहन्तारं त्वमनुज्ञातुमर्हसि॥
target: I will engage in austerities: it behoves you to grant me such an embryo, such a slayer of Sakra it behoves you to promise me.

source: शूराश्च भद्रकाश्चैव शरकाण्डनिभा हयाः। पद्मकिञ्जल्कवर्णाभा दण्डधारमुदावहन्॥
target: Brave and gentle steeds resembling reedstalks and of the hue of the palms of the lotus, bore Dandadhara.

source: न च भीष्मो न च द्रोणो न च क्षत्ता न गौतमः। विवास्यमानान् कौन्तेयाननुमंस्यन्ति कर्हिचित्॥
target: Neither Bhishma, nor Drona, nor Kshatta (Vidura), nor Gautama, (Kripa) will ever sanction the banishment of the sons of Kunti.

source: भीष्म उवाच शिलरतये त्रिपथानुयोगरूपान्। बहुविधमनुशास्य तथ्यरूपान् गगनतलं द्युतिमान् विवेश सिद्धः॥
target: Bhishma said The learned ascetic gifted with high soul and great slendour and crowned with success having in this manner described to that poor Brahmana observing the Shila vow, on the subject of the infinite merits of Ganga, then ascended the sky.

source: लोकनाथ महाबाहो शिव नारायणाच्युत। तव वाक्यमुपश्रुत्य हर्षेणास्मि परिप्लुतः॥
target: O lord of all the worlds, O mighty-armed one, O Shiva, O Narayana, O you of undecaying glory, hearing your words I have been filled with joy.

source: व्यास उवाच तां गच्छन्तीमन्वगच्छत् तदानीं सोऽपश्यदारात् तरुणं दर्शनीयम्। सिद्धासनस्थं युवतीसहायं क्रीडन्तमैक्षद् गिरिराजमूर्तीि॥
target: Vyasa said : He (Indra) followed her and soon saw a handsome youth with a young lady. They were seated on a throne on the peaks of the king of mountains and they were playing with dice.

source: यदि वेदाः प्रमाणास्ते दिवसादूर्ध्वमच्युत। त्रयोदश समाः कालो ज्ञायतां परिनिष्ठितः॥
target: Therefore regard, O one of unfading glory, accepting the authority of the Vedas, the period of thirteen years equal to a day or so.

source: इत्युक्तः पाण्डवेयेन किरातः प्रहसन्निव। उवाच श्लक्ष्णया वाचा पाण्डवं सव्यसाचिनम्॥
target: Having been thus addressed by the Pandava, the Kirata spoke to the son of Pandu, Savyasachi (Arjuna), in these sweet words.

source: धृष्टद्युम्नो द्रोणमृत्युरिति विप्रथितं वचः। मद्वधाय श्रुतोऽप्यष लोके चाप्यति विश्रुतः॥
target: “Dhristadyumna is the slayer of Drona" is the general belief. I have heard that he is born to kill me. This is also widely known in the world.

source: मप्येकवीरो बलभित् सवज्रः। जरासंघश्चेदिराजो महात्मा महाबाहुश्चैकलव्यो निषादः॥ एकैकशो निहताः सर्व एते योगैस्तैस्तैस्त्वद्धितार्थं मयैव। अथापरे निहता राक्षसेन्द्रा। हिडिम्बकिर्मीरवकप्रधानाः। अलायुधः परचक्रावमर्दी घटोत्कचचोग्रकर्मा तरस्वी॥
target: The conqueror of Bala that excellent hero, wielding his thunder, cannot slay the indomitable Karna when he stands armed with weapons. Indeed, O Arjuna, for your welfare, by the help of numerous machinations, I have destroyed, one after another Jarasandha, the high-souled ruler of the Chedis, the mighty armed Ekalavya of the Nishada tribe, other great Rakshasas having Hidimba, Krimira and Vaka for their leaders, as also Alayudha that crusher of hostile troops and Ghatotkacha that guider of enemies and of fearful feats.

source: तत्र त्रिपथगां दिव्यां शीततोयामशैवलाम्। ददर्श राघवो गङ्गां रम्याषिनिषेविताम्॥ आश्रमैरविदूरस्थैः श्रीमद्भिः समलंकृताम्। कालेऽप्सरोभिहष्टाभिः सेविताम्भोह्रदां शिवाम्॥ देवदानवगन्धर्वैः किंनरैरुपशोभिताम्। नागगन्धर्वपत्नीभिः सेवितां सततं शिवाम्॥ देवाक्रीडशताकीर्णो देवोद्यानयुतां नदीम्। देवार्थमाकाशगतां विख्यातां देवपद्मिनीम्॥ जलाघाताट्टहासोग्रां फेननिर्मलहासिनीम्। क्वचिद् वेणीकृतजलां क्वचिदावर्तशोभिताम्॥ क्वचित् स्तिमितगम्भीरां क्वचिद् वेगसमाकुलाम्। क्वचिद् गम्भीरनिर्घोषां क्वचिद् भैरवनि:स्वनाम् ।।१७ देवसंघाप्लुतजलां निर्मलोत्पलसंकुलाम्। क्वचिदाभोगपुलिनां क्वचिनिर्मलवालुकाम्॥ हंससारससंघुष्टां चक्रवाकोपशोभिताम्। सदामत्तैश्च विहगैरभिपन्नामनिन्दिताम्॥ क्वचित् तीररुहैर्वृक्षैर्मालाभिरिव शोभिताम्। क्वचित् फुल्लोत्पलच्छन्नां क्वचित् पद्मवनाकुलाम्।।२ क्वचित् कुमुदखण्डैश्च कुड्मलैरुपशोभिताम्। नानापुष्परजोध्वस्तां समदामिव च क्वचित्॥ व्यपेतमलसंघातां मणिनिर्मलदर्शनाम्। दिशागजैर्वनगजैर्मत्तैश्च वरवारणैः॥ देवराजोपवाह्यश्च संनादितवनान्तराम्। प्रमदामिव यत्नेन भूषितां भूषणोत्तमैः॥ फलपुष्पैः किसलयैर्वृतां गुल्मैर्द्विजैस्तथा। विष्णुपादच्युतां दिव्यामपापां पापनाशिनीम् ॥ शिंशुमारैश्च नत्रैश्च भुजङ्गैश्च समन्विताम्। शंकरस्य जटाजूटाद् भ्रष्टां सागरतेजसा ॥ समुद्रमहिषीं गङ्गां सारसक्रौञ्चनादिताम्। आससाद महाबाहुः शृङ्गवेरपुरं प्रति॥
target: Then Rāghava saw the celestial Gangā running in three courses with cool waters free from moss, beautiful to behold, frequented by the sages, adorned with graceful asylums close by, containing sacred watery expanses haunted at the hours of sport by delighted Apsaras, graced with celestials, Danvas, Gandharbas, and Kinnaras, ever holy, attended by the wives of Nagas and Gandharbas, with hills serving as sporting-places for the celestials, the river surrounded by gardens of the immortals, that for the behoof of the celestials had ascended heaven, famous, furnished with assemblage of celestial lotuses, with the rocks laughing aloud in consequence of the dashing of water, laughing without blemish with foam, sometimes having her water flowing like a braid, and sometimes decked by eddies, sometimes still and deep, and sometimes rushing furiously, sometimes sounding solemnly and sometimes roaring dreadfully, with crowds of deities bathing in its water, embellished with fresh-blown lotuses, having spacious shoals and spots covered with glittering sand, resounding with the cries of cranes of various kinds graced by Chakravakas, ever resorted to by maddened fowls, without blame, decked by trees on its banks resembling garlands somewhere covered with full-blown lotuses and somewhere containing multitudes of lotuses, at places decked with tracts of lilies, at others with opening buds, rife with the farina of various flowers, sometimes resembling a proud female, removing the dirt of sin, translucent like a gem to the view, with the elephants of the quarters, wild ones, mad ones, as well as those the best of their species, and those carrying the foremost of celestials, roaring in the neighbouring woods, adorned carefully with the choicest ornaments like to a damsel, crowded with flowers and fruits and bushes as also with birds, flowing from the feet of Vişnu, divine, without sin, capable of destroying it, filled with porpoises, crocodiles and snakes, drawn out from the matted locks of Sankara by the energy of Sagara's descendant, the queen of the Ocean, resonant with the cries of cranes and krauñcas. The mighty-armed Rāma came to the Gangā near Śộngaverapura.

source: इमां सपर्यां सह सर्वकामदैः श्रियश्च शक्रप्रमुखैश्च दैवतैः। पठन्ति ये विप्रसदःसमागताः समृद्धकामाः श्रियमाप्नुवन्ति ते॥
target: They who, seeking advancement, appear before assemblies of Brahmanas, and read this description of the glorification of Shree by all the gods headed by Indra,-deities competent to grant every wish, succeed in acquiring great prosperity.

source: जाम्बवान् वानरश्रेष्ठः सह सर्वैः प्लवङ्गमैः। भूतलात् सहसोत्थाय गृध्रराजानमब्रवीत्॥
target: Then Jāmbavān-foremost of monkeystogether with all the monkeys, arising suddenly from the ground, spoke to the vulture-king, saying,

source: अन्यान् बाणान् समीक्षस्व यैस्त्वं मां सूदयिष्यसि। तच्छुत्वा स विचिन्त्याथ ततो वचनमब्रवीत्॥
target: Do you look for other arrows with which to kill me! Hearing these words and thinking on them, he said as follows.

source: जीमूतस्येव धर्मान्ते द्रक्ष्यन्ति युधि सैनिकाः॥ जेष्याम्यद्य रणे पार्थं सायकैर्नतपर्वभिः।
target: My soldiers will behold me like a cloud discharging torrents of rain at the end of the summer. Today I will, by means of straight arrows, conquer the sons of Pritha.

source: ततो युद्धं समभवत्सुराणां सह राक्षसैः। क्रुद्धानां रक्षसां कीर्तिं समरेष्वनिवर्तिनाम्॥
target: Thereupon there arose with Rākşasas a terrible encounter of the celestials unable to bear their fame in battle.

source: इति मां त्वं विजानीहि सर्वलोकस्य जाजले। समं मतिमतां श्रेष्ठ समलोष्टाश्मकाञ्चनम्॥
target: Know, O Jajali, that I regard equally all creatures. O highest of intelligent men, I perceive no difference between a clod of earth, a piece of stone, and a lump of gold.

source: अतीव रूपेण समन्विता त्वं न चाप्यरण्येषु बिभेषि किं नु। देवी नु यक्षी यदि दानवी वा वराप्सरा दैत्यवराङ्गना वा॥
target: You are endued with great beauty; do you not feel any fear in this forest? Are you a goddess or a Yakshi or a Danavi or the beautiful wife of a Daitya?

source: अतिमात्रमयं देशो मनोज्ञः प्रतिभाति मे। तापसानां निवासोऽयं व्यक्तं स्वर्गपथोऽनघ ॥
target: This country appears to me exceedingly lovely. This abode of the ascetics is like to the way to heaven itself.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच कृतवान् धर्मराजो भीष्मेणोक्तो विधिवद् गोप्रदाने। तथा सर्वे स मान्धातुर्देवदेवोपदिष्टं सम्यग्धर्मं धारयामास राजा॥
target: Vaishampayana said Thus addressed by Bhishma on the subject of properly making gifts of kine, king Yudhishthira did all that Bhishma desired. Indeed, king Yudhishthira bore in mind the whole of that religion which the preceptor of the gods imparted to the Royal Mandhatri.

source: आसादितमिदं घोरं तुमुलं लोमहर्षणम्। पाञ्चालीमपकर्षद्भिः सभामध्ये तपस्विनीम्॥
target: The wretches have brought on themselves this fearful, wholesale and horrible destruction by dragging into the Sabha the ascetic princess of Panchala.

source: तद् वचो भीमसेनस्य प्रियं अज्ञातशत्रुः कौन्तेयो हृष्टोऽभूत् सह सोदरैः॥
target: Hearing those pleasant words of Bhimasena, O king, Yudhishthira was, with all his brothers, filled with joy.

source: ऋषीणां च प्रसादेन कपिवृद्धमतेन च॥ गुरूणां च प्रसादेन संप्लव त्वं महार्णवम्।
target: By the grace of the saints, and with the permission of the aged monkeys, and by the blessing of the superiors, do you bound over the mighty main.

source: ततो द्रोणस्य यन्तारं निपात्यैकेषुणा भुवि। अश्वान् व्यद्रावयद् बाणैर्हतसूतांस्ततस्ततः॥
target: He then felled Drona's driver by striking him with a single arrow; then with other arrows, he compelled his horses to run away from the field.

source: सर्वायुधमहामानं विजयं नाम तद्धनुः। इन्द्रार्थं प्रियकामेन निर्मितं विश्वकर्मणा॥
target: My bow, that was known by the name of Vijaya, was the most supreme of all weapons. It was made by Vishvakarman with the object of performing what was agreeable to Indra.

source: ऋत्विज ऊचुः वर्तते तव राजेन्द्र कमैतद्विधिवत्प्रभो। अस्मै तु द्विजमुख्याय वरं त्वं दातुमर्हसि॥
target: The Ritvijas said : O king of kings, O Lord, your this act (sacrifice) is being properly performed. It is now proper for you to grant a boon to this best of Brahmanas (Astika).

source: द्रोणेन चैवमुक्तस्य तव पुत्रस्य भारत। सहसा निःसृतो भावो योऽस्य नित्यं हदि स्थितः।।१३
target: ( Bharata, when your son had been thus addressed by Drona, the feeling that was then present in his heart, suddenly round vent.

source: संवर्त उवाच मा स्मैव त्वं पुनरागाः कथंचित् बृहस्पतिं परिदातुं मरुत्ते। मां त्वां धक्ष्ये चक्षुषा दारुणेन संक्रुद्धोऽहं पावक त्वं निबोध॥
target: You must never come again thus to present Brihaspati to Marutta; for know, O Pavaka, (Agni), if you do, I losing my temper, will burn you with my fierce evil eyes.

source: माल्यगन्धानलङ्कारान् वस्त्राणि विविधानि च। एतान्येवाभिजानाति यतो जाता हि भामिनी॥
target: Since her very birth the handsome lady has only been accustomed to garlands, perfumes, ornaments and diverse kinds of robes.

source: स तैः शूरैरनुज्ञातो ययौ राजनिवेशनम्। पार्थमादाय गोविन्दो ददर्श च युधिष्ठिरम्॥
target: Having been thus permitted by those warriors he started for the camp of the king. Govinda, then, with Partha, saw Yudhishthira.

source: वसिष्ठो विजयश्चैव जाबालिरथ काश्यपः। कात्यायनो गौतमश्च वामदेवस्तथैव च॥ अभ्यषिञ्चनरव्याघ्र प्रसन्नेन सुगन्धिना। सलिलेन सहस्राक्षं वसवो वासवं यथा॥
target: Vasistha, Vijaya, Jabali, Katyayana, Gautama and Vāmadeva, sprinkled that foremost of men, with clear and fragrant water as Vasus did the thousand eyed Vasava.

source: वध्यमानेषु संग्रामे पञ्चालेषु महात्मना। उदीर्यमाणे द्रोणारे पाण्डवान् भयमाविशत्॥
target: Then beholding the slaughter of the Panchalas by the high-souled Drona and seeing his weapons enshroud all sides, the Pandavas became frightened.

source: एवमुक्तः स शक्रेण देवो नारायणः प्रभुः। अब्रवीन्न परित्रासः कर्तव्यः श्रूयतां च मे॥ न तावदेष दुष्टात्मा शक्यो जेतुं सुरासुरैः। हन्तुं चापि समासाद्य वरदानेन दुर्जयः॥
target: Being thus addressed by Śakra the lord Narayana; said, "Do not fear, hear what I say. He is invincible by virtue of the boon, and that vicious-souled one is incapable of being vanquished even by the celestials and Asuras.

source: नानाप्रहरणाः क्षिप्रमितो गच्छत सत्वराः। जनस्थानं हतस्थानं भूतं पूर्वं खरालयम्॥ तत्रास्यतां जनस्थाने शून्ये निहतराक्षसे। पौरुषं बलमाश्रित्य त्रासमुत्सृज्य दूरतः॥
target: Equipped with various weapons, do you speedily take yourself to Janasthāna-that field of carnage-which ere this contained the abode of Khara; and casting off fear at a distance, do you sojourn in vacant Janasthāna with all its Raksasas slain (by Rama).

source: स्नानालंकरणैर्हद्यैर्गन्धमाल्यैश्च सुप्रभैः। धनंजयस्य रूपेण शरैर्मन्मथचोदितैः॥
target: After the both she adorned herself with charming and greatly splendid ornaments and sweet scented garlands. Her heart was pierced by the arrows of the god of love on account of the beauty and grace of Dhananjaya (Arjuna).

source: तेजस्विनः : कुमारस्य शराः परमदारुणाः॥ क्षिण्वन्ति हृदयं मेऽद्य घोराः पावकतेजसः। तमाचार्योऽब्रवीत् कर्णं शनकैः प्रहसन्निव॥
target: The fierce and exceedingly dreadful darts, corroding like fire, of this very furious prince, are this day sucking my heart's strength in battle.” Then softly and with a smile the preceptor replied to Karna saying-

source: मार्कण्डेय उवाच ततः काले बहुतिथे व्यतिक्रान्ते कदाचन। प्राप्तः स कालो मर्तव्यं यत्र स्तयवता नृप॥
target: Markandeya aid : After the lapse of a long while, O king, the time for Satyavana's death at last arrived.

source: ते हन्यमाना द्रोणेन पञ्चालाः प्राद्रवन् भयात्। पश्यतो भीमसेनस्य पार्थस्य च महात्मनः॥
target: The Panchalas, (thus) destroyed by Drona fled away in terror in the very presence of Bhimasena and in that of the high-souled Pritha.

source: एवं वर्षसहस्राणि नव तस्यातिचक्रमुः। शिरांसि नव चाप्यस्य प्रविष्टानि हुताशनम्॥
target: In this way, he passed away nine thousand years, and nine of his heads entered into Fire.

source: मनुजेन्द्रार्तरूपेण यदुक्तस्त्वं हनूमता। तदयुक्तमहं मन्ये सागरस्येव शोषणम्॥
target: O king, all that Hanumān in distressful guise had communicated to you I deem as improbable, like to the drying of the deep.

source: संध्याकालं उपावृत्ते मुहुर्ते चातिदारुणे। ततः संचिन्त्य भगवान् वरदानं महात्मनः॥
target: It was evening and the moment was aweinspiring and the god thus thought of the boons granted by the large minded one (Vishnu).

source: भगीरथस्तु राजर्षिः कृत्वा सलिलमुत्तमम्। यथाक्रमं यथान्यायं सागराणां महायशाः॥ कृतोदकः शुची राजा स्वपुरं प्रविवेश ह। समृद्धार्थो नरश्रेष्ठ स्वराज्यं प्रशशास ह॥
target: The royal saint king Bhagiratha also of high fame having performed his ablutions and purified himself, and duly and in proper order offered oblations of water to the sons of Sagara, entered his capital. And attaining exceeding prosperity, that foremost of men ruled his kingdom.

source: सर्वेषां दीयतां देयं मुञ्चन् कोपमदावुभौ। साधु धर्मेति धर्मेति नान्यच्छ्रयेत भाषितम्॥
target: Dispelling all anger and vengeance he always said, “Give to each what each is to have.” The only sounds that could be heard (in his kingdom) were, "Blessed be Dharma, blessed be Dharma."

source: ईष्र्युः परसुखं दृष्ट्वा अन्यस्य च बुभूषकः। त्रिवर्गहन्ता चान्येषामात्मकामानुवर्तकः॥
target: Seeing the happiness of other I was filled with envy and I always wished them poverty. Acting thus which promised to crown my own wishes with fruition, I sought to destroy the virtue, riches, and pleasures of other people.

source: साधु धर्ममवेक्षस्व साधु साधुव्रतं चर। यथा तव तथान्येषां रक्ष्या दारा निशाचर॥
target: Have your eyes always on religion and do you follow in the track of piety. Like to yours own wives, others are worthy of being protected by you, O ranger of the night.

source: प्रतिवक्तुं प्रकृष्टे हि नापकृष्टस्तु शक्नुयात्। यदयुक्तं मया पूर्वं प्रमादाद् वाक्यमप्रियम् ॥ तत्रापि खलु मां दोषं कर्तुं नार्हसि राघव। त्वं हि दृष्टार्थतत्वज्ञः प्रजानां च हिते रतः। कार्यकारणसिद्धौ च प्रसन्ना बुद्धिरव्यया॥
target: An inferior person can by no means address his superior improperly. It does not behove you, O Rāghava, therefore to blame me for those unpleasant words which I used towards you, out of foolishness. You have acquired a practical mastery over the principles of religion and are ever engaged in the welfare of your subjects. Your eternal power of ascertaining the crime and meeting its condign punishment is perfectly clear.

source: न तस्य मृत्युरन्योऽस्ति कश्चिद्धिपुरुषर्षभ। दर्शनं योऽभिगच्छेत स वध्यो लवणेन हि॥
target: O foremost of men, he shall not be slain by any other expedient than that I have acquainted yourself with. If he can perceive before, whoever that enemy might be, Lavana shall forsooth destroy him.

source: यो न कामयते किंचिन्न किंचिदवमन्यते। इहलोकस्थ एवैष ब्रह्मभूयाय कल्पते॥
target: He who never desires for anything, who despises nothing, becomes eligible, even when living in this world, for assimilation with Brahma.

source: दुःखिताः खरघातेन राक्षसाः पिशिताशनाः। तैः सीता निहता घोरैर्भविष्यति न संशयः॥
target: The Rākşasas subsisting flesh are aggrieved because of Khara having been slain; and now, without doubt, those terrible ones have slain Sita.

source: ततो रामः प्रादुरासीत् प्रज्वलन्निव तेजसा। शिष्यैः परिवृतो राजन् जटाचीरधरो मुनिः॥
target: Then did Rama come there as if blazing with energy, the anchorite having matted hairs wearing deer skin was surrounded by his disciples.

source: स तथा तय॑मानस्तु पाण्डुपुत्रैर्विशेषतः। विहीनश्च स्वकै त्यैर्निर्जने चावृतो भृशम्॥
target: Chastised there by the sons of Pandu, while lying concealed in such a solitary place after having been deprived of his followers and attendants, alas, how did he answer the Pandavas upon hearing such bitter and departed rebukes from his victorious enemies. Tell me everything, O Sanjaya, about it.'

source: असद्भ्यो दीयते यत्तु तद् दानमिह भुज्यते। यादृशं दीयते दानं तादृशं फलमश्नुते॥
target: Whatever is given to those that are not good yields fruits in this world. The fruits of gifts are proportionate of the gifts offered.

source: ध्रुवं श्रेयः परं तात भविष्यति तवोत्तमम्। यस्य ते पुरुषव्याघ्रः सखा चायं जनार्दनः॥
target: O son, Forsooth, high and great benefits will be reaped by you who have that foremost of all persons, viz., Vasudeva, for your friend.

source: कर्णं द्वादशभिर्विद्ध्वा वृषसेनं त्रिसिः शरैः॥ शल्यस्य सशरं चापं मुष्टिदेशे व्यकृन्तत।
target: Piercing Karna with twelve and Vrishasena with three shafts. He cut-off Shalya's bow, once more near the handle.

source: कार्ये व्यासक्तमनसः संकल्पो जाग्रतो ह्यपि। यद्वन्मनोरथैश्वर्यं स्वप्ने तद्वन्मनोगतम्॥
target: As the imagination of a person who is awake and engaged in acts, is due only to the creative power of the mind, similarly, the impressions in a dream belong only to the mind.

source: मां चापि राजञ्जानन्ति ह्याकुमारमिमाः प्रजाः॥ नाज्ञातचर्यां पश्यामि मेरोरिव निगूहनम्।
target: O king, all the people know me from my childhood. I do not see how I shall be able to live undiscovered and unknown. The Meru (mountains) might as well be concealed!
